npc.318: Please try out Large Ship Construction when you have enough resources and materials to spare!

80.Intro: I am the battleship Nagato. I'll be counting on you. Leave the enemy battleships to me.
80.Library: The first battleship born under the Eight-Eight Fleet Program and nameship of the Nagato-class battleships, Nagato here. Until the Yamato-class was commissioned, I served as the flagship of the Combined Fleet. I was known around the world as one of the "Big Seven".
80.Poke(2): Is there something on my face?
80.Poke(3): I'd prefer it if you wouldn't touch my rigging so much.
80.Married: It's alright... I'm right here beside you.
80.Wedding: What is this...? What is this vision, deep inside my memories? Ships, both friend and foe, and then that massive light... I must be exhausted... right, Admiral?
80.Equip(1): My thanks. Now I can fight on their level.
80.Equip(2): Modernization, huh? I don't really need it, though...
80.Supply: My thanks. Now I can fight on their level.
80.Docking(1): A little bit of maintenance is essential.
80.Docking(2): I'd prefer to enter the decisive battle in perfect condition.
80.Construction: It seems a new comrade has been launched. Looking forward to meeting her.
80.Return: Mission complete. The fleet has returned.
80.Battle: Don't underestimate the power of the Big Seven.
80.Attack: The long-awaited decisive battle, huh. I'm getting all excited.
80.Yasen(1): Alright! Fleet, I, Nagato, shall lead the way!
80.Yasen(2): All main batteries, full salvo! Fiiiiire!
80.MVP: Compared to the glory of serving as the Combined Fleet's flagship, this is insignificant, but I'll accept... it.
80.Damaged(2): The Nagato-class' armor isn't just for show.
80.Damaged(3): Ngh... The enemy fleet is pretty good...
80.Sunk: To sink in the midst of battle... and not in that light... how satisfying...
80.NewYears 6547: Happy New Year, huh... it makes my heart swell.
80.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun, huh... I'm willing to play the demon... No, these are absolutely not horns! Ah... hey, the destroyers are already throwing at me! Well, I guess I have no choice... ROAAARR!!
80.Valentines 6547: Uh... um, that is... I happened to make some. N-No, it was Mutsu's idea, ok? Saying that these things are important... Ah... how does it... what do you think?
80.Anniversary 6547: It has been three years for us. How thrilling... Right. Today, let's open our naval shop magnificently! I see, It's the third year... Time sure flies...
80.Rainy 6547: Mutsu. ...What's this? An umbrella? ....Ah, much appreciated. Rain in the rainy season, huh...? Well, a calm day like this once in a while isn't bad sometimes....
80.Summer 6547: Alright! Summer is here! Fleet, assemble at the beach with your swimsuits! We're going to practice 'beach volleyball'! I, Nagato, have already set the teams!
80.Xmas 6547: So this is... Christmas, huh... Hmm... I see.
80.Xmas 1471: Admiral, you're always working so hard. Let's have a drink together today.
80.YearsEnd 6547: It's already December, huh... A year passed in the blink of an eye. Hm? What is it, Mutsu? Eh? ...Cleaning? I'll be doing that, too? Ah, guess there's no avoiding it, huh. Well then, I'll get the floor!

275.Intro: I, Nagato, am not about to lose to some newcomers.
275.Poke(3): W-Wha... n-no... I-I don't mind... it...
275.Idle: Hm? What? It's not like I have too much time on my hands or anything. Yes, indeed. I am so busy...
275.Supply: That's true. I should eat while I have the chance.

81.Intro: Second of the Nagato-class battleships, Mutsu. Pleased to meet you. Don't play with fire too much, okay? ...Please?
81.Library:
Second of the Nagato-class battleships to have been born, Mutsu.

Naturally, I'm a part of the world's Big Seven ships.

Eh? The main cannon gunpowder explosion incident? Well, I guess there's no point in hiding it. This time will be fine!
81.Poke(3): Like I said, be careful with that or you'll start a fire inside of me! Hey, are you listening?
81.Married: If it's for you, I'll work hard again today, you know?
81.Wedding: Admiral...! Why do you keep looking at my third turret? If you want to look, look over here♥
81.Equip(1): My, it's fine. It's not like anything will happen, you know?
81.Equip(2): Hmm...? Not bad, right? Thank you.
81.Supply: My, it's fine. It's not like anything will happen, you know?
81.Docking(1): I'll be fixing my makeup for a bit.
81.Docking(2): My clothes were ruined. Would you mind...?
81.Construction: Looks like a new warship has been built.
81.Sortie: So it's my turn? Sounds good. I'll let them have it!
81.Battle: Enemy ship spotted! Open all gunports!
81.Yasen(1): Well then, let's deliver the final blow.
81.Yasen(2): Third turret... what are you doing?
81.MVP: My, it was me? Hmm... so even something like that can happen. It doesn't feel bad at all.
81.Sunk: Sinking in battle... I wonder why... I don't feel any regrets...
81.NewYears 6547: Admiral? Happy New Year! Please treat me well again this year! Oh, and also, please take good care of Nagato. That girl can be a little awkward at times, you know?
81.Setsubun 6547: Eh? I'm also a demon? That's fine, but... I see. These aren't demon horns, you know? Eh? So Nagato is really getting into this? I guess I have no choice...
81.Valentines 6547: Heeere~ Admiral. It's a bit of a mature chocolate. Here you go. Make sure you eat it, okay? Ufufu♪
81.Anniversary 6547: Oh! Oh my! It's the third anniversary! Amazing that it still goes on. I'm a bit surprised over it. Oh, that's not what I meant. I meant well.
81.Rainy 6547: Ah, Nagato, are you going out? Bring this umbrella along. It's going to continue all day today. The rain, that is.
81.Summer 6547: What is it, Nagato? Beach volleyball? That's okay, but... do you know the rules? My, my, it can't be helped. Leave it to me!
81.Fall 6547: The battle seems like it'll be a little big this time. We may have to sortie with all of our strength. We need to be prepared. I also need to put a bit more energy into my makeup. One moment.
81.YearsEnd 6547: Well, the end of the year always ends up so busy. Let's get the cleaning done early. Ufufu♪ Nagato, won't you please take care of this area?

276.Poke(2): Like I said, be careful with that or you'll start a fire inside of me! Hey, are you listening?
276.Poke(3): Didn't I tell you not to get a fire burning...? Eh? You're serious? Hmm~ then Onee-san... won't be held responsible♥
276.Idle: My... my, my. You're leaving me all by my lonesome... My, oh, my!

131.Intro:
First of the Yamato-class battleships, Yamato.
I have come forth!
131.Library:
First of the Yamato-class battleships, Yamato here.

As the trump card of the Decisive Battle Doctrine, I was built in absolute secrecy at the Kure Naval Arsenal.

With what was then the most advanced and sophisticated technology inside of me, and alongside the second ship, Musashi, I will do my best as the backbone of the Combined Fleet's war potential!
131.Poke(2): You called me a hotel? N-No, I'm not!
131.Poke(3): Umm...? Are you really that interested...? Is it because there are so many secondary guns?
131.Idle: Mm... ah... Admiral, I apologize. Is my main battery getting in the way?
131.Married: Admiral, aren't you feeling a bit tired?
131.Wedding: Admiral, as always, thank you so much. Even more than serving as flagship of the Combined Fleet... and more than fighting enemy battleships... it's now... this moment... that I love the most. I will... always, Admiral... at my darling's side, I shall do my best.
131.Join: Battleship Yamato. The Combined Fleet is sortieing!
131.Equip(1): A remodel, then? You have my thanks!
131.Supply: I shall gratefully partake of them.
131.Docking(1): I'm going into the bath for a bit.
131.Docking(2): Ow, ow, ow... I'm very sorry. I didn't think I would take this much damage.
131.Construction: The construction of a new ship seems to be complete.
131.Return: Thank you for your hard work. The fleet has returned.
131.Battle: Then, let's begin. Prepare for surface combat!
131.Attack: First and second cannons: volley fire. Begin!
131.Yasen(1): Battleship Yamato, forcing a night engagement!
131.Yasen(2): The bracket fire... Mm. The next shot will be a direct hit!
131.MVP: I'm the best one? That makes me feel a little proud. Please leave the next naval battle to me as well!
131.Damaged(1): D-Did you think you'd landed a direct hit!?
131.Damaged(2): If we don't correct the listing... Hurry with the counterflooding!
131.Damaged(3): Gh... in a place like this... I'm not... going to sink!
131.Sunk: Once again... I'm going to fall... all hands... to the top deck... Musashi... Shinano... I leave the rest to you...
131.H0100: 0100. Admiral, shouldn't you be going to bed soon?
131.H0200: Admiral? Will you be okay without resting? The present time is 0200.
131.H0300: 0300. Surely by now you've begun to feel tired?
131.H0400: The present time is 0400. Admiral, it will be morning soon.
131.H0500: Admiral, it's 0500. The sky is starting to grow brighter.
131.H0600: It's morning. 0600. Admiral, the morning arrived so quickly.
131.H0700: 0700. It's breakfast time. Would you like some of Yamato Hotel's famous consommé?
131.H0800: The present time is 0800. As the Combined Fleet's flagship, I will be in operation soon.
131.H0900: 0900. Admiral, how is today's operation mobilization going?
131.H1000: Admiral, how will we utilize the other fleets? The present time is 1000.
131.H1100: 1100. I'll have to start preparing for lunch soon... What would be good to make?
131.H1200: 1200. It's lunchtime, so Yamato Hotel's famous- ...ah... I'm not a hotel!
131.H1300: It's 1300... You get a little drowsy after eating.
131.H1400: 1400. Zzz... Ah! Um... I'm not asleep!
131.H1500: 1500. Admiral, would you like a Ramune?
131.H1700: 1700. Admiral, the sun will be setting soon.
131.H1800: The present time is 1800. For today, shall we grant half the ships shore leave?
131.H1900: 1900. Let's suspend our fleet duties for today so we can have dinner.
131.H2000: It's 2000. It's a full course dinner. After all, Yamato Hotel is...
131.H2100: 2100. Admiral, why not partake of my hospitality?
131.H2200: The present time is 2200. Isn't it about time for a bath?
131.H2300: It's currently 2300. Admiral, as always, you did an excellent job today.
131.NewYears 6547: Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! The First Battleship Division and I will be counting on you again this year! Now, let's go.
131.Anniversary 6547: Admiral. Our fleet has reached the third year. Congratulations. I, Yamato...I am so happy! Let's make a toast with 'ramune'.
131.Rainy 6547: Iowa-san? Ah, isn't that teru teru bozu cute? Say, would you like to make one together? For the ones I make, it goes like...
131.Summer 6547: Admiral, please don't stare so much! Maybe red and white was a little too flashy...? I-Is that so? Well then, that's a relief. Admiral, let's go together.
131.Fall 6547: Admiral, it's fall. Fall is a time for delicious food. I've also come up with a "New Full Course".
131.Saury 6547: Saury? This is saury fishing support? Orders understood. The battleship Yamato will accompany you to the northern seas!
131.Xmas 6547: Merry Christmas! Admiral, I put my full power into making a special Christmas dinner! I've roasted us a turkey. H-Huh? Zuikaku-san...?

136.Intro: First of the Yamato-class battleships, Yamato, now with drastically improved anti-air weaponry.
136.Poke(1): Admiral...? Umm... no, it's fine, but...
136.Poke(2): Geez! Stop calling me a hotel already!
136.Poke(3): Admiral? Um... well, my living conditions are noticeably different than the other girls'. ...Is that okay?
136.Married: Admiral, aren't you feeling a bit tired? Shall I brew us some of my specially made black tea? It'll help put you at ease. Ufu♪ ...Please wait just a moment.
136.Ranking: Our fleet's military record? I'm looking forward to this!
136.Equip(1): Anti-air. Anti-ship. ...Which one should I focus on...?
136.Equip(2): I'm pleased with this. Admiral, you have my thanks!
136.Docking(1): I shall take a relatively short bath.
136.Docking(2): It... it's not as if I underestimated them, but... I apologize.
136.Construction: New ship girls have been added to our lineup.
136.Return: The fleet has safely returned. How wonderful...
136.Attack: Enemy ship acquired. All guns: annihilate them!
136.Yasen(2): I see... Very well... then you leave me no choice!

143.Intro: Hmpf, it seems that I've kept you waiting ... Second of the Yamato-class battleships, Musashi, has arrived!
143.Library: Second of the Yamato-class battleships, Musashi. Laid down in Nagasaki. My best regards to you. As with my sister ships Yamato and Shinano, I was constructed under strict secrecy. Ah, I really want to be able to shoot these main cannons... I ask of you, may I? Excellent!
143.Poke(2): Just where are you looking? I'm right here, no?
143.Poke(3): Hmpf, you called me over? You want me to entertain you?
143.Idle: Admiral, if you're busy, you should close the browser - that's the admiral way. What? You were thinking of the next strategy? My apologies then.
143.Married: Admiral, You're quite the hard-worker, huh.  Admiral, did the fatigue not accumulate? Taking an adequate rest is also a proper way of being an Admiral. What? You were fascinated by me? Hahahaha! You're a funny one, partner!
143.Wedding: Admiral, I have confidence that I will guard you from any adversaries. Hmph... You doubt me? You sure had me taken lightly. With that said, I'll be counting on you from now on, partner.
143.Join: Leave this battle to me, Musashi!
143.Docking(1): I'll be cleaning off dirt for a while.
143.Docking(2): Well, let's go off to the bath.
143.Construction: A new girl has arrived, hmm? Let's go.
143.Return: Operation complete. The fleet is back.
143.Battle: My cannons aren't just for show!
143.Yasen(1): Hahaha! How amusing! Did you think you'd get away?
143.Yasen(2): Taste the true power of our main cannons.
143.MVP: I am a Yamato-class. The second, improved model. It's only natural. But, I will accept your praise.
143.Damaged(1): That attack felt just like a mosquito's bite!
143.Damaged(2): Geh, that's right! Bring it on! I'm right here!
143.Damaged(3): Not yet... with just this, I, Musashi... cannot sink!
143.Sunk: For I, Musashi, managed to block the attacks on everybody else... Well... I'm... satisfied...
143.H0000: This Musashi will inform you that it is now midnight.
143.H0100: 1 o'clock, huh... Even this late... to have such enthusiasm...
143.H0300: Admiral. It is 3 o'clock. This Musashi... is dozing off...
143.H0400: 4 o'clock, hmm? Is the admiral on the night watch today, perhaps?
143.H0500: It's 5 o'clock now, huh? I don't dislike the morning.
143.H0600: 6 o'clock, hmm? It's starting to get light.
143.H0700: 7 o'clock. Admiral. You're energetic in the morning, too, huh?
143.H0800: The admiral is the admiral, huh? Oh, sorry, it is now 8 o'clock.
143.H0900: 9 o'clock... Now that I think of it, is Yamato in this fleet?
143.H1000: 10 o'clock, if Yamato is here, then that's amazing. That girl, she's unexpectedly shy, you know? She doesn't go out much.
143.H1100: 11 o'clock. Do you have any problems? Don't worry. This Musashi, I, will take care of them.
143.H1200: Time for lunch... What? I want to eat sara udon... Ah, how I miss it...
143.H1300: 1 o'clock PM. Recently, I impulsively bought a hamburger, you know? They're somehow popular. I wanted to eat one.
143.H1400: 2 o'clock PM, time to begin the afternoon's work.
143.H1500: 3 o'clock, huh? I wonder if I could get Mamiya to make me a Castella...
143.H1600: 4 o'clock PM, huh? Alright, I've still got some left in me!
143.H1700: 5 o'clock PM. You should adjust your eyes to the light.
143.H1800: 6 o'clock PM, huh... Access has been increasing lately. Be prepared.
143.H1900: 7 o'clock PM. Oh, Admiral, what are you doing for dinner? Want to go together?
143.H2000: 8 o'clock PM, huh? That Maya, is she working hard?
143.H2100: 9 o'clock PM. What? Oh, Shimakaze? No, I'm fine.
143.H2200: 10 o'clock PM, finishing up afterward is part of the strategy too!
143.H2300: 11 o'clock PM, huh... Let's take the night battles in moderation too...
143.NewYears 6547: A new year. Splendid! Admiral, have yourself a Happy New Year. I'm leaving this year to you as well! Hahahaha!
143.Setsubun 6547: Oh... it's Setsubun. Alright. I, Musashi, shall play the role of demon. Come now, hurry up and shoot me!
143.Valentines 6547: Admiral, hey. I made some chocolate. So... if you get tired, have some... Don't be shy...!
143.Anniversary 6547: Admiral. We have finally reach the third year. Hehe... To have a reliable friend is reassuring indeed. Here's to another year, partner.
143.Rainy 6547: Rain... it's no problem. All the more so since it's the rainy season. A cup of hot sake on such a day is nice, too, huh?
143.Summer 6547: Hm? The sea in summer? Very well, I'll sortie anytime. Huh? What? In a swimsuit? What for?
143.Saury 6547: This is saury fishing support? You need me for that...? Haha! Very well! I'll lend you as much of my power as it takes!
143.Cold 6547: Admiral, it's growing colder. Do you care if I come a little closer? Hm? Ahaha! I'm kidding.
143.Xmas 6547: *nom nom* Mm... good... so good...! Christmas... isn't bad at all! Admiral, I want some more!
143.YearsEnd 6547: That was certainly fast. It's already December. So then, I'll get started with the cleaning. After that, I'll have a drink.

148.Intro: The second ship of the Yamato-class battleships, Musashi... Barging in! What do you think of this color? Does this look suit me as well?
148.Poke(1): I, Musashi, am right here! Do not worry.
148.Poke(2): Where are you looking at? Nothing has changed in that particular spot though, right?
148.Poke(3): Admiral! ... Well, I don't really mind it... Hmm, after my triumphant return... okay...?
148.Married: Admiral, did the fatigue not accumulate? Taking an adequate rest is also a proper way of being an Admiral. What? You were fascinated by me? Hahahaha! You're a funny one, partner!
148.Ranking: How is it going? Well, just take your time.
148.Equip(1): Anti-air capabilities, huh... Well, I'm contemplating about it.
148.Equip(2): That's right. I feel sorry for Yamato but... You have my thanks.
148.Docking(2): Uhh... I was... hit even in my vital parts, huh... It's beyond me, I guess...
148.Construction: A newbie, huh? It's going to be bustling here.
148.Yasen(1): This will be fun! Musashi, plunging into battle! Follow me!
148.Yasen(2): That's right! I can't let this go like what happened at Sibuyan Sea.

77.Intro: Super-dreadnought, first of the Ise-class, Ise. Setting off!
77.Library: Based on the Fusou-class battleships, the strong firepower super-dreadnought. Battleship, Ise. By taking off a few of the main cannons, I can be upgraded to the famous Aviation Battleship mode! I'm looking forward to it!
77.Poke(2): Are my turrets heavy? Not at all.
77.Poke(3): Ah, sorry. Did I hit you with my turrets when I turned around?
77.Wedding: Hey, Admiral, could we talk about the positioning of the fifth gun turret? Eh? You don't get the meaning? Kuu... no good, huh...
77.Ranking: Admiral, there is a message for you.
77.Equip(1): A~lright, I can do it with this!
77.Equip(2): Wow, aren't they cool! These things!
77.Supply: A~lright, I can do it with this!
77.Docking(2): Just as I feared, it's pretty bad...
77.Construction: Admiral, a new ship type has been launched.
77.Return: Seems like the fleet is back.
77.Yasen(2): Main cannons, 6 rounds 12 shots, broadside fire!
77.MVP: Eh, I had the best result? Hooray! Hyuuga, did you see? What do you think?
77.Damaged(3): It's getting a bit bad... what should I do..
77.Sunk: This is it, huh... Hyuuga, I'm going ahead...
77.NewYears 6547: It's New Year's! New Year's! Hyuuga, Happy New Year! I'll be counting on you again this year.
77.Valentines 6547: That's right, it's Valentine's Day. Admiral? Hyuuga? Here, chocolate! Fufu♪
77.Anniversary 6547: Today is a happy day? Hyuuga is in a good mood. Shall we get drunk today?
77.YearsEnd 6547: That was fast... It's already the end of the year. Hey, Hyuuga. Should we get some cleaning started?

82.Intro: I'm the aviation battleship 'Ise'! With a rear-facing flight deck and 2 catapults, I can make use of the power of aviation!
82.Library: To obtain the power of marine aviation, a main cannon was removed, and in it's place a flight deck was installed, granting the aviation power of a light aircraft carrier. Aviation battleship, Ise. My name was taken up by the newly-developed DDH of the Marine Self Defence Force.
82.Poke(1): Ah, sorry. Did you call me?
82.Poke(2): Well, seaplanes are just the standard, you know.
82.Poke(3): The firepower of a battleship with the flight power of a light aircraft carrier... yeah, it's pretty awesome, isn't it?
82.Wedding: Admiral, erm... could you please not take my catapult away... If I don't have that, I'll... Ah! You meanie!
82.Ranking: Letter for the admiral.. you are probably busy, yeah?
82.Equip(1): Hehe, Hyuuga's in for a surprise, isn't she?
82.Equip(2): Aren't they just perfect, these things!
82.Supply: Hehe, Hyuuga's in for a surprise, isn't she?
82.Docking(1): It's just a scratch. But thanks anyway.
82.Docking(2): As expected, it looks like I need some repairs.
82.Construction: Admiral, looks like a new ship type has been launched.
82.Return: The armada has returned. Good work!
82.Sortie: You're late, Hyuuga. I'm leaving you behind!
82.Attack: Zuiuns and the like, how are they? Are they cool?
82.Yasen(2): Main cannon, 4 rounds 8 shots, broadside fire!
82.MVP: Eh, I've still got the number one result? How about that Hyuuga, you're being a bit quiet.
82.Damaged(1): Compared to the Ozawa Decoy Fleet, this is nothing!
82.Damaged(2): Hit me with your best shot!
82.Sunk: Well, I guess I did what I could...Hyuuga, take your time to come...

87.Intro: You're the admiral? I see. Anyway, second ship of the Ise class— Hyuuga. Remember me, if you would.
87.Library: Second of the Ise-class battleships, Hyuuga. Ah yes, I became an aviation battleship together with Ise you know. That's originally because an accident happened on my fifth turret. I'm fighting till I am sunk at Kure.
87.Poke(1): Hey... aren't you... Oh, it's you, Admiral.
87.Poke(3): I wonder what we're fighting for.
87.Wedding: Admiral, what's with that face... you're getting all hot, too. Are you sick? Shall we lie down together?
87.Ranking: Contact is here. Read or not read, that's up to you.
87.Equip(1): This enhancement, I wonder how it will influence our strength...
87.Equip(3): Um, not bad... not necessarily good either though.
87.Supply: Such invigoration... I wonder how will it effect my performance.
87.Docking(1): I like to rest when we can.
87.Docking(2): Well, I'll leave the front line to Ise.
87.Construction: There's a newcomer to our fleet... what an eccentric ship.
87.Return: The fleet is back. Things will get busy...
87.Attack: A close shot... I'll hit it with the next one.
87.Yasen(1): Well, might as well bring it down now...
87.Yasen(2): Why is the enemy fleet attacking us...?
87.MVP: My attack was effective?... I see, it's not a bad feeling, not that it means much.
87.Damaged(2): Hey hey...! Why the fifth turret?
87.Damaged(3): Well... A little bit breezy thanks to that... I guess...
87.Sunk: Might as well take a look at the afterlife... Ise, this was a short farewell...
87.NewYears 6547: Happy New Year... best wishes for the coming year. Ise, and you, Admiral— I'm counting on you again this year.
87.Valentines 6547: Oh, yeah, it's that Valentine's thing, isn't it? No choice, then. I'll give you a special Zuiun. Here.
87.Anniversary 6547: Oh? So, it's an anniversary today.... Looks like everybody is happy. Well, that's not too bad.
87.Rainy 6547: It rains often at this time of year. It'll be a problem if this affects the Zuiuns' operations....
87.Summer 6547: I don't have a problem with this season. Ise... Ise? Ah, are you sleeping?
87.Xmas 6547: Oh... so this is Christmas... is it...? Hmm... red and green, and then white? It's not too bad.
87.YearsEnd 6547: Hm... it's about time to do the cleaning. I'm going to polish the Zuiuns in the hangar.

88.Intro: Ise-class Aviation Battleship, Hyuuga... Pushing forward.
88.Library: I'm Hyuuga. I got the ability of carrying aircrafts, and now I am an aviation battleship. I fought bravely in Battle of Leyte Gulf. An operation of transporting tactical goods "Operation Hoku-Go", it is one with a lot of memories for me. Ah yes, JMSDF's DDH "Hyuuga" succeeds to my name.
88.Poke(1): Oh... It's you. You're still here.
88.Poke(2): Looks like the days of plain-old battleship is over.
88.Wedding: Aviation Battleship... got a nice ring to it, yeah? You get it, right? Alright... let's drink! We're not going back 'till morning!
88.Ranking: Here's a letter for you... No, not from me.
88.Equip(1): The unlikely age of the aviation battleship, is it?
88.Equip(2): So the world's finally caught up with me then.
88.Supply: The unlikely age of the aviation battleship, is it?
88.Docking(1): I won't be able to carry the 60's even with the repairs, you know?
88.Construction: A new face is coming to our fleet... Let's go welcome her.
88.Return: The fleet's returned. Let's hope they're all present and well...
88.Battle: Get to know the true power of the aviation battleships!
88.Attack: That's right... Launch the fighters and charge-in. Like this.
88.Yasen(1): You're a problem... We'll have to wipe you out here!
88.Yasen(2): Well, it's not like the rear deck is a shield...
88.MVP: I see, so it's an age of aerial combat from now on... I hope Mogami's faring fine as well.
88.Damaged(3): Ugh... I wouldn't want Ise to see me like this
88.Sunk: Even if I get heavily damaged and sunk to the bottom of the sea, it is inside Kure naval base that I'll accept this fate, I surely decided so, but… it cannot be helped.

26.Intro: Of the two Fusou-class super-dreadnought battleships, I am the elder sister, Fusou. Please take care of me and my younger sister Yamashiro.
26.Library: The first of the Japanese designs for the super-dreadnought battleship class, Fusou. Please remember to take care of my younger sister, Yamashiro, as well. Leyte Gulf? Oh well, I would like to go there someday. Right?
26.Poke(1): Admiral, the weather is good today...
26.Poke(2): *sigh* Although the sky is so blue...
26.Poke(3): Admiral? If you touch it too much - I'm a little worried about the ammunition storage...
26.Married: Admiral… If you work too hard, your body will get bad. Oh, me?...I...*sigh*
26.Wedding: My main cannons, aren't they wonderful? But specialising in firepower too much can lead to all kinds of problems...If it's Admiral, I'm sure you understand, right?
26.Ranking: There's a notification for the admiral.
26.Equip(2): Please modernize my sister Yamashiro as well.
26.Docking(1): It's only a scratch, don't worry about it.
26.Docking(2): With these large turrets, my shoulders get stiff... I'll be resting for a while.
26.Construction: It looks like we got a new comrade...
26.Return: Admiral, the fleet has returned to base.
26.Sortie: Battleship Fusou, setting sail. Yamashiro? Don't fall behind, we're sortieing!
26.Attack: Yamashiro, are you okay? It's the firefight.
26.Yasen(1): I'll show you the real power of the Nishimura fleet!
26.Yasen(2): I absolutely cannot lose out to Ise and Hyuuga...!
26.MVP: At least I can take pride in my firepower. ...Eh? Armor and speed? Those...are things I want...but...
26.Damaged(3): In this kind of condition, I won't be able to breach the Leyte Gulf...
26.Sunk: Am I going to sink after all? Hope Yamashiro's still fine...
26.NewYears 6547: Admiral, I wish you well in the year to come. The Fusou-class will be relying on you again this year.
26.Setsubun 6547: Yamashiro, it's Setsubun... You eat a number of these beans equal to your age. After that, you throw some... at the one who is the Demon.
26.Valentines 6547: Admiral? If you would like... these... chocolates... Won't you please accept them? If you would like...
26.Anniversary 6547: Yamashiro, today is a special day. Go on and greet the admiral... Yamashiro? Oh, she's not here. Yamashiro?
26.Rainy 6547: Yamashiro, there is indeed a lot of rain in the rainy season.... I wonder if Shigure is well....
26.Summer 6547: Yamashiro? It's going to be summer soon. Would you like to go somewhere together? I wonder where would be nice.
26.Fall 6547: Autumn... it's that time of year again... Yamashiro, are you prepared? This is the year we'll finally break through.
26.LateFall 6547: Yamashiro, let's do our best together.
26.Xmas 6547: Yamashiro? This dish tastes wonderful. You should try some, too. See? It's different from normal chicken.
26.YearsEnd 6547: Yamashiro, the year is ending. It is cleaning season. Let us polish our main guns thoroughly and welcome the new year.

286.Idle: Um... Admiral? I wonder if I wasn't heard... Admiral? Admiraal? ...Oh my, that's a relief. Fusou, waiting here on stand by.

411.Poke(1): Please witness... the power of the remodeled Fusou-class!
411.Poke(2): Admiral, why is the sky so blue I wonder... My heart is also, towards the admiral... I-It's nothing! Nothing at all. I'm sorry...

27.Intro: Of the two Fusou-class battleships, I am the younger sister, Yamashiro. Umm... have you seen Fusou nee-sama?
27.Library: The second of the Fusou-class battleships, Yamashiro. "A faulty battleship." "A strange thing for the fleet to have." Everyone said things like that... but it was fine, as long as I could fight alongside Fusou nee-sama until the end...
27.Poke(2): Nee-sama!? Oh, it's only the admiral.
27.Married: The admiral, too... Please take a break sometime.
27.Wedding: Th... thank you. But... my heart shall always be with Fusou nee-sama's... I'm sorry.
27.Ranking: A letter... what if it's a sorrowful letter...!?
27.Equip(1): Is it really okay to get this before Nee-sama?
27.Equip(2): A modernization... With this, they can't call me a faulty battleship...
27.Supply: Is it really okay to get this before Nee-sama?
27.Docking(2): "A strange battleship for the fleet to have"... they say such terrible things.
27.Construction: Nee-sama? It looks like a new ship was built.
27.Battle: Enemy fleet sighted! Prepare for shelling!
27.Yasen(1): Finally, a night battle... but this feeling of dread is...
27.MVP: Eh? I contributed the most...? No way, that's...!? Really!? Nee-sama, were you watching!?
27.Damaged(1): It hurts...! I just knew this would be dreadful...
27.Damaged(2): I was hit!? Is the ammo storage on fire?
27.Damaged(3): No way— torpedoes? ...All ships, advance without me and don't look back! Please think only of annihilating the enemy...!
27.Sunk: Fusou nee-sama... we will be together again in the next world...
27.NewYears 6547: Nee-sama, please treat me well again this year! ...Ah? Admiral? Sure. Take care.
27.Setsubun 6547: Nee-sama... I eat these beans and then throw them? And... the one playing demon is... Ah, it's that girl... fufufufufu♪
27.Valentines 6547: Nee-sama, I would like to give you these chocolates! ...Admiral? I guess I have to... Here, take it.
27.Anniversary 6547: Nee-sama, Nee-sama, today is a very special and important day. Wait, Nee-sama? Admiral, where is Nee-sama?
27.Rainy 6547: Nee-sama, the rainy season is such a nuisance since it damages our equipment! Really, so... dreadful.
27.Summer 6547: Nee-sama, are you making plans for a trip? I think it's a wonderful idea! I'm fine with anywhere, as long as it's with you...!
27.Summer 1471: Fusou nee-sama, I agree— it's a little hot. I'll go bring iced red beans from Mamiya-san...
27.Fall 6547: Nee-sama... it's autumn. It will be alright. I will always be by your side. We shall never be apart.
27.Xmas 6547: Nee-sama, this turkey tastes wonderful. Hm? That one aircraft carrier is... It doesn't matter.
27.YearsEnd 6547: Nee-sama, I understand! We shall clean. Haaa... There's so much dust in the turret... How dreadful...

287.Idle: What...? You're saying Nee-sama and I can't go out to that part of the ocean anymore...? What do you mean by that? How dreadful... from the very start...!
287.Married: ....Admiral. Just like Nee-sama, I think... you are a good person. I'll always... be grateful for everything... I mean it, you know?
287.Supply: I wonder if Nee-sama has been given enough supplies...

412.Poke(1): I've been remodeled... so maybe... this will work...
412.Poke(3): You, too... Please take a break sometime.

78.Intro: It's the English-born returnee, Kongou, desu! Nice to meet you!
78.Library: The super-dreadnought fitted with Western technology at Vickers in England, Kongou, desu! Here in the Pacific Theatre, I'll use the power of my speed to be of great use, desu! Look forward to it!
78.Poke(2): I'd love a cup o' tea~
78.Poke(3): Hey! Admiral! I don't mind you touching me, but there's a time and place for everything!
78.Married: Hey! Admiral! Even though you're always doing your best, I want you to not push yourself so hard, desu!
78.Wedding: Admiral... even though it's the time and place, if you forget the mood and timing... it'll be a "no", you know?
78.Ranking: Admiral! You've got mail! Love letters aren't allowed!
78.Join: Now it's our turn! Follow me! Everyone, form up behind me!
78.Equip(1): Yes! I will show you what I'm made of!
78.Equip(2): It feels like I've finally found the real me!
78.Supply: Yes! I will show you what I'm made of!
78.Docking(1): Always got to make time for teatime.
78.Docking(2): Uu~... seems like I went a little overboard, desu...
78.Sortie: The one to win over the admiral's heart will be me, desu!
78.Yasen(1): You think I'm finished!? Think again! I'm not letting up once I lock onto you!
78.MVP: Did you see my performance? I'll do even better next time— just you watch— so nooo! Don't look away!
78.Damaged(3): Shit! The precious equipment I got from the admiral...!
78.Sunk: Admiral... may your fortunes hold... I'll be... watching from Valhalla...
78.NewYears 6547: Ah...! Happy... New Year! Admiral, the Kongou-class fast battleships will be counting on you again this year!
78.Setsubun 6547: Hey~ Admiral~! For this year's Setsubun, us four Kongou-class sisters will take the job of providing directions! First off, the demon will be... Ah, Admiral~! Why did you run away, desu~!?
78.Valentines 6547: Heeyyy, Admiral. Burning... looove~! Here, chocolate! It's for you!
78.Anniversary 6547: Hey! Admiral~! It's the third anniversary! Yay~! Congratulations and Burning Love~!!
78.Rainy 6547: Oh, it's the rainy Tsuyu season! I don't like it, desu! Uu~!
78.Summer 6547: The summer season! It's here, desu! Hiei, where's my swimwear? Eh... there's nothing?
78.Saury 6547: "Saury"...? Oh! That saury! I'll load up on searchlights and head towards the fishing grounds, desu! This is going to be fun!
78.Xmas 6547: Hey, Admiral! Merrrrryyyy... CHRISTMAS TO YOU!! Now, hurry up and give me my present, desu! Come on... come on...! ...Ah! He ran away! Wait!
78.YearsEnd 6547: Oh...! This year's already at December! Time really flies, huh, Admiral? The naval base cleanup? You can count on me, desu!

209.Idle: I told you to keep your eyes on me~! Admiral~ just what are you doing, desu!?

149.H0100: 1 A.M. The admiral sure is a hard worker, desu!
149.H0200: Two... A..M... just how long are you planning on working... desu...
149.H0300: Three... A..M... I'm just sleeping now...
149.H0400: Four... A..M... the admiral is here, too... (...) ...Admiral...?
149.H0500: 5 A.M. Hmm? Did I just hear Hiei screaming?
149.H0600: Good morning! It's 6 in the morning, desu! Admiral~ you're cool in the morning, desu!
149.H0700: 7 in the morning, desu! Admiral, what are you having for breakfast?
149.H0800: It's 8 A.M., desu! Wow! You're having natto in the morning? It's that food you stir and mix, right?
149.H0900: It's 9 A.M., desu! I enjoyed a Japanese breakfast!
149.H1000: Ten o'clock! Morning work, come on!
149.H1100: Eleven~! Hey, Admiral~... just looking at you never gets old!
149.H1200: It's the midday announcement, desu! It's time for lunch, desu!
149.H1300: 1 P.M.! The admiral's lunch is natto again? Black tea doesn't... go well with it, desu...
149.H1400: 2 P.M. It's almost teatime! I've got scones waiting for you!
149.H1500: 3 P.M. Teatime with the admiral, desu! Mmm~mm♪ black tea is delicious!
149.H1600: 4 P.M. Hey! Admiral~! How about having one of my hand-made scones?
149.H1700: Evening, five o'clock. I won't lose to anyone else with my feelings for the admiral!
149.H1800: 6 P.M. For dinner tonight, I'll be making English-style curry for the admiral, desu!
149.H1900: A time signal? I'm making soup right now, desu. Please don't talk to me.
149.H2000: It's 8 P.M., desu! HEY! ADMIRAL! Kongou's English-style curry is done! Eat up!
149.H2100: 9 P.M. There are no ingredients in curry? No problem♪ It's already mixed together, desu!
149.H2200: It's 10 P.M, desu! Admiral, it was another day of hard work! Let's do our best together tomorrow, too!
149.H2300: It's almost 'good night' time, desu! I'll be Admiral's time keeper tomorrow, too!

86.Intro: I'm Hiei, Kongou Onee-sama's sister. I'm looking forward to gaining experience and getting closer to my sister's brilliance.
86.Library: The battlecruiser that Admiral Inoue loved, it's Hiei. Even though I'm a shiny Imperial ship, I'll work my hardest. I was even the test-ship for the Yamato class, didn't you know? Eh? The Battle of Guadalcanal? Yes, I fought hard.
86.Poke(1): Ah, yes. Did you call for me?
86.Poke(3): Unnnngh... Ah..!! What is it? I wasn't sleeping! I swear I wasn't!
86.Married: Hiei can still fight some more. Commander, let's do our best together!
86.Wedding: Thank you for your favour, Commander... B-but... my heart... belongs to oneesama! Eh? It's not that kind of talk!? O-oh.. I see... I-I'm so embarrassed~!
86.Ranking: Seems like there's a notice for the admiral.
86.Join: Off I go! With all my spirit! Held high!
86.Equip(1): Yes! I can feel the power surging!
86.Equip(2): I wonder if I got closer to Onee-sama?
86.Supply: Yeah, my strength is surging up!
86.Docking(1): These injuries, are just scratches though...
86.Docking(2): While dreaming of Onee-sama, I'll rest.
86.Construction: Looks like a new younger sister... or perhaps an older sister, has arrived.
86.Return: Operation complete! The fleet has returned to base.
86.Sortie: I won't lose to Commander, in love or in battle!
86.Yasen(1): I will not forgive anyone who gets in the way of Onee-sama!
86.Yasen(2): I, will do my best, so don't abandon me!
86.MVP: Did you see me in action? Right! Then, giving my best was worth it!
86.Damaged(3): To do such things to the equipment handed over from Onee-sama... I-I can't forgive this!
86.Sunk: Is Kongou Onee-sama... safe? Then, it's... alright...
86.NewYears 6547: Commander, best wishes for the coming year! This year, I'll still be moving forward... with all my spirit... held high! Ah, Commander, there's something in your hair... Wha... Whoa! Ahh! Commander, are you okay?
86.Setsubun 6547: Yes, Kongou onee-sama! I'm doing... Setsubun... with my spirit... held high! ...Here I go! This year's demons will be... Myoukou and... Sendai♪ Hmm... Okay, let's do this!
86.Valentines 6547: Homemade chocolate: check... Fighting spirit: check... At this time of year, I'm losing in neither love nor war!
86.Valentines 16: Hieee~! I mistook the chocolate for an AP shell and loaded it...! Hiee~ hiee~!
86.Anniversary 6547: I, Hiei, on the third year of love, will go! With my spirits... Held high! Yeah! *pant*
86.Saury 6547: Kongou nee-sama, this is saury fishing! Saury! Sauries caught in season are delicious because they have plenty of fat. ...Oh, hey, maybe I should try seeing how it tastes in curry! ...Alright♪ Let's try it!
86.Xmas 6547: Aye! Commander! The fleet is now fully prepared for Christmas! For the Christmas cake this year... I made it! With all my spirit! Held high! Please look forward to it. Aye!
86.YearsEnd 6547: Yes, Commander. Cleanup, right? Please leave it to me! Hiei, wiping the floor. Off I go! With all my spirit! Held high! Rrraaaaagh...!! And back around! Rrraaaaagh...!! Right! All clean.

210.Idle: Oh yeah! I'm feelin' psyched! ...or so I felt? huh what?... whattt...?

150.Supply: Alright! With this, I'm good to go!
150.H0000: It's 0 A.M. Hiei's go~ing to be~d.
150.H0100: It's 1 A.M... Hiei is fast asleep.
150.H0300: 3 A.M. Now I am getting wide awake.
150.H0400: 4 A.M. Can't sleep, why can't I sleep! This is your fault, you know!
150.H0500: 5 A.M. Hie~i! This turned out to be pretty much an all-nighter!
150.H0600: 6 A.M. I'm all swollen... I can't let Onee-sama see my face like thiiiis!
150.H0700: 7 A.M. Hmmm... I didn't get enough sleep, you know~ Off I go! With all my spirit! Held high!
150.H0800: 8 A.M. Battleships have such a lot of maintenance to do in the morning, it's quite a strain, you know!
150.H0900: 9 A.M. Yeah! The prep work will be always be ready now!
150.H1000: 10 A.M. I'm gonna watch TV while on standby, 'ka~y?
150.H1100: 11 A.M. Chief? What's this 'Wife and Mother-in-law' problem?
150.H1200: 12 midday~ I've taken a liking to this midday program~ Eh? You'll take me to the recording? I'm fired up now!
150.H1300: It's 13 o'clock. Whew~ Lunch breaks sure are fun~
150.H1400: It's 14 o'clock now. H-huh? Oh no, we forgot to eat lunch! Wha-what should we do?
150.H1500: 15 o'clock. Ah Commander, that store over there is still doing lunch.
150.H1600: 16 o'clock. Ah, today I got to enjoy an outing with the commander. Eh? That's a bad thing?
150.H1700: The day's gotten dark~ It's 17 o'clock. I'm glad the base was quiet today, Commander.
150.H1900: 19 o'clock. Done~! My famous recipe—Hiei Curry! Go on, eat it up!
150.H2000: 20 o'clock. How is it? Your impression of Hiei's curry? Your impressions...I wanna hear your impressions!
150.H2100: It's 21 o'clock. It's been an hour since the commander ran away... Why do you run from Hiei!?
150.H2200: It's now 22 o'clock. *gloom* Looks like the commander got away...
150.H2300: 23 o'clock. Oh well, I guess I'll go to Onee-sama's room... Onee-... Commander! Why are you here!?

79.Intro: Fast battleship, Haruna, reporting for duty. You're the admiral, correct? I'm looking forward to working with you!
79.Library: I'm the fast battleship, Haruna. I was equipped with a set of four domestically-made 36 cm cannons. I stayed bravely watching the sky over Etajima village's Kure naval base 'til the very end. Please remember Haruna who, of all four fast battleship sisters, was able to fight 'til the bitter end, okay?.
79.Poke(2): Sure. If you're fine with me, I'll keep you company any time!
79.Poke(3): You're so affectionate, aren't you? Thank you for holding me in your thoughts.
79.Married: Admiral... I don't think I can ever repay you... for being this kind to me...
79.Wedding: What is this...? I feel such an overwhelming desire to protect everyone... my comrades... and now, Admiral... you as well.
79.Join: Haruna... is now... starting the sortie!
79.Equip(1): I can feel how powerful this is. Thank you so much for thinking of me.
79.Equip(2): This is... so wonderful! It feels just a little heavy, but still, I'll do my best!
79.Supply: I can feel how powerful this is. Thank you so much for thinking of me.
79.Docking(1): Is it really okay... for me to rest...?
79.Docking(2): You saw through to how tired I really was, didn't you...? Admiral, thank you so much. I'll be turning in, then.
79.Return: Here is the post-mission report. Would you like to read it?
79.Attack: I will give it everything I've got!
79.Yasen(1): A night battle, then? I can't wait to test myself!
79.Yasen(2): How inconsiderate... I will... not allow this!
79.MVP: I'm only doing what comes naturally. To receive such special treatment... I've done nothing to deserve it!
79.Damaged(3): No way... this is... but still... I can keep going!
79.Sunk: If this is to be my fate... then so be it... ...I'm so sorry...
79.NewYears 6547: Admiral? Best wishes for the coming year! The four of us Kongou-class sisters including myself will be counting on you again this year! Now, let's visit the shrine! And then we can draw fortunes!
79.Setsubun 6547: Admiral, it's Setsubun! Fortune, we~lcome! Demons, bego~one! Fufu♪ This is pretty fun. Oh? Admiral, what is that? Ehou... maki? The sushi is so big. This is my first time seeing one!
79.Valentines 6547: Admiral... if you'd like... my chocolates... won't you have some?
79.Valentines 16: How inconsiderate... if there is leftover chocolate... I will not forgive you!
79.Anniversary 6547: Admiral, Thank you so much for being with me, Haruna for three years. I felt inspired by it, Admiral.
79.Saury 6547: Being inconsiderate on the fishing grounds... I will... never allow it! Yes, Admiral. I'll sortie to provide saury fishing support! Leave it to me!
79.Xmas 6547: Merry Christmas, Admiral! I'm so glad to be able to spend another Christmas together with you! Admiral, I'll open up the champagne. (...) Okay, here you go. I think... I'll have some, too.
79.YearsEnd 6547: Admiral, it's the time of year for cleaning, isn't it? I'll clean up the things on your desk for you! Okay! I'll arrange the things inside your desk as well, so please leave it to me! Oh... Admiral...? Umm... I can't ope- ...Admiral?

211.Supply: ...Thank you so much! I can fight once again!

151.H0000: 0000. Admiral, thank you for working diligently even so late at night!
151.H0100: ...0100. I'll stay up with you! I'm not sleepy at all!
151.H0200: 0200. Admiral, you mustn't lose focus! I will also do my best!
151.H0300: 0300. Admiral... for now, I will stand guard here... so you can go ahead and sleep...
151.H0400: 04... 00... Admiral... I would like to rest with you... but the base defense...
151.H0500: 0500. A single futon is certainly a bit crowded, isn't it... but still, I feel... so warm.
151.H0600: 0600. Admiral, it's morning! How are you feeling?
151.H0700: 0700. Morning is in full swing! You look full of energy, don't you? I will also do my best!
151.H0800: 0800. Admiral, for breakfast, would you mind if I join you?
151.H0900: 0900! Admiral, the sortie preparations are in order!
151.H1000: 1000. For today's operation schedule, please allow me to handle it!
151.H1100: 1100. Admiral, I recommend this operation plan for the day. So for now... why don't you take a little rest?
151.H1200: 1200. You really should take a break... it's just that... Admiral, you're working too hard. Please, do it for me.
151.H1300: 1300. Admiral, having a nice, relaxing lunch with me like this... it's also an important duty of yours♪ Okay?
151.H1400: 1400. The ship girls' morale is rising! Let's all launch at once!
151.H1500: 1500. Admiral, the rankings have been updated. Would you like to check them with me?
151.H1600: 1600. Admiral, come and update the Fleet Command comment together with me!
151.H1700: 1700. I'm growing a little interested in reading the comments of the admirals around our rank.
151.H1800: 1800. Admiral, it's getting late. It'll be night before long.
151.H1900: 1900. The view from the admiral's office at night... I think it's lovely.
151.H2000: 2000. Those cranes that keep working hard at the dock... I think they're just a little romantic.
151.H2100: 2100. I will also work hard, just like those cranes, so that I can do my best to support both the admiral and the fleet!
151.H2200: 2200. Maybe I said... a little too much tonight. Please excuse me.
151.H2300: 2300. Admiral... once in a while, please go to bed early... okay? Please, do it for me.

85.Intro: Is the mic's volume fine? Check. One. Two. ...Alright. Nice to meet you. I'm Kirishima.
85.Library:
Kirishima here. Do you expect me to stand by and lose to the intellect of my sister ship, Haruna?

As a domestically-produced fast battleship, I'll fight my hardest!

One of the Aegis ships of the modern JMSDF succeeds my name.
85.Poke(2): Come now, deliver your orders promptly, Commander.
85.Poke(3): That is... for what reason are you poking me so often? Is this some new form of command?
85.Married: Your judgment is impeccable, as always.
85.Wedding: If my predictions hold true, after the battle is over, I believe the commander and I are going to... most likely... most likely...! ...No, it was nothing!
85.Join: Sortieing! Now then, how shall we approach this?
85.Equip(1): With this enhancement, my battle strength has risen appreciably as a result! You have my thanks.
85.Equip(2): This remodel is beyond what I had estimated. That's my commander! It far exceeds the previous data!
85.Supply: With this enhancement, my battle strength has risen appreciably as a result. You have my thanks.
85.Docking(1): "Hope for the best and prepare for the worst," they say.
85.Docking(2): This is the best timing for entering the dock. As expected of you!
85.Construction: There's a notification about a new ship.
85.Return: Operation successful! The fleet is returning. Would you like to affirm the battle results?
85.Battle: Now, proceed with the exchange of fire!
85.Attack: Main battery, zero in on the enemy! ...Fire!
85.Yasen(1): As for speed and firepower... fufu♪ Commencing night battle!
85.Yasen(2): Distance, velocity... Alright! All cannons, fire a volley!
85.MVP: I'll give my all to be known as the genius of the fleet!
85.Damaged(3): How did...? My combat analysis was...
85.Sunk: The sea floor is... surprisingly warm... ... ...
85.NewYears 6547: Commander? I would like to wish you well for the new year! Thank you for all that you've done for us in the last year. The Kongou-class fast battleships will be counting on you once again this year. Ah, are you going to draw a fortune? It's belated good luck.
85.Setsubun 6547: Now then, it's Setsubun! So who is playing the demon this year? Hmm. Fufu, so I see. Alright! Firing specifications, check! Beans loaded! Setsubun surface battle: aim...! ...Fire! Tch... straddled. Loading next round!
85.Valentines 6547: Sweetness: check. Bitterness: check. Wrapping: check! Alright, it'll be fine! Commander, please take this!
85.Valentines 16: I, Kirishima, am not as sweet as those chocolates, you know~? Aim: check! All cannons, fire a volley!
85.Anniversary 6547: Is the mic volume ok? Check. One, two... Right. Today I would like to show my gratitude for reaching our third year. From here on, we're... eh, too long?
85.Saury 6547:
...Onee-sama, even if it's to support the saury fishing, that equipment loadout is... Exclusively carrying searchlights like that is...
...You're right, we should ask the torpedo squadron escorts to increase the number of lookouts and fish detectors.
85.Xmas 6547: So, it's the time of year for Christmas parties! The most important thing for the party host to have is a mic. Naturally, I'd like you to run a mic check regularly. Yes, it's important indeed. I'm counting on you.
85.YearsEnd 6547: Now, let's show some enthusiasm for December cleaning! Broom, check! Dustpan, check! Kirishima, starting off with sweeping! Sweeping battle: ready! Commencing!

212.Idle: Mic check. One, two. One-two, one-two... three-FOOUURR! Oh! My fault, Admiral. I thought I'd do some checks while you were away...
212.Married: Commander, are you looking for the Type 3 Shells...? Ahhn... that's not a place you can load ammunition into! There's no helping it... we'll search for them together.

152.Equip(3): Hm... this is a good thing.
152.H0000: Mic check. One, two. Alright. 0000. The date has been updated.
152.H0100: 0100. Time announcer... this is something that I, Kirishima, am well-suited for.
152.H0200: 0200... ... ... na... ... ...ga... Huh? The mic output is...
152.H0300: 0300. For the mic to break this late at night... Oh? Is it working now? Hold on! Is my voice coming through?
152.H0400: 0400. Commander, the mic is all fixed! ...Commander? ...Commander? You're asleep... then?
152.H0500: 0500. Okay, let's look lively again day! Ah, Commander... I apologize. Did I wake you up?
152.H0600: 0600. It's morning. The morning is so refreshing!
152.H0700: 0700. Commander, come, please deliver your orders!
152.H0800: 0800. Co... Commander...? D-Did you go... back to sleep?
152.H0900: 0900! Commander? Commander! Please wake up! I'm worried about you!
152.H1000: 1000. The time announcements have been in complete disarray. How could I have been so negligent as to leave them in such a state!?
152.H1100: 1100. All ship girls, avoid making noise. Today's missions shall be performed in the afternoon!
152.H1200: 1200. It's lunchtime... Well... the commander's rest shall be safeguarded by me, Kirishima.
152.H1300: 1300. I will... have lunch by myself. T-This is also... my solemn duty...
152.H1400: 1400. Commander, you've awakened! Please leave the support to me, Kirishima!
152.H1500: 1500. The second, third and fourth fleets are all off on expeditions!
152.H1600: 1600. The docks and shipyard are experiencing no issues? And check.
152.H1700: 1700. Commander, the weekly missions are also doing well. As expected of you!
152.H1800: 1800... That girl... has a faulty electrical system? Smack! Shouldn't she just hit it?
152.H1900: 1900. Oh, excuse me. I generally enjoy taking theoretical possibilities into consideration.
152.H2000: 2000. As your support, I am always prepared for all possible outcomes!
152.H2100: 2100. Commander, that is... when I said "parting line"... I wasn't talking about my hairstyle!
152.H2200: 2200. Commander...! If you take my glasses, I won't be able to fight!
152.H2300: 2300. It's almost time for my mic check. Ufufu♪

171.Intro: Good day. I am Bismarck, the nameship of the Bismarck-class battleships. You should remember it well.
171.Library: It is I, the pride of Deutschland, the nameship of the Bismarck super dreadnoughts. Germanic designs are just beautiful and dignified, no? It's alright, you can praise me more. I shall be operating far and wide throughout this ocean. You can expect much from me!
171.Poke(1): Good. It is I, Bismarck's turn.
171.Poke(2): You're being quite familiar. Why is that?
171.Poke(3): Admiral, it seems that your fleet is lacking in discipline. I shall instruct you from the basics.
171.Idle: Geez~! To neglect one such as myself, aren't you quite something! It's fine for me to come along on a sortie or practice, you know!?
171.Married: Admiral, no matter what it is, it's bad to work too hard, okay? A change of pace is also a good thing, you know?
171.Wedding: Admiral, what is it? Such an earnest expression... This is for me? ...I-I see... Y-you can give it to me. I won't give this back, you know? Definitely...
171.Ranking: What is it? Has the situation changed for the better?
171.Join: Battleship Bismarck, setting sail! Sally forth!
171.Supply: My thanks. I can continue to fight with this.
171.Docking(2): Apologies, I shall take a short respite. Please call on me later.
171.Construction: It appears that a new ship has been commissioned.
171.Return: Operation complete, the fleet has returned to port.
171.Sortie: I shall show you how Bismarck fights!
171.Battle: A fleet battle... I'm itching for a fight!
171.Yasen(1): I won't let you escape... Don't underestimate me!
171.MVP: I am number one? What are you saying, of course that's the case. Is that not good? You can praise me more.
171.Damaged(3): They got me...! The rudder! Is the rudder alright!?... Well then, I can continue on...from here.
171.Sunk: Once again, I shall return to Brest... I exchanged enough shells... I'm...satisfied...
171.NewYears 6547: Admiral! Let's work hard again this year! Of course, it goes without saying that I always work hard!
171.Xmas 6547: So this year's Christmas season has already come? How time flies. Now, you may give me a present!

172.H0000: 12 o'clock midnight. I'm a little tired.
172.H0100: 1 A.M. Admiral, is it not about time for bed?
172.H0200: 2 A.M. *ya~wn*... Of course, I'm tired also...
172.H0300: 3 A.M. You will rise properly tomorrow, yes? Could you please be punctual in the morning?
172.H0400: 4 A.M. I shall take a short nap. All-nighters are bad for the skin.
172.H0500: It's 5 A.M. Alrighty, get up! Good morning!
172.H0600: 6 A.M. Well now, Admiral, let's go and get all the morning affairs in order!
172.H0700: 7 A.M. Admiral, it is time for breakfast. What have you prepared for me?
172.H0800: 8 A.M. This Admiral-made breakfast is pretty good. Japanese-style isn't bad.
172.H0900: 9 A.M. Well now, let us up and go and start today's commerce raiding! ...Eh, I'm mistaken?
172.H1000: 10 A.M. Kongou? Nagato? No, I don't know them. Who are they? Are they strong?
172.H1100: It's 11 A.M... Yamato-class? That's got a strong feeling to it. I'd like to meet them.
172.H1200: I am informing you that is it now 12 midday. Well now, what would be good for lunch?
172.H1300: 1 P.M. Oh, those destroyers of a familiar ship class are here. I know those kids.
172.H1400: 2 P.M. I wonder if Scharnhorst has also come here. I still would like to meet her.
172.H1500: It's 3 P.M. I'd like to eat a little something sweet. Hey Admiral, did you hear me?
172.H1600: 4 P.M. Almost evening, no? Shall we leave it at this?
172.H1700: 5 P.M. Phew~, today was hard work as well. Well now, shall we stop at this checkpoint for today?
172.H1800: 6 P.M. Almost time for dinner. Admiral, what kind of menu do you have for me?
172.H1900: It is 7 P.M. The admiral's sauerkraut has an odd flavor... Oh, this is 'tsukemono', you say?
172.H2000: 8 P.M. It's really night now... It's bad for my skin, so could we not go on a night battle?
172.H2100: 9 P.M. H~mm, Japanese battleships have such tall bridges. Those sisters sure are something.
172.H2200: It's 10 P.M. I shall take a rest soon.
172.H2300: 11 P.M. Admiral, are you still going? Good night.

173.Poke(2): Operation Rheinübung, is it? This brings back memories.
173.Damaged(1): Ahh! This reminds me of those annoying biplanes...!

441.Intro: The second ship of the Vittorio Veneto-class battleships, Littorio. I have confidence in my speed and firepower. Nice to meet ya~
441.Library: I was born in the country of Pasta. Second ship of the Vittorio Veneto class battleship, Littorio. Armed with high speed armaments and a state-of-the-art fast battleship. I have my sister, Roma, with me. It's a pleasure to meet you.
441.Poke(2): Admiral, did you call for Littorio?
441.Poke(3): Th-this is the Japanese way of greeting! S-such a Mediterranean Sea way! Wait, Admiral! I'm mad!
441.Idle: Fritz... Fritz X... Uhm...? Somehow, this strange word keep bursting up in my mind... Admiral, do you know about this? Oh, really...?
441.Married: Admiral, I made some delicious Mediterranean pasta. Would you like to join me? There's also wine as well, ufufu ♪
441.Wedding: Admiral, What's with this formality? Well, is this for me? Really? Oh, thank you very much, Admiral... I'll take care... I'll take good care of this.
441.Ranking: Admiral, time to confirm the report. I'll bring it to you.
441.Join: I will show you the true power of Italy! Battleship Littorio, going!
441.Equip(2): With this, I won't lose to Roma! Ufufu.
441.Equip(3): Ara. I think this is good.
441.Docking(1): I'm sorry. I've sustained some damage. I'll go to the dock.
441.Docking(2): I'm truly sorry. I need the dock for real this time. I'm sorry.
441.Construction: Admiral, a new ship is ready to be added to the battle line.
441.Return: The fleet have returned safely. Good work everyone!
441.Sortie: Roma? I'm gonna leave you behind. Battleship Littorio, going!
441.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted! Prepare to fire! At last, it's a real fight.
441.Attack: Turret number one, number two, aiming...Fire, now!
441.Yasen(1): It's a night battle. Let's do it. Please follow Littorio
441.Yasen(2): This is the same fleet battle we're into... That's right, this is...
441.MVP: Eh? Littorio is number one? Wah, thank you. I feel embarrassed.
441.Damaged(3): Uuu... I'm fairly beaten... But Littorio... won't sink... with just this...
441.Sunk: I'm... going to sink right...? Roma... this time... you can take it easy to come here... good... night...
441.NewYears 6547: Buon anno! Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! I'm counting on you again this year!
441.Setsubun 6547: Set... tsu... boohn...? Set-tsu-boohn...? This event has such a strange-sounding name.
441.Rainy 6547: It's been raining a lot recently.... So, this is what Japan's rainy season is like. Good to know.
441.EarlySummer 6547: It's finally summer, Admiral. I want to try out a new swimsuit. Hehe... it'll be fun!
441.Summer 6547: Admiral, it's summertime. Let's go to the beach together. Ah... not for that... to swim, I mean. I've gotten myself a new swimsuit. Ufufu...
441.YearsEnd 6547: It's already the end of the year. Roma, you'll need to clean up properly, you know. Eh? My place is even dirtier? Oh, my. Y-You're right... oh, dear...

446.Intro: I'm Italia, the second ship of the Vittori Veneto-class battleships and previously known as Littorio. Nice to meet ya~
446.Library: I was born in the country of Pasta. Second ship of the Vittorio Veneto class battleship, formerly Littorio, Italia. Armed with high speed armaments and a state-of-the-art fast battleship. I have my sister, Roma, with me. It's a pleasure to meet you.
446.Poke(2): Admiral, did you call for Italia?
446.Married: Admiral, I'm truly grateful to you for having taken such good care of a foreigner like me until now. Thank you, Admiral. If it is possible... I wish to always be by your side.
446.Join: I will show you the true power of shipgirls! Battleship Italia, going!
446.Supply: I think I'm getting fat... I should refrain from eating pasta...
446.Sortie: Roma, are you alright? Okay! Battleship Italia, going!
446.Yasen(1): I won't lose in night battle! Please follow Italia!
446.MVP: Italia is number one...? Wah, thank you! I'm happy.
446.H0000: Admiral, the date has changed. Today, I will be announcing the time with you. Ufufu.
446.H0100: 1:00... AM. Are you tired, Admiral? Shall I bring you some wine?
446.H0200: 2:00... AM. The night here is a bit colder. Are you okay, Admiral?
446.H0300: 3:00... AM. *fuah* Ah, I'm sorry. Shall I make something like mulled wine, Admiral? It will warm you up.
446.H0400: 4:00 AM. Morning is coming. This feeling before dawn... is nice...
446.H0500: 5:00 AM. Buon giorno, Admiral! I'm about to wake the others!
446.H0600: 6:00 AM. Yup, it's a wonderful morning. What do you want for breakfast?
446.H0700: 7:00... AM. Admiral, today I have prepared croissant with caffe latte. Please dig in.
446.H0800: 8:00... AM. Admiral, it's about time for the fleet's operation. Shall we start with some expeditions?
446.H0900: 9:00 AM. Fu~ I wonder, is Roma doing fine?
446.H1000: 10:00 AM. Ah! Those German shipgirls are also here? Really...
446.H1100: 11:00 AM. It's about time for lunch, Admiral. What shall we have?
446.H1200: 12:00 PM. For today's primo piatto we have seafood pasta. For secondo we have meat. Contorno is important too. As for wine... is red wine ok?
446.H1300: 13:00... PM. Eh... That's too much for lunch? I'm sorry. I'll reduce the amount of food in our dinner.
446.H1400: 14:00 PM. Well, let us give our best this afternoon! Which area shall our fleet advance? Western?
446.H1500: 15:00... PM. The Japanese's fast battleship is not bad. They're wonderful.
446.H1600: 16:00... PM. That battleship... has such an artistic superstructure... Her bridge is a work of art.
446.H1700: 17:00... PM. Admiral, the sunset in Japan is beautiful. It's the same in Mediterranean Sea too.
446.H1800: 18:00... PM. Well, it's about time to prepare for dinner. Which wine shall we have? White wine or red wine? Shall we go with white wine then?
446.H1900: 19:00 PM. I've brought you dinner, please dig in! Also here's your wine. Whoa! What a wonderful way of drinking
446.H2000: 20:00 PM. Admiral, I shall open the red wine next. Uhm... which one should I open... Ah! Do you like cheese? Or dolce?
446.H2100: 21:00 PM. Admiral, you're good. I'm happy to be worthy of making all those food you have eaten.
446.H2200: 22:00... PM. I'm a little worried about Roma... I'm sorry Admiral. I will check on her.
446.H2300: 23:00 PM. Don't worry, Roma is doing fine. Am I worrying too much? I'm sorry.
446.Xmas 6547: Buone Feste! Admiral, Merry Christmas! Here. It's my present to you. *♥*

442.Intro: I'm the fourth battleship of the Vittorio Veneto-class, Roma. Nice to meet you. What? Please don't stare at me, okay?
442.Library: The Italian-made, state of the art warship. Fourth of the Vittorio Veneto class battleships, Roma. Yes, I was together with my elder sister at that time. The day those monsters were dropped. I won't forget that pain. I absolutely won't forget it.
442.Poke(1): Buon giorno. Did you call for Roma?
442.Poke(2): Admiral, do you have an order for Roma? Oh, then that's fine.
442.Poke(3): What's that Admiral?　The way you touch the left area around my deck is unforgivable. Can I give you the counterattack?
442.Idle: Damn that bomber... you better remember this! Ah, Admiral? What? I didn't say anything. None at all. Aren't you just hearing things? Come on, work first work first.
442.Married: What, Admiral? You seem free. How about becoming my partner then? Ah, of course that's not what I meant. We're just talking a walk over there, a walk. Let's go.
442.Wedding: What? Even though I look like this, I'm actually busy. What's that box? 'Try to open it'? I'll do it later then. Wha? In this place? But now is...
442.Ranking: Confirming the information? Well that's important.
442.Join: Battleship Roma, sortieing. I'm going first, sister.
442.Equip(1): Japanese improvement... Well that's good too, thanks.
442.Equip(2): Grazie. With this... maybe I will become better with this.
442.Supply: Grazie. I'm gonna go again, you can count on me.
442.Docking(1): I'm going to need a little repair. What? Don't stare at me.
442.Docking(2): Um, for me to be at the dock... well that's fine... Tsk, I already said to not stare at me!
442.Construction: Admiral, looks like a new ship is ready to join the battle line.
442.Return: The fleet has returned. What is it? Please, don't stare at me too much.
442.Sortie: Roma of the Vittorio Veneto-class, starting! I'm serious, follow me!
442.Battle: Enemy fleet sighted! Commencing artillery fire. Here we go... Open all the gunports!
442.Yasen(1): This is a night battle? Well that's fine, I'll give it a try. Roma, charging forward!
442.Yasen(2): Alright! We'll point our cannons directly to the enemy ships. Fire, Fire!
442.MVP: Ah!? It's me... Uhm... Is it me again? Well, whatever. I do feel happy though.
442.Damaged(1): Tsk... that hurt.　I'll remember this.
442.Damaged(2): Iya... t-that place is... that's not bad, I'll show you this time!
442.Damaged(3): Direct hit!? Am I done for? W-Well, I'm still fine. I won't sink this time!
442.Sunk: Wa...N-no way... I'm sinking, again? That's ridiculous... No... Nee-san...
442.NewYears 6547: Buon anno! Admiral, best wishes for the coming year. Nee-san and I, Roma, will be counting on you for another year.
442.Setsubun 6547: Set-tsu-boohn...? No, you pronounce it differently. "Setsubunga." Isn't that right? Eh? I've got it wrong? Japanese is difficult.
442.Valentines 6547: I happen to have a chocolate I made... What? You don't need it? You do? ...Ah, I see. Hmmm...
442.Rainy 6547: The rainy season... Hmm, so this is the rainy season. There's a lot of rain, but there's also less air raids, so I guess it's not that bad.
442.EarlySummer 6547: It has become considerably hot... Summer is soon. Neesan, I want to buy a new swimsuit. Hmm.
442.Summer 6547: Nee-san? Are you going to go swim with the Admiral? It can't be helped— I'll accompany you as well. I've bought a swimsuit too, after all.
442.Xmas 6547: Buone Feste. Admiral, Merry Christmas. However... nee-san, you're overdoing it a bit... ...geez...
442.YearsEnd 6547: End of the year cleaning, huh? I suppose it's necessary. Nee-san's room is a disaster. I'll have to help her out.

447.Poke(1): Fourth ship of the Vittorio Veneto-class Battleships, Roma, in combat position.
447.Join: Battleship, Roma, sortieing! Nee-san, I'll be fine, don't worry.
447.Battle: Enemy fleet sighted! Commencing artillery fire. I'll destroy you with all my might... Open all the gunports!
447.Attack: Battleship, Roma, commencing artillery fire. Main artillery, fire!
447.Yasen(1): I've grown used to night battles now... Follow after me! All ships, charge forward!
447.Yasen(2): Triple cannons are not toys. Alright? I'll show you what's what!
447.Damaged(1): Tsk... that hurt. But it's nothing compared to what I've been through...!
447.Damaged(2): Iya... t-that place is... damn, I'll show you this time!
447.H0000: The date has changed, Admiral. I, Roma, will be your secretary of the day. What? Do you object?
447.H0100: 01...0...0... I'm still not used to this style yet. I did it correctly, right? Right?
447.H0200: 02...0...0... Zero-Two... Zero... Zero... Yes, perfect. I got it down.
447.H0300: 03...0...0... It's already three o'clock... Are you not getting sleepy, Admiral?
447.H0400: 04...0...0... Isn't it already morning? As expected, keeping at it everyday seems bad for the skin.
447.H0500: 05...0...0... I'm going to wake everyone up, okay? Admiral... you are sleepy now?
447.H0600: 06...0...0... Well then, what should we do about breakfast? Is yesterday's bread fine with you?
447.H0700: 07...0...0... Admiral. You looked sleepy so I made some cappuccino. Do you need another?
447.H0800: 08...0...0... Well then, let's get to work. Let's send out the fleet. To the West? South?
447.H0900: 09...0...0... So that's the Japanese Fast Battleship Kirishima? Hmmm...
447.H1000: 10...0...0... Eh, with Kirishima? I see. I do feel like trying to go up against her at least once as well.
447.H1100: 11...0...0... It's already noon... Time flies. What do you want to do for lunch? Mamiya's, perhaps?
447.H1200: 12...0...0... Japanese lunch is pretty simple, isn't it? I wonder if it can last till nighttime.
447.H1300: 13...0...0... That dish called katsu curry surprise me a little. Is it a type of risotto? Unique, isn't it? It's powerful.
447.H1400: 14...0...0... Bismarck? Yes, I do know her, albeit only the name. She's famous, you know.
447.H1500: 15...0...0... Ah, Kirishima? What is it? Did you need me for something? Ah, my glasses?
447.H1600: 16...0...0... I got a little nervous. Kirishima... doesn't seem like a bad person, right?
447.H1700: 17...0...0... The sun is setting. I'm worn out today too. How about you, Admiral? Is that so?
447.H1800: 18...0...0... Admiral, what do you want to do for dinner? Eh, Kongou? Kirishima? What's happening!?
447.H1900: 19...0...0... What is the "Fast Battleship Union?" Wha- whaaa—!? Me too? Whaaa!?
447.H2000: 20...0...0... This white wine known as "Nihonshu"... is good! You drinking, Admiral?
447.H2100: 21... Phew... They finally went back. Do Japanese battleships not have any sense of shame?
447.H2200: 22...0...0... Ah, sis. It's fine, I'm doing the job properly. Don't worry.
447.H2300: 23...0...0... Eh? I reek of alcohol? I... it's the fault of Kirishima and the rest!

440.Intro: Hi! I'm the Iowa-class battleship, Iowa. You're the admiral of this fleet? Hmm... not bad! The pleasure is all mine!
440.Library: Hi! I'm the name ship of the Iowa-class battleships, Iowa. Although I'm a high-speed battleship, I'm heavily armed, and could be said to be the penultimate form of battleship. As the last of the battleship classes born in the USA, I will work hard for the fleet. Take good care of me!
440.Poke(2): Sortie? Hm... sounds good to me.
440.Poke(3): This is not a drill. I repeat, this is not a drill! Hey, Admiral!?
440.Idle: This is the Japanese fleet, huh... Ohh! That battleship has such a unique bridge. I like her. Hey! Hey, you!
440.Married: Admiral? What's wrong? Are you tired? Okay, it's fine if you take a quick nap. It's fine. I don't mind.
440.Wedding: What...? Admiral, what's this ring? An engagement ring? For me...? Ah...! Thank you... me, too...
440.Equip(1): Oh, this is great! It'll really help.
440.Docking(1): Time for some quick repairs... I think I'll take a shower.
440.Docking(2): Oh, shit... I'm starting to feel indebted to Japan's amazing baths...
440.Construction: Okay! A new ship is finished being built. I can't wait to meet the new friend!
440.Battle: Now, time to show you my overwhelming firepower! Open fire!
440.Attack: Fire! Fire! Ahaha! Let's go! Let's get them!
440.Yasen(1): I'm a fast battleship, so don't even think of running. Night battle— let's get this started!
440.Yasen(2): I'm not a name ship for nothing, y'know. Fufufu, let's finish this.
440.MVP: I'm the most valuable!? Really? Thanks! *♥*
440.Damaged(3): Ouch! You've done it now... I'll get you back for this... it's a promise, damn it!
440.Sunk: Oh my god... I lost...? The water is... it's hard to see... Admi... ral...
440.NewYears 6547: A happy new year. Admiral, I hope I can count on you again this year.
440.Setsubun 6547: What? Setsuboon... What's that? Well, I've never heard of it...
440.Rainy 6547: It's raining so much at this time of year. "To-you" is what you call it...? As in, "for you"? What a romantic season. That's Japan for you.
440.Fall 6547: Japan in autumn is... ... ... ...Ah...! This beer is amazing! Eh? There's a kind of beer made just for autumn? Japan... is incredible, isn't it?
440.Saury 6547: Saury? What? But why saury...? Fishing... support? The Combined Fleet sure has it rough.

360.Intro: Hi! I'm the Iowa-class battleship, Iowa. Admiral, how've you been? Doing okay? Well then, let's do our best today! Go! Go!
360.Equip(2): Harpoon? Mmm... it's not bad, but... isn't it too soon for that? You can wait... can't you?
360.Attack: If you think the age of battleships is over, then pay attention. Fire!
360.H0000: Today I'll be your secretary ship. That okay? Hmhm! Leave it to me.
360.H0200: Two o'clock now. Is that fine?
360.H0300: It's three o'clock now. *sigh* I'm falling asleep.
360.H0400: Four o'clock now. It's almost morning... *yawn* ...Admiral, you up?
360.H0600: 6 o'clock! Admiral, I'll make you some scrambled eggs this morning, okay? Ah, please help yourself to the coffee! Okay?
360.H0700: 7 o'clock. Alright, let's begin our morning duties! What do you want to do first?
360.H0800: It's 8 o'clock. Alright, let's proceed with the fleet maneuvers. Go! Go!
360.H0900: 9 o'clock. *whew* This should wrap up our morning duties, right? Is that okay?
360.H1000: 10 o'clock! Eh!? You're mean you're really still working? Japan's fleets are so hard-working...
360.H1100: It's 11 o'clock! Admiral, what are you having for lunch? Huh? Steak!? I'll tag along!
360.H1200: It is noon! Alright, let's sit down and enjoy our lunch!
360.H1300: Mamiya restaurant, huh... I've heard rumors. Ohhh! So this is a traditional Japanese lunch? Great! I'll dig right in!
360.H1400: Yeah... the portions are a little small, but traditional Japanese lunches aren't half bad. The fact that it's also healthy is great! Ah! It's 2 o'clock now. I forgot.
360.H1500: 3 o'clock! Hey! Yamato! Let's have it out for real next time! During an exercise, of course! It's a drill, only a drill!
360.H1600: 4 o... ohhhh! The Kongou sisters! Japan's fast battleships are really pretty! Huh? Kirishima, why are you angry? What's wrong?
360.H1700: It's 5 o'clock. Japanese sunsets are so beautiful! Admiral, it's wonderful!
360.H1800: It's 6 o'clock! Admiral? What are we going to have for dinner? Ohh!? Yamato will? I'm excited for that! Let's go!
360.H1900: 7 o'clock. Yamato, thanks for the invitation for dinner! I'm just going to help myself to the Yamato Hotel dinner.
360.H2000: 8 o'clock. Yamato Hotel's dinner was great! Huh? I'm praising you. Yamato, what's wrong?
360.H2100: 9 o'clock! Oh, that's why. What are you saying, Yamato? You're a great battleship! You're beautiful!
360.H2200: It's 10 o'clock! Admiral, we did a good job today! Great!
360.H2300: 11 o'clock! Well then, let's finish it up for the day! Good night!

439.Intro: I am known as the Queen Elizabeth-class battleship, Warspite. Admiral, I'll be relying on you.
439.Library: Queen Elizabeth-class battleship, second ship, Warspite here. Admiral, the pleasure is mine. I'm a genuine born and bred British battleship. The Home Fleet, the Mediterranean and the Indian Ocean were all locations I was deployed to. Remember my name, Admiral. Be sure to engrave it into your memory.
439.Poke(3): What's this? Admiral, what on earth do think you're doing with that hand of yours? Would you kindly explain?
439.Idle: Admiral, are you free now...? Oh... you look busy... It can't be helped. I know, I'll go visit the Kongou girls in their room.
439.Married: My Admiral, what's wrong? You don't seem well. Hmmmm... that's it! I'll prepare some black tea and muffins. Tea time will definitely make you feel all better.
439.Wedding: My Admiral? Why are you calling? Eh? What's this ring? Is this for me? ...Yes. I gratefully accept, my Admiral! I'll be with you 'til death do us part!
439.Join: Sally go! Main fleet, weigh anchor!
439.Equip(1): This is a good armament. Thank you very much, indeed.
439.Equip(2): A Japanese weapon? It isn't bad. I quite like it.
439.Supply: I am much obliged for your kindness.
439.Docking(1): I'll be in the docks for a bit. See you later.
439.Docking(2): Admiral, I'll fall back to the rear for repairs. Keep in touch.
439.Construction: A new ship has been completed. It was good, wasn't it?
439.Sortie: Battleship Warspite, sortieing! Fleet, follow me!
439.Battle: Enemy ship is in sight. Open fire!
439.Yasen(1): So you think you can run from me? Amusing. Fleet, increase speed! Begin pursuit!
439.MVP: I'm number one? I beg to differ. It was all because of everyone putting up a good fight. Isn't that right, Admiral?
439.Sunk: I'm the one who is sinking? ...So... this is... how I'll fall on the battlefield...
439.NewYears 6547: Best wishes for a happy new year, Admiral!
439.Setsubun 6547: Setsuboon? If I'm not mistaken, those girls did mention it... Ah, Kongou, it's Setsuboon! Eh? Why are you laughing? Why is that? ...Why!?
439.Fall 6547: Japan in autumn. How pleasant... this atmosphere. I quite like it. The food is delicious, too.
439.Saury 6547: Saury? The fish? Battleships providing support with fishing... The Japanese fleet is certainly quite nice! I'd also like to take part!
439.Xmas 6547: Admiral! Happy Christmas! Let's have a drink today. Cheers! It's such a lovely day.

364.H0000: Admiral, the date has changed. I shall serve as flagship of the fleet for today.
364.H0100: It's one o'clock. I hope that tone of voice was good.
364.H0200: It's two o'clock now. The late night is so quiet. I'm rather fond of this hour.
364.H0300: It's three o'clock now. Shall I brew some black tea? You'll drink some, right?
364.H0400: It's four o'clock now. It's nearly daybreak. Admiral, aren't you a bit tired?
364.H0500: Good morning, Admiral! It's five o'clock now.
364.H0600: It's six o'clock now. Would you like a cup of black tea for the morning? Or would you prefer some strong coffee?
364.H0700: It's seven o'clock now. Admiral, breakfast is ready!
364.H0800: It's eight o'clock now. Well, let's begin with fleet operations for the day. I'll begin by assembling the battleship forces.
364.H0900: It's nine o'clock now. Those girls are ...Nagato... and Mutsu, correct? ...Hello! It's quite an honour.
364.H1000: It's ten o'clock now. Fuso class? Great! What a lovely and unique superstructure! Quite the sense of artistry. Indeed, even I can appreciate it!
364.H1100: It's eleven. Aviation... battleship? Super multi-plane... Zuiun? ...That's quite complicated. Japan's battleships are very intricate.
364.H1200: It is noon. Is that the renowned Yamato-class...? They're certainly amazing. So great...
364.H1300: It's one o'clock. Let's have lunch. I made some ham sandwiches. You can have them with some black tea! Please!
364.H1400: It's two o'clo... Oh, my! The Kongou sisters! You're looking full of spirit. That's wonderful.
364.H1500: It's three o'clock now. Kongou, what's wrong? ...Are you angry? Why?
