364.H1600: It's four o'clock now. Admiral, those girls... how scandalous. Ships from that country are here, too. ...Eh? ...They're good girls? Really? I... see... I'll go greet them, then. Hello!
364.H1700: It's five o'clock now. It's beautiful... the sunset. How pretty. Ever since arriving in this fleet, I've always loved the scenery. ...So lovely.
364.H1800: It's six o'clock now. The sun is setting. Time to bring the fleet home to port.
364.H1900: It's seven o'clock now. You'll be making dinner, Admiral...? Will you be alright? Do you need me to help?
364.H2000: It's eight o'clock now. Delicious! Admiral, your cooking is delicious! The Japanese fleet... the Japanese Admiral is so amazing...! *sigh*
364.H2100: It's nine o'clock now. Ah, if I'm not mistaken, those are Italian heavy cruisers. Hello! ...Wait, what? Why are you running!? W-Wait!
364.H2200: It's ten o'clock now. My, Italia-san... Roma-san. Eh? Fri... tz...? Ah, that's not good. It's out of the question. I'm... not good with it...
364.H2300: It's eleven o'clock now. Admiral, thank you for your hard work today. Sweet dreams.

83.Intro: I'm the aircraft carrier, Akagi. If you're forming a carrier task force, just leave it to me.
83.Library: I'm the aircraft carrier, Akagi. As a mainstay of the Carrier Task Force, I support its forward advances. A combination of diligent training and many proud air wings has earned us a reputation as an "invincible fleet". Overconfident, you say...? Hmm... you may be right... I'll keep it in mind.
83.Poke(1): Are we holding a strategy meeting?
83.Poke(2): Reppuu? No, never heard of it.
83.Poke(3): Ryuusei? Is that different from the Type 97 Torpedo Bomber?
83.Idle: Um... Admiral? Is it mealti- no! Is it time to start the strategy meeting yet!?
83.Married: 1st CarDiv, Akagi, always ready to deploy! Admiral, please take a break sometimes.
83.Wedding: Admiral... Admiral, when I'm with you, I feel as though there is a way to change those fateful five minutes. I will do my best.
83.Ranking: Admiral, I have a message for you.
83.Join: We mustn't be overconfident. Let's move forward with all our might!
83.Equip(1): I guess having three flight decks... is unnecessary, huh?
83.Equip(2): Thank you very much for the modernization.
83.Supply: Thank you very much for resupplying my planes. It helps a lot.
83.Docking(1): I'll be preparing for the next operation.
83.Docking(2): Looks like it'll take a little while to repair the flight deck.
83.Construction: A new ship can now take part in the task force.
83.Battle: First Bomber Squadron, please take off!
83.Yasen(1): Second Bomber Squadron, all planes, take off!
83.Yasen(2): All carrier-based planes, are you ready?
83.MVP: We must not become complacent following this victory. Reconnaissance and gaining the initiative are key... wait... where did that come from?
83.Damaged(3): For the pride of the 1st CarDiv... I cannot fall in such a place...
83.Sunk: I'm so sorry... scuttle me... please do it...
83.NewYears 6547: Admiral, CarDiv 1 is here to wish you well for the new year. We will be counting on you once again this year!
83.Setsubun 6547: It's Setsubun. So I throw this bean at the light cruiser playing the d- ...Er, oh, this is good~ How surprising... Oh, you can go~♪
83.Valentines 6547: Admiral, you may have this chocolate, if you'd like... Ah, right! There's no need for a return gift. Fufufu♪
83.Anniversary 6547: Admiral, today is an important day to us CarDiv 1. Here's to another year working together with you.
83.Rainy 6547: It's the rainy season. It's raining again today.... On a day like this, taking a break at Mamiya's sounds nice. Right, Admiral? Admiral?
83.Summer 6547: Oh my, Kaga-san. Summer is coming. Eh? A new swimsuit? I hadn't thought about getting one...
83.Saury 6547: Admiral, it's the autumn season. Autumn is for appetites. There are so many kinds of delicious food at this time of year... I can't wait♪
83.Xmas 6547: This is...! Delicious! So this is Christmas...! This is nice. Ah, Kaga-san, would you like some, too?
83.YearsEnd 6547: So then, it's time for CarDiv 1 to do the end of year cleanup. Polishing the the hangar, the deck and... Hm! Superb.

277.Sortie: The enemy's task force will definitely appear. Kaga-san and I will show you our pride as the First Division!

84.Intro: I'm Kaga, an aircraft carrier. Are you my admiral...? I will place my trust in your abilities.
84.Library: I, Kaga, was built as the third ship of the Eight-Eight Fleet. Eventually, in a twist of fate, I was completed as a large aircraft carrier. Along with Akagi-san, we are the main force of the glorious First Carrier Division, with myself as flagship.
84.Poke(1): Is there... something on my face?
84.Poke(2): Do you need to consult with me? It's fine.
84.Poke(3): My flight deck is delicate. Please do not touch it so much.
84.Married: Well... I feel the same way.
84.Wedding: I'm... not good at expressing myself... that is... Admiral... I... actually, you've made me very happy...
84.Ranking: There is a message here from Fleet Command.
84.Join: I will not give this up.
84.Equip(1): I agree. This enhancement was a great decision.
84.Equip(2): This is great equipment. I find it very uplifting.
84.Docking(2): It will take some time to repair this damage. I apologize.
84.Construction: It seems that a new ship has completed construction.
84.Return: Operation completed. The fleet has returned.
84.Battle: Don't associate me with the Fifth Division's children.
84.Attack: It will end in one strike, so do not worry.
84.Yasen(1): All of my children are exceptional.
84.MVP: That was an excellent battle strategy. I am looking forward to sortieing with this fleet again.
84.Damaged(1): I won't have this hanging over my head.
84.Damaged(2): My deck is on fire... this can't...
84.Damaged(3): A direct hit on the flight deck. That's... impossible...
84.Sunk: Akagi-san... if you are safe, then it's fine... I'm going ahead... I will wait for you...
84.NewYearsOld 6547: Admiral, Akagi-san, Happy New Year. I will be counting on you again this year.
84.NewYears 6547: CarDiv 2, I am counting on you again this year. ...Oh, CarDiv 5, you are both here as well. Indeed, I will be relying on you this year as well. Follow me resolutely.
84.Setsubun 6547: Ouch. A bean? I see. So it is Setsubun. Then, who was the one who hit me? I see.
84.Valentines 6547: Admiral, if you enjoy sweet things, then here. No, there is no special meaning.
84.Anniversary 6547: Third anniversary? We made it. Truly this is an exhilarating feeling. Let's celebrate with some sake. Would you like to join me, Admiral?
84.Rainy 6547: Is it raining? I do not like this season very much. Eh... Akagi, you do? I see.... Never mind. It is nothing.
84.Summer 6547: I am not too fond of the summer. The sea? Have fun.
84.Xmas 6547: Merry Christmas, huh...? It is fine. Admiral, have you seen Akagi-san anywhere...? I see...
84.YearsEnd 6547: December. It arrived so quickly. Ah... Akagi-san. Eh? You are making New Year's soba? Understood. I will assist you.

278.Poke(3): Is there something wrong with my aircraft hangar? I see... hn... I'd appreciate it if you would give me some room.
278.Idle: CarDiv 5, have you honed your skills? I see. Very well, you shall demonstrate it— in the field.
278.Construction: There's a new ship, but I wonder if she's strong enough.
278.Damaged(2): Akagi... I will not sink and... leave you behind...
278.H0400: 0400... it's always the most tiring before dawn.
278.H0800: 0800... it is time for combat operations.
278.H0900: 0900... it's the 1st CarDiv's turn, is it not?
278.H1100: 1100... have we completed enough exercises...? I see...
278.H1200: 1200... it is noon. Time for lunch.
278.H1300: 1300... growing lethargic after lunch, as expected.
278.H1400: 1400... ah, that part of the sea, huh? It will end in one strike.
278.H1500: 1500... those girls probably can't do it... we will have to cover for them.
278.H1600: 1600... I see. It seems those girls are fine, after all.
278.H1700: 1700... the sun is about to set. Let's secure the aircraft.
278.H1800: 1800... Admiral, thanks for the hard work. It was a productive day.
278.H1900: 1900... time for dinner. Today, it will be nikujaga. Sounds good. I'm looking forward to it.
278.H2000: 2000... for a bit, I'll be heading off to Akagi's room.
278.H2200: 2200... night battle... you say? I decline.
278.H2300: 2300... today was a great day. I will be thankful if tomorrow is the same.

90.Intro: I'm the aircraft carrier, Souryuu. If you're making a carrier task fleet, you can count me in.
90.Library: I'm the aircraft carrier, Souryuu. Starting from the attack on Pearl Harbor, the crucial battle that opened the war, I participated as an important frontline carrier. Eh? What? Midway? What's that? Is it tasty?
90.Poke(2): Well... um... the Type 99 Dive Bombers will stick out...
90.Poke(3): Excuse me, but you'll interrupt the landing drill if you shake the ship too much...
90.Idle: Mmm... Nothing's going on. Well, I guess that's not a bad thing. It's a little boring, though... Time to go hang out with Hiryuu... ah, Admiral! Aye! Nothing to report!
90.Married: Admiral, can you spare some time go into town with me? There are things I'd like to get. Ah, not at all, not at all! I'll buy them myself. Really!
90.Wedding: I'm... trying my hardest, you know? Am I being helpful? Hey... Admiral, what do I mean to you?
90.Ranking: Admiral, there's a telegram for you.
90.Join: My task fleet is now launching!
90.Equip(1): Thanks. With this, I won't lose to Hiryuu!
90.Equip(2): I'm so happy. Now I'm totally battle-ready.
90.Supply: Supplies are critical. Thank you! *whew* With this, I can fight again!
90.Docking(1): Please excuse me. I'm going to go freshen up real quick.
90.Docking(2): *sigh* ...My precious flight deck is... I'm checking in for a bit...
90.Construction: There are new forces joining the fleet, I see.
90.Return: The fleet has returned to the base.
90.Sortie: The aircraft are trained to perfection. I'm anticipating great results!
90.Attack: Watch the anti-air defense closely. I'm counting on you!
90.Yasen(1): Keep the counterstrike going. All aircraft, take off!
90.Yasen(2): That's right— keep aiming for the big ones!
90.MVP: The glory of the First Task Fleet will not waver!
90.Damaged(1): Stop it, stop it, stop it!
90.Damaged(2): The flight deck is getting bombed? Not good— it's going to blow...!
90.Damaged(3): Why is the deck getting bombed again!? It really hurts!
90.Sunk: The fire on the flight deck... it won't go out... sorry...
90.NewYears 6547: Admiral, have a Happy New Year~! The Second Carrier Division will be counting on you again this year~!
90.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun, huh? That's great! Sounds fun! Who is the demon for the Nagumo Task Force? Eh? Kaga-san!?
90.Valentines 6547: Here, Admiral— have chocolates from me as well! Don't feel obligated to eat too many, okay?
90.Anniversary 6547: Congratulations to you, Admiral! And to everybody else, too! We're going to celebrate today, right? Time to open the mess hall!
90.Saury 6547: Saury, then? That kind of saury? Well... I guess it's fine, but Salt-grilled Saury is definitely tasty!
90.Xmas 6547: Yay, it's Christmas! Isn't it great? The tree, the chicken... I love this atmosphere! Ufufu♪

279.H0000: It's midnight. For today, I'll be in charge of secretary ship duties. Is that okay with you?
279.H0300: *yaaaawn* It's 0300. Naturally, I'm getting a bit sleepy...
279.H0400: It's 0400, Admiral. It's almost morning, isn't it? Staying up late at night is bad for your complexion.
279.H0600: It's 0600, Admiral. I'll do the morning call. All hands, arise!
279.H0700: Admiral, it's 0700. Hey, what should we do for breakfast?
279.H0800: Itsh (0800?), Admihruhl...*gulp* So we got some Mamiya's for breakfast. Works for me!
279.H0900: It just turned 0900. Well, it's about time for fleet operations. Shall we get started?
279.H1000: It's 1000, Admiral. Hmm? My 2nd CarDiv's preparations are a-okay. We're ready any time!
279.H1100: Admiral, it's 1100. It's almost lunchtime. Gosh, am I ever hungry!
279.H1200: 1200. It's lunchtime! Hey, what's for lunch? What should we have♪
279.H1300: 1300. I agree— curry... sounds great! Mamiya-saan! Curry for two!
279.H1400: It's 1400, Admiral. Lunch ran a little late, so let's do something active. Active ...okay?
279.H1500: 150- Oh, Hiryuu! Nice work! Yup, I'm good! Nothing out of the ordinary here.
279.H1600: It's 1600, Admiral. Ah! Were you watching me just now♪ It's okay, go ahead and watch. Hmhm♪
279.H1700: Admiral, it's 1700. The sun is already setting. So, what's for dinner♪
279.H1800: 1800. Eh? Admiral, you're treating me to dinner? Yay! Looking forward to it♪
279.H1900: 1900. Oh! Looks delicious...! Admiral, you sure can cook. That's surprising. Let's eat~!
279.H2000: Admiral, it's 2000. *whew* I ate too much. Admiral, thanks for the food!
279.H2100: Admiral, it's 2100. That's true. I'll go maintain the dive bombers so they'll be ready for tomorrow.
279.H2200: 220- Ah, Hamakaze, Isokaze. Good job out there! Eh? You're going for night battle practice? That sounds tough.
279.H2300: It's 2300, Admiral. Thank you soooo much for today! Let's do our best tomorrow, too!

197.Poke(2): Well... um... you're getting in the way of the Egusa Squadron's maintenance. It-can-wait.
197.Poke(3): Admiral...? Is it really okay for you to do that? That girl over there is glaring... see? Aha! You fell for it! How cute♪
197.Ranking: Hm? You're looking over the intelligence? It's important, important. Good thinking!
197.Join: Second Carrier Division flagship Souryuu, setting sail!
197.Equip(1): Alright! Nice equipment! What do you think, Hiryuu?
197.Equip(2): I'm so happy! So...? Does it suit me?
197.Return: The fleet has safely returned to port. We did it♪
197.Sortie: The aircraft are ready to go. Alright... Second Carrier Division, sortieing! I'm expecting great results!
197.Battle: Here we go! CarDiv 2 Bomber Squadron, begin takeoff!
197.MVP: The glory of the Second Carrier Division of the First Task Fleet will not waver!

91.Intro: Aircraft carrier Hiryuu here. Leave the carrier battles to me. I can fight on against any and all adversity.
91.Library: Hiryuu-class aircraft carrier, Hiryuu here. Hm? Aren't I an improved version of the Souryuu-class, you asked? Don't sweat the small stuff! More importantly, scouting is crucial. In carrier warfare, the first to strike wins! Don't be blinded by pride! Carefully but boldly fight on through!
91.Poke(1): Hm? Has an enemy carrier appeared?
91.Poke(2): Er... hey! My planes will fall off.
91.Poke(3): Tamon-maru is going to get mad, you know?
91.Idle: Woah~ oh, oh, oh. So these are the blueprints for the revised Hiryuu-class aircraft carriers, the Unryuu-class. They sure were planning on making a lot... Wooow... this is amazing... A-Ah, Admiral, what was that? Sorry, but I wasn't really listening!
91.Married: Admiral, I appreciate the new planes, but I still prefer to fight alongside the Tomonaga Squadron. Eh? You'll grant my request? Thank you...! Ah...! I hugged you without thinking. Sorry♪
91.Wedding: Sometimes... once in a while... it's okay to forget about the fighting, you know? Hey... look at me. Yeah! I love it... that smile...
91.Ranking: The Red Brick has a message for you, it seems.
91.Equip(1): Great! I can continue fighting with this!
91.Equip(2): Alright! With this, CarDiv 1 is no match for us!
91.Supply: Thanks for the resupply. With this, I'll be able to sortie again! Alright!
91.Docking(1): I'll go do some quick repairs on my flight deck.
91.Docking(2): Good grief. Well, sometimes there's nothing you can do but enter the docks.
91.Construction: Construction is complete. Hopefully she's a good ship.
91.Return: The fleet has returned. Is Operation MI next?
91.Sortie: We'll win decisively! Be sure to scout thoroughly.
91.Attack: A second attack wave is required. Hurry!
91.Yasen(1): Alright! Tomonaga Squadron, I'm counting on you!
91.Yasen(2): Even if I'm the last ship standing, I'll give them hell!
91.MVP: How's that! Hey, Tamon-maru, were you watching?
91.Damaged(1): This is nothing but a scratch!
91.Damaged(2): Ouch! Are we... still able to land and take off?
91.Sunk: So I'm going to sink... then I'll have one final little drink with the moon...
91.NewYears 6547: Best wishes for the new year! Admiral, CarDiv 2 will be counting on you again this year! Okay?
91.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun, then? Isn't that nice? The demon is... Kaga-san? So who was the one that picked her? Admiral? Akagi-san?
91.Anniversary 6547: So we're gonna celebrate today! Yessss! Hiryuu wants to celebrate with the admiral next year, too.... Okay?
91.Saury 6547: *sniff sniff* The Salt-grilled Saury smells so good! Ah, right, it's time for the Naval Base Saury Festival! That's great!
91.Xmas 6547: Oh~oh~ it's Christmas. The cake... the turkey... mmm~ they're just so delicious! Huh? Zuikaku? Why are you angry? Eh-

280.H0000: Alright, I'll be in charge of announcing the time today. Now, from the top! Midnight!
280.H0300: 03... 00... Not good, not good! Maybe I should make some coffee?.
280.H0400: 0400. Admiral, I made some coffee. Here. It's still hot, so be careful.
280.H0500: 0500. Ahh...! The morning sun sure is dazzling...! Admiral, morning!
280.H0600: 0600. It's morning! All hands, arise and shine! Now, let's start our day.
280.H0700: 0700. Admiral, I made breakfast. Sorry, but it's only a simple Japanese breakfast. Is that enough rice?
280.H0800: 0800. Now, let's start the morning off with practice drills. Training is important! Very important!
280.H0900: 0900. That's right. If we neglect our training, Tamon-maru will scold us. You know?
280.H1000: 100- Ah, Kazagumo, Makigumo, how've you been? Oh? Good to hear! I'm also doing great! Just great!
280.H1100: 1100. Hmm... aren't you hungry? Our breakfast was kinda light...
280.H1200: 1200. Lunch for today will be... Mm, let's go for Mamiya's. Sounds good, right?
280.H1300: 1300. *whew* I'm full, so full! Mamiya-san's food sure is good, but the servings are kinda small. Right?
280.H1400: 1400. Now, shall we do some maneuvers to work off lunch? We have to be relentless and practice intensely!
280.H1500: 1500. It's time for a snack♪ Ah... it's Irako-chan. Hey! Heeeeyy!
280.H1600: 1600. Souryuu? Yeah, we're very close. How do I put it...? It's almost as if she were... another me.
280.H1700: 1700. We got so caught up in talking that it's already evening. What should I do for dinner?
280.H1800: 1800. Eh? Admiral, you'll make dinner? Come to think of it, Souryuu said your cooking was delicious...
280.H1900: 1900. Isn't this kind of extravagant? Admiral, this is on the level of the Yamato Hotel. It looks so delicious...!
280.H2000: 2000. Thanks for the food! Admiral, this is... so good♪ These portions are the best...!
280.H2100: 2100. *whew* I'm full, so full... but I'm going to get fat. Tamon-maru is going to be angry with me...
280.H2200: 2200. Yeah, the maintenance of the Tomonaga Squadron is perfect! We'll be ready to fight tomorrow as well.
280.H2300: 2300. *phew* And so, another day has passed. Admiral, thanks for today. Let's do our best tomorrow, too!

196.Intro: Aircraft carrier Hiryuu here. Leave the carrier battles to me. I'll show you I can counter any and all adversity!
196.Poke(3): Tamon-maru is g... er... Oh, he won't? Then... it's fine. ...You mean it?
196.Ranking: You want to check the intelligence from the Red Brick? Then have a look!
196.Join: Alright! Second Carrier Division flagship Hiryuu, sortieing!
196.Equip(1): Yes! That's a good plane! Right?
196.Equip(2): Alright! With this, we can't lose to CarDiv 1! Right, Souryuu?
196.Return: The fleet has returned. After Operation MI is... It's still too soon. Ufufufu♪
196.Sortie: Fleet, sortie! Let's win decisively. Be sure to scout thoroughly!

110.Intro:
First of the Shoukaku-class carriers, Shoukaku here.
I will try to live up to the names of my senpai in CarDiv 1 and CarDiv 2, fighting hard alongside Zuikaku!
110.Library:
First of the Shoukaku-class carriers, Shoukaku here.

I was designed and built after the Washington Naval Treaty was denounced, and commissioned as a standard large-scale aircraft carrier. Along with my younger sister Zuikaku, we form the Fifth Carrier Division.

After a tragic event, we succeeded our senpai and continued to support the front lines.
110.Poke(2): Zuikaku, don't give the admiral such a hard time, okay?
110.Poke(3): Zuikaku, come on, stop playing with my skirt so mu- Wait... Oh, my goodness... Admiral?
110.Idle: Admiral? Um... we should be heading to Port Moresby... Um... that is...
110.Married: Admiral, I'm always really grateful for your hard work. Please take a short break, okay?
110.Wedding: Admiral, thank you so much. You've loaded these wonderful planes that I had never seen before. I'm truly overflowing with this feeling of gratitude! Maybe... just maybe... if my wish comes true, after Marianas, you and I can always...
110.Ranking: Admiral, would you like to browse through the report?
110.Equip(1): Okay! I think this will work!
110.Equip(2): I'm so happy! Admiral, you have my thanks.
110.Docking(1): I'll take a short bath... Be out in a bit.
110.Docking(2): I seem to get injured rather easily... Right, Zuikaku?
110.Construction: Admiral, a new warship has been completed.
110.Return: The fleet has returned! Everyone, that was really nice work!
110.Sortie: Ready, Zuikaku? Let's go. The Task Force is sortieing!
110.Attack: Here we go. All planes, attack!
110.Yasen(1): Now, then... what's going to appear? Be sure to watch out for submarines.
110.Yasen(2): Combat Air Patrol, provide cover for the Bomber Squadron!
110.MVP: Admiral, I did it! It's all thanks to the aircraft girls and all of the accompanying ships working so hard! Thank you all!
110.Damaged(1): Ow...! I-I can still do this!
110.Damaged(2): G-Geez! Why are you only going for me?
110.Damaged(3): I've been hit! It'll be difficult for the planes to land and take off!
110.Sunk: I'm... dying once again... Yahagi-san, Akizuki-san... take over... please...
110.H0000: Admiral? It seems the date has changed.
110.H0500: The present time is 0500. It's daybreak.
110.H0600: 0600. I'll give the wake-up call for the ship girls.
110.H0700: It's 0700. What should we do for breakfast?
110.H0800: 0800. Let's do our best again today!
110.H0900: The present time is 0900. Should I send out the scout planes?
110.H1000: The time is 1000. Zuikaku, are you okay?
110.H1100: 1100. It's almost time to make lunch.
110.H1400: The present time is 1400. Admiral, are you getting worn out?
110.H1500: It's 1500. It's almost time for the operation to begin.
110.H1600: 1600. I'm sending out the Combat Air Patrol.
110.H1700: It's 1700. The setting sun is beautiful, Admiral.
110.H2000: It's 2000. A light cruiser is making a commotion. What could it be?
110.H2200: It's 2200. Admiral, aren't you getting tired?
110.H2300: The present time is 2300. Isn't it about time to turn in?
110.NewYears 6547: Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! My younger sister, Zuikaku and I will be counting on you again this year.
110.Setsubun 6547: Zuikaku, it's Setsubun. ...No, don't worry about it. Just leave the demon role to me. I'm already used to it...
110.Valentines 6547: Admiral, if it's okay with you, won't you please accept this...? ...! Thank goodness. Thank you very much!
110.Rainy 6547: It's the rainy season. This reminds me of the days of Operation MO. There was a squall then, too.... right, Zuikaku?
110.Summer 6547: Zuikaku, did you buy a new swimsuit? My, it's nice. It's very cute. Eh? Me? I'm fine with last year's. Wha... really? Do you think so?
110.Fall 6547: Fall. That's right, Zuikaku. Fall makes me... start to feel a bit lonely. No... I'm fine right now.
110.Xmas 6547: Zuikaku? What's the matter? What has you feeling so irritable? It's finally Christmas, so have some of this and relax. Okay? ...Eh? Ehh!?
110.YearsEnd 6547: December is always such a busy month. Zuikaku, that dish cloth is for the tablewares. Ah, no, wait, it's this one... huh? Ah! Ow, ow, ow... Ah... oh, no!!

461.Intro:
First of the Shoukaku-class carriers, Shoukaku here.
I hope that the remodeled Shoukaku-class, including Zuikaku, will be a useful source of strength for you.
461.Library:
First of the Shoukaku-class carriers, Shoukaku here.

I was designed and built after the Washington Naval Treaty was denounced, and commissioned as a standard large-scale aircraft carrier. Along with my younger sister Zuikaku, we form the Fifth Carrier Division.

After a tragic event, we succeeded our senpai and continued to support the front lines. And now, having gotten through Marianas, I wish to continue flying onward with the admiral.
461.Poke(2): Zuikaku, don't give our accompanying ships such a hard time, okay? ...Zuikaku? Zuikaku!?
461.Married: Admiral... I've... been of use to you, haven't I? Ah... is... that so? I'm glad... Thank goodness!
461.Join: New CarDiv 5, flagship Shoukaku. Starting the sortie!
461.Equip(1): So this is the new equipment... Ah, yes! I'll be sure to put it to good use.
461.Sortie: Ready, Zuikaku? Don't fall behind! The Task Force is setting sail!
461.Damaged(2):
Nh...! O-Ouch...
A-Are we still able to land and take off?
461.Damaged(3): The remodeled Shoukaku-class will not sink so easily. Is the flight deck intact? Hm? Good to hear. I can still fight on!

466.Poke(1): A newly remodeled flight deck and aviation equipment— this is a new era for flight rigging. I'll do my best!
466.Yasen(1): Oh? Is it another squall? Zuikaku, want to change course a bit?

111.Intro: Second of the Shoukaku-class aircraft carriers, the younger sister, Zuikaku. The lucky carrier, you say? That's not it— I just fight with all my might... see? As long as I still have planes, I won't lose!
111.Library: Second of the Shoukaku-class aircraft carriers, Zuikaku. Following the battle of Midway, I occupied a core position in the First Task Force along with Shoukaku-nee. I fought until the very last arrow was fired... which was literally the day the Task Force was completely annihilated...
111.Poke(1): Admiral... what is it? An operation?
111.Poke(2): Shoukaku-nee, what is it? A-Admiral, it was you!? What do you want? Are you trying to get bombed?
111.Poke(3): All bomber aircraft, prepare for immediate takeoff! Objective: the admiral in his home port office! Get him!
111.Idle: Admiral...! You know, I'm getting really bored here... I'm gonna throw a fit...
111.Married: Admiral... you shouldn't overdo it, you know...?
111.Wedding: Admiral... what's up...? You're looking at me so seriously. Is there something on my face? Eh? Ah! Too close! You're too close! Your face... ah.. ah~h~h...! Ah...
111.Ranking: Admiral... so...? How'd you do, how'd you do?
111.Equip(2): Oh, wow... this is pretty good... ♪Thaaank you!
111.Supply: Fuel... ammunition... the planes are fully resupplied.
111.Docking(1): I'm going into the bath for a bit.
111.Docking(2): Well... even I get hurt sometimes.
111.Construction: Admiral, it looks like a new ship is ready.
111.Return: The fleet has safely returned. Haaa~h...! Thank goodness...
111.Attack: We'll decide this... from outside their range!
111.Yasen(1): Turkey, you say...? This isn't funny!
111.Yasen(2): Second Bomber Squadron, all airworthy planes, commence takeoff!
111.MVP: Yes!!! Did you see? This is the true power of CarDiv 5! The Goddess of Fortune is on my side!
111.Damaged(3): Damn! These hits are coming out of nowhere! Suppress any explosions! Is the flight deck okay?
111.Sunk: Nh... am I done for...? All hands, to the flight deck... Shoukaku-nee, are you there waiting for me...?
111.H0000: Admiral, the date just changed, you know?
111.H0600: The current time is 0600. We're up early... or is it "up very late"?
111.H0700: It's 0700. What's for breakfast!? Looking forward to it♪
111.H0800: It's currently 0800. Okay, let's try hard to outrange them again today!
111.H0900: The time is 0900. To start with, should we prepare with recon?
111.H1000: It's now 1000. Is Shoukaku-nee doing okay?
111.H1100: It's 1100. What are we having for lunch? Hey, what's for lunch?
111.H1200: Admiral! 12- ...Anyway, it's lunchtime! Lunchtime! I want lunch...!
111.H1300: 13- nn~nnnn~ what a pain! It's 1 o'clock! 1 o'clock!
111.H1400: Yeah, yeah. I know. The-present-time-is-1-4-0-0. Is that good?
111.H1500: The time is 1500. Is Ozawacchi doing okay?
111.H1600: It's 1600. It'll be evening soon, won't it?
111.H1700: The sunlight is gradually fading away. It's 1700.
111.H1900: 19- ...Uggghhh... it really is a pain to say. It's 7 o'clock. What are we having for dinner?
111.H2000: 2000... 8 o'clock! I don't really care, but... Kawau- ...Sendai, shut up!
111.H2200: 2200. It's well into the night... Admiral, is it ok if I get dismissed soon?
111.H2300: It's getting pretty late. 2300. Mmm... let's turn in soon...
111.NewYears 6547: Admiral, Shoukaku-nee, Happy New Year! I'm counting on you guys again this year! Huh... why are you two laughing? Eh?
111.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun, eh...? Ah, Shoukaku-nee, there's no need for you to be the demon every year...! Ah geez, give me that mask! Come on, sheesh...
111.Anniversary 6547: Admiral-san, I'm sure I'm the only one who even considered it, so I'll give you this chocolate out of pity. Here... ...Make sure... you give me a return gift.
111.Rainy 6547: I don't like this season for some reason.... I just can't warm up to it. I wonder if Shoukaku is alright? I'm kinda worried....
111.Summer 6547: Shoukaku-nee, look, look! It's my brand new swimsuit for the year! I went and bought it! I mean, it's almost summer! You should come with me and buy one, too!
111.Fall 6547: Fall, huh...? That's true, fall is the season of endings. However, it's also the season of beginnings. It definitely is. That's what I believe. Heh... that's so unlike me!
111.Xmas 6547: Hmm... Christmas, huh... ...Ah! Shoukaku-nee! I won't eat that dish! I absolutely will not eat it! I said I don't need it~!
111.YearsEnd 6547: The end of the year came in the blink of an eye. The cleanup is such a pain, ugh... Ah, Shoukaku-nee, what? Ah! Be careful! Ahh! Are you okay, Shoukaku-nee?

462.Intro: The carrier whose rigging was completely modernized, Zuikaku here. Don't confuse me for your average aircraft carrier!
462.Library: Second of the Shoukaku-class aircraft carriers, Zuikaku. Following the battle of Midway, I occupied a core position in the First Task Force along with Shoukaku-nee. I fought until the very last arrow was fired... which was literally the day the Task Force was completely annihilated... ...However, this time will be different! I will show you the strength and potential of a fully remodeled aircraft carrier! Shoukaku-nee, let's do this!
462.Equip(1): New planes? That's great! Thank you!
462.Sortie: Task Force flagship Zuikaku, setting sail! Follow my lead!
462.Battle: Shoukaku-nee, let's do this. Bow to windward! Bomber Squadron, commence takeoff!
462.MVP: Yesss!!! Did you see? This is the true power of the new CarDiv 5! The Goddess of Fortune is on my side!

467.Equip(2): A new model of plane... hmm... sounds good to me. It's definitely compatible with my current rigging.
467.Attack: Now, let's get started. This time we'll definitely strike from outside their range. All bomber squadrons, take off!
467.Damaged(3): Damn! That hit came out of nowhere! Suppress any explosions! Is the deck intact? Then I can still fight!

153.Intro: Yes... I am Taihou. Thank you for your reception. Admiral... I shall bring victory to you and your task force!
153.Library: I'm the Armoured Carrier, Taihou. I'm the newest and most advanced standard carrier that is armed with a flight deck. Aren't these enclosed hangars great? Hmm? You say that gas builds up easily? How rude. I-it'll be fine this time!
153.Poke(1): Admiral. Are you interested in my armoured flight deck?
153.Poke(2): Yes, these are the newest enclosed hangars. I can fit Ryuuseis and Reppus with no problem.
153.Poke(3): Are you really that interested in the colour of my flight deck? Your face is close... it's making me feel awkward.
153.Idle: Admiral! Making me wait... I won't say anymore. Training and planning are important. Shall we sortie once we are properly ready?
153.Married: Admiral, aren't you tired? Really? Well, that's okay. But don't overdo it… okay?
153.Wedding: Admiral.. Did I meet your expectations? Well, that's great♪ But I've still got much more to go. Let's stay together and do our best!
153.Join: Today's winds are good... Standard Carrier Taihou, heading out!
153.Supply: With proper supplies and training, they won't call us turkeys!
153.Docking(1): You're right. A small wound may end up a fatal one.
153.Docking(2): It's important to use this time to carry out some proper repairs.
153.Construction: Construction of a new ship has been completed!
153.Return: Campaign complete! The fleet has returned to base.
153.Sortie: Everyone ready? We're going out. First mobile squadron, sortieing!
153.Battle: I'll show you the true strength of the newest and most advanced armoured carrier!
153.Attack: My brilliant pilots will show you what they're made of!
153.Yasen(1): Yes. We shall use this opportunity to annihilate them!
153.Yasen(2): Reppu and Ryuusei. I wanted to see this squadron!
153.MVP: Admiral, did I not promise you victory? I won't lose!
153.Damaged(1): This level of damage would not faze me!
153.Damaged(2): Hah! E-explosion!? My Tankers? Are they all right!?
153.Damaged(3): Argh! M-my fuel! Gotta make sure it doesn't ignite!
153.Sunk: I'm sinking... again. However, you saw me going wild, didn't you? Good... I'm... satisfied.
153.H0000: Midnight. I, Taihou shall be the one telling you the time today.
153.H0100: 0100. Hmm? You want to train together? Sure.
153.H0200: 0200. Even if I'm the newest and most advanced, I'll feel insecure if you keep looking at me like that!
153.H0300: 0300. Admiral, shouldn't you take some sleep? Eh, you'll be fine?
153.H0400: 040...0... Haa... Fuu... Ah, I- I'm not sleeping! Really!
153.H0500: 0500. It's morning. Shall we start with some running? Eh, Dailies?
153.H0600: 0600. Admiral, what would you like for breakfast? A Japanese meal from Mamiya?
153.H0700: 0700. Stamina training is the most basic of basics. Some press ups before breakfast would go well.
153.H0800: 0800. The breakfast was delicious! Now for some more muscle training!
153.H0900: 0900. Admiral, why are you looking so tired before we have even started combat? Are you okay?
153.H1000: 1000. Now, it's time to really start the fighting!
153.H1100: 1100. That feels nice! Admiral, are you still holding up?
153.H1200: 1200. It's noon. I wonder what sort of curry is served in this fleet.
153.H1300: It's 1300. Eh!? It's my turn to make curry, as I'm the secretary this time!?
153.H1400: 1400. Sorry, this ended up really late... but here's some Taihou curry.
153.H1500: 1500. How was my curry? It was great...? Hurray!
153.H1600: 1600. Most accidents occur in the evening. Let's stay vigilant!
153.H1700: It's 1700. Eh!? An explosion from far away...? That's scary... be careful of fires!
153.H1800: 1800. Um... my apologies... triggered explosions are the only thing I can't handle... enemies are fine.
153.H1900: 1900. Admiral, as you're here... I've calmed down. It's true.
153.H2000: 2000. That suisei? Yes, I would never forget it.
153.H2100: 2100. This late already? Time seems to fly by when I'm with you. It's amazing.
153.H2200: 2200. Admiral, you're done for the day, aren't you? How about some alcohol with the late night snack?
153.H2300: 2300. If you drink too much... Oh? Hehe... your sleeping face is adorable. D'ohoh.
153.NewYears 6547: Admiral, the fleet has welcomed the new year. The First Task Fleet and I will be relying on your leadership again this year. It's greatly appreciated!
153.Anniversary 6547: Admiral, congratulations on our fleet's third anniversary. I, Taihou, will celebrate this occasion. Let us do our best for the upcoming year.
153.Rainy 6547: If the rain keeps on pouring, it'll hinder our flight drills. I'm worried that the squad will not get adequate training. Hmm...
153.Rainy 1471: That's right! I can just use the rain as part of their training. Right! Fellow planes, commencing... huh? Everyone? Huh...?
153.Fall 6547: Shoukaku-san, Zuikaku-san, thanks as always. I was going to try to bake some potatoes. How about it? Want to join me? Fiber is good for your body you know?
153.Saury 6547: E-Everyone, what's going on? What's with that fleet composition and equipment? ...Eh? It's for northern saury fishing... support? I-Is that so...? ...I see...
153.Xmas 6547: Admiral? Merry Christmas! Looks like Shoukaku-san and Zuikaku-san are having fun as well! Eh? ...Th... they... they're having fun... right? So, Admiral! Okay, cheers!

156.Intro: Good morning! It's the remodelled Taihou! Reinforced deck armour! Even higher defence! An increase in open-air planes to boost capacity just for you, Admiral!
156.Library: I am aircraft carrier Taihou. State of the art carrier with reinforced armour all round, including the flight deck. My enclosed hangers and Hurricane Bow look good don't they? My armoured flight deck has also been redecorated. How does it look? Do you think it suits me?
156.Poke(1): Admiral. Are you really that interested in my hurricane bow?
156.Poke(2): Yes, the anti-air weaponry is also state-of-the-art. I'll take on however many that comes!
156.Poke(3): Martyrs... something I do not like to say. As much as I'd like to avoid saying it, it is a war we're currently in.
156.Ranking: Admiral, have you read the report?
156.Join: Taihou, heading out now! I wonder if everyone is doing fine in Tawi-Tawi?
156.Docking(1): Gotta make sure we don't get any fuel leaks.
156.Docking(2): Okay, time to take a long bath once in a while!
156.Construction: Seems like a new ship has been added to our forces!
156.Return: The fleet has returned to base. Good work!
156.Sortie: First Mobile Squad Flagship, Taihou, heading out!
156.Yasen(1): All ships forward! Wipe the remaining forces out!
156.Yasen(2): These reinforced decks aren't just for show. Second assault squad, launch!
156.MVP: How's this, Admiral? This is my, and our mobile squadron's true power!
156.Sunk: No matter how thick the armour... you will sink when the time comes, huh... However, you saw me going wild, didn't you? Good... I'm... satisfied.

404.Intro:
Unryuu class aircraft carrier, Unryuu, reporting in.
Admiral, it's a pleasure to meet you.
404.Library:
Built in wartime under the Rapid Naval Armaments Supplement Programme, the eldest of the Unryuu-class aircraft carriers, Unryuu.

I am the improved mass-production version of Hiryuu, the masterpiece medium-sized carrier. I was supposed to be able to act as a mainstay of the reborn Task Force, but...

...I'll show everyone this time.
404.Poke(2): Stop that. My flight deck isn't very wide, so... don't touch it.
404.Poke(3): Hmm...? So you'll give me an exceptional aircraft? In that case, let's have a little chat.
404.Idle: Admiral? ...Admiral? Can't you hear me? Should I send a recon plane? Or maybe a dive bomber?
404.Married: Admiral. Even if the decisive battle is inevitable, relax your shoulders and let's try to take it easy. I will always be by your side, so... it'll be just fine.
404.Wedding: Admiral, why are you being so formal? ...Eh? This is for me? This is... um... Why did you choose me? There are others who... No, I will treasure this. It's precious to me.
404.Ranking:
The intelligence, huh...
How is the state of the war?
404.Equip(2): A new plane model... ...Give me a full complement.
404.Supply: A resupply, huh...? Please replenish my aircraft as well.
404.Docking(1): My clothes have been dirtied. How unpleasant...
404.Docking(2): An after-battle bath... *whew* This isn't bad... mm... Not bad at all...
404.Construction: It looks like a hastily-built ship was finished.
404.Sortie: This isn't a transport mission— this is an aerial battle. I'm raring to go.
404.Battle: Right. First Bomber Squadron, commence takeoff.
404.Attack: We're going? Right. All aircraft, commence takeoff.
404.Yasen(1): You won't escape. Unryuu, starting the assault.
404.Yasen(2): Don't forget to watch for submarines.
404.MVP:
I'm the ship who accomplished the most? I see...
No... I'm happy. It feels wonderful...
404.Damaged(2): A direct hit!? Engine room! Emergency power...!
404.Damaged(3):
I'm hit... Correct the listing.
I won't sink... ever again...
404.Sunk:
An explosion from the hangar... Not good...
...No, it's fine... I'm happy I was able to do what I was designed for... Thank you...
404.Rainy 6547: I see, so it's raining again today. I'm sure it's fine to take a rest, you know?
404.Saury 6547: Oh, my... saury is so delicious. Food that is in season is really wonderful. Oh, I know, next time I'll let Shigure have some, too.
404.Xmas 6547: Admiral, say "ahhh". You see? It's sweet and delicious, right? For Christmas, I find this thing they call cake to be quite charming. This carbonated alcohol seems nice as well.

406.Intro:
Unryuu-class aircraft carrier, Unryuu, present.
Admiral, please leave the reborn Task Force to me.
406.Poke(2): I told you... don't touch my flight deck. Are you really that interested? ...I guess there's no helping it.
406.Poke(3): Hmm...? So you'll place even more exceptional aircraft on board? Well then, I'd like some variety.
406.Ranking:
The intelligence? Let me have a look.
Hmm... So I see.
406.Join: Task Force flagship, aircraft carrier Unryuu. Setting sail.
406.Equip(1): New airframes are... I'm always excited for them.
406.Equip(2): Ryuusei Kai, huh...? Ah... no, it was nothing.
406.Docking(2): Taking a bath after battle... *whew* In any case, I feel relieved.
406.Construction: It looks like a hastily-built ship was finished. Is she Amagi?
406.Sortie: Unryuu-class transport ship, they say? What a joke. I will show you my true power.
406.H0000: Admiral, it has just turned midnight.
406.H0100: Admiral, it's 0100. This tranquility late at night is something I don't mind.
406.H0200: It's 0200, Admiral. Wouldn't it be better to take a rest soon?
406.H0300: 0300. Admiral, I have this feeling that I'll meet Amagi one day.
406.H0400: It's 0400. Admiral, the night will be over soon. Another day is starting.
406.H0500: It's 0500. Admiral, it's now morning. Now, let's begin operations.
406.H0600: 0600. Admiral, what would you like to do for breakfast? Would you like to have it together with me?
406.H0700: 0700. Please excuse the simple breakfast. Is it a little less food than you'd like?
406.H0800: It's 0800. Now, Admiral, let's load the aircraft and launch the fleet.
406.H0900: 0900. What would be good as a carrier-based aircraft? Tenzan...? Ryuusei...? Reppuu are fine, too.
406.H1000: It's 1000. Admiral, the airframes loaded right now are rather... um... um...
406.H1100: It's 1100. Admiral, what would you like for lunch? I'll go make it.
406.H1200: 1200. I made rice balls as lunchtime combat rations. How are they?
406.H1300: It's 1300, Admiral. Was lunch a bit too simple? Sorry about that...
406.H1400: 1400. Admiral, of course I don't mind the transport missions, but the cargo is... um...
406.H1500: It's 1500. You're right, but carrying such explosive cargo is... ...Aye...
406.H1600: It's 1600. Admiral, I get a little nervous around this time. You absolutely have to be vigilant for the presence of submarines.
406.H1700: 1700. *sigh* ...It'll be such a relief to get through this part of the day. I'm a little nervous.
406.H1800: It's 1800. Admiral, it's time for dinner. What would you like? ...Well...
406.H1900: 1900. Shigure, what is it? Eh? A care package? Thank you. You saved me.
406.H2000: 2000. Admiral, Shigure left us a care package of rice balls and pickled radish.
406.H2100: It's 2100. Admiral, we already had this for lunch, but Shigure's rice balls are really good, aren't they? Ufufu...
406.H2200: Admiral, it's 2200. It's already well into the night. It's become a lot more quiet.
406.H2300: Admiral, I'm notifying you that it's 2300. Thank you very much for all you've done today.

331.Intro:
I'm the Unryuu-class aircraft carrier known as Amagi.
Admiral, it's an honor to be working for you.
I will dedicate myself to it!
331.Library:
Unryuu-Class aircraft carrier, the second ship, Amagi here.

I was a rushed wartime construction under the Rapid Naval Armaments Supplement Programme.

Even though I wasn't able to join the Carrier Task Force, I still fought hard in the air battle over Kure Naval base!
331.Poke(1): Um... is it an air battle?
331.Poke(2): What...? Anti-air defense! Commence firing! Oh? Admiral...? Ah... well...
331.Poke(3): Admiral, do you need to do something with my hangar? You're deploying aircraft...? ...! That's wonderful!
331.Idle: Hakodate...? Why is that... such a familiar name...? ...Am I imagining it? Ah! Admiral, did you call for me? I will fight on with everything I have.
331.Married: Admiral, as always, thank you so much for your hard work. I'm right here on standby, so... please call me if you ever need anything.
331.Wedding: Admiral, did you call for me? Eh? For me? This is...? ...I accept. Admiral, thank you so much! Always... I will cherish this forever!
331.Ranking: Admiral, intelligence is important, isn't it? I think so, too.
331.Join: Carrier Division flagship, Amagi. Starting the sortie!
331.Equip(1): Shall we reinforce my anti-aircraft guns?
331.Equip(2): New aircraft...! I feel so inspired! Thank you very much!
331.Supply:
For this precious fuel and these aircraft...
Thank you very much!
331.Docking(1):
This isn't a serious wound, but...
Admiral, please excuse me.
331.Docking(2):
I have to apologize... This is going to be a long bath.
I truly... am sorry...
331.Construction: It looks as though a new ship was commissioned.
331.Return: The fleet has safely returned. Good work.
331.Sortie: Aircraft carrier, Amagi. I'm setting sail.
331.Battle: This isn't anti-air defense! The Bomber Squadron will be taking off! Amagi Carrier Division, commence takeoff!
331.Attack: Amagi Carrier Division... I-I'm counting on you!
331.Yasen(1): W-We're pursuing? So I see... I-I'll do my best!
331.Yasen(2): Reppuu... ...those dazzling wings... Ah...! Even though they're my own planes, I was mesmerized by them!
331.MVP: I was the... best one? ...Really? Ah... thank you very much! ...I'm so happy...
331.Damaged(3): Uu... I've been hit. It won't be possible for planes to take off now!
331.Sunk: Even though I'm sinking... I have... such a strange feeling... This time... I was able to... fight with everything... I had...
331.NewYears 6547: Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! It's an honor to be spending New Year's with you!
331.Anniversary 6547: Admiral, today is an important day, right? Amagi is honored to be with you! Fufu, I'm happy.
331.Xmas 6547: Merry Christmas to you, Admiral. The scenery at Hakodate and Kure will be beautiful tonight, I'm sure.

429.Intro:
Unryuu-class aircraft carrier, Amagi here!
Admiral, I'll be able to play an active role now!
429.Poke(3): Admiral, do you need to do something with my hangar? You're inspecting the brand new aircraft...? ...Are you really?
429.Married: Admiral, for giving me these wonderful planes... and now, for using me as a mainstay aircraft carrier... I truly cannot thank you enough! I'm so full of appreciation...!
429.Join: Reborn First Carrier Division, Amagi. Starting the sortie!
429.Battle: 601st Air Group, commencing takeoff! Now, please begin!
429.MVP: *phew* ...I'm happy I was able to do this much in battle! Anyone can do it... if they put their mind to it!
429.H0000: Admiral, the date has changed. For today, I, Amagi, will be the one notifying you of the time! Ah, yes! It'll be fine. I'll do my best!
429.H0100: The time is now 0100. Admiral, the fleet is so peaceful at night.
429.H0200: It's 0200. It's the time of Ushimitsu, Admiral. Does it scare me a little? No! It's no... problem... at... all... ...A... Admiral...? ...Where are...? Ah... Hwaa!?
429.H0300: It's... 0300. Admiral? Um... I'd like you to stop teasing me. You really surprised me. ...I-It's not like I was scared...
429.H0400: The time is now 0400. Admiral, this time of night is so sleep-inducing... ... ...I'll pull through!
429.H0500: It's 0500. The night has come to a close. Should I get ready to do the morning call?
429.H0600: 0600. Fleet, rise and shine! It's morning. Let's do our best again today!
429.H0700: It's 0700. Admiral, I'm sorry that it's so simple, but breakfast is ready right over here! To start with, there's miso soup with dashi stock...
429.H0800: It's 0800. Admiral? Did my breakfast suite your tastes? Ah... thank goodness. ...Then I'll put everything away. Fufu... ...thank goodness...
429.H0900: The time is now 0900. Admiral, it's about time for the fleet to sortie. What should we do for the main fleet's composition?
429.H1000: It's 1000. That's right, it makes me really happy that I'll be able to load aircraft! They're nice things to have... these planes.
429.H1100: It's 1100. It's about time to make lunch, isn't it? Admiral, is there anything you'd like to eat? What should we do...?
429.H1200: 1200. It's noon! Admiral, I tried making Japanese curry for lunch. Here's a big bowl for you to eat! There's even enough for seconds.
429.H1300: It's 1300. Wasn't my Japanese curry good? After all, it had dashi! On top of that, the potato starch's thickness was a strong point! Ufufu♪
429.H1400: The time is now 1400. Ah... Unryuu nee-sama! How are you feeling? Nee-sama, you're so beautiful these days... I want to be just like you!
429.H1500: It's 1500. Admiral, how about something sweet? I ordered some kuzumochi from Mamiya-san! Let's have some.
429.H1600: It's 1600. Admiral, if I train hard, will I be able to be like Hiryuu-san and Souryuu-san? ...Eh? You mean it...? Then, I will do my best!
429.H1700: It's 1700. Admiral, the sunset is beautiful, isn't it? ...Eh? I'm also...? Stop... what are you saying? ...Ah? Let's head back...? ...Let's do that...
429.H1800: The time is now 1800. Admiral, should I start making dinner? I'll show you my culinary skills! Please wait just a little while!
429.H1900: It's 1900. I tried making a Western-style dinner. It's katsuretsu. Now, help yourself. I've also made some corn soup.
429.H2000: It's 2000. Eh? You want to know if katsuretsu is different from tonkatsu, and what the difference is? Well, let's see... first of all, they're originally...
429.H2100: It's 2100, Admiral. So that's it— you mean my younger sister, Katsuragi? Yes... I believe we will meet again. I'd like to form a carrier division with her.
429.H2200: The time is now 2200. Night is so peacef- ...or maybe not so much. ...U-Um, shall I go and ask them to quiet down?
429.H2300: It's 2300. Admiral, thank you so much for your hard work today. Please get a good night's rest so that you won't get burned out, okay?

332.Intro:
Unryuu-class aircraft carrier, third ship Katsuragi here!
Eh? You called me a floating anti-air battery?
Y-You're way off...! What are you even talking about!?
332.Library:
Third ship of the Unryuu-class aircraft carriers, Katsuragi here! That's right— a standard carrier.

It looks like I was born a little late. But still, after the battle was over, I put everything I had into my work.

In a sense, I'm the best one. It's true, you know! It's really true!
332.Poke(1): I'm a standard carrier, you know. A standard carrier!
332.Poke(2): Give me your absolute best aircraft. Understand?
332.Poke(3): Ah- That's not my hanga- ...What are you doing, anyway!? What do you want, you idiot!!
332.Idle: I see, I see. So this is a Ryuusei Kai, huh? Mhm, mhm. I'd overheard people talking about it... But wait, isn't that a Reppuu? This is great! It's perfect for me! ...Eh?
332.Married: Admiral... Hey, if only these aircraft were supplied, I could... ...Eh... what? Even if you look at me with such gentle eyes, it's not... It's not getting you anywhere! Geez...
332.Wedding: What is it, Admiral? Can't you see that I'm kind of busy? I have my hands full with these engines. They need all kinds of maint- ...er...? U-Um... thank you! I-I...!
332.Ranking: Right, right! Intelligence is absolutely vital! Shall we try confirming it together?
332.Join: Aircraft carrier Katsuragi, preparations complete! Starting the sortie!
332.Equip(1): Th... That equipment isn't too bad. Mm.
332.Equip(2): Alright...! I can fight with this! I'm really happy!
332.Equip(3): I'll give it all I've got.
332.Supply:
Thanks for the precious supplies.
Alright! I can head back out!
332.Docking(1): I'm entering the bath! You... don't you dare peek!
332.Docking(2): Uweh... this might take a little while... Sorry— I'm going into the bath... Y-You're dead if you peek!
332.Construction: A new force has joined up! I can't wait!
332.Return: Operation completed. The fleet has returned. Good work!
332.Sortie:
Task Force flagship, Katsuragi. I'm setting sail!
...! I've always wanted to say that!
332.Battle: Alright!!! Enemy fleet sighted! All operational aircraft, commence takeoff!
332.Attack: Enemy spotted! All AA guns... W-Wait, no... F-From the top!!! Bomber Squadron, Combat Air Patrol, prepare for takeoff!
332.Yasen(1): Pursuit, huh? Chasing too far is prohibited, but... sometimes you have to... Alright! Let's go!
332.Yasen(2):
Bomber Squadron, take off!
I-I'm... an aircraft carrier, after all!
332.MVP: Eh? Me? I was the best one? ...Ah... I-I see... Hmm...! ...Th-Thank you... ...I see...
332.Damaged(1): No way!? Is the flight deck safe? Prevent any secondary explosions! I don't want to sink!
332.Damaged(2): In a place like this... I, Katsuragi, am not going to sink! Attacks like that won't...!
332.Damaged(3): I took a hit... but... the engine room is still undamaged. Like this, sailing won't be a problem!
332.Sunk: I see... this is what sinking is like... It's cold... and... it's lonely... Bye-bye, everyone...
332.NewYears 6547: Have a Happy New Year! I will try my hardest as a core member of the Task Force this year, too!
332.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun, huh... I wonder if I can throw these beans at Unryuu-nee and Amagi-nee? Wait. Bad idea, bad idea!
332.Valentines 6547: Chocolate... Do you want some? ...Mm... I guess I did make some, but are you sure...? ...I have no choice, so here!
332.Anniversary 6547: I see. Today is an important day for us, right? It is for you, too... isn't it? Right?
332.Fall 6547: Somehow... doesn't fall seem a bit melancholic...? In a way? Eh? Amagi-nee, you love the fall? Why?
332.Xmas 6547: Christmas... huh... This atmosphere really isn't bad. This is champagne? I-I see...
332.YearsEnd 6547: It's almost New Year's Eve. There's so much cleaning to do in my hangar, er... Hey! don't put your hands in there, you idiot!

430.Intro:
Aircraft carrier Katsuragi, present!
Feel free to watch what a genuine standard aircraft carrier is capable of!
430.Poke(1):
That's right, an aircraft carrier!
I'm a mainstay, a mainstay!
430.Poke(3): I told you! That's not my hangar! How many times do I... ...Mmh... I'm not letting you get away with it today!
430.Join: Aircraft carrier, Katsuragi! My air squadrons are flawless! I will show you the true power of the remodeled Hiryuu-class!!
430.Battle: Alright! Enemy fleet sighted! Here I go! Bomber Squadron, all operational aircraft commence takeoff!
430.MVP: Me again? My bad... I keep taking first place. Sorry!
430.H0000: Um... Today I, aircraft carrier Katsuragi, will act as your secretary ship. What? Got a problem with that? I can just barely spare some time for announcements. Barely!
430.H0100: It's 0100. Is that good? Are you listening? Ah, I see... Th-Then it's fine... Alright!
430.H0200: It's 0200! Hey, aren't you listening to the time announcements I'm doing!? Oh...? Really? Then I guess it's okay.
430.H0300: 0300... Now, look! You're clearly not listening! Just what have you been doing? ...Er, eh? ...Cooking?
430.H0400: It's 0400. What? You made a late-night snack? That's hot pot with udon... W-Well, thank you. Eh... it's good, but... w-what's this for?
430.H0500: 050- ...Eh? Compared to my sisters, the part that should stick out doesn't, and so I have to eat up...? ...! Now you've done it! Do you have any last words!?
430.H0600: It's 0600! *sigh* ...Seriously, just where the heck do you even look when you assess us? That place has nothing to do with our abilities... Honestly...
430.H0700: It's 0700. Telling someone off builds up an appetite. You, go make breakfast, alright? Isn't that fine? It's your punishment! Your punishment!
430.H0800: 0800! No way... the breakfast you made is... delicious! Who in the world did you learn it from!? ...Eh? Amagi-nee? S-Seriously?
430.H0900: It's 0900. I just never really wanted to! But still, when it comes to a carrier's abilities, cooking has nothing to do with it. To start with, a carrier is...!
430.H1000: It's 1000. Ah! Zuikaku-senpai!? As always, goodworkoutthere! *sigh* I was so nervous. After all, that was Zuikaku-san, the one I admire!
430.H1100: 1100! Eh? What? It's true. The one I admire is the one and only Zuikaku-san! She's so wonderful...! Her camouflage is so lovely! It even matches with mine!
430.H1200: 1200. It's already lunchtime!? What are you doing for lunch today? Going to Mamiya-san's? Or maybe... hmm...
430.H1300: 1300. Sometimes, it's nice to go somewhere outside the harbor! You get this sort of disembarking feeling♪ ...Ah! I-It's not like we're on a date or anything!
430.H1400: It's 1400. Geez, what kind of misunderstanding was that? You're such an idiot, really. ...But still, that Western-style place was really good... I wouldn't mind going there again!
430.H1500: 1500! Ah, Amagi-nee, how are you? Yeah, I'm doing great as always! Look! My flight deck and my rocket launcher, all perfectly maintained☆
430.H1600: It's 1600! Eh? What? Anti-air defense? That's my number one specialty! ...What? Show it to you right now? It's going to be really flashy♪
430.H1700: 1700. After all that, it's already evening... *sigh* Sorties and expeditions are... ugh... I-I'll get them done tomorrow!
430.H1800: 1800. It's already dinner time. Well... if you don't mind something basic, I'll go make it. Do salted rice balls, pickled radish, and a side of leaf miso soup sound okay?
430.H1900: It's 1900. So? How are my salted rice balls? Isn't the amount of salt perfect? That's right! Something like this takes a high degree of practice!
430.H2000: 2000. A-As for me, one day, I hope I can hit the open sea with the responsibility of Task Force flagship... ...I'm serious!
430.H2100: 2100. Then, what's your dream? I really want to hear it, okay? Huh? So that's it... Ehh... Hmmmm... ...So that's it...
430.H2200: It's 2200. Hehe... hm... ...Eh!? Am I in an unusually good mood...? N-Not at all! It's normal! It's-nor-mal! ...Ehehe♪
430.H2300: 2300. Well, it's just about closing time. You did a really good job! We have to get up early, so why don't we get some rest? Eh? We're not turning in!?

432.Intro: Guten Morgen. I am the aircraft carrier, Graf Zeppelin. You are the admiral overseeing this fleet, yes? Is that so? Roger.
432.Library: First of the Graf Zeppelin-class carriers, Graf Zeppelin. Capable of undertaking three-dimensional commerce raiding, I am a heavily armed and full-scale carrier. It seems that the technology used in the Japanese carrier, Akagi, was also referenced in my construction. A Japanese fleet, huh. I'm looking forward to it.
432.Poke(1): Am I to depart? So be it.
432.Poke(2): What is it? You seem to be concerned. These flight decks are continually being maintained by me, personally. There is no need to worry.
432.Poke(3): What is the meaning of this? This is not a custom of your fleet, is it? An explanation, if you please.
432.Idle: The Messerschmitt... it has a fine airframe. The Focke-Wulf is an extremely powerful fighter, too... Mm. This fleet's airframes as well... ...The a-admiral is also... rather good. N-No, not at all. I said nothing.
432.Married: Admiral? Is there something on your mind? I see. That's fine, then... If you wish to consult with me on commerce raiding... Actually, if there is anything at all, do not hesitate to talk to me about it. Feel free.
432.Wedding: Admiral? What is it? How may I, Graf Zeppelin, aid you? Ahh... this is...? For me? It is a thing of beauty. Are you sure? I see...
432.Ranking: Admiral? Ah, you wish to examine the latest intelligence? Roger.
432.Join: Aircraft carrier Graf Zeppelin, sortieing! Lichten des ankers!
432.Equip(1): Na gut. This is a fine plane. Hmm...
432.Equip(2): Oh...? This carrier-based plane... indeed... danke.
432.Supply: Resupply is vital at all times, no? This will help.
432.Docking(1): I shall briefly cleanse my rigging and myself. That is not a problem, is it?
432.Docking(2): Apologies. I have sustained heavy damage. Please allow me to enter the docks.
432.Construction: Hmm... a new ship? From this arsenal, many ships have been born. How lively.
432.Return: Admiral, the fleet has returned. Yes, the operation is complete.
432.Sortie: Excellent. You may entrust this task force to me. Flagship Graf Zeppelin, setting sail.
432.Battle: We've spotted the enemy, have we? Wonderful. Bomber Squadron, depart at once! Break their formation!
432.Attack: Launch all capable planes! Hahaha! How thrilling.
432.Yasen flagship: Haha...! A night battle, is it? So be it. I will show you that I, Graf Zeppelin, am no ordinary carrier. Fleet, follow after me. Pursue!
432.Yasen attack: Allow me to demonstrate that I am no mere carrier.
432.MVP: I, Graf Zeppelin, have brought you the greatest battle results? I see. Hmm...
432.Damaged(1): Ughh! What the...? A direct hit!?
432.Damaged(2): A hit? The flight deck? Suppress explosions!
432.Damaged(3): Tch! They got me. And yet, my cannons still function! If it comes to a night battle... Admiral!
432.Sunk: I'm... sinking in a fleet battle... am I? Ha...hah...! So be it! ...Just what is... this feeling... ha... heheh...
432.Setsubun 6547: So this is the Setzbühn tradition Eugen spoke of. It is certainly a strange tradition. Right! I shall try throwing some. Akagi, here I come! Prepare yourself!
432.Valentines 6547: A chocolate exchange custom... That's not bad. The country of courtesy, indeed. ...R-Right... Admiral, this package is... Th-That's right, I am offering it to you!
432.Rainy 6547: It has been raining quite a bit lately. I remember that it was at this time of year that they initially decided to halt my construction. It was infuriating. Ah, no. It's ancient history. Please forget it.
432.Summer 6547: So this is what this country's summer is like? This so-called "watermon-splitting" fighting style is of interest to me. One day I must experience it.
432.Fall 6547: Mm. The Autumn Festival? I've heard of it. In my country, we call it Oktoberfest. I shall look forward to it.
432.Saury 6547: What...? Saury...? ...What is the meaning of this? The overall strategy behind this mission is truly baffling. Safeguard the fishing grounds... and... support... them? I see.... Wait, no. Wait, wait, wait.
432.Xmas 6547: Admiral, this fleet also celebrates Christmas, I see. This stollen isn't bad at all. It was baked by a submarine from this country? Hmm... not bad.
432.YearsEnd 6547: December, is it...? ...I was launched in December. How nostalgic. ...What? O-so-ji? Eh... you wish for me... to...?

353.Intro: Guten morgen. Aircraft carrier Graf Zeppelin, reporting for duty. Admiral, I shall rely on you for today.
353.Equip(2): While the Focke-Wulf has a fine airframe, this is also... danke.
353.MVP: Deploying the Graf Zeppelin to a real battle... Was this not the natural result, Admiral?
353.H0000: Guten Abend. Admiral, I will be serving as your secretary ship for today. Entrust this duty to me. ...Right.
353.H0100: 01...0-0. This will do, yes? Leave it in my hands. There will be no issues.
353.H0200: 02...0-0. Hmm... flawless. Admiral. Admiral? Are there any further tasks for me? As your secretary ship, expect nothing but the best.
353.H0300: 03...0-0. Understood! You desire coffee, yes? Entrust it to me. Prepare to taste the most supreme of coffees. I am quite confident when it comes to the aroma and flavor of coffee.
353.H0400: 04...0-0. How is it? This is authentic German coffee. Ah! First, you should enjoy the aroma thoroughly, and after that... *sigh* It doesn't matter. Please, go ahead.
353.H0500: 05...0-0. It's morning now, Admiral. Why don't you go ahead and take a shower? I will support you with the work here.
353.H0600: Guten Morgen. 06...0-0. Admiral, what would you prefer to do for breakfast? If you are fine with something simple, I will prepare it for you.
353.H0700: 07...0-0. Admiral, I made a kaiser roll, cheese, ham and hot coffee. I will place them here. Partake of them when you have a moment.
353.H0800: 08...0-0. Now then, our work awaits. Let us commence today's fleet operations. What shall we do? To start with, how about combat drills with Akagi?
353.H0900: 09...0-0. "Akagi". "Kaga". So they are this country's frontline standard carriers. They do not have any catapults. Nor do I see a main battery...
353.H1000: 10...0-0. Those aircraft bear a resemblance to my Messerschmitt. Are those not carrier-based aircraft? I assume they are from the air force. What? They are not?
353.H1100: 11...0-0. It is nearly lunchtime. Admiral, what do you intend to do for lunch? What? "Mamiya", you say? I have heard the rumors. Oh...?
353.H1200: 12...0-0. Oh...? So this is "Mamiya". The menu... has variety. Admiral, what is your recommendation? Curry, you say? Right! I shall order it.
353.H1300: 13...0-0. The curry from lunch was quite a memorable dish. So the fleet here is able to have that every day, yes? I see. Hmm....
353.H1400: 14...0... Ah, Bismarck, you are stationed here as well. I am still new to the area— please teach me all you know. Ah... that... will do for now.
353.H1500: 15...0-0. This country has a unique culture. Admiral, I will diligently study as much of it as I am able, just as that U-boat has done.
353.H1600: 16...0-0. So these are... "Shoukaku" and "Zuikaku". They are quite the sight. So they are the "final form" of this country's carriers... Hmmm...
353.H1700: 17...0-0. The sun is setting. The setting sun is beautiful no matter the sea you are in. Admiral, what is it? Is there something on my face?
353.H1800: 18...0-0. For dinner today... ah, I have been invited to a "standard-carrier-banquet"... Admiral, would you like to join me?
353.H1900: 19...0-0. Ah, Akagi. My gratitude for inviting me to the dinner banquet this evening. Danke. What... is that? "Hot pot", you say? Such an unusual cuisine.
353.H2000: 20...0-0. "Hot pot"... Is this similar to a pot-au-feu? Why is everyone surrounding the hot pot? Taihou, teach me. How should I eat it?
353.H2100: 21...0-0. That was a strange banquet. However... mm, I found it quite enjoyable. Admiral, this fleet is... I believe I will enjoy it here.
353.H2200: 22...0-0. Admiral, the evening has advanced to night. Now then, let us begin drawing today's work to a close. Shall I make some coffee?
353.H2300: 23...0-0. Admiral, today was quite a day, yes? Let us work hard tomorrow as well. Gute nacht.

444.Intro: Buon giornov! I'm the aircraft carrier from the Mediterranean, Aquila! I'm ready for service... supposedly♪ Please look forward to it!
444.Library: Built in the Mediterranean at Genoa, the aircraft carrier from the land of pasta, it's Aquila! I'm a carrier converted from a passenger liner, but it was a large-scale conversion, so my specs should be in line with a proper carrier's... ...supposedly. Right, Graf, Akagi? ...Aren't you listening!?
444.Poke(1): That's right— I'm Aquila. Did you remember?
444.Poke(2): Is it my turn now? Certainly. The sortie... when is it?
444.Poke(3): Graf, what is it? ...Oh, my. Admiral? You've taken an interest in me? No problem. Ask me anything you waaant.
444.Idle: Good, good. With these planes, on the next sortie, Akagi and Graf won't be able to be so big-headed! Good, good! Next time for sure! Next time for sure!
444.Married: Admiral? What's wrong? You're looking a little bit tired... I know! How about if I there-there you? Now look, step right over here. There, there. There, theeere. ...Feeling better?
444.Wedding: Admiral! Is this a present for me? What is it...? Pretty! Oh... onto my finger? Ah... grazie! I'm going to show off to Graf!
444.Ranking: Oh, my. The intelligence, right? I'll go get it for you. And here you are.
444.Join: Aircraft carrier, Aquila, sortieing! Carriers of Japan, follow me! Just kidding... a-ouch...!
444.Equip(1): My, what a cute plane. Admiral, grazie.
444.Equip(2): This equipment is also nice. Now I can enter active service. Good, good.
444.Docking(1): Mukyukyu... My clothes are a little bit dirty... Admiral, I'll take a short break, okay?
444.Docking(2): Mugyugyugyu... There's a big hole in my flight deck... Admiral, I'll have to take a short holiday.
444.Construction: Admiral, it looks like a new ship is completed.
444.Return: Admiral, the fleet has returned! Everyone is safe! That's the important part♪ *phew* Good, good.
444.Sortie: Good, good. My rigging and planes are just perfect! Task force flagshiiip, Aquila, setting saaail!
444.Battle: Enemy fleet sighted! Good, good. Let's launch the planes! Bow to windward. Let's do this!
444.Attack: All Bomber Squadron aircraft, to the catapult! Continuous launch. Hurry up~!
444.Yasen(1): A night battle, is it? If Graf can do it, then so can I! Surely I can. All ships, form up behind me! Attaaaack!
444.Yasen(2): So this is an air battle? Good, good. Aquila air squadrons, go~!
444.MVP: My, Admiral, I played the biggest part? Grazie! Good, good.
444.Damaged(1): Ahhh! It hurts! It really hurts!
444.Damaged(2): I said no! You can't hit me there...!
444.Damaged(3): *sigh* The deck has a big hole in it... and the catapult is all bent up. This is bad... bad, bad!
444.Sunk: I'll... only come this far...? But... this time... since it's in the middle of the sea... is... this fine...?
444.NewYears 6547: Admiral? Best wishes for the coming year! Buon Anno. Shall we have another good, good kind of year?
444.Setsubun 6547: Roma, where did you get this "Setsubunga" from exactly? Especially the "ga" part. Eh? The admiral said it? Really?
444.Fall 6547: In autumn, there are so many delicious looking foods~ Admiral, look. Umm... that Autumn Festival stall looks delicious! Wow! Zara has her own pasta stall, too! Fuuu~
444.Saury 6547: Sanma...? I've never heard of that fish... Is it for a Japanese festival? Hmm, hmm... so we're supporting the fishermen! Ro-ger-that♪
444.Xmas 6547:
Buone Feste. Admiral, here's my Christmas present to you♪
...There! Thank goodness! It suits you♪

365.H0000: As of now, the time is midnight. Buona sera! Admiral? For today, I'll be assigned as your secretary ship.
365.H0100: 01♪00♪ Admiral? See? I'm perfect for announcing the time!
365.H0200: 02... umm... 00! Good, good! That was flawless!
365.H0300: 02... No, that's wrong. I know this... umm... 0... 3! 00. *phew* That was close.
365.H0400: 03... no... 4... 00 ...*phew* Ah, Admiral? That means... it'll be morning soon.
365.H0500: Um... tre, quatro, so it should be... ah! It's 05! 0500. Good, good.
365.H0600: 0600! Admiral, buon giorno! It's morning. Morning is here!
365.H0700: 0700. Admiral, who is going to make breakfast? Eh? I will? ...Well, hold on... could I be dismissed a bit early today...?
365.H0800: 0800. Ah, Admiral, excuse me. This is the breakfast you had me make. *slurp* Mm... This miso soup is really delicious!
365.H0900: 0900. About the breakfast you and I had— other than the natto, I really enjoyed it. I'm looking forward to breakfast tomorrow! Good, good... A-ouch!
365.H1000: 1000. So, Admiral, what will we start with today? Naturally, it should be exercises with the task force, right? I'll do my best♪
365.H1100: 1100. Admiral, this is bad! It'll be lunch soon! Who is going to be the one to make lunch...?
365.H1200: 12... *sniff* *sniff* That smells good! This smell is... ah! Zara! You're letting people try your brand new pasta? My, today is very rosso! Grazie!
365.H1300: Admiral? Isn't this pasta delicious, with its balance of tomato and garlic? *phew* It's 1300♪
365.H1400: 14... My, Akagi! Eh? There's something on my cheek? Ah... a piece of tomato from today's pasta... Ufufu... yes, it was delicious.
365.H1500: 1500. It must be nice to be able to carry as many planes as Akagi, huh? Admiral, if I practice hard enough and finally get remodelled, can I be like that?
365.H1600: 16... Ah, Graf. How are you feeling? Eh? I'm always in perfect form. Right, Admiral? ...Huh? Admiral?
365.H1700: 1700. Admiral? The sunsets here are so beautiful. The sunsets at Genoa in the Mediterranean are pretty, too. Would you like to go there with me sometime?
365.H1800: 1800. Dinner is... Ah, Admiral, that's so like you. So we're eating out. Could it be... at the reputed trattoria Mamiya?
365.H1900: 1900. This is... ...and this, too! They're so delicious! This reputed trattoria Mamiya... simply amazing! ...Ah, seconds, please.
365.H2000: *nom* Mm. 2000. *phew* Ah... Italia! Roma! Good evening. Oh... who is the noisy heavy cruiser over there? I feel like I've seen her before...
365.H2100: 2100. My, isn't that Pola? Hey, she's stripping! Ah, it's Zara! Ah... she's getting angrier and angrier. Uh-oh.
365.H2200: 2200. Admiral, you must be exhausted from all the hard work today. You'll take it easy and relax tonight, won't you? Huh? Now it's the light cruisers who are acting up!
365.H2300: 2300. Admiral, buona notte! Good night~ See you tomorrow.

433.Intro: Hello~! Aircraft carrier Saratoga here. Admiral, please call me Sara. It's a pleasure to meet you.
433.Library:
Hello~! American-born aircraft carrier, Saratoga here.

My name comes from a major historical event. During the great war, I fought hard from the beginning to the very end. After the war, I was involved in a certain experiment with Nagato-san and the others.

From now on, I'll be in the same fleet as you, so I intend to fight hard with everyone!
433.Poke(3):
Admiral, I just ran maintenance on this Wildcat.
Can this wait, please? If you don't mind.
433.Idle: Yup! With this, the planes won't have any issues! There's quite a lot of them, so this is pretty tough. Oh, Nagato! Hi! Eh...? You're going to do exercises now? Sorry about this, but I have other duties to perform for today. Maybe next time!
433.Married: Admiral? Are you feeling worn out? I can go make you tea or anything else that will get you going again. Eh? Bread? I'm not so good at making that... although on the other hand, I am pretty good at making cakes. I'll bake one for you. Please wait a bit, okay?
433.Wedding: Admiral, how are you doing? Eh? This is for me... you mean? Ah...! Is it okay if I open it? Oh my god...! It's beautiful!
433.Ranking: The intelligence, then? I'll go organize and bring it to you.
433.Join: Aircraft carrier Saratoga, setting sail. Follow me.
433.Equip(1): Beautiful! They're all good little girls.
433.Equip(2): Such a good plane. And this is a good little girl, too.
433.Supply: (Thanks a lot!) Thank you very much!
433.Docking(1): Sorry. I'll rest for just a bit, Admiral.
433.Docking(2): I'm sorry. I'll have to fall back and rest. Sorry about this, Admiral.
433.Sortie: Sara, now sortieing! Let's go, everyone!
433.Battle: Let's go. Air squadron, commence takeoff!
433.Yasen(1): The entire fleet will now shift into a pursuit battle. Form on me!
433.Yasen(2): I'm counting on you, my little girls!
433.MVP:
Oh my god...! I stood out that much in the battle!?
Somehow... I feel a little guilty for this.
433.Damaged(2): Eh? The flight deck!? Damage control!
433.Damaged(3): No way... geez... Both my flight deck and my behind are...
433.Sunk:
Oh my god... I'm... going to sink here...?
...Admiral, this is farewell... Good bye...
433.Setsubun 6547: This is it— the special event I've heard so much about. Setsuboon! I'm not worried. Countermeasures are set. Fighter Squadron, take off immediately. I'm leaving the combat air patrol to you! Ow...! Ow, ow!
433.Xmas 6547: Merry Christmas, Admiral! I tried making my special extra-extra large turkey salad sandwich. Please, have some!

438.Intro: Hello~! Aircraft carrier Saratoga here. I've been improved, with an enhanced rigging and planes! Let's do our best together from now on!
438.Poke(3):
Admiral, I just ran maintenance on this Dauntless.
Can this wait, please? If you don't mind.
438.Sortie: CV-3 Sara, now sortieing! Let's go, everyone!
438.MVP: Oh my god...! My battle results were that high!? Admiral, it's all thanks to you. Let's have a toast when we return!
438.H0000: Admiral, the date changed just now. Today I, Sara, will be the one to assist you in your duties.
438.H0100: 1 o'clock. Admiral, let's do our best tonight.
438.H0200: 2 o'clock. Yes, I'm doing fine. Admiral, aren't you tired?
438.H0300: 3 o'clock. I'll go make us some coffee. Please wait a moment.
438.H0400: 4 o'clock. Admiral, it'll be dawn very soon. *sigh* ...Alright! Let's get through this!
438.H0500: 5 o'clock. The sunrise is... so beautiful...!
438.H0600: (Good morning!) It's 6 o'clock. Admiral, good morning. It's another crisp morning!
438.H0700: 7 o'clock. I made breakfast for you this morning. Are scrambled eggs fine with you? There's coffee over here.
438.H0800: 8 o'clock. After I finish cleaning up, I need to service my planes. They're all good little girls.
438.H0900: 9 o'clock. Ah, Yorkie...? Ah...! Excuse me. I mistook you for someone else. Sorry! Ah, silly me. I beg your pardon.
438.H1000: 10 o'clock. Kaga-san, good morning! ...Eh? A practice match? Ufu... I'd be glad to! I'll face you with everything I've got!
438.H1100: 11 o'clock. Kaga-san, that's just like you. The Japanese Task Force mustn't be underestimated. I'll have to work harder from now on!
438.H1200: It is noon. Admiral, what are you doing for lunch? I can throw together a simple sandwich real quick for you if you'd like. Okay? Ufu... just a moment.
438.H1300: 1 o'clock. Here— I hope you like it. A turkey salad sandwich. Please give it a try!
438.H1400: 2 o'clock. Admiral, what did you think of my turkey salad sandwich? Did it suit your tastes? Ahh... really!? ...! Thank goodness...!
438.H1500: 3 o'clock. Whew... I'm a little tired. Huh? No! I'm totally fine!
438.H1600: 4 o'c- ...Oh... Hey, Akagi-san! How are you? Ufu... I see. That's great! It's the same with me. Ufufu♪
438.H1700: 5 o'clock. Admiral, the sunset overlooking the sea is breathtaking. So beautiful!
438.H1800: 6 o'clock. What would you like for dinner? Eh? You will...? No, it's fine. Leave dinner to me as well! I'll do my best!
438.H1900: 7 o'clock. Here. Thanks for waiting! It's New Jersey-style beefsteak. Please have some! Here— have a beer to go with it!
438.H2000: 8 o'clock. Admiral? Did it fill you up? Oh? Glad to hear it. There's a dessert as well. Here— it's my special ice cream made with corn syrup. Please have some! Now, don't hold back, okay?
438.H2100: 9 o'clock. Oh, Iowa! Such a rare sighting. You're alone? After I finish work, did you want to do something for a bit? Yeah, that's okay. Wait a bit, then!
438.H2200: 10 o'clock. Admiral, what is it? Eh? You want to come along as well? Of course! That'd be great! That's right, why don't we invite Kaga-san and the others as well? Eh? We can do that next time...?
438.H2300: 11 o'clock. Admiral, thanks for your hard work today! Well, let's go meet up with Iowa and then let's go for a drink!

89.Intro: Aircraft carrier, Houshou here. Although I'm inexperienced, I look forward to your guidance.
89.Library: I am the aircraft carrier known as Houshou. I was designed as a carrier from the beginning and I am the world's first aircraft carrier. I may be petite for a ship, but I'll do my best.
89.Poke(3): You must be tired. Shall I prepare the bath? Or perhaps dinner? Or perhaps... fufu! Just kidding.
