89.Married: Admiral, thanks as always for the hard work. When you can, please be sure to relax a little.
89.Wedding: Someday... someday, just the two of us... I would like to enjoy a nice, relaxing cruise with you, okay?
89.Ranking: Admiral, a message for you has arrived.
89.Join: Live combat...? I suppose it can't be helped.
89.Equip(1): I'm so sorry. For you to be reinforcing my armament is...
89.Equip(2): Isn't this... a little too much for me?
89.Supply: I'm so sorry. For you to be reinforcing my armament is...
89.Docking(1): In that case, I'll have a little rest.
89.Docking(2): I shouldn't have acted so recklessly.
89.Construction: It looks like new children are on the way!
89.Return: Thanks for the hard work. The fleet has made its return.
89.Battle: Wind direction... check! Air force, take off!
89.Attack: This is... not an exercise. It's live combat!
89.Yasen(1): When you do something... you do it well!
89.Yasen(2): We can't just keep doing exercises forever!
89.MVP: That's... is that true? To have been of some help to you... that's wonderful!
89.Damaged(3): I have no intention of sinking like this...!
89.Sunk: Even I... can sink, it seems...
89.NewYears 6547: Admiral? Best wishes for the coming year. All of us aircraft carriers will be counting on you again this year.
89.Setsubun 6547: Here! I have all of the Setsubun beans ready. Please let me know if it there isn't enough, okay?
89.Valentines 6547: Admiral... um... I was wondering if it was okay... if I could also give you chocolate, and... um...
89.Valentines 1471: The chocolate... how was it? I used soy flour and wasanbon sugar in it. ...Is that so? Thank goodness!
89.Rainy 6547: It's raining again. It's troubling that it might rain and ruin the food. There's also the laundry to take care of. What should I do...?
89.Summer 6547: That's true... to help the ship girls and the admiral at the beach, we can open a seaside teahouse. Mamiya-san? Irako-san?
89.Cold 6547: It's been a little cooler recently. It must be autumn.
89.Saury 6547: It's true— saury are really delicious to eat when they're in-season. Salt-grilled and sashimi are rather nice. I'll make some.
89.Xmas 6547: Admiral, for the Christmas meal, I tried making a Japanese-style arrangement. If you don't mind... how is it? I hope it suits your tastes.

285.Poke(2): You must be tired. Shall I prepare the bath? Or perhaps dinner? Or perhaps... fufu! Just kidding.
285.Poke(3): My dreams for the future? Well, let's see... one day, together with you, I would like us to open our very own cozy little restaurant... Oh, what am I saying! I'm so sorry! Please forget about it.
285.Idle: Admiral, I'll be standing right here, so please ask me whenever you need anything.

76.Intro: Light aircraft carrier, Ryuujou! Ain't my silhouette distinctive? Actually... sendin' out planes one after another is right proper for a carrier, ya know! You can count on me!
76.Library: I might be a light aircraft carrier, but I'm a carrier with a distinguished record, ya know? Ah, that Fourth Fleet incident thing, off Iwate? That one was right tough. The waves went and collapsed my bridge... Dang, I just couldn't believe☆ it.
76.Poke(2): Hey, now... you, keep them hands to yourself.
76.Poke(3): Hey now, what the heck was that a bit ago? Well, I guess it's fine! Now give me a hand with the aircraft maintenance.
76.Wedding: By the way... you, what do you think of me? Well, pay me no mind. I'm just a li'l bit curious is all. Ahhh don't worry, don't worry! Sorry...
76.Ranking: Looks like so~methin' arrived. I can't say for sure what it is.
76.Equip(1): Hoho~ Are ya makin' a fuss over li'l ol' me? That makes me a li'l bit happy~!
76.Equip(2): Thanks! With this, I ain't gonna lose to Akagi and Kaga. Like I ever would, a-ha-ha-ha-ha...
76.Supply: Hoho~ Are ya makin' a fuss over li'l ol' me? That makes me a li'l bit happy~!
76.Docking(1): Umm... I'm gonna admit myself for a li'l...
76.Docking(2): Ain't got no choice. Battles are impossible anyway... Sorry 'bout this, but I'm takin' a li'l rest. You can call it a paid vacation.
76.Construction: Ohhh~ Looks like a new ship is rarin' to go. Let's take a look!
76.Return: The fleet came back home. Good work!
76.Sortie: Well, I'm here, so this is the main fleet now!
76.Battle: Nooow spread out! Bomber Squadron, take off!
76.Attack: All you carrier aircraft! Get to work, get to work!
76.Yasen(1): Alright! I'll finish it one go!
76.Yasen(2): It ain't gonna end like the Solomon Sea!
76.MVP: Alright! I did it! I had myself a stellar performance! Praise me! Praise me!
76.Damaged(2): Ow, ow, ow! Fwehhh ...This is bad!
76.Damaged(3): Oh no~! I'm in a li'l bit of a pinch!
76.Sunk: I'm... a li'l bit tired... sorry...
76.NewYears 6547: Commander, have a good one! Countin' on ya for another year~!
76.Valentines 6547: Commander? H-Here. I put my heart inta makin' it... it's that chocolate thing. If ya ain't one for sweet stuff... Ah, ya took a bite! How is it? Good? ...Ugh, don't just say it's good!
76.Anniversary 6547: Holy cow, it's the third year! Ain't that a happy occasion. Holy hot dang!
76.EarlySummer 6547: Yep, summer is on the way! I tell you, one o' these days, I'm gonna stun everyone out on the beach with a smokin' hot swimsuit! Just you watch...! Ah... one o' these days...
76.Summer 6547: What a harsh summer. I'm burnin' up here. Feels like my deck could fry me up some eggs sunny side up.
76.Fall 6547: Heck yeah! I made it all the way through summer. I gotta be invincible or somethin'. The almighty invincible aircraft carrier! Come arrow or torpedo, ain't nothin' stoppin' me! Ahahaha... ah... haaa...
76.Saury 6547: Hoho~ So ya need me ta support the saury fishin', right? Leave the aerial support ta me! Sauries, huh... those guys must really like 'em... That's it! Next time let's take some and grill 'em up! Yeah!
76.Wine 6547: Hmmmm? If it ain't that famous imported wine ya'll are goin' on about. Down the hatch... *gulp* *gulp* *gulp* Tohh! Goes down just fine. Hey, that new heavy cruiser... don't she know this ain't a place to strip down?
76.Xmas 6547: Commander, Merry Christmas! It's mah Christmas getup— ain't it cute♪ Oh, ain't it, ain't it♪ Have yourself a candy~
76.YearsEnd 6547: End of the year and all that! I'm up to my ears in stuff to do! First of all, let's get ta cleanin'!

281.Idle: Ah~ what is... this... I... ah, I don't mind this or nothin'. It ain't like I'm bored here.
281.Supply: Ho~ Supplies make me real happy~

75.Intro: My name is Izumo Ma... No, Hiyou. I'm an aircraft carrier. Pleased to meet you, Admiral!
75.Library: I'm Hiyou! Converted from the Northern line passenger liner 'Izumo-maru' into a carrier. But, I was able to operate at the same level as a full aircraft carrier. It's the truth!
75.Poke(2): Excellent timing, you can help with the aircraft maintenance. There's just so much to do...
75.Poke(3): Since you have so much free time, you can check the elevator's hydraulics. It's in bad shape...
75.Wedding: A-ah, somehow fleet work is tiring… Ah, sorry to be grumbling to Admiral… I-it's okay?... Why…?
75.Ranking: It seems there's a message for Admiral, I wonder what it is~
75.Join: Now then, Hiyou-class aircraft carrier's setting off!
75.Equip(1): What's that, what's that? Power-Up? How nice~
75.Equip(2): I was originally supposed to be a commercial cruise ship though... Oh well.
75.Supply: What's that, what's that? Power-Up? How nice~
75.Docking(1): I just don't have time to dock...
75.Docking(2): Head into the dock!? I'm so tired of that....
75.Return: The battle, it has been finished.
75.Sortie: Where do we go next? The Aleutian trench?
75.Yasen(1): Now then, I'll take revenge for Midway!
75.Yasen(2): Even if my armor is slightly thin~!
75.MVP: See? A remodeled carrier isn't weak, is she? We can do it!
75.Damaged(2): Fire on the flight deck? Fire pumps, hurry!
75.Damaged(3): The fire pump failed...what do you mean....
75.Sunk: The blaze couldn't be...extinguished. I'll go on too...
75.Anniversary 6547: So, today is a special day. Jun'you, you're already red.... How long are you going to drink...?
75.Xmas 6547: C-Christmas, huh? I wonder if I still have my dress... Would it be okay to wear it...?

283.Poke(1): What is it, jeez! Please quit fooling around on duty! Jeez...
283.Poke(3): What? I'm busy. If you have so much free time, you should run checks on the emergency fire pumps and such!
283.Idle: I have not given up the San Francisco route. If there is peace... eventually, I'm sure...
283.Ranking: Admiral, it is important to review the report. Here, the report♪
283.Equip(1): Thank you very much! These are such wonderful equipment♪
283.Equip(2): Alright, with this I finally can fought along with the Standard Carriers~ Yay♪
283.Sortie: Now then, Hiyou-class aircraft carrier, setting off at full power! The flying corps are perfectly proficient!

92.Intro: Merchant ship turned carrier, Junyou here~! Hyaha!
92.Library:
A wartime retrofit was ordered on the under construction luxury liner, Kashiwara Maru.

That renovation wound up as the carrier, Junyou. I fought really well, and made it all the way to the end. I'm better than you'd expect!
92.Poke(1): A~dmiral. If you got a sec then gimme a ha~nd. Hiyou an' me, we need some good planes, y'know?
92.Poke(2): Ah~! Admiral♪ good work! ...Eh? I... I haven't been drinking... I'm totally so~ber.
92.Poke(3): Wait a sec! I hear somethin' I don't like... you think it might be an enemy recon plane...?
92.Married: Yo~ Admiral, you wanna have a drink with me sometime? I got some really good sake♪ Ah, don't worry. I brought some snacks, too.
92.Wedding: I worked really hard so I wouldn't lose to those standard carriers. You're the only admiral who really gets me, y'know what I mean? Hey... gimme a kiss♥
92.Ranking: There's a message for you. What's it say?
92.Join: Let's do this! Junyou, headin' out!
92.Equip(1): Nice~ I'm better than you'd think, y'know?
92.Equip(2): Fine...! So fine...! I think I'm fallin' in love with myself...!
92.Supply: Thanks a bunch. Don't forget to supply the mess hall, too! It's very important!
92.Docking(1): Well, it's not a big deal, but... just in case, right?
92.Docking(2): Dang, my armor's gettin' sorta thin. With me an' Hiyou, there's no helpin' i~t.
92.Construction: A new comrade's here. Let's throw a party.
92.Return: The fleet came back. Nice work!
92.Sortie: With me an' Hiyou here, well, I'd say that makes us a task force! Yep!
92.Attack: Heheh. I'm gonna hit 'em with all I got! Eat this!
92.Yasen(1): Alright... Bomber Squadron, start takin' off!
92.Yasen(2): You got it... Tenzan and Ryuusei are what I want!
92.MVP: Yeah~? I surprised you there, didn't I? Carrier-based planes really are the best... hehe.
92.Damaged(2): I told you my armor's thin, and I meant it!
92.Damaged(3): Uwa~ah! I don't like this at all...!
92.Anniversary 6547: Ooh! Isn't today an important day? Good! Let's open some sake and.... Woohoo!

284.Idle: *sigh* Looks like downtime... Oh well, time to drink♪ Let's see... maybe I'll have some hot sake♪
284.Ranking: Yeah, that's true. Sometimes it's not a bad idea to take a look at the overall situation. How's it look...? Hmm?

408.Poke(2): Hiyahh~! An after-battle drink really hits the spot, doesn't it♪ Now I can see two admirals♪ Ahahaha!
408.Poke(3): Uh-oh, you look hungover, Admiral. That's no good! Drink some of this. Here, here.
408.Join: Alright! The fully remodeled Junyou-san is ready to sortie! Setting sail!
408.Docking(1): *phew* Soakin' in a hot bath makes my wounds sting...! Am I gonna get in trouble if I take sake into the bath? Well?
408.Yasen(2): You got it~ Reppuu and Ryuusei. I want some of those, too~ Kahaha~!

74.Intro: I'm the light aircraft carrier, Shouhou. Yes, I'm a little small, but please make a place for me on your fleet!
74.Library: First of the Shouhou-class aircraft carriers. Originally, a submarine tender. If it's not the flagship or the main fleet but a small task-force, then by all means use me! If you make use of me, I'll surely get good results!
74.Poke(2): Eh, do I like coral? No, I hate it!
74.Poke(3): Um...if you touch me too much, I can't launch my aircraft. Can we do it after I've launched everything?
74.Idle: One dive bomber... two dive bombers... three... Ah, Admiral! It's okay, I'm not lonely or anything. I have my planes with me and... Ah, yes!
74.Married: Once in a while, won't you try taking it easy and be yourself? Forget about things like sortie and your duty... I mean, I'm sorry! That's no good, isn't it...
74.Wedding: Admiral, am I being useful? Really? Then...that's great. From now on, I'll always be by your side!
74.Ranking: Admiral, you have a message from command.
74.Equip(1): Huh? I'm so happy! For you to be giving me strength!
74.Equip(2): Thank you! Now, I'll be able to keep up with the fleet carriers!
74.Supply: Eh? I'm so happy! For you to be giving me strength!
74.Docking(1): Time for a little rest. I'll be well shortly.
74.Docking(2): If I stay like this, I'll just be a target for the enemy. I'm sorry, but I need to rest a little.
74.Construction: Looks like a new ship has arrived.
74.Return: A fleet has just returned to port from an operation.
74.Sortie: Will my planes be okay...? No, it'll be fine!
74.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted! Bombers, please prepare for flight!
74.Attack: I'm still an aircraft carrier! I can do it!
74.Yasen(1): Second attack squadron, are you ready? Then, prepare for launch!
74.Yasen(2): Straying too far from the fleet is dangerous...
74.MVP: Yay, I did it! I'm so happy! From now on, I'll be sure to keep working hard!
74.Damaged(3): Ah... I'm done for... I can't fight like this.
74.NewYears 6547: Best wishes for the coming year! I hope that you'll allow me to rely on you for another year!
74.Setsubun 6547: It's Setsubun. It's okay if I throw these beans, right? Ei~! O-Oh, no...! Admiral, p-please excuse me! I misjudged my throw...
74.Valentines 6547: A-Admiral? ...U-Umm... would you please accept... this chocolate from me? ...Ah... thank you very much!
74.Rainy 6547: The rainy season, huh... This is the season in which I was launched. I.... ah, no, it's nothing. I'm fine.
74.Summer 6547: For summer, this clothing works well, Admiral. Isn't it cold during the winter, you say? W-well. N-no! It's fine!
74.Xmas 6547: Merry Christmas to you, Admiral. Um, I have a gift for you. If it's fine with you, please accept this.

282.Idle: One dive bomber... two dive bombers... three... Ah, Admiral! It's okay, I'm not lonely or anything. I have my planes with me and... Ah, yes!

116.Intro: I'm Zuihou. I'm a light carrier, but with proper experience, I'll be able to show you that I perform as good as an aircraft carrier.
116.Library: I'm the Shouhou-class light aircraft carrier, Zuihou. Originally planned as a high-speed refueling ship, then a submarine tender, but finally completed as a light aircraft carrier. Though my body is small, I fought bravely to the last day!
116.Poke(1): Type 99 bombers, have cute legs, you know?
116.Poke(2): The Suisei isn't a bad plane, but the maintenance is pretty harsh.
116.Poke(3): Tenzan is... Ah? Ahn♡ Admiral? Could you stop messing with my hangar?nm♡ I mean, quit it.
116.Idle: Coastal patrol and transport fleet escort are both important things aren't they....Hey, Admiral, let's go do some work..
116.Married: Admiral, thanks for all the hard work. Looking after all us light aircraft carriers so well… it makes me happy.
116.Wedding: Admiral, what? Is it an Air Corps inspection… it's not? Ah, your face is all serious… Eh? A bouquet, eh!? to me!? Ah, ah, what should I do… Th-Th-Thank… you.
116.Ranking: The war records, when will you look at them? Now... no, it's nothing, any time is fine...
116.Join: Light aircraft carrier, Zuihou. Now heading out!
116.Equip(1): The newly-developed planes are great, as expected.
116.Equip(2): Don't change me back into a high-speed refueling ship because it isn't allowed.
116.Docking(1): My armor's thin... It'd be better if they didn't hit me...
116.Docking(2): Ah, I got pretty beaten up... I wanna go to a hot spring...
116.Construction: It looks like a new kanmusu has arrived. I wonder if it's a Carrier~?
116.Return: The fleet's returned. I hope everybody's okay
116.Sortie: Aircraft carrier, Zuihou. Now heading out! You'll see the true power of the Ozawa Fleet!
116.Battle: Okay, let's go! Attack wing, launch!
116.Yasen(1): Of course, we're going to pursue!
116.Yasen(2): Even with reduced numbers, we're the best!
116.MVP: Zuihou's air corps played a part? Awesome! Even light aircraft carriers can excel if they do their best!
116.Damaged(1): Kya! Is my flight deck okay!?
116.Damaged(3): They... got me.... aaa! But, I won't let it be... like Engaño!
116.Sunk: All hands....abandon ship... I'm sinking... again... Shouhou? Will I see you... again...
116.H0200: It is now 0200. Aren't you tired?
116.H0400: The time is... 0400. Isn't it morning?
116.H0500: The time is now... 0500... It's morning at last.
116.H0900: The time is now 0900. Just in case, should I ready the defence planes?
116.H1100: 1100. Have you already eaten your bento?
116.H1200: It's Noon! Admiral, let's open our bentos! Will you have some of the rolled eggs that I made?
116.H1500: 1500. I wanna eat sweets... right? Admiral♪
116.H1900: 1000... Ah...In other words, 7 o'clock!. The sun's set for the day.
116.H2100: The time is now, 2100. Did you go drinking ashore with the second watch?
116.H2200: Admiral, it's 2200. Thanks for the hard work today. Eh? You're not tired?
116.H2300: It is now, 2300. *yawn*... It's early to bed, early to rise, you know?
116.NewYears 6547: Happy New Year! Best wishes for the coming year! ...Umm... I made a sweet rolled omelette... will you eat it?
116.Setsubun 6547: It's the time of year for Setsubun. I happened to have roasted the beans. The tamagoyaki for you is also perfect♪
116.Valentines 6547: Admiral? I took making this chocolate pretty seriously... Will you eat it?
116.Rainy 6547: It's been raining almost everyday. It's the rainy season. Rainy days at the homeport sure are serene. Ehehe.
116.EarlySummer 6547: Admiral, it's getting hot. So, summer is coming... Ah, what should I do about my swimsuit?
116.Summer 6547: It's summer. Admiral, want to go have some shaved ice together? I'll have... strawberry milk! Admiral? What flavor do you want?
116.Fall 6547: Admiral, it's fall! Tamagoyaki are nice, but baked sweet potatoes are good, too, aren't they? Should I bake some sweet potatoes☆
116.Xmas 6547: It's Christmas! I tried to making Christmassy tamagoyaki! How is it...?
116.YearsEnd 6547: Admiral, just like that, the year is ending. Let's get through the cleaning together! I'll go get the brooms.

117.Intro: I'm Zuihou. How do my remodeled clothes look? I'll still do my best!
117.Married: Admiral? Umm... I, think made too much tamagoyaki... will you eat it? Aah, really? Ehehe... I'm glad.
117.Join: Aircraft Carrier, Zuihou! Setting sail now!
117.Equip(3): My bento, will you eat it?
117.Supply: Thanks! As a reward after this, tamagoyaki, will be grilled up for you!
117.Docking(2): Ah, I've been defeated. Can I stay in the bath for a longer time? ...okay?
117.Construction: It looks like new kanmusu has arrived. I wonder if it's a Standard Aircraft Carrier?
117.Yasen(1): O-kay, Fleet will engage into pursuit! Go!!
117.Damaged(1): No! The flight deck is... the hangar is going to...
117.Damaged(2): Ow-w-w-www, is it because the camouflage didn't work?
117.Sunk: All hands....abandon ship... I'm sinking... again... Shouhou? Will I see you... again...

102.Intro: I'm Chitose. I'm the the first Japanese seaplane tender. Nice to meet you!
102.Library: I'm the Seaplane Tender, Chitose. Although I'm an exceptional ship capable of making use of seaplanes a lot, I was used as an oiler and supplied fuel to other ships. In the latter stages of the war, I was remodeled into an aircraft carrier and fought in the frontline.
102.Poke(1): Admiral, what do you want to drink?
102.Poke(2): You want some more? Here you go!
102.Poke(3): Admiral~ you can really knock them back! Here, another drink!
102.Married: Admiral, it's not good to work yourself too hard. Once in a while, won't you drink some fine sake with me, and have a little rest? Alright...?
102.Wedding: Admiral, after the battle's over, why don't we have a drink together? Ah, not some fuel!
102.Ranking: Admiral, there's a message for you.
102.Join: No problem, leave it to me.
102.Equip(2): Ah, fix it right there. Yeah, there. I want to be more useful.
102.Docking(1): With only this much... I'll be better soon.
102.Docking(2): Since Chiyoda will worry about me, I'll heal up as fast as possible.
102.Construction: Umm, it looks like a new ship has arrived.
102.Battle: I'm proud of my newly developed E12 seaplanes!
102.MVP: No need to thank me, it's all thanks to the seaplanes...
102.NewYears 6547: Admiral, best wishes... for the coming year! ...Chiyoda and I will be counting on you again this year.
102.Setsubun 6547: It's Setsubun, Admiral. The demon is... umm... Ah! Chiyoda? Do you want to be the demon for Setsubun? Well?
102.Valentines 6547: Admiral... my chocolate... I'd like to give you some. It's a little bitter... for an adult taste... Ufufu♪
102.Rainy 6547: The rainy season. The number of clear days are decreasing... but on these days, having a light drink in the room sounds good, doesn't it? Ufu~
102.Summer 6547: Chiyoda, it's getting hot little by little. Summer is on the way.
102.Fall 6547: Summer is already over, and the fall has arrived.
102.LateFall 6547: That's right. In fall, drinking sake while eating makes it taste even better.
102.Fall 1471: Chiyoda, baked sweet potatoes are delicious, but don't eat too much or you'll get fat. Look, the admiral can see you!
102.Xmas 6547: Admiral? Christmas... it's so fun! Oh, hey, Chiyoda! Make sure not to eat too much. Ufufu♪
102.YearsEnd 6547: It's already the end of the year. The year just flew by. I'll have to get the New Year's osechi ready. Chiyoda, help me out.

104.Idle: You're busy aren't you? That's fine, that's fine. How about we take it easy?

106.H0000: 12 midnight. Together with the admiral, I watched the day tick over! *giggle*
106.H0100: It's 1 A.M. Ah, somehow I'm uneasy... perhaps Chiyoda is mad?
106.H0200: It's 2 A.M. Being the timekeeper, it's a bit rough, you know...
106.H0300: It's 3 A.M. Just as a nightcap, would you like something to drink?
106.H0400: 4 A.M. I wonder if Chiyoda is sleeping well...
106.H0500: 5 A.M. Admiral, the daily quests have renewed. Let's clear them out together!
106.H0600: zzz... haa... Ah! 6 A.M. Admiral! Sorry! I borrowed your lap for a bit.
106.H0700: 7 A.M. Daybreak sure is refreshing. Good morning.
106.H0800: It's 8 A.M. Thanks to the admiral, I was able to sleep well last night.
106.H0900: 9 A.M. For me, it's too early to be drinking or to be sober. *giggle*
106.H1000: 10 A.M. Today's maneuvers, what are you considering?
106.H1100: 11 A.M. For lunch, what do you want to do?
106.H1200: 12 midday, it's lunch time, no? On a hill overlooking the port, even a bento is great!
106.H1300: It's 1 P.M. With the admiral, even a convenience bento is great. *giggle* How lovely!
106.H1400: It's 2 P.M. Ah.. Admiral, I see Chiyoda over there! He~y Chiyoda~?
106.H1500: It's 3 P.M. Oh my? Chiyoda, she ran away all angry. I wonder why~?
106.H1600: It's 4 P.M. Admiral, this evening's maneuvers, what are you considering?
106.H1700: 5 P.M. Such a beautiful twilight, isn't it?
106.H1900: 7 P.M. Just time for dinner, no? How about we go to Houshou's?
106.H2000: 8 P.M. Admiral, how about taking your time in a bath today?
106.H2100: 9 P.M. Admiral, the bath is.... going together is impossible!
106.H2200: 10 P.M. Oh my, what is it Chiyoda? It's all right, I'm not bothering the admiral. Don't worry.
106.H2300: 11 P.M. Admiral, staying up late every day is bad. Go to bed early today...

108.Intro: I'm the girl who took a diet and became an aircraft carrier, Chitose. I even got faster. Maybe I should write a book about it.
108.Library: Renovated from a seaplane carrier to a carrier, I'm Chitose. Slimming down my body by dieting. My legs even became faster. This will let me play a part in the Task Force! I'll do my best for you!
108.Poke(2): Isn't it great, this flightdeck? It's my favorite.
108.Poke(3): Admiral, I don't recall saying it was okay to touch.
108.Married: The admiral is always doing his utmost best. It's okay. I understand.
108.Wedding: Thank you for always looking out for the reborn Chitose, Admiral.
108.Equip(1): I wonder if Chiyoda has gotten stronger.
108.Equip(2): No way, I might actually be cool.
108.Docking(2): Man, that's gonna leave a mark... Chiyoda will worry, so let's keep it a secret, yeah?
108.Construction: A new ship has been completed.
108.Return: The fleet has returned to the home port.
108.Yasen(2): I hope this isn't like the Philippine Sea...
108.MVP: Chiyoda's gonna yell "Don't get too cocky" at me, so let's keep quiet about this.
108.Damaged(2): I won't let you hit my flight deck!
108.Damaged(3): Ah man, my precious flight deck...
108.Sunk: Chiyoda... I leave the rest... to you...

296.Poke(1): You want a refill, right? It's my pleasure.
296.Poke(2): Admiral, what do you want to drink?
296.Idle: There is no fleet action scheduled for a while. Before the next operation, I'm going to deal with many of trivial things that may bother you in the future. Admiral, drink sake if you like, and please make yourself at home.

103.Intro: Seaplane tender Chiyoda. My older sister Chitose isn't bothering you, is she?
103.Library: Laid down as a Seaplane Tender, second of the Chitose class, Chiyoda. I was able to make use of midget subs, you know. I'll do my best alongside Chitose-onee!
103.Poke(1): Eh? Did Chitose-onee do something again?
103.Poke(2): Chitose-onee... watch out... ah... A dream?
103.Poke(3): Chitose-onee.. that tickleeeesss... oh, Admiral, What are you doing?
103.Married: Admiral, had you not seen Chitose-onee around here? Ah, is that so, hmm... well, then, umm... you look a little worn-out so I'll lend you my lap! I'll let you rest a little!
103.Wedding: Admiral, do you need something? Ah- You wanted to know if I'd seen Chitose-onee? I see...
103.Ranking: Communique for Chitose-onee... no, for the admiral.
103.Equip(1): I'm getting a bit closer to Chitose-onee, aren't I?
103.Equip(2): Heheh I can win with this... Maybe even beat Chitose-onee!
103.Supply: I'm getting a bit closer to Chitose-onee, aren't I?
103.Docking(1): I'm not really fond of docking, actually...
103.Docking(2): Urgh... I'm going for heavy repairs...? Don't tell Chitose-onee! I beg you!
103.Construction: A new ship has been finished~ Oh, here she comes~
103.Return: The fleet has returned. Is everybody safe?
103.Battle: This is Chiyoda's seaplane. I've spotted the enemy!
103.Attack: Seek out the enemy, and then strike!
103.MVP: Chiyoda's the best? Oh my, am I as good as Sis?
103.Damaged(2): I'm not going the same way as Chitose-onee!
103.Damaged(3): No... At this rate, my seaplanes...
103.NewYears 6547: Admiral, have a Happy New Year! Hey, have you seen Chitose-onee? I see... where could she be...?
103.Setsubun 6547: Eh? Chitose-onee! What? I'll be the demon? I-I don't mind... O-Ow! The destroyers are- ...Ow! Geez, stop that!
103.Valentines 6547: Admiral? Have you seen Chitose-onee...? ...Ah, I see. I-It can't be helped! Then, here... ...have this!
103.Rainy 6547: Rainy days are a little boring... Chitose-onee... I wonder what she's up to. Ah, I'm off to see her for a bit!
103.Summer 6547: Chitose-onee, it's getting so hot. It's almost summer. Onee, aren't you going to buy a swimsuit?
103.Fall 6547: Chitose-onee, let's make baked sweet potatoes! Fall is a time for baking sweet potatoes. I'll go get some potatoes!
103.Fall 1471: *nom* These baked sweet potatoes are delicious♪
103.Fall 4: Mmmm... so sweet... these potatoes are really delicious. Chitose-onee, you're not having any?
103.Xmas 6547:
Christmas, huh... Oh, this poultry dish— Onee, I like it!
...Admiral! Have you seen Chitose-onee?
103.YearsEnd 6547: *sigh* End of the year cleaning, huh... My rigging, the naval base and the Admiral's office... there's way too much to clean up!

105.Idle: Admiral, it's Chiyoda! Did you forget about me?

107.H0000: I'm Chiyoda. I'll be acting as your timekeeper today. Ah, it's midnight.
107.H0100: 1 A.M. Admiral, your're going to keep going at this time? You should sleep soon.... I want to go to Chitose-onee's....
107.H0200: 2 A.M. Not sleeping? I wanna hurry up and go to Chitose-onee's room so go to sleep~
107.H0300: 3 A.M. To call on the admiral hourly... seriously, what kind of mission is this?
107.H0400: 4 A.M.... I-I can't sleep now! I'm in the middle of a mission!
107.H0500: 5 A.M. Admiral, It's morning. This mission, will Chitose-onee have to do it... if I don't?
107.H0600: 6 A.M. About time for the town to wake up.
107.H0700: 7 A.M. Admiral, it's morning! Are you refreshed?
107.H0800: 8 A.M. You look busy. Job? Study? Manuscript? Anything's fine. Going off to sortie!
107.H0900: 9 A.M. I wonder what's Chitose-onee's doing around this time...
107.H1000: 10 A.M. Admiral, what do you think of Chitose-nee? You're gonna answer me in an hour!
107.H1100: 11 A.M. Sooooo, you like Onee, huh? E-eh!? N-No, you can't!
107.H1200: Midday.... hey, Admiral, until you take back what you said, today's lunch is on hold!
107.H1300: It's 1 P.M. Admiral, take it back! I'm getting hungry too~ hey~
107.H1400: 2 P.M. The admiral's so stubborn~ You'll be my rival in love from today! Eh, it can't be helped. Here, onigiri.
107.H1500: It's 3 P.M. So, where are we attacking this afternoon? East? South?
107.H1600: 4 P.M. Not here... Chitose-nee's not here!
107.H1700: 5 P.M. Admiral~ What do you like about Sis? You're gonna answer me in an hour!
107.H1800: 6 P.M. So, what's your answer!　hmm... I see... hmmm... e-eh! N-No way!
107.H1900: 7 P.M. It's dinner time but.... Admiral... you go on ahead... I'm a little shocked... I lost my appetite...
107.H2000: It's 8 P.M. My eyes aren't red...because I've been crying!
107.H2100: It's 9 P.M. Admiral... giving me supper... I'm a little glad, maybe...
107.H2200: It's 10 P.M. As I thought, Chitose-Onee sleeping on the admiral's lap, I can't forgive this!
107.H2300: 11 P.M! I'll refresh the memories of Onee! So, gimme that lap! Good night!

109.Intro: The girl that became an aircraft carrier, Chiyoda. Of course, I'll be assigned to Chitose-onee's fleet, yes?
109.Library: Heavily remodeled from a seaplane tender, I'm the job-changed aircraft carrier Chiyoda. I'm quite the carrier, no? I'll fight the enemy air force together with Chitose-onee!
109.Poke(3): Chitose-onee, do that when we're alone in the room... Oh. It's you, Admiral?
109.Married: Even though I'm worried for just Chitose-onee, the admiral upon that... really, good grief.
109.Wedding: Admiral.... I'm happy that you have feeling for me, but still, I'm worried about Chitose-onee...
109.Equip(1): Thank you! With this, I can match the regular carriers, no?
109.Equip(2): Leyte will be okay this time!
109.Docking(1): Carrier maintenance is vital, you know.
109.Docking(2): Ow-w-w~ Keep this a secret... from Chitose-nee~
109.Construction: A new ship has been added to our fleet.
109.Return: Operation's complete, the fleet has returned.
109.Sortie: Aircraft carrier Chiyoda, launching! Attack wings are all ready, sortieing!
109.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted! Strike wing, commencing assault!
109.Attack: Right, bomber wing, attack wing, It's your turn!
109.Yasen(1): It's about time for the coup-de-grace!
109.Yasen(2): I really want to fly with Chitose-nee's fleet...
109.MVP: Yay! I can really do it with as an aircraft carrier, can't I? Chitose-nee, did you see me?
109.Damaged(2): The flight deck's on fire!? Put it out!
109.Damaged(3): Oooh... Well, I'm a light carrier... I can't be too reckless.

297.Poke(2): Eh? Did Chitose-onee do something again?
297.Idle: Hey, Admiral~! Have you seen Chitose-onee? Oh, is that so! ...Jeez, I'm kinda bored!
297.Married: Admiral! Did you see Chitose-onee? Is that so? Then, erm...! Yo... you seem a little tired so I'll lend you my lap to rest on!
297.Supply: Fuu~ With this, maybe I'll make it somehow?

184.Intro: Good day, I'm Submarine Tender Taigei. I may be inexperienced, but I am glad to be of service.
184.Library: I'm Submarine Tender Taigei. I serve as flagship of submarine fleets in order to support operations through supplies and usage of scout planes. I have also been designed as a carrier backup to be converted if it is needed. I'll do my best!
184.Poke(2): Assigning me with submarines? Just leave it to me!
184.Poke(3): Um, you're asking me what's in here? Onions, potatoes... and torpedoes for supply use... yeah...
184.Idle: A-D-M-I-R-A-L~ Admiral! U-um... about the submarine operations... Ah, a short break... I-I see... No, it's nothing... mmhm...
184.Married: Aren't you a little tired, Admiral? As I am a Submarine Tender, I am quite confident in my livability.
184.Wedding: Admiral... I thank you from the bottom of my heart for raising me in my default form. I will always, yes, always be thankful. I'll always be besides you...
184.Ranking: Admiral? I see you're grasping the situation. It sure is important.
184.Join: Submarine Fleet flagship, Taigei, heading out!
184.Equip(2): My, really? I feel a little glad, I suppose.
184.Docking(1): Sorry, I'll be using the bath for a little while.
184.Docking(2): Apologies, I'll be in the bath a little longer... Hmm, I guess electrical welding is no good...
184.Construction: Oh my! Seems like a new friend has joined us.
184.Return: The fleet has safely returned. What a relief.
184.Battle: Enemy fleet sighted! ...W-what should I do?
184.Yasen(1): A fleet battle with these armaments... it might be impossible!
184.MVP: Eh... no way! M-me!? Th-Thank you so much... I'll keep giving it my all!
184.Damaged(3): Wha- a direct hit!? N-no more... increase the rate of draining! I'm gonna sink...!
184.Sunk: Eh... I'm... sinking? So this is what it's like... to be in the water...
184.NewYearsOld 6547: Admiral? ...Ah, um... submarine tenders are good, aren't they? They're a necessity, right? Ah, thank goodness! Yes, leave the care of the submarines to me!
184.NewYears 6547:
Ad~mi~ral~
Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! I'll be counting on you again this year!
184.Setsubun 6547: Well, it's Setsubun, so all the submarine girls are... Ow...! St-Stop it! Owww! Please, no more! Ahhh...! Stop it! I surrendered already~!
184.EarlySummer 6547: Ad-mi-ral. Eh? What's that? A swimsuit? I have one prepared, but... Eh? Right now? Please be patient until summer.
184.Summer 6547: Ad-mi-ral. Um, I... put on the swimsuit. How do I look? U... um, please don't stare at me so much... hawaaa....
184.Fall 6547: Ah, Shigure-san. Nice work out there. Eh, the fall bulge? That's true. Shigure-san should be fine, but I should be careful...
184.Saury 6547: It's a fleet for saury fishing support? Orders received! Ah, Isokaze-san is also ready to go! Great!
184.Xmas 6547: Ad-mi-ral♪ It's Christmas. I'll show you what I can do! If you have any cooking requests, please let me know, okay?

185.Intro: Carrier Ryuuhou, remodeled from a Submarine Tender. I'll once again try my best as a carrier!
185.Library: Carrier Ryuuhou, remodeled from a Submarine Tender. My speed was not up to plan specifications as there were issues with changing the boilers, but I have an enhanced flight deck and armaments as this Light Carrier class. Carrier Ryuuhou, giving it her all!
185.Poke(2): Unfortunate...? Bad luck? Eh, me!? That's just not true!
185.Poke(3): Doolittle? Somehow, the word doesn't ring well with me... Don't do anything...? Huh...?
185.Idle: A-D-M-I-R-A-L~ Admiral! Um... is Carrier Task Force deploying? Ah, a short break... I-I see, right...
185.Married: Aren't you tired, Admiral? Want to take a quick nap on my flight deck? Please do!
185.Wedding: Admiral... I thank you from the bottom of my heart for raising me as a remodeled carrier. I will always, yes, always be thankful. I'll always, always be part of the admiral's mobile squadron!
185.Ranking: Admiral, what is the situation like? Is it okay?
185.Equip(2): With this, I won't lose to the enemy's planes!
185.Supply: Thank you for replenishing my planes!
185.Docking(1): I'll just be in the bath.
185.Docking(2): Apologies. This may be a long bath.
185.Construction: Seems like a new friend has come.
185.Return: We've returned safely this time too. Phew.
185.Sortie: Task force, deploying. I'll go with determination to win!
185.Battle: This feels great... First assault squad, launch!
185.Attack: There's more coming! Ryuuhou assault squadron, launch!
185.Yasen(1): Moving into the chase. All ships, launch assault!
185.Yasen(2): Turkey!? Are you saying I'm one? I'm sorry, but we're the elite. Don't underestimate us!
185.MVP: My planes did great? H-hurray! This is the strength of the Carrier Ryuuhou!
185.Damaged(2): Oh no, my flight deck hangar!
185.Damaged(3): They got me! The elevator has been... but don't worry, I'm not sinking!
185.Sunk: Sinking as a carrier... did I manage to accomplish a lot this time...?
185.H0000: It's midnight now. It sure has gotten late. Are you tired?
185.H0100: 0100. Admiral, it's already late into the night, you know?
185.H0200: 0200. Admiral, are you sure you don't need to rest?
185.H0300: 0300. Geez, I'm starting to feel a little sleepy, too... I-I'm fine! Yawn...
185.H0400: 0400. D-don't worry! I've been keeping myself awake by counting the number of Tenzan in my hangar.
185.H0500: 0500. It's morning, Admiral! You're up early... don't tell me you stayed up all night...
185.H0600: 0600. What should we have for breakfast? I guess curry is a little too heavy for the morning...
185.H0700: 0700. Admiral, I tried making miso soup with fried eggs along with fried salmon fillets for breakfast. Dig in!
185.H0800: 0800. Now, let's get through the day with zeal! Right, Admiral?
185.H0900: 0900. I want to clean the base. I'm off to do some sweeping!
185.H1000: 1000. There sure is dust gathered. Give me a hand, Admiral. Here, hold this.
185.H1100: 1100. Cleaning sure makes you hungry. What shall we have for lunch?
185.H1200: 1200. Lunch today is Taige—er, I mean, Ryuuhou's specialty curry!
185.H1300: 1300. How was my specialty curry? The potato was good too, right?
185.H1400: 1400. Um, Admiral, it's time for the mobile squadron to- ah, not yet? Okay...
185.H1500: 1500. Admiral, it's now time for the carrier squadron to sortie, right? Right?
185.H1600: 1600. The seared sky sure is beautiful... it's already evening, huh.
185.H1700: 1700. Have to prepare dinner soon. What would you like, Admiral?
185.H1800: 1800. Since we had curry for lunch, I guess we should have something more exquisite...
185.H1900: 1900. Admiral, I tried making Fricandeau Beef. How is it?
185.H2000: 2000. How was the Fricandeau Beef? Hehe... great to hear!
185.H2100: 2100. Admiral, want to go draft up tomorrow's operation plans after we clean up?
185.H2200: 2200. Tomorrow WILL be the day when the mobile squadron get to sortie... Right, Admiral!?
185.H2300: 2300. Admiral, this sure has been another tiring day. Shall we also do our best tomorrow?
185.NewYearsOld 6547: Admiral? Ah, um... even a slow light aircraft carrier is still good enough for fighting, isn't it? Right? I have to believe in myself!
185.Setsubun 6547: Well, it's Setsubun... I'm sure that since I've become an aircraft carrier, all those submarine girls are... ...Ow! Eh? Why me? Ow! Owowowow! G-Geez... come on, stop it! Why me!? Geez!
185.Saury 6547: The fleet is going all-in for saury fishing support? Ryuuhou— orders received! Isokaze-san and Hamakaze-san, are you both ready to go?

318.Poke(2): Eh!? A sortie for the mobile squadron?
318.Poke(3): Geez! I'm not a transport, nor an anti-air cannon stand! I'm a carrier, a carrier you know!
318.Join: I'd like to show the true power of the Carrier Ryuuhou!
318.Equip(1): I do think the Tenzan are adorable.
318.Return: The fleet has returned safely. What a relief.
318.Attack: Even I can fight if I have planes!
318.Yasen(2): Don't make light of us remodeled carriers!

182.Intro: I'm Repair ship Akashi. If you take a little damage, I can fix you up in the base. Just leave it to me!
182.Library: I'm Akashi, the only dedicated repair ship in the combined fleet. I was in charge of repairing ships damaged in the front lines when I was stationed in the Truk Anchorage. I supported the fleet from behind right up until the destruction of the Anchorage. Pleased to meet you.
182.Poke(2): Admiral, you need repairs? Have you been damaged somewhere?
182.Poke(3): It's dangerous, so don't touch my cranes... hey! That's even more dangerous!
182.Idle: Right... don't worry! I'm busy with things such as repairs and procuring new machinery! So don't worry! ... really...
182.Married: Admiral... you've gotta make sure you fix yourself up sometimes. Just leave the maintenance... to me, okay?
182.Wedding: Admiral, what is it? You want to process the ring in my factory? Geez... I wonder who the lucky person is? Ehh... for me!? No way...! I-I'll treasure it! Thank you!
182.Ranking: Do you want to check the fleet's operational status, Admiral?
182.Equip(1): Now...this is what I call progress!
182.Equip(2): Now I can repair even more! Thank you so much!
182.Docking(1): I guess even I need maintenance once in a while...
182.Docking(2): Phew... what a blessing it is to have people washing my back. Thanks so much.
182.Construction: It seems like a new ship has been completed. Looking forward to it.
182.Return: The fleet has returned safely. Phew.
182.Battle: Fighting isn't my... well... but I guess I'll just have to do it!
182.Yasen(1): A pursuit... w-what am I supposed to do about that!?
182.Yasen(2): It's not my forte, but here we go...!
182.MVP: Eh...EEEEEH!? M-me!? How did that happen...? Well, can't say I'm not happy...
182.Damaged(1): Geh... ouch... is my factory fine?
182.Damaged(2): I'm hit...don't let the fire spread to the work machines!
182.Damaged(3): I...I was targetted!? I can't do a good repair job in this state!
182.Sunk: Seems like I'm heading towards the sea floor... guess I can have another long sleep. Good night.
182.Setsubun 6547: It's Setsubun— that's great! Ooyodo, be the demon. The demon! Eh... me!? But why!?
182.Valentines 6547: Admiral? Here, chocolate! For my return gift... some fancy sweets and raw materials would be nice!
182.Anniversary 6547: Admiral, isn't today our anniversary? It's great, isn't it? Are you making anything to commemorate the occasion?
182.Rainy 6547: It's the rainy season. The arsenal is going to rust.... I should run a good maintenance on it and oil the equipment.
182.Summer 6547: It's summer, isn't it! I want to wear a swimsuit, too! Admiral, you can buy me one! *sparkle* Ehe.
182.Fall 6547: Fall has arrived. It's a season that gives you a bit of an appetite. Mamiya-san, we need you!
182.Xmas 6547: Merry Christmas, Admiral! Maybe we should decorate the cranes with Christmas lights!

187.Intro: Repair Ship Akashi, at your service! Leave the emergency maintenance at the base to me! I'll support the girls in the front lines!
187.Poke(2): Admiral... I really think you ought to be repaired a little too.
187.Battle: You have to wipe off.. the sprinkle of sparks!
187.Attack: Never have I thought that I would be using my weapons to hit the enemy fleet!
187.MVP: I've been under your debt, so take this as a token of my appreciation! My real job is repairs though!
187.H0000: 0000, Midnight... Shouldn't you be resting soon?
187.H0100: 0100. Aren't you sleepy after all? Eh? Me? I'm fine!
187.H0200: 0200. I've somehow remembered my time at Truk... I sure worked hard.
187.H0300: 0300. About Palau… I wonder why? I don't really remember much of it.
187.H0400: 0400. It's morning soon, yeah? Admiral? You sure you're fine with not sleeping tonight?
187.H0500: 0500. The sky is gradually getting brighter! It's a brand new day!
187.H0600: 0600. Admiral? What will you have for breakfast? It's not anywhere near Mamiya's level, but my cooking is unexpectedly good, you know?
187.H0700: 0700. It's morning, huh. Should we go and wake the sleepy heads up?
187.H0800: 0800, huh. Now! Time to get the repairs on!
187.H0900: 0900. Which ship would you like me to repair? …Eh!? It can't be… a sortie!?
187.H1000: 1000. …Admiral? For me, battles are a bit… ah… no… even if you load me with all these weapons…
187.H1100: 1100. You're too reckless, Admiral. It'll be hell if the work machines broke down!
187.H1200: 1200. It's afternoon! It's Akashi curry time! What do you say!?
187.H1300: 1300. I'll be doing the inspection of ship interior factory! There's quite a lot of it~
187.H1400: 1400. It's about time I dive fully into the afternoon repairs, okay?
187.H1500: 1500. Admiral? Don't you feel a little hungry now? Hmm?
187.H1600: 1600. Mamiya Monaka is really tasty, isn't it! I would like to make some in the ship too...
187.H1700: 1700. The sun will be setting soon. Oof… It's been tiring, yeah.
187.H1800: 1800. Do you want to eat out for dinner? Like the Yamato hotel, perhaps... just a joke, really.
187.H1900: 1900. I'm sorry it's only something simple, but dinner is ready!
187.H2000: 2000 I guess a full stomach really makes you sleepy, huh… Yaaawnn… Ah— I shouldn't!
187.H2100: 2100, huh. The day will be ending in three more hours. Thanks for the good work.
187.H2200: 2200 Nights at the anchorage sure is quiet, huh… It'll be nice if it stays like this…
187.H2300: 2300 Admiral? Thank you for your hard work for today!

161.Intro: I'm Akitsu Maru, sir. It is an honour to be part of this fleet, sir.
161.Library: I am the class-3 of Army's special transport 'Akitsu Maru', sir. Please leave transportation and landing combat to me, sir. My pride is this Daihatsu, sir. I'm different from the mouse and mole, sir.
161.Poke(1): Officer... I mean, Admiral. Is there something I can help with?
161.Poke(2): Admiral... I have noticed a certain peculiarity in this fleet's formation... is this one of your preferences...?
161.Poke(3): Admiral...! I'd rather you do this sort of thing with someone else...!
161.Idle: Admiral, I am aware that being on standby is part of my duties, but... after I've been assigned to this fleet I started to... feel a bit lonely, sir...
161.Married: Admiral, there are no ship daughters that you will never get a chance to meet. I can say this, for it is in this way that I, too, have managed to meet you…
161.Wedding: I thought that you had no concerns about me. The strength of this feeling is connected… as expected of Admiral, oh, beg your pardon… I would like to know more and more about you, sir.
161.Ranking: It is important to check reports regularly.
161.Equip(1): Hm, I see you are very thorough with the daily maintenance.
161.Docking(1): So this is the naval dockyard...
161.Docking(2): The naval dock... sure is great...
161.Construction: So this is the naval shipyard... Ah, the construction of a new ship has just been finished.
161.Return: The fleet has returned to base.
161.Sortie: Alright, let's defeat them and aim for success.
161.Battle: I have spotted an enemy fleet, sir!
161.Yasen(1): The Daihatsu, is it not firing up!?
161.Yasen(2): We're boarding in for a closer look, sir!
161.MVP: I still have a long way to go, sir. I am going to give my best, sir.
161.Damaged(3): Now I can face neither officer nor Admiral...!
161.Sunk: I didn't think... I would sink... in such a place...
161.H0100: 0100 hours. Hmm, are you unable to sleep?
161.H0200: 0200 hours. Will you be requiring a lullaby? That was a joke.
161.H0300: 0300 hours. Still drinking at a time like this...gah...
161.H0400: 0400 hours. Ah..did I just catch myself dropping off!?
161.H0500: 0500 hours. I cannot eat anymore... Eh!? Were you saying something?
161.H0600: 0600 hours. The morning air is quite fresh.
161.H0700: 0700 hours. You should not neglect sleep.
161.H0800: 0800 hours. I have seen to the admiral's schedule for today.
161.H0900: 0900 hours. Plan for today. First off, expeditions.
161.H1000: 1000 hours. A daily mission is fine too.
161.H1100: 1100 hours. This morning's mission is coming to an end. Let us do our best.
161.H1200: 1200 hours. Here is your lunch. It is army rations. It is good to try these things now and again.
161.H1300: 1300 hours. Admiral, did you find your lunch palatable? Your expression is hard to read.
161.H1400: 1400 hours. Such a large amount of resources!
161.H1500: 1500 hours. You could build a battleship with what you used for myself, yes?
161.H1600: 1600 hours. That was quite reckless Admiral. One such as I is specialised in amphibious operations. Now that you've spent so much I shall have to....what!?
161.H1700: 1700 hours. Admiral, land or sea which is it to be...
161.H1800: 1800 hours. Are you going to have dinner?
161.H1900: 1900 hours. Dusk has fallen. Naval Base is nice at night too.
161.H2000: 2000 hours. A submarine belonging to the land forces? I do not know. Maruyu!? Good gracious!
161.H2100: 2100 hours. We have an early start tomorrow. We should finish off for today soon.
161.H2200: 2200 hours. Thank you for all your hard work today, Admiral.
161.H2300: 2300 hours. I feel that we shall meet someone important tomorrow.
161.Anniversary 6547: Officer, or rather, Admiral— congratulations on our third anniversary, sir. I am humbly pleased about it, sir.
161.Rainy 6547: It's the rainy season, sir. It has been raining all day, sir. Today I shall maintain my built-in Daihatsu, sir.
161.Saury 6547: So this is the saury fishing support mission. I would also like to participate, however... Admiral-dono, is it even possible for me to load the proper equipment?
161.Cold 6547: Admiral-dono. As for me, my body aches a bit at this time of year. Is there something that can be done? Well, I'm sure there's nothing to worry about.
161.Xmas 6547: So this is what people refer to as Christmas, sir? Well, I find festivals from foreign countries very interesting, sir. Personally, I have no issues with them, sir.

166.Intro: I have enhanced myself for air combat potential, sir. I am now a carrier, sir.
166.Library: I am Akitsu Maru, of the Army's Hei class, sir. I was the pioneer of the modern amphibious assault vessel, able to operate new weapons such as auto-gyros, sir. We may not do so well in anti-submarine warfare. I most humbly look forward to working with you sir.
166.Poke(1): There are Ka-type and also fixed-wing aircraft, sir.
166.Poke(2): I have got caught up in this fleets atmosphere lately... I shall reflect on this, sir.
166.Poke(3): Admiral, you're touching my flight deck and... I would prefer it if you didn't touch the Ka-types, sir.
166.Ranking: Admiral, the liaison officer has arrived.
166.Join: Akitsu Maru, Daihatsu and Ka-types are ready to go.
166.Equip(1): Sir, I desire on full inspection of the Ka-types, sir.
166.Equip(2): The people in the factory are hard workers, sir.
166.Docking(1): I am getting quite familiar with this dock, sir.
166.Docking(2): Forgive me. I request to be repaired again, sir.
166.Construction: A new friend has arrived. Aaah...such inspiring words, sir.
166.Return: The observation auto-gyros report the fleet has returned.
166.Sortie: Or rather, we'll make it fly, sir!
166.Battle: It's time for me, Akitsu Maru to unleash her evolved capability, sir!
166.Attack: Now, fellow Ka-type Autogyros, move out!
166.Yasen(1): Hmhmhm, I have good night vision.
166.Yasen(2): I won't allow submarines to get close...I think!
166.MVP: My flight deck has been useful, sir. I am quite pleased for it, sir.
166.Damaged(3): I can't show myself to the officers or the admiral in this condition, I'm too embarrased!
166.Sunk: I see...this is what...people call pride...I un...der...stand...now...

460.Intro: Good morning!　I'm Hayasui, an oiler equipped with seaplanes!　I'll do my best to support everyone!
460.Library: Fleet escort oiler, Hayasui. Best regards! I'm a multi-purpose refuel vessel that can supply a variety of different materials and am also designed to carry carrier-based aircraft. With a change of plans after the Battle of Midway, I also became able to launch Ryuusei.
460.Poke(2): A supply mission, Admiral? I'll do my best!
460.Poke(3): Admiral, my turntable is... um... well... it's nothing. I'm fine!
460.Idle: Excuse me, aren't we suppose to go for our next mission? Oh, not yet? I'm sorry. Is there anything I can help... Yes. I'll be on standby.
460.Married: Admiral, Ryuusei is fine, but seaplane is good too. Zuiun is also... Ah...No! Not about me...I was talking about... Mogami-san or Hyuuga-san...
460.Wedding: Admiral, did you call for me? Hm? This box is for me? Can I open it? Whoa... so beautiful! Ah! Does this mean... Does this mean...!!!
460.Ranking: The recent report right, Admiral? Yes, right away!
460.Join: Yes sir. Combined Fleet commanded oil tanker Hayasui, Setting sail!
460.Equip(1): This equipment is... Ah, yes! It is compatible with me!
460.Equip(2): With this... Perhaps with this I can fight alongside the others in the fleet.
460.Supply: That's right. Even I needed to resupply too. Thank you as always, Admiral!
460.Docking(1): I'm sorry, My armaments and my supply equipment is... Yes, I'll get it fix.
460.Docking(2): Oh no! There's a hole in my petroleum tank? Eh!? The Powder magazine and the provisions too? I'm sorry. I'll fix it up.
460.Construction: A new ship is ready for commission. I'm looking forward to it.
460.Return: The fleet has returned! Ahh... thank goodness everyone's fine.
460.Sortie: Supply corps 1 flagship, Hayasui, Set sail! The fleet is mobile!
460.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted!? Umm... Attacking! Hayasui air squadron, prepare for takeoff!
460.Attack: Is the flight deck OK? Air squadron, launch!
460.Yasen(1): Night battle? Hmm... We have to do this! Cannons, ready for barrage. Charging in!
460.Yasen(2): Hayasui air squadron, I'm counting on you!
460.MVP: Ehh!? My air team performs very well? I'm sincerely happy about it. I really am!
460.Damaged(1): Hyaaah! Oh no... Is the crude oil tank OK?
460.Damaged(2): I-It hurts! Ahh... Not my precious supply goods...!
460.Damaged(3): I'm hit. I don't have much protection, so I'm having a bit of trouble right now.
460.Sunk: Ah...? My body is tilting forward...? Eh? Hayasui is... sinking...? No...
460.NewYears 6547: Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! I'll be counting on you again this year!
460.Setsubun 6547: It's Setsubun. Yes, I brought lots of beans, too. Let's throw them together! Ei!
460.Valentines 6547: Admiral-san, th-this chocolate... please accept it! I-I made it myself...
460.Anniversary 6547: It's the third anniversary Admiral! Amazing! Hayasui is very happy.
460.Rainy 6547: The rainy season is humid, so I don't really like it. But, don't worry! I will always support the fleet and the admiral! You bet!
460.Summer 6547: Summer is here for the year. Every year, when this season comes around, I get stomach aches. U... hehehe... I wonder why...?
460.Fall 6547: Admiral, it's fall! Fall! I really like fall for some reason. Want me to bake us some sweet potatoes?
460.Xmas 6547: Admiral! Merry Christmas! I made a cake, too! Okay, open wide. Say "ahhh~"
460.YearsEnd 6547: It's already the end of the year, Admiral. Cleaning... we really need to clean up! Irako-chan and the others look busy, too! Alright! I will do my part as well! Aye!

352.Intro: Good morning. Aircraft carrying oiler, Hayasui, will do her best. Preparations for sortie of aircraft are perfect!
352.Poke(1): Yes! Hayasui, ready when you are.
352.Poke(2): Accompanying a fleet mission, Admiral? Hayasui, will do my best!
352.Poke(3): Admiral!? My turntable is... um... my aircraft hanger is... not particularly... well... I'm fine.
352.Equip(2): A new Ryuusei? Haa~n, I can't wait! ♪
352.Sortie: Hayasui's Fleet Flaghip, Set sail! Ehehe... I always wanted to say that.
352.Attack: Hayasui air squadron, orderly sortie! Get them!
352.Yasen(2): Is the flight deck OK? Air squadron, launch!
352.H0000: Admiral, the date has changed. Hayasui will be alerting you on the time. Yes! Leave it to me.
352.H0100: Admiral, it is 0100. Yes. Hayasui is still fine. Look!
352.H0200: Admiral, it is 0200. No, I'm not feeling sleepy! Yes!
352.H0300: 03...0...0... H-huh? I'm awake! I'm totally fine!
352.H0400: 0...4... Mmph... I can't load any more...
352.H0500: Mmph... mmph... Wah! Come on, Admiral! Why didn't you wake me up! No!
352.H0600: It is 0600. Admiral... Yes, I'm sorry. I will start preparing breakfast.
352.H0700: 0700, and the breakfast is ready. Please, help yourself. Today's menu is barley rice with potato miso soup, dried fish and...
352.H0800: Admiral, it is 0800. Yes! It might not be as good as Mamiya-san's, but I have a storage so I am quite good at cooking.
352.H0900: Admiral, it is 0900. Well, let's work hard today as well!
352.H1000: Admiral, it is 1000. We will start with status check on the expedition fleet. Hmmm...
352.H1100: Admiral, it is 1100. Expedition should be good with this! Would next be exercise? Okay!
352.H1200: Admiral, it is 1200 and noon! I will bring the lunch! Please wait.
352.H1300: It is 1300. Admiral, how was Hayasui's Omurice? Hehehe, I might have gone a little over the line.
352.H1400: Admiral, it is 1400. Let's do our best for the afternoon as well.
352.H1500: It is 1500. Admiral, how about having some tea and sweets? Hayasui, will prepare them. Please wait.
352.H1600: Admiral, it is 1600. Eh? Kazahaya? No, I haven't meant her in a while. I'm pretty it's been since Truk or something. I wonder if she's doing well...
352.H1700: Admiral, it is 1700. Isn't the sunset beautiful. I want to watch it forever.
352.H1800: Admiral, it is 1800. What should we do about dinner. What will be good? Hayasui, will prepare it.
352.H1900: 1900! Yes! I did my best to prepare a Western style dinner. The main dish is beef steak! Yes, beef steak! It's special!
352.H2000: Admiral, it is 2000. Here is your after dinner coffee. Did the dinner suit your taste? Really!? I'm glad.
352.H2100: Admiral, it is 2100. The third torpedo squadron seems to be lively. I wonder what's going on? Eh, don't worry about it? Ah, okay.
352.H2200: Admiral, it is 2200. Eh? Taiyou-san? Yes, I believe we'll meet here someday. For sure.
352.H2300: 2300. Admiral, good work today as well. Let's do our best tomorrow too! Yes!

154.Intro: I'm Katori, a Training Cruiser. Don't you worry... I'll be gentle in teaching you various things.
154.Library: First of the Katori-class training cruisers, Katori. Right, leave the ocean navigation training to me. I believe I'll be a great help in furthering what the fleet attains out of it's drills, for sure. Eh, my firepower in comparison to a battleship... is it? I wonder, tactics-wise, how it is.
154.Poke(2): Should I go on ocean navigation training?
154.Poke(3): Ara... Hoho...? I see. Looks like you need a little discipline...
154.Idle: Well... How do I put it... Sometimes it goes past one's mind... That we were fighting while escaping from the enemy fleet... Um... 'Don't worry, this is just a dream'? Yes... It's just a dream.
154.Married: Admiral, is there something wrong? Are you tired? If that's so, would you like to go to a sea a little faraway with Katori? When this battle is over, for sure...
154.Wedding: What may it be, Admiral? For you to personally summon this Katori... Eh...? Th-thank you very much! I'll... gracefully receive it.
154.Ranking: Admiral, you want a situation report? That's very important; the report is right here.
154.Equip(1): An upgrade for Katori? I'm very thankful.
154.Equip(2): Yeah, my armaments are actually that heavy. Ufufu.
154.Supply: Thanks. From now on, I can navigate the ocean at any time.
154.Docking(1): It's not a big problem but... My clothes got ripped a bit...
154.Docking(2): Well, please excuse me then. I will head to the bath first.
154.Construction: Admiral, looks like we have a new important ship girl for ocean navigation.
154.Return: The fleet has returned. Good work everyone.
154.Sortie: Ocean navigating fleet's flagship Katori, going! Everyone, please follow me!
154.Battle: Enemy fleet sighted! Artillery, commence fire!
154.Attack: Somehow... in the shelling phase... something inside my head... Wait, I need to focus on the battle. FIRE!
154.Yasen(1): A night battle!? How interesting... Let's do it! Please, follow me.
154.Yasen(2): These guns and torpedoes are not just for show. Now, see the results of our daily training!
154.MVP: Of course, the result from this ocean navigation will not betray us. What about you, Admiral?
154.Damaged(2): Arghhhh! I can still fight! Don't worry!
154.Damaged(3): I'm beat... But my gun still works... I'll rain shells on them!
154.Sunk: It's...no good... At least, I got launched...aa..ah...
154.Setsubun 6547: Fortune, welcome~! Demons, begone~! ...Ufu♪ It's like I'm a child again. This is rather fun, Admiral!
154.Valentines 6547: Um... here— if you'd like, please have some. Yes, it's chocolate cake. Go ahead and eat some.
154.Anniversary 6547: Admiral, today is an important day. Katori is happy to be with you on such a day!
154.Summer 6547: Summer has come again, hasn't it? The destroyers are really excited. Admiral, how about a swim?
154.Fall 6547: Admiral, it has become a little chilly, hasn't it? It's autumn... How do you spend your autumn? Do you consider it to be a time for reading?
154.Xmas 6547: It's Christmas, Admiral. It's a little romantic... I feel like adding even more Christmas lights.
154.YearsEnd 6547: So then, it's New Year's Eve. Let's clean the year's worth of dirt from both the fleet and the naval base! It's time for cleaning.

343.Idle: Preparing for the next ocean voyage...alright! I'll be thorough. Admiral...oh, you're busy...Well, I, uh...I guess it's no matter.
343.H0000: Today, Training Cruiser Katori will be your secretary, right? Admiral, I'll be in your care.
343.H0100: 01:00. It's hard to believe how quiet this port becomes at night... During the day, it was so noisy...
343.H0200: 02:00. Tomorrow will come soon. How about some rest, Admiral?
343.H0300: 03:00. Admiral? You should lie down and rest. Leave the rest of the work to me.
343.H0400: 04:00. Admiral? It's almost dawn. It's the darkest before dawn, right? Ufufu~
343.H0500: 05:00. Admiral, it's already morning. Shall I brew a strong tea? Is coffee better for you?
343.H0600: 06:00. It's time to reveille for the fleet, Admiral? Reveille!
343.H0700: 07:00. What do you want for breakfast? Then, one toast with warm coffee and fruit for you, right?
343.H0800: 08:00. Time for the fleet to work! First is some expeditions, right? While we're at it, should we add some...ocean navigation?
343.H0900: 09:00. Ah... But if I were to navigate the ocean then... Who would be here with you...? Th-That's right, let's do it another time.
343.H1000: 10:00. About the torpedo squadron... Oh, this expedition is ok? And this is... Oh, we need to resupply, too... what should we do about development?
343.H1100: 11:00. Admiral... Thank you very much! I was nervous at things I'm not familiar with but... I'll get used to it soon.
343.H1200: 12:00. What shall we eat for lunch? Can I do it as long as it's simple?
343.H1300: 13:00. Do you want more of Katori's curry? It's different from others' curry, right? Ufufufu
343.H1400: 14:00. Ara? What's wrong, Maikaze? It's a little lonely...? Nowaki is not with you today?
343.H1500: 15:00. Huh...about Maikaze? She's such a good girl! Of course, Nowaki is too.
343.H1600: 16:00. What? Ah...about this? It's not a main gun, it's a ceremonial saluting gun... Shall I shoot it?
343.H1700: 17:00. The sun is about to set... Let us return to the base.
343.H1800: 18:00. Good work today, Admiral. What do you wish for your dinner? Fufu... Roger that! I shall now prepare.
343.H1900: 19:00. Now then, eat up! It's different from Ashigara's, right? How does it taste?
343.H2000: 20:00. Can you wait, Admiral? I'm washing at the moment... Ara... It's as if we are a married couple... Ufufu
343.H2100: 21:00. Admiral? Is there a problem? You're putting on such a troubled face... 'Don't worry'? We're always with you, Admiral.
343.H2200: 22:00. Guu... That girl is being noisy again, today! Don't stop me, Admiral! I'm gonna teach her a lesson!
343.H2300: 23:00. Night time is here. Good work, Admiral. Shall we have some sake? And then good night.

465.Intro: Admiral-san, thanks for the hard work. Training cruiser, Kashima, checking in! Ufufu!
465.Library: Second of the Katori-class training cruisers— the little sister, Kashima. I was built at a time of peaceful waters in order to raise a new generation of capable fleet ships. The time spent on my original duty wasn't long, but I gave my very best both as a fleet flagship and escort. After the battle ended, for the sake of the future, I worked very hard! Please don't forget about my services, okay?
465.Poke(2): Oh? I'll be the Fourth Fleet's flagship, then? Not right now? Well, now...
465.Poke(3): This sensation... that's not big sis Katori, is it...? See! I knew it! Admiral-san! Fufu♪
465.Idle: Admiral-san? Admiral-san! Umm... I want to talk about the escort fleet... O-Oh, you look busy... don't you? Excuse me. Later is fine with me... okay.
465.Married: Admiral-san. Someday, when the waters are peaceful again, I would like to go on a deep sea cruise with you! There are so many places that I want to see! Will we? We'll go for sure, right? I'm looking forward to it.
465.Wedding: Admiral-san? Is this a briefing for a deep sea practice drill? Or maybe an anti-submarine battle... Eh? It's not? This is... for me? No way, eh... really? Umm... I'll gladly accept it. Thank you so much! I'll treasure it...
465.Ranking: Oh, do you want to see the stats? I'll get them for you, okay? Ufu♪
465.Join: Flagship Kashima, now sortieing! Everyone, please follow after me!
465.Docking(1): Uu... I got a little dirty. I'll go take a bath, okay?
465.Docking(2): I'm sorry. I... both my uniform and myself... I'll go freshen up a bit. Wait for me, okay?
465.Construction: Admiral-san, the new ship would like to introduce herself.
465.Sortie: Marine escort fleet flagship Kashima, now sortieing! Ehehe... I'll try!
465.Battle: Enemy? Is it the enemy? We have no choice but to fight. Fleet, make preparations to engage. Please hurry!
465.Yasen(1): You can't escape! Pursue them. Port and starboard engines, flank speed. I-I can do this!
465.Yasen(2): Don't underestimate a training cruiser! My equipment and proficiency are more than enough!
465.MVP: Eh? You're kidding... it's me? I had the best battle results? Really? No way... Admiral-san, I'm... a little... happy!
465.Damaged(3): Kyaaaa! I-I... won't sink... I have no intention of sinking... in this place...
465.Sunk: No way... it's so cold... Eh!? Seawater...? This is... I'm... eh...? I'm... sinking...? No way...
465.NewYears 6547: Best wishes for the coming year, Admiral-san! I'll be relying on you again this year. I'll also be doing my absolute best!
465.Setsubun 6547: Katori-nee, it's Setsubun, but what are we doing...? Ah... we throw them at Admiral-san! I understand! Demons, begone~! Ei! Ei! Oh, was that wrong?
465.Valentines 6547: With this, the chocolates are finished! I'll give them a lovely wrapping and wait for the right moment!
465.Valentines 1471: A-Admiral-san, if you'd like, please accept this chocolate. Ah... yes! They're sweet!
465.Anniversary 6547: Congratulations on the third anniversary, Admiral. It's your third anniversary, isn't it? This make me happy, too. Heheh~
465.Rainy 6547: It's raining a lot lately. On a day like this, shall we stay indoors and plan strategies for future operations?
465.Summer 6547: It's almost summer. I wonder what Katori-nee will do about her swimsuit? I suppose I should get one as well? What should I do?
465.Fall 6547: Admiral-san, it's a pleasant fall, isn't it? I was also launched in fall, you know? Ufufu♪
465.Saury 6547: Saury... then...? I understand! I'll do my best to secure the fishing grounds! Eh...? Take this!?
465.Cold 6547: Admiral-san, it's growing cold out. Would you like me to brew some hot coffee? Please wait just a moment!
465.Xmas 6547: Admiral-san? Merry Christmas! This time of year somehow always ends up making me feel a little happy. Just for today, maybe it's okay to have a little drink. Right? Ehehe♪
465.Xmas 1471: Admiral-san? Today is a special day. I'm so happy that I was able to spend it together with you! Ufufu♪
465.YearsEnd 6547: And just like that, it's December. The fleet is so busy with the cleaning! I'll have to do my part as well!

356.Intro: Admiral-san, thanks for your hard work. Kashima here. Let's do our best again today. I'm counting on you.
356.Join: Fourth fleet flagship Kashima, sortieing! Everyone, let's do our best!
356.H0000: Admiral-san, for today, I, Kashima, will be undertaking the position of secretary ship. Fufu, I'm so happy.
356.H0100: It's 0100, Admiral-san. Fufufu. How fun♪ ...Eh? "What was that", you asked? I-It was nothing... ehehe♪
356.H0200: It's 0200, Admiral-san. The night sure is long, isn't it. I'll make some tea, okay? Or is coffee better?
356.H0300: It's 0300, Admiral-san. You must be getting sleepy, yes? I've got some pretty strong coffee. I'll put it over here, okay? Ufufu♪
356.H0400: Admiral-san, would you like another coffee? This time, how about with plenty of milk and sugar? Ah, it's 0400 now!
356.H0500: It's 0500, Admiral-san. Night has given way to dawn! I'll get breakfast ready later, okay? Western... Japanese... which would you like this morning?
356.H0600: It's 0600, Admiral-san. I've done the "all hands, arise" call for the fleet. Hmm... being the secretary ship takes the fortitude for all nighters, doesn't it? Ufufu♪
356.H0700: It's 0700, Admiral-san. Breakfast is over here, okay? It's scrambled eggs, bacon, toast and hot coffee! Dig in!
356.H0800: It's 0800, Admiral-san. Since I think that we'll be busy at lunch, I'll get some sandwiches ready, okay? Ham and eggs, and then afterwards...
356.H0900: Admiral-san, it's now 0900. Shall we begin the practices for today? Have you already reviewed the status of the expeditions?
356.H1000: It's 1000. Oh my, that's everyone in Division 6. They're so upbeat... Aoba-san, you're on assignment, so taking photos right now is... eh? Bed hair!? No way, it can't be!
356.H1100: 1100. Honestly, that Aoba gave me quite a shock! Talking about me having bed hair... my hair is always... ah, i-it's nothing...
356.H1200: It's 1200, Admiral-san. How about Kashima's Special Sandwiches for lunch? Yes! Right here in the office... ah! There's coffee here, too!
356.H1300: It's 1300, Admiral-san. Did you have one of my sandwiches? Ah, yes! The largish bits of egg are their selling point, you see. I'm so happy that they suit your tastes~! Ufufu♪
356.H1400: It's 1400, Admiral-san. Yes, the marine escort fleet? That's true— anti-submarine warfare is so very important. I'll do my best!
356.H1500: It's 1500. Eh? About Admiral Inoue? Yes, while he is very controversial, I personally have a lot of respect for him. I believe he is a fine man.
356.H1600: It's 1600. How nostalgic they were... those days of the South Seas. So many things happened. Now with my new admiral in this new sea... I'll do my very best!
356.H1700: It's 1700, Admiral-san. The sunset is lovely, don't you think? I could watch it forever! I love that final moment when the sun slips below the horizon.
356.H1800: It's 1800, Admiral-san. Dinner will be a little elaborate, so please look forward to it! Ufufu♪
356.H1900: It's 1900, Admiral-san. Please wait just a little more. It will be ready very soon.
356.H2000: It's 2000, Admiral-san. I tried making my specialty, chicken gratin. It's piping hot♪ You can eat it together with this bread. Ufufu♪
356.H2100: 2100... Oh my, Katori-nee? Good work! Yes, I'm alright! I've done my job perfectly, right, Admiral-san? ...Admiral-san?
356.H2200: It's true... DesRon 3 is really so... active at night, aren't they? They're just so energetic. Ah, they're sortieing. It's 2200 now.
356.H2300: It's 2300. Admiral-san, thanks for a job very well done again today! Although I'm not very good in battle... I'll do my best with the flagship duties tomorrow, too!

445.Intro: I'm Seaplane Tender Akitsushima! Make sure to remember me along with this Taitei-chan, alright!
445.Library: I'm the Seaplane Tender Akitsushima! That's right, I'm a Flying Boat Tender constructed for the sake of assisting Large-sized Flying Boat and refueling at sea, among other things! Eh? Is my "makeup" too heavy? You're rude, maybe! I'm not letting you have Type 2 Taitei-chan, kay!
445.Poke(2): This Type 2 Taitei-chan? I'm not letting you have her.
445.Poke(3): Heeey! Admiral, I hope you will not touch places that had nothing to do with you so much, maybe! Taitei-chan can't sleep like this, right!
445.Idle: This camouflage is flashy isn't it? Nah, that's not true, don't you agree, Taitei-chan? Don't you think so? Taitei-chan thinks so too, don't you? Ah, Admiral, is it time for our next mission?
445.Married: Admiral, why are you so lost in thought? Ah, are you tired? Times like these, the Akitsushima-style shoulder massage technique will be... Ufufu, hey, feels good doesn't it?
445.Wedding: Admiral, you called me here? I'm not giving you Taitei-chan if it's about her. Eh, that's not it? Ugh...this is... wow... it's beautiful... amaaazing... so, why are giving it to me?
445.Ranking: You wanna see the report? That's important, maybe. Here, help yourself.
445.Join: Flying Boat Tender Akitsushima, setting sail, maybe! Wait that's not it, setting sail!
445.Equip(1): Whoa, such good equipment! I'm happy, I think!
445.Equip(2): Admiral, you can't separate Type 2 Taitei-chan from me, maybe! I'm telling you!
445.Supply: Supply, this helps, I think... Ehehe
445.Docking(1): Uuu... my defenses might be on the low side, I think... I'll have a bath, maybe...
445.Docking(2): They got me good, I think-.. I'm not meant for the front line, maybe. Logistics might be perfect for me I think..
445.Construction: Somebody said a new ship girl has come! Who is she? Who is she?
445.Return: Operation complete! The fleet has returned I think!
445.Sortie: Now's the time, Akitsushima-style combat navigation technique, maybe I'll do it in a real battle!
445.Battle: Enemy fleet, sighted, I think! All fleet, prepare for battle!
445.Attack: Attack power, I might be low on that, I think...
445.Yasen(1): N-Night battle!? Me? W-well, I guess I have no choice but to go, I think...
445.Yasen(2): Do you say I wear heavy makeup? It's so rude!
445.MVP: E-Eh! I'm number one!? Is such a thing even possible... Eh...
445.Damaged(2): My camouflage pattern, might not have been very useful I think...
445.Damaged(3): T-..They got me good, I think. That's why I told you offense is not one of my fortes...
445.Sunk: I see, I'm sinking... Taitei-chan, bye, bye. I'm sure the future will be...
445.NewYears 6547: Admiral, I think I wish you well for the coming year! Taitei-chan is counting on you again this year!
445.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun, huh? Throwing these beans... Hmm... Who we'll throw them at might be a sensitive question. ...Choukai? No way. There might be a problem with that.
445.Valentines 6547: Admiral, maybe I'll give you this chocolate! This is my very own Akitsushima handmade chocolate, so maybe I want you to savor every bite!
445.Anniversary 6547: Admiral! It's the third anniversary kamodesu, third anniversary. Alright, I will make a really, really big cabbage roll to celebrate this happy occasion!
445.Rainy 6547: Admiral, the rainy season is a bit unpleasant, isn't it? It might be troublesome for Taitei-chan, too.... I wonder if I should make a teru teru bozu.
445.EarlySummer 6547: Hey! I think it's almost summer! I just have to swim with Taitei-chan! You're coming too, right, Admiral? I think I'll look forward to it!
445.Summer 6547: Yay! I think summer has arrived! Admiral, come on, come on, hurry up and change into your swimsuit. Let's go swimming! I'll even let you hold on to Taitei-chan, just this once~♪
445.Fall 6547: Fall, huh...? I don't think I really like the fall. I mean, the sky is kind of ominous. Right, Taitei-chan?
445.Xmas 6547: Yay! It's Christmas! Maybe I'll go make a whole lot of food! Huh? Zuikaku? What's wrong with you?
445.YearsEnd 6547: Uwaaa...! I think it's cleaning time...! Time for my end of year cleanup! I have to thoroughly clean up the cranes and everything! It's okay, Taitei-chan, you don't need to worry!

450.Intro: I'm Seaplane Tender Akitsushima! Have you already remembered Taitei-chan and I?
450.Poke(2): This Type 2 Taitei-chan? Like I said, I won't let you have her.
450.Poke(3): Admiral~ I hope you will not touch such strange places so much, maybe! How long will Taitei-chan have to wait to go to sleep?
450.Equip(1): Aaa they even have those equipments . I'm happy
450.Attack: I was renovated but... attack power, I don't have any
450.Yasen(2): You still say my makeup is heavy? It's really rude!
450.H0000: Admiral, the date might have changed! Today I, Akitsushima will be your secretary, maybe. Ok?
450.H0100: 0100. Is it fine like this? It might be fine? Okay!
450.H0200: 0200. Maybe I've a knack for this. Aren't I the perfect secretary?
450.H0300: 03...0...0. But I might be a bit drowsy. It's this late, after all.
450.H0400: 04...00... Eh, I'm ok. I'm perfectly awake... maybe...
450.H0500: Oh no! I'm awake! 0500! It might already be morning! I need to get it together!
450.H0600: 0600. Admiral, what would be good for breakfast? You know, I'm unexpectedly good at cooking!
450.H0700: 0700. Admiral, have some breakfast, maybe! Look, this miso soup for example... isn't it good? There's also some dried fish!
450.H0800: 0800. Alright, once we're done with cleaning up, we should hurry and put the flying boat to use! We might have a long-distance recon expedition!?
450.H0900: 0900. Taitei-chan? Heh, cute right? But no matter how much you praise her, I won't give her to you.
450.H1000: 1000. Admiral, what will you do next? Maybe check as many missions as you can?
450.H1100: 1100. Alright, we have to prepare for lunch. If it's lunch, then it should be curry after all, maybe. Is curry fine with you?
450.H1200: 1200. Tadaa! It's Akitsushima's deluxe curry! It's definitely good, maybe! Try some, try some!
450.H1300: 1300. How was it? Akitsushima's curry. I have an unexpectedly large food warehouse. Ehehe.
450.H1400: 1400. As expected, this camouflage might be strange? Really? I rather like it though...
450.H1500: 1500. Admiral, are you maybe getting hungry? I made some food like Inari-zushi but, will you maybe take some?
450.H1600: 1600. It might be sunset soon for today as well. Ahh, I might be tired.
450.H1700: 1700. It might be dusk. Taitei-chan, too, good work today. Afuun.
450.H1800: 1800. Alright, I shall prepare for dinner, maybe. Admiral, is there something you'd like to eat?
450.H1900: 1900. Here, tonight I've tried to make my deluxe cabbage roll, maybe. The plentiful potatos and onions are the main point of the flavor!
450.H2000: 2000. Admiral, how was the cabbage roll? It tasted a bit like a croquette and was delicious, right? Yep, yep. Thank goodness, maybe!
450.H2100: 2100. Alright! It'll be the end of the day once I've done the dishes. I might be tired!
450.H2200: 2200. Oh, somehow it's noisy from the direction of the torpedo squadron even though it's nighttime, maybe. Eh? It can't be helped? I see, so that's how it is.
450.H2300: 2300. Admiral, thanks for your hard work today, maybe. Let's do our best tomorrow too.

451.Intro: Admiral, thank you for your hard work. Seaplane Tender Mizuho has now arrived. It is a pleasure to meet you.
451.Library: I am a seaplane tender, Mizuho. Together with Chitose and Chiyoda, I am capable of utilizing the Kouhyouteki midget submarine.
