Although I was not bestowed with the latest model engine, I manage to participate at the start of the Southern Operations. I shall do my best to meet your expectations.
451.Poke(1): Did you call me? I'm so happy for it.
451.Poke(2): Hehehe... What's the matter, Admiral? Did you happen to forget something?
451.Poke(3): Admiral, I am happy that you take good care of me. Don't worry, I am ready for sortie anytime.
451.Idle: How strange, I was supposed to have a new model engine, but why... Ah, Admiral!? It's nothing. I am okay.
451.Married: Admiral, Are you tired? Goodness gracious, I shall make something tasty for you. Let's see... What would be nice...?
451.Wedding: Admiral, did you summon me? Did I make a huge mistake? Eh...? You're giving me this box? May I open it? Eh... I... I... I'm so happy...
451.Ranking: You want to look at the intel? A moment, please. I'll sort it out for you.
451.Join: Seaplane Tender Mizuho, Ready! Forgive me if I'm a bit slow.
451.Equip(1): Should I take the seaplanes or Kouhyouteki? I'm at a loss...
451.Equip(2): I never saw this armament before. Is this a new weapon? Thank you very much.
451.Supply: Admiral, I am grateful for this.
451.Docking(1): I am slightly covered with soot. My apologies. I shall lay down for a while.
451.Docking(2): My apologies for being in this state... I shall take a bath now. I'm sorry.
451.Construction: Admiral, The construction of a new ship has completed.
451.Return: Admiral, the fleet has returned. What a relief for everyone to return to the dock safely.
451.Sortie: Fleet Command Mizuho, Sailing out! Let's go, everyone.
451.Battle: E-enemy fleet has been spotted!? What should I do? R-ready for battle... is it?
451.Attack: Mizuho, moving in! Commencing assault. Ready the guns!
451.Yasen(1): It is now nighttime. I wanted to pursue the enemy, but it ended up in a night battle... What should I do?
451.Yasen(2): I must... pursue the enemy... Get your bearings, Mizuho!
451.MVP: Ehh...!? I... I have excelled in battle? Admiral... I... I'm lost for words.
451.Damaged(1): Hyaah! It... It hurts. Was that a torpedo?
451.Damaged(2): Nooo! I-I am fine. Don't let me sink, please!
451.Damaged(3): Hyaaaaaah! For me to be in this state... But I am still able to cruise!
451.Sunk: Am I... Sinking? But, this time I am able to be useful. I... am glad...
451.NewYears 6547: Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! The 11th Carrier Division and I will be counting on you for another year!
451.Setsubun 6547: Setsu... bun... is it...? Eh? Maya-san, you'll be the demon? Y-You want me to throw it...? Ah... ehhh??
451.Valentines 6547: Admiral, I... tried making some chocolate candies...! Would you... like to try one?
451.Anniversary 6547: Admiral, it is the third anniversary. Congratulations. I, too, am happy for it.
451.Rainy 6547: This season feels a bit melancholic, doesn't it? Because of submarines? Maybe so... even now, I still feel a bit conflicted about them...
451.EarlySummer 6547: It's getting hotter and hotter. This year... summer is back for the year... Mizuho thinks summer is too much...
451.Summer 6547: What a strong heat wave this is. Admiral, how are you feeling? So I see. You're so energetic... aren't you?
451.Fall 6547: So it's autumn. Admiral, it's the season of delicious food. Shall I make something for you? What would you like?
451.Xmas 6547: Christmas. It's fun, don't you think? I've made rice croquettes as well. ...How does it taste...?
451.YearsEnd 6547: It's already the end of the year. Admiral, the year really flew by, didn't it? I shall do my part the cleanup as well.

348.H0000: Admiral. I, Mizuho will be by your side announcing the time for today. It is a pleasure to be of use
348.H0100: Admiral, it is now 0100. The fleet during nighttime feels really serene.
348.H0200: Admiral, it is now 0200. Thank you for your hard work, even in this late hours.
348.H0300: Admiral, it is now 0300. Would you like me to make supper for you? Something as simple as an Ochazuke?
348.H0400: Admiral, it is now 0400. I've prepared my specialty Ochazuke. Do you like it? ...Really? I'm so glad.
348.H0500: Admiral, it is now 0500. The sky has started to get a bit bright. It's going to be morning.
348.H0600: Admiral, it is now 0600. Let's do a reveille call to all fleet.
348.H0700: Admiral, it is now 0700. I shall serve you your breakfast. It is white rice and smoked fish with a side dish of vegetable and tofu miso soup. Bon appetit.
348.H0800: Admiral, it is now 0800. I will be making Onigiri using our rations for lunch. A moment, please.
348.H0900: Admiral, it is now 0900. We are starting our fleet training? Affirmative. Would you like to see our fleet's composition first?
348.H1000: Admiral, it is now 1000. Cruising on the sea feels great. I too, am doing my best.
348.H1100: Admiral, it is now 1100. Shall we have lunch after one more push? Today's ration is my specialty onigiri.
348.H1200: Admiral-! It is noon 1200. Please enjoy my specialty onigiri. As for miso soup... Here it is. I shall pour it on this cup.
348.H1300: Admiral, it is now 1300. Let's do our best for today. I shall assist alongside you.
348.H1400: Admiral, it is 1400... Oh, Chitose. Thank you for your hard work. I am glad that we were to work together once more. It is a pleasure.
348.H1500: Admiral, it is 1500. Miss Chitose? Yes, I was together with her as part of the 11th Aviation Fleet. Yes, she is preciously a wonderful person.
348.H1600: Admiral, it is now 1600. Ah, Naka. Good day. Eh, your autograph? Ahh.. Th-Thank you very much. I shall treasure it.
348.H1700: Admiral, it is now 1700. It is almost the end of service for the ship planes. Let's send our fleet back to the home port.
348.H1800: Admiral, it is 1800. I will now prepare dinner. What should I cook? How about seasoned rice with sardine soup?
348.H1900: Admiral, it is now 1900. Dinner is served. Bon appetit. Would you like more seasoned rice?
348.H2000: Admiral, it is 2000. I have made too much seasoned rice, so i'll roll the rest into an onigiri. Please have some if you want.
348.H2100: Admiral, It is 2100... Oh my. Takao, Maya. Thank you for your hard work. You have helped me a lot back then. I am ever grateful for it.
348.H2200: Admiral, it is now 2200. Jintsuu and Sendai really worked hard in this hours. How admirable... *yawn*
348.H2300: Admiral it is 2300. Thank you so much for today. I kept the onigiri inside the shelf. Please have some if you're hungry.

491.Intro: Bonjour. Enchanté. Je m'appelle Commandant Teste. Admiral, I look forward to the possibility of working together.
491.Library:
Originating from the country of freedom, equality, and fraternity, I am the seaplane tender, Commandant Teste.

I was born as a fully-fledged seaplane tender capable of repairing my aircraft and various on-board machinery. Don't you find my firepower to be on the level of a cruiser? Eh? My accomplishments in live combat? C'est la vie!
491.Poke(2): Pardon? Admiral, are you curious about my cranes?
491.Idle: At times like these, we should make progress with the seaplanes' maintenance. Oh? Hyuuga? Eh...? This is a... Zuiun? Eh... I may have a few? Merci.
491.Married: Comment allez-vous? Ah... is that so? What a relief. Indeed, sometimes, taking a break is also an important duty. Let's have some wine. Wait just a moment.
491.Wedding: Comment allez-vous? Eh...? This... is...? ...Admiral! Merci. Je vous aime.
491.Ranking: Please give me a moment. I shall retrieve it for you.
491.Join: Commandant Teste, setting sail. Bonne chance.
491.Equip(1): Trés bien. This is good equipment.
491.Docking(1): Excusez moi. I really must apologize.
491.Docking(2): Merci beaucoup. I shall rest for a while. Thank you very much... for your concern...
491.Construction: A new navire seems to have been completed.
491.Return: The flotte has returned to port. C'était un bon travail.
491.Sortie: Flotte, now sortieing. Everyone, please follow me.
491.Battle: I have spotted an enemy fleet. Everyone, how are your preparations?
491.Yasen(1): En avant toute! Everyone, we should make haste.
491.MVP: Eh? Am I... la meilleure this time? That's wonderful. Merci beaucoup.
491.Damaged(3): Ah... ...I won't... sink... just yet... but... ugh... stop shooting...!
491.Setsubun 6547: This is... what those girls called, "C'est tout bon"? This wonderful tradition has such profound sentiments. It's splendid.
491.Xmas 1471: Joyeux noël! Here, please have some of the gâteau de Noël I made.

372.Equip(1): Trés bien! This is impeccable equipment.
372.Docking(2): Kh... this is unbelievable... I shall retire. Merci beaucoup. Thank you very much for your concern.
372.Attack: Oui! Let's go. Bomber Squadron, begin takeoff!
372.H0000: It is now midnight. For today, I have been given the responsibility of putting the directives into practice.
372.H0100: It is now 1 a.m. This truly is a time when one should already be in bed.
372.H0200: It is now 2 a.m. I would recommend taking at least a short rest. Otherwise, tomorrow will be difficult.
372.H0300: It is now 3 a.m. Aye. I will stay awake, so you may go ahead and sleep. Bonne nuit.
372.H0400: It is now 4 a.m. It's nearly morning. I don't particularly mind the hours before daybreak.
372.H0500: It is now 5 a.m. Admiral, I intend to awaken everyone in the fleet momentarily. Is that alright?
372.H0600: Oui! It is now 6 A.M. All fleet members, please awaken! It's morning! Bonjour!
372.H0700: It is now 7 a.m. Have a freshly baked croissant and some café. Or perhaps you would prefer wine? ...Bon appétit!
372.H0800: Now, let us commence fleet movements for the morning. To start with, would you like to verify the expeditionary fleets? Or perhaps fleet exercises?
372.H0900: It is now 9 a.m. Admiral, would you like to drink some wine as well? Or would that interfere with your work?
372.H1000: It is now 10 a.m. Admiral? Here, it's your wine. I've poured red for you. Bon appétit.
372.H1100: It is now 11 a.m. What will you be doing for lunch? Would you like me to prepare it for you?
372.H1200: It's noon. Non? Ma... mi... ya? Mamiya? Is that a cafétéria?
372.H1300: It is now 1 p.m. C'est bon! It was delicious. Thank you for the meal!
372.H1400: It is now 2- Oh... Mizuho. Ça va? I see. Good to hear. I'm feeling rather lively myself.
372.H1500: It is now 3 p.m. Oh, Mizuho, you mean? Yeah, she's a good friend. I've met so many wonderful people in this fleet. It makes me happy.
372.H1600: It is now 4 p.m. Yes, it's true. My birthplace has a variety of splendid battleships as well. I'll introduce you to one next time.
372.H1700: It is now 5 p.m. Admiral, take a look. The sea is so very... Oui. It's beautiful.
372.H1800: It is now 6 p.m. For tonight, would you like me to try my hand at dinner? Then please wait for just a bit.
372.H1900: It is now 7 p.m. Excusez moi, but I am in the process of making it. Please wait a little longer. It's almost done!
372.H2000: It is now 8 p.m. De la cuisine française! Please, have some. Bon appétit!
372.H2100: It is now 9 p.m. Admiral, voulez vous du vin?
372.H2200: It is now 10 p.m. Seeing that you ate so much of my food makes me very happy. Merci!
372.H2300: It is now 11 p.m. Thank you for your hard work today. Let's do our best tomorrow as well! Bon soirée.

128.Intro: Guten Tag ... ah, my mistake... sorry, please call me "hachi".
128.Library: I made it to Germany as the second submarine sent on the transoceanic voyage. Then, I received a U-boat. This operation was carried out 5 times, but because of mines and other events, I was the only one who was able to successfully complete the return trip... yeah, I really hate mines!
128.Poke(2): Hmm, if it's easier for you, call me "Hacchan". Yes.
128.Poke(3): Ah! ...You've surprised me, touching me all of a sudden and making these loud noises.
128.Idle: I think... I'd like to read a new book now...
128.Wedding: Admiral? Hacchan wants to read a new book... oh, things I like outside of books? Hmm~ I'd like to try Stollen sometime, yeah? Ah, but it's a Christmas confectionery. Eh? Mamiya will bake it? Today's a special day!? Wow, I'm so happy♪
128.Ranking: A report for the admiral. Let's see...
128.Equip(2): That's right. I think upgrading is essential...
128.Docking(1): May I entrust you with the servicing?
128.Docking(2): Looks like repairs will take some time... I wonder if I can take a lot of books with me into the docks?
128.Construction: It seems a new ship has been constructed.
128.Sortie: I won't lose to anyone on long voyages!
128.Battle: I don't really like fighting.... but I've no other choice!
128.Yasen(1): Come on! Torpedoes loaded... oh... not yet...
128.Yasen(2): I'll keep resisting even if I surface! I'll shower you with these 20mm machine guns I brought back!
128.MVP: Oh my? Did Hacchan do it? Well then, as a reward, I'd like to eat Stollen.
128.Damaged(1): It's glossy black... and its eyes are glaring...
128.Damaged(2): The hydraulic pressure is rising...! Ah, leaking...!
128.Damaged(3): I have to surface, and re-position myself...
128.Sunk: I always knew I'd sink, some day... Admiral... everybody... I'm glad that I met you all...
128.H0200: 0200. Still fighting even at this time?
128.H0300: 0300. If you keep going now, you wont last through tomorrow. Admiral?
128.H0400: 0400... Aa, sorry, I nodded off there...
128.H0500: 0500. Do you like German bread? I was just thinking about it, so I'll go make some.
128.H0600: 0600. I'll have some German bread ready for after breakfast.
128.H0800: Eight!... no wait, 0800. The roggenmischbrot, freshly baked!
128.H0900: 0900. How was the German bread, Admiral?... Too sour? Admiral... I don't get you...
128.H1000: 1000. It's time to refocus on my reading!
128.H1100: 1100. Once, I gave Hibiki some freshly baked bread, and she was so happy! What a good kid...!
128.H1300: 1300. Let's keep on reading, shall I?
128.H1400: It feels refreshing to not be submerged.
128.H1500: 1500. I'm a bit distracted, so I can't focus on reading....
128.H1600: 1600. Admiral, what do you usually do around this time?
128.H1700: 1700. What should I make for dinner..?
128.H1800: 1800. I really like the atmosphere the sun setting over the sea creates.
128.H1900: 1900. I want to try something other than swimsuits... like the uniform everyone is wearing... maybe?
128.H2000: 8-8! Wait, 2000. Admiral, here and some ham, cheese and potato. Eat up!
128.H2100: 2100. Admiral, are you feeling better now?
128.H2200: 2200. Admiral is playing Kancolle! I am reading! Eheh~
128.H2300: It's 2300. It's getting late, isn't it. I'm a bit tired...
128.NewYears 6547: Admiral? Best wishes for the new year. Hacchan and the Submarine Fleet will be counting on you again this year.
128.Setsubun 6547: It's Setsubun? ...No, Hacchan will pass. ...Admiral? Why do you have such a sad expression...? Ah, okay. I'm throwing it, then... ...eii...
128.Valentines 6547: Admiral? Since it's Valentine's, Hacchan tried finishing up a chocolate stollen cake. How is it? Does it taste good?
128.Valentines 1471: I'm glad that the chocolate stollen was well-received. I learned about panettone from that new girl, so I'm thinking about trying a chocolate cake version of that, too.
128.Anniversary 6547: Three years. Amazing, isn't it? It's the third anniversary! Hacchan is a little surprised too. It's a celebration.
128.Rainy 6547: It feels so humid. After all, it's the rainy season. Hacchan is still fine even in rainy season, you know?
128.EarlySummer 6547: Eh? A swimsuit? Hacchan is fine staying with this swimsuit, but if you insist on a change... Glasses. Wouldn't you like to see me with new glasses?
128.Summer 6547: It's summer. Acht-acht! It's already August and we haven't gone swimming together. Ah, Hacchan goes swimming every day, of course. Would you like to go swimming, too?
128.Fall 6547: It's autumn. Autumn is for reading. The amount of reading I get done goes waaaay up in autumn. I'd like a new book. Admiral, would you buy me one?
128.Xmas 6547: Admiral? It's Christmas. We haven't baked any Stollen. So then, Hacchan won't be able to sortie right now... Eh? Denied?
128.Xmas 1471: But... it's not Christmas without Sto- Eh? You'll make me some? Really? Danke! Hacchan is looking forward to it! Ufufu...
128.YearsEnd 6547: Admiral? Hacchan will also be participating in the cleaning. First, the Admiral's desk's drawer... eh? You're going to clean it yourself? Mm... so I see.

494.Intro:
Large submarine aircraft carrier, born for the purpose of complementing the Sentoku-class...
I-13-class submarine, I-13 here. Um... I'm... Hitomi is also...
...No... it was nothing...
494.Library:
From the class of revised I-9 class-submarines, the I-13-class submarine, I-13 here. Alongside with my younger sister, I-14, I was born in Kobe...

That's right... In line with that submarine class, I was a submarine carrier able to make use of Seirans. I had secret capabilities that were ahead of its time.

Us sisters participated in the Saiun transport operation, Operation Hikari. However, from around Ogasawara, my recollection... I can't remember... ... ...I'm sorry...
494.Poke(1): Admiral...? Did you call for me...? ...Was I mistaken...?
494.Poke(2): My hangar... you mean? ...Saiuns would... no... Seirans would... um... ah...
494.Poke(3): Ah...! Admiral, that place is... Um... that place is for the Seirans... so... treat it carefully... please...
494.Idle: Iyo-chan... Even if you're off duty... you shouldn't let loose so much, so don't... You really shouldn't... The admiral will... The admiral will get worried... So, then... ...A-Are you listening? ...Listen to your older sister... once in... a while...
494.Married: Eh...? Iyo-chan? ...I see... Yeah, I also love my sister. When I'm with her, I feel at ease... ...But... you, too... u-um... As for you, I also... love you. When I'm with you, I feel at ease... At... ease...
494.Wedding: Admiral, did you call for me? ...Okay, I'm here, but... I don't really... Ah...? This is... This is...? M-Me... For me...? You're okay with it being me? ...I-I see!
494.Ranking: Admiral, what is it? ...Ah, the intelligence. I'll... go get it.
494.Equip(1): Ah...! This is... it's in good condition...
494.Equip(2): This equipment is... With this... Even I... Even I...!
494.Equip(3): I have a bad feeling about this...
494.Docking(1): Excuse me... um... I'll go treat my wounds... ...Excuse me...
494.Docking(2): I'm so sorry for this. It's a lot of damage... I... Sorry, Admiral... Sorry...!
494.Return: The fleet has returned... safely... I'm so relieved... thank goodness.
494.Sortie: The cargo is fine... Okay... First Submarine Squadron, I-13... going.
494.Battle: They found us... Not good... There's no choice... Prepare for battle...!
494.Attack: Let's fire... Opening torpedo tubes... Tube 1... tube 2... ready. ...Fiire!
494.Yasen(1): Night... We're still... going to? ...I see...
494.Yasen(2): I have... no choice...! Torpedoes... ready? ...Going...! Fiire!
494.MVP: No way... That can't be... It's me? ...You mistook Iyo-chan for me... I'm sure of it... so... ...Huh...?
494.Damaged(2): No, ah, no way...! Hurry up and dive...! Ah, hurry...!
494.Damaged(3): I had a bad feeling about this... I... I don't think I can...
494.Sunk:
Huh...? It's... no use...? I'm... in a place like this... again...
P... Please... no...!

374.Intro:
Large submarine aircraft carrier, born for the purpose of complementing the Sentoku-class...
I-13-class submarine, I-13 here. Please call me Hitomi.
I'll make it this time.
374.Poke(2): I said my hangar is... Saiuns...? No... Seirans are... um... that is...
374.Equip(1): Ah...! This is... no way... ...Good condition...
374.Docking(1): Excuse me... um... I'll go treat my wounds. ...Wait for me... please...
374.Sortie: First Submarine Squadron, I-13... Starting the sortie. ...Alright... Fleet, please follow me.
374.Battle: This time I found you first... Let's go... Prepare for battle...!
374.MVP: No way... That can't be... It's me? ...Not Iyo-chan...? ...Is that so...? Me... huh...? I see... Me!
374.H0000: 0 o'clock. Phew... Admiral, is it okay if... I'm on duty today...? Really...?
374.H0500: 0500. Look, it's the morning sun... The start of a new day...
374.H0600: 0600. Good morning. I'll... go make breakfast... Please wait...
374.H0700: 0700. Admiral, breakfast is ready. Oh...? Barley rice...? No, it's buttered rice... You don't like it?
374.H0800: 0800. I'm almost done... doing the dishes. Please... wait...
374.H0900: 0900. Thank you for waiting, admiral. Shall we proceed to the morning exercises...?
374.H1000: 100... Oh, R... how are you? I see... glad to hear that. Do your best in the ASW exercises... okay?
374.H1100: 1100. It's... almost noon. How about lunch, admiral...? I made some rice balls...
374.H1200: 1200. ...here. My special... rice balls. Ah... are they... a bit too salty...?
374.H1300: 1300. Truk... anchorage... I'd love to go there at some point...
374.H1400: 1400. Huh...?! You'd like to go to Truk... with me, Admiral? No way... really...?
374.H1500: 1500. Oh no, what should I do...? I'm going to Truk with the admiral... What should I do... What should I wear...? Hmm, maybe I should bring a Saiun with me... maybe... Oh God, what should I do...
374.H1600: 1600. Admiral, the sunset... the sunset at Nanao Bay was also beautiful... How about... we go there next...? Would that be okay...?
374.H1700: 1700. Admiral, the sun is setting. Let's... call the fleets back to port. I'm glad that... today has been another peaceful day.
374.H1800: 18000. About dinner... uhm... Oh, Mamiya...? 'That' Mamiya...? No way...... I'd... love to go there...
374.H1900: 1800. So this is Mamiya...? Wow... what a nice scent...... that heavy cruiser over there... sure is something...
374.H2000: 200... Wait, what? Iyo, what are you dong? D-don't drink so much...
374.H2100: 2100. Stop it, Iyo... the admiral is watching... sheesh... Okay, no more alcohol...!
374.H2200: 2200. I'm terribly sorry, admiral... I'll make sure to give Iyo a mouthful... On behalf of my Type AM submarine sister... I humbly apologise...
374.H2300: 2300. Thank you for your... hard work today. Someday... someday I'll go to Truk with you, admiral... I'll be waiting... And doing my best...

495.Intro: I'm I-14, a 1st Class submarine born to carry Seiran. You can call me Iyo if you want. Nice to meet you, admiral!
495.Library: I'm I-14, second ship of the Type AM submarines! I was built for the purpose of forming a submarine aircraft carrier fleet that was meant to carry out operations. However, by the time I was actually born the situation wouldn't allow that anymore. I never got to play an active part in the war with the Seiran squadron of the 631st air group, but even as the war was taking a turn for the worse I was still able to contribute to the success of Operation "Hikari".  So please don't forget about me, and I-13.
495.Poke(1): You called?  Hohoho~, so what is it?
495.Poke(2): Yep!  My hangar is nice, isn't it! I'm doing my best after all, ehehehe.
495.Poke(3): Ah, Aaaa!  Jeez!  It's not really good to mess with my hanger like that!  It's pretty fragile.  You need to be careful around the vents you know?
495.Idle: Umm...Admiral...Huh?  He's not here.... Does this mean I'm on shore leave? I guess..  Alright! I'm off to drink for a bit!  Turning the lights on.  Getting hyped!  Cheers! Hohoho~
495.Wedding: Huh?  Is that... for me?  You're giving it...to me?  Woah...what is it?  Can I open it?  I'll open it then...  Ahh!  Admiral, this is... are you really really serious about this?  Really!?  Yiss!  Don't worry, I'll make sure to treasure it as much as I can!  Hehehe~! I'm not giving it back, you know!  Yay~!
495.Married: You're looking a bit under the weather, admiral.  Are you okay? Well then, how about we have a few drinks together? You know, as a charm to get you out and about again.  Just for a bit...!  ...Okay, cheers!  Ah, there, yup.  That'll help you get better.
495.Ranking: Ah, really?  The status report, isn't it?  Wait a minute, I'll go fetch it right now.
495.Join: First Class submarine I-14!  Preparing to sortie!  Weigh Anchor!
495.Equip(1): This is pretty good.  I like it!
495.Equip(2): I guess this works too.  Hehehe~ Just leave it to me!
495.Docking(1): Yup, minor repairs are important too.  Ah, what a nice bath!
495.Docking(2): I do like the bath.  Admiral, want to take one... together?  Ehehehe~ Just....kid...ing.
495.Construction: Hehehe~  Admiral, a new girl just arrived!  What's she like?
495.Return: I'm back home!  I'm back here safe and sound!
495.Sortie: Everyone in the 631st Air Group, are you ready to go?  Okay, Let's do it!  I-14, heading out!
495.Battle: Prepare for battle!  Descend to periscope depth.  Open torpedo tubes 1 to 4!
495.Yasen(1): I'm not done yet!  Commence running battle!
495.Yasen(2): Hehehe~, Here comes my attack!  Take this!
495.MVP: Woohoo!  I did it!  Come on, you can praise me if you want, admiral.  Ehehe~, I really did it!
495.Damaged(1): Waaaaaa!  I'm... I'm still okay, right?
495.Damaged(2): Ah, I-I'm flooding...! I'm still... still fine though!
495.Damaged(3): Oh no..I-I'm flooding...! Emergency ascent!  I'm not going to sink because of this!
495.Sunk: Water is...it keeps flooding in...it won't stop!  I'm going to sink here... right?  Bye...bye...

375.Intro: I'm I-14, a 1st Class submarine born to carry Seiran.  Yup, today's gonna be another great day! Let's get cracking, admiral!
375.Poke(2): Yep!  My hangar is nice, isn't it! Saiun is fine too, but of course nothing beats Seiran!  Yay!
375.Poke(3): Ah, Aaaaa!  Jeez!  Please stop fiddling around with my hanger that much!  It's very sensitive...  Ahh, Jeez! The negative tank too...heeeey! What do you think you're doing!
375.Docking(2): Taking a batch sure is nice. Come on, admiral. How about you join me? Ehehehe~ Juuuuust kidding.
375.Sortie: Everyone in the 631st Air Group, are you ready to go? All right then! I-14, heading out!
375.MVP: Aww yiss!  I did it again!  You know, you can praise me if you want, admiral  Yay! I really did it!
375.H0000: We've just passed 0 o'clock. I'll be your secretary today! That's fine, right?
375.H0100: 0100, yay! Is this how I'm supposed to do it? Ha ha~, easy peasy! Ehehehe~
375.H0200: 0200. It's a bit cold tonight, don't you think? Let's get some drinks! I'll keep us warm. How about it?
375.H0300: 0300. Oh, it's fine if it's just a little bit?! Now we're talking, admiral! I expect no less! Ehehehe~, alright, cheers!
375.H0400: 0400... Oh... uh... whoops, it's already morning! You alright, admiral...? Wake up~!
375.H0500: 0500. Just look at the sunrise...! So pretty... Don't you think? So pretty... Ehehehe~... so, how about a drink or two while watching it?
375.H0600: 0600. Iiiiit's moooooorning! Everyone, wake up, wake up! It's morning, mooooorniiiiiiing! Ehehehe~
375.H0700: 0700. Hey, I made breakfast! It's a simple meal, but very nutritious! Dig in!
375.H0800: 0800. Alright, time for some morning exercises! Where should we start? I'd say... hmmm... maybe this one?
375.H0900: 0900... Oh! Shioi! Good morning! Wanna have a Seiran match? Ehehe~ You wanna?
375.H1000: 1000! Woah, Shioi. The way your Seiran takes off is so beautiful~. But I ain't gonna lose here! Alright, my 631 buddies, let's do this! Yay!
375.H1100: 1100. Ugh... launching Seiran sure makes me hungry. Oh, you're also hungry, admiral? Still?
375.H1200: 1200. Ehehehe~ Ta-da~! My special light rice balls! What light, you say...? Oh well, don't sweat the details. Come on, just try them! Ehehehe~
375.H1300: 1300. So, what do you think of my special rice balls? They look small, but are really nutritious! Alright, let's keep it up this afternoon! Yay!
375.H1400: 1400. Oh, my sister? Hmm, I wonder... I hope she's doing fine... I'm... a little bit worried.
375.H1500: 1500. Me? Hmm... I guess I'm quite the optimist. Like, everything's gonna be fine. Ehehehe~
375.H1600: 1600. Shioi's sister? Hmm, we were together at Nanao Bay. She's a nice boat. ...now that you mention her, I haven't seen her in a while. Oh well, we'll probably see her soon. It's okay, no need to be impatient.
375.H1700: 1700. Hey admiral, look! The sun is setting right now! Right now! Did you see it? Did you?! Ehehehe~, beautiful, wasn't it? I like it. How about you, admiral?
375.H1800: 1800. Hmm, I worked hard today! Hey, admiral. Buy me a round today! Pretty please?
375.H1900: 1900! Woohoo! Shore leave! Let's go to Mamiya! Where the food is delicious and the fun never stops~! Ehehehe~
375.H2000: 2000. Aaah, the food is so delicious! Not to mention the booze! Those surface ships sure can drink a lot! Yay!
375.H2100: 21...00... Oh look, it's Hitomi! Wanna join us for a drink? ...huh? Dunno whaddaya talkin' 'bout. Right, admiral? Ehehehe~ Oh shit--
375.H2200: 2200... ouch ouch... Hitomi, you don't have to keep hitting me while crying, you know~ ...Ouch...
375.H2300: 2300. Alright, the early bird catches the worm. Let's go to bed early, we have a lot to do tomorrow! Good work today.

191.Intro: Such a great admiral makes me happy. I'm I-19. Yep, calling me 'Iku' is fine!
191.Library: I'm the submarine I-19. Yes, Iku! I sunk the carrier Wasp with my pride and joy, my oxygen torpedoes! I was even able to hit a battleship and destroyer that was waaaay ahead of the carrier! Don't you forget Iku, Sniper of the Ocean's great abilities... 'kay?
191.Poke(1): Admiral! You're not allowed to look away from Iku!
191.Poke(2): Nnfu~, you won't get mad no matter what I do, so I like you.
191.Poke(3): Admiral? Are your shoulders sti~ff? How's thi~s? Does it hurt? Ehehehehe.
191.Idle: Admiral~! What were you thinking, keeping Iku waiting? Do you want to be punished again~?
191.Married: A~dmi~ra~l! I'll massage your shoulders! ...Uuu, they're all stiff...
191.Wedding: Admiral, what i~s it? You wanna dive with Iku? Oka~y...here, a wetsuit! Doesn't that look great on you♪ Well now, let's dive together! ...Fufu, make sure you absolutely don't let go of my hand. Ready and splaaash!!
191.Ranking: Admiral, there's a message for you.
191.Equip(1): Fufu~. My sniper soul is burning~.
191.Equip(2): With this, I'll get all of them in one go!
191.Docking(1): Just a li~ttle bit of repairing~
191.Docking(2): Nn, I got beat... Once I'm better, I'll pay them back twice over!
191.Sortie: Iku's torpedoes are itching to go!
191.Battle: Iku's torpedo strike, off it goes!
191.Yasen(1): Admiral, I want a reward if I beat that one.
191.Yasen(2): "Aim at me!" is what it feels like it's saying!
191.MVP: Iku had a great, dazzling victory! I'm expecting a reward from you~
191.Damaged(2): Kuh! Is that the one targeting me?
191.Damaged(3): Did you think you'd back me into a corner? It gets me fired up instead!
191.Sunk: Iku...is sinking...? Hey...Admiral...even if I'm not there...please...don't worry...okay...?
191.H0400: 0400. Really, didn't you fall asleep a bit there? Iku knows it.
191.H0500: 0500. Hey... right now, you fell asleep, yeah?
191.H0700: 0700! The beginning of a new day! ...I'm hungry~
191.H1300: 1300! After lunch, I always want to take a nap~
191.H1400: 1400. The weather this afternoon is great, so I want to go for a walk! Truthfully, I'm always in the water though~
191.H1500: 1500. Admiral? What do you normally do at this time?
191.H1700: 1700. Somehow, I'm itching to do something, you know?
191.H2000: 2000! It was great to spend Iku's favourite time with you!
191.H2100: 2100. So~ It's nearly time for tonight's performance!
191.H2200: 2200. Whoops, I got all fired up~
191.H2300: 2300. Almost time for Iku's sleep time, isn't it?
191.NewYears 6547: Admiral? Have a Happy New Year, nano! Iku is gonna be counting on you again this year!
191.Setsubun 6547: It's Setsubun! Let's see, Iku and everyone's demon's is... it's Taigei! Target acquired! Surface depth for Setsubun battle! Fire~! Demons, begone! Ei, ei~!
191.Valentines 6547: Admiral? Iku did her very best to make this handmade chocolate! Try some of it! So...? Isn't it good? Mhm! There's still some more!
191.Valentines 1471: Admiral!? What's the matter!? You don't look so good... Eh? You ate too much chocolate? That's not good at all... I made some medicine-filled chocolate! Here, eat this!
191.Rainy 6547: Hasn't it been raining a lot lately? Iku is always underwater so she didn't really notice. So it's the rainy season.
191.Summer 6547: Summer is almost back! Eh? Admiral? You want to see me wear a different swimsuit? I'm okay with that, but... hmmm. I dunno what to do.
191.Fall 6547: Iku wants to shoot a whole lot of torpedoes this fall. At a carrier, or a carrier, or a carrier... but a battleship is fine, too!
191.Xmas 6547: Admiral? This cake is delicious! Give me more, more! Christmas puts Iku in a really good mood!

483.Intro: Hey, hey, hey! So you're the admiral! I'm the submarine, I-26, but you can call me Nimu! Nice to meet you!
483.Library: I'm an I-class from Kure! Hey, hey, hey, I just remembered something about me! Of course commerce raiding is my specialty, but I can also eat up heavy cruisers and aircraft carriers! Leave it to me!
483.Poke(1): Hmm? Did you call for me?
483.Poke(2): What, what, what? My turn? ...A commerce raid battle? Leave it to me, Admiral!
483.Poke(3): Eh? It's not Nina— it's Nimu. Admiral, make sure you remember my name properly, okay? Because I'm worth it!
483.Idle: Torpedoes loaded, fuel okaaay. Potatoes and onions, loaded up, loaded uuuup. Okay! Now I'll be ready when it's my turn!
483.Married: *whew* Today is all work, work! Hmm? Oh, oh? What's wrong, Admiral? What, what, what? You don't look so good. Okay! You can use my lap as a pillow and rest. Yup! Come, come, come!
483.Wedding: Admiral, what, what, what? You wanted me? ...Hm? What? That box and that face... Eh? Could it be? Could it be? Could it really be!? Hey, hey, hey! ...So it is! Thank you. I'm happy!
483.Ranking: What, what? You want to look over the intelligence? Okay.
483.Equip(1): Ah, this equipment is good. Thanks!
483.Equip(2): Hey, hey, hey, listen! This armament? It looks great! Yay!
483.Equip(3): It's here, it's here, it's here!
483.Docking(2): Sorry! I'm gonna take a long bath.
483.Construction: Hey, hey, hey! It's a new girl, you know?
483.Return: *whew* We came back! Everyone worked hard, and I worked hard, too!
483.Sortie: Flagship of the submarine squadron, I-26 Nimu. Setting sail!
483.Battle: Enemy ship spotted! Periscope depth... torpedoes armed... ready!
483.Yasen(1): I-26, commencing pursuit of enemy remnants. You-won't-get-away!
483.MVP: Eh? No way... I got the best results this time? I did it! Okay! What big fish should I eat next? Maybe an aircraft carrier? Admiral, look forward to it!
483.Damaged(1): Kyaaa...! Not good! Dive! Hurry up and dive!
483.Damaged(2): N-Nooooo! Water is... this is bad!
483.Damaged(3): Th-They got me...! Emergency blow! I'm not finished yet! Preparing for surface shelling!
483.Sunk: Th-They got me! Emergency blow! To the surface! ...Huh? I'm not rising...? I'm going to sink...? No way... no way...
483.NewYears 6547: Admiral, Happy New Year! The submarine fleet and I will be counting on you for another year!
483.Setsubun 6547: Hey, hey, hey! Ah, what, what? Ah, Setsubun? I get it now. So the demon for us submarines is... Ah, Taigei... That's so rough...
483.Fall 6547: Awww... summer is over. It's fall. This season is... ummmm... Ah, Fusou-san? Eh? Breakthrough training? Ah... ummmm... errr....
483.Saury 6547: *sniff sniff sniff* This smell... could it be saury? You're grilling saury? I wanna eat, wanna eat, wanna eat!
483.Xmas 6547: Ahh~ so this is that Christmas thing. Hey, hey, Saracchi, is Christmas where you come from even more amazing? Ah, I see. Hweh...

367.Intro: Hey, hey, hey! Admiral, how are you today? I'm submarine I-26, and I'm doing great, of course! Let's work together again today☆
367.H0000: It's now midnight. Admiral, I'll be keeping you company today. Aren't you happy?
367.H0100: It's 0100 nooooow! Ah! Was that too loud for this time of night? Sorry.
367.H0200: It's 0200 nooow. Is this a little better?
367.H0300: It's 0300 n- ...Ah, I don't need to use such a soft voice? Okay, got it.
367.H0400: It's 0400 nooow. Admiral, it's almost morning. I'm a little sleepy, but I'll pull through!
367.H0500: It's 0500 nooow. Look, look, look! Hey, the sunrise! Isn't it pretty? Admiral, the day is starting up.
367.H0600: It's 0600 nooow. Admiral, isn't it time for the morning call? Leave it to me! I'll wake everyone up. It's mooorning! Morning!
367.H0700: It's 0700 nooow. Admiral, I'll put your breakfast here, okay? It's steaming hot rice, miso soup and some pickled veggies. Hey, hey, is it good?
367.H0800: It's 0800 nooow. Okay, now that we're all full, want to sortie? What are we going to attack today? Heeey?
367.H0900: It's 0900 nooow. Ah, I see. A quest, right? I'll go check the quests, okay? Here I go!
367.H1000: It's 1000 nooow. Ah, aircraft carriers? Okay. Somehow I feel a sense of pride when I see them! Let's go! Want me to?
367.H1100: 1100. Ah! It's almost lunchtime! Admiral, I'll go make lunch, okay? Please wait!
367.H1200: 1200. It's time for luunch! Today's lunch is luxurious! Cooked white rice with canned beef, and also boiled dried vegetables!!! Okay, dig in!
367.H1300: It's 1300 nooow. Admiral, what did you think of lunch? Wasn't it luxurious? Wasn't it? Wasn't it? Yup, yup, yup!
367.H1400: 140... Ah, isn't that... isn't that girl a Lexington-class? Could it be Saracchi? Saracchi...?
367.H1500: It's 1500. Well, it wasn't really mistaken identity. Maybe more of a misunderstanding? She looked so similar. Oh well!
367.H1600: It's 1600 nooow. Admiral, what should we do? It's a tough battleground, but do you want to go patrolling the southern waters? Hey, hey, let's go?
367.H1700: It's 1700 nooow. Hey, hey, hey, look, look, look! Admiral, the sun is setting. Isn't it pretty? It almost feels like the fighting is a distant memory.
367.H1800: It's 1800 nooow. Okay, tonight's dinner will be super extra luxurious! It's my ultimate secret dish. Admiral, please look forward to it!
367.H1900: It's 1900 nooow. Admiral, look, look. Ta-daah! Dinner is the super extra luxurious, Nimu Special Curry! See, the potatoes are really big, right?
367.H2000: It's 2000 nooow. So, Admiral, after we finish washing up, want me to go on a night sortie? What will be my prey for tonight? Will they be there?
367.H2100: It's 2100 nooow. Let's get started with the night sortie! My torpedoes and everything are all ready, so let's go full power!
367.H2200: It's 2200 nooow. *whew* Tonight's work is all finished up. It went perfectly again tonight. Admiral, you were great, too!
367.H2300: 2300 nooow. Admiral, for today and every other day, thank you very, very much for your hard work. Tomorrow, let's work hard together again! Oh, oh!

127.Intro: Hello! I-58 here! You can call me Goya. I'm not bitter!
127.Library: I have fought hard from the beginning to the end. Even when the war had became harsh, I managed to take down that heavy cruiser! After fulfilling my mission and everything was all over, I managed to make it back safely to Kure, my home port.
127.Poke(1): Hello from beneath the sea! Goya here!
127.Poke(2): Phew! It's lovely good in the sea. Nothing begins unless I dive!
127.Poke(3): If it's armour, it has to be a school swimsuit! Look, it's efficiently smooth!
127.Married: Do your best with your KanColle study!
127.Wedding: Being with the admiral is so much fun! You know, there are lots of fish that only live in the south, they're worth seeing, yeah? This time, I'll take you there!
127.Ranking: Communication for the admiral? Lemme see!
127.Equip(2): Admiral, I don't really need this...
127.Construction: A new ship has been finished! Anyhow, it's an above-water ship, isn't it?
127.Battle: Wa~ I found a lot of scary things!
127.Yasen(2): Goya's torpedos - they're clever little things!
127.MVP: Goya, she did her best, yes? Eh? Chanpuru? I'm not a side dish, you know~
127.Damaged(3): My swimsuit, a functional beauty and designated by the admiral, is...
127.Sunk: Someday, Goya wants to dream of the day I met you all... diving deep....
127.H0200: 0200. Oh... There is something behind... Ah well, forget it.
127.H0700: 0700. If nothing else, eat some breakfast.
127.H0800: 0800. What kind of day will today be, I wonder?
127.H0900: 0900. 9 o'clock. Where are you taking 58 today?
127.H1000: A~dmiral. 1000. I'd like a new swimsuit soon~
127.H1100: 1100. A~dmiral~, I wanna try on this fluttery swimsuit too~
127.H1200: 1200~. After lunch, let's look at more swimsuits!
127.H1300: 1300. Ah, Admiral, why don't we take a nap?
127.H1900: 1900. I should study sometime... It's gotta be German, yeah?
127.H2100: 2100. Ice-cream for dessert is great, yeah? Mamiya-san, come o~n!
127.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun, dechi! Rising to Setsubun combat depth. Taigei spotted! Beans one through four... Fire!
127.Valentines 6547: Admiral, Admiral! This is for you, dechi! It's Goya's special Goya chocolate, dechi!
127.Valentines 1471: Admiral, Admiral! Did you finish your Goya chocolate yet? ...Eh, why not!? It's good, though! Hurry and eat it, dechi!
127.Rainy 6547: It's a season with a lot of rain, dechi! But! If I dive underwater... it doesn't matter anymore, dechi!
127.Summer 6547: Hello from beneath the sea! It's summer, dechi!! Is it time for Goya and the others to have their summer vacation, dechi? Admiral!? Where did you go!?
127.Fall 6547: It's fall, dechi! This is the season of delicious food, dechi. But if I eat too much... The swimsuit designated by the admiral might get too tight if I'm not careful, dechi.
127.Saury 6547: It's the saury festival, dechi! Sauries like to gather around where it's bright, so you should bring something that shines reaaally bright when you fish, dechi!

126.Intro: I'm I-168. What? It's hard to say? OK, just call me Imuya. Nice to meet you!
126.Library: I am a submarine born and raised in Kure. After that battle of Midway, I managed to land the final blow to Yorktown who defeated Hiryuu! Our carriers were avenged! I also worked hard running transport missions to that terrible island.
126.Poke(1): Commander, are you used to my name? It's I-Mu-Ya, you know?
126.Poke(2): I may be riding on a float right now, but I'm actually an amazing diver!
126.Poke(3): Ah, were you looking at me from behind? It's not like I'm playing with a smart phone or anything!
126.Idle: Commander, did you come to hate Imuya?
126.Married: Commander, let's take a break if you are tired.
126.Wedding: Commander, I can dive to about 100m. Won't you come dive with me this time? I, will guide you with all my strength. When this fight is over... it's a promise, okay?
126.Ranking: There seems to be a report addressed to the commander.
126.Join: It's time to deploy, I'll show you the power of a Kaidai-class submarine!
126.Equip(1): If it's the commander's desire, then this is alright too...?
126.Equip(2): No way, I keep getting stronger!
126.Docking(2): This wound is nothing serious! ...D...don't make it too sore...
126.Construction: A new ship has been created! I wonder what kind of ship it is?
126.Return: Operation complete! The fleet has returned.
126.Sortie: I'm gonna put some big holes in the enemies' hulls!
126.Attack: Load torpedoes from 1 to 4. Let's go get a win!
126.Yasen(1): The night is our world! I'll finish you!
126.Yasen(2): I'll approach stealthily, sinking you for certain.
126.MVP: I did it! You can rely on Imuya, the sniper of the sea! I'll even finish off aircraft carriers!
126.Sunk: Ahh, I wanted to bathe in the sun more... I've had enough of... the seabed...
126.H0100: 0100. Night-time. Will you be okay at school or work tomorrow?
126.H0300: 0300. Is it okay? You really don't have anything planned for tommorrow?
126.H0500: 0500. Eh, did you want to hear Imuya's voice?
126.H0600: 0600. Commander, it's morning before you knew it!
126.H0800: 0800. I'm pretty strong in the morning, you know!
126.H0900: 0900. Let's get to work let's get to work!
126.H1000: 1000. Let's go with all our strength until lunch!
126.H1100: 1100. If we work hard I'm sure there will be delicious lunch waiting for us!
126.H1300: 1300. Lunch with the commander, I'm really happy!
126.H1400: 1400. Well then, let's give it our best and sortie even in the afternoon!
126.H1500: 1500. The 3 o'clock you... the disaster of yours... it's somehow scary!
126.H1900: 1900. I can only make curry, is that okay? Alrighty, let's make it together! We can eat together in an hour!
126.H2000: 2000. Did you make the curry properly? Well then, let's eat together!
126.H2100: 2100. Somehow after eating dinner and getting full, I get sleepy...
126.H2300: 2300. Commander, thanks for another day's hard work!
126.NewYears 6547: Commander, have a Happy New Year! The Sniper of the Sea, Imuya, will be counting on you again this year!
126.Setsubun 6547: Ah... Year after year, Taigei-san gets pelted with beans... Ah- Ahhh... Look, see what I mean? I'm so sorry...! please don't cry.
126.Valentines 6547: Commander, this is Imuya's bridge-shaped, smartphone-sized chocolate! Here! Just so you know, Imuya made it herself! It was actually pretty hard work!
126.Valentines 1471: Commander, did you finish all of Imuya's chocolate? ...Eh, you used it as a decoration? That's not what it was meant for! Hurry up eat it, geez!
126.Anniversary 6547: Commander! It's the third anniversary, the third anniversary! So cool! Imuya is a bit surprised too. Please take care of me from now on, too!
126.Rainy 6547: It's been raining a lot recently, hasn't it? It's the rainy season, so it can't be helped. Ah, Iku! So you're making a teru teru bozu! Show me, show me! ...That's very unique.
126.Fall 6547: Goya... even though fall is a time for eating, if you eat that much, the beautiful and functional swimsuit designated by the admiral won't fit anymore, you know? Is that fine?
126.Saury 6547: So we're supporting the saury fishing! I'm not sure if us submarines are really the right choice, but... okay! Let's give this a try! I'll cheer them on! I can do that much!

155.Intro: Good day, Admiral. I'm I-401, the second ship in the special submarine series. Just call me Shioi.
155.Library: I'm I-401, the second ship in the I-400 submarine series. I'm a submarine carrier capable of making a round trip around the world, and carries 3 units of the special attack plane "Seiran". Yes, it's a secret strategic weapon... it's a secret, okay?
155.Poke(2): Can I dive yet? Can I dive yet?
155.Poke(3): Please don't touch my hangar tubes that much.
155.Idle: Umm... the canal, can we go to the canal?
155.Married: Hmm? What's up? Are you tired? Admiral, you shouldn't work so hard.
155.Wedding: Admiral... did.. I do well? Really? You're not lying? Well, that's great! Then, can I ask for a favour from the admiral? Yeah, just one... okay?
155.Ranking: Umm, here is the admiral and the fleet's information.
155.Equip(1): Ah, this is great, this is really great!
155.Equip(2): Hurray! I think this is a great modernization!
155.Supply: Ah, thank you! I'll use them wisely!
155.Docking(1): I'll go take a quick splash!
155.Docking(2): A nice long bath is fine too! Yeah!
155.Construction: Seems like a new girl has arrived. Wonder what she's like?
155.Return: Operation complete. The fleet has returned!
155.Sortie: It's showtime for the I-400 series!
155.Battle: Now... the battle for the I-400's begin here!
155.Yasen(1): Alright, let's go through another night!
155.Yasen(2): Seiran and oxygen torpedoes. These should work!
155.MVP: Ah, I did it? Hurray! The I-400's are good, after all.
155.Damaged(3): Guh, I got hit for a good one. I can still keep going, so don't underestimate me!
155.Sunk: I wonder if I ran wild enough this time round. A ship really sinks when they're sunk, huh. Bye bye.
155.H0000: 0000. Thank you for your hard work, Admiral.
155.H0100: 0100. I'm a bit sleepy... oh, I'm still awake.
155.H0200: 0200. Admiral, should you sleep now? Really? You're such a hard worker.
155.H0300: 0300. Admiral, I'm going to lie down a bit, okay? Zzz...
155.H0400: 0400. Mm, mmm... it's almost morning, huh... Oh well, let's keep going!
155.H0500: 0500. It's the morning! Ok-ay! Time to do my best, yeah!
155.H0600: 0600. Admiral, it's morning! The morning! Want to do a morning dive?
155.H0700: 0700. Let's have breakfast! What should I have? Mozuku, perhaps?
155.H0800: 0800. Admiral, was breakfast good? Good to hear!
155.H0900: 0900. It's almost time for a real operation now! What say?
155.H1000: 1000. Yeah. I don't really like destroyers and light cruisers equipped with anti-submarine equipment.
155.H1100: 1100. Admiral, it'll be noon soon. What would you like? For lunch, that is.
155.H1200: 1200. Woohoo! It's lunchtime! I wonder if I can send half the crew onshore...
155.H1300: 1300. The lunch was great, Admiral. Nothing beats curry at lunch.
155.H1400: 1400. I'm going for a short dive with a submarine-only fleet.
155.H1500: 1500. Admiral, the ranking have been updated. Do you wish to check?
155.H1600: 1600. Hmm... I am feeling a bit tired. Admiral, want to take a short rest?
155.H1700: 1700. It'll be evening soon. Phew, I sure am beat. What would you like for dinner?
155.H1800: 1800. Admiral, the sun has set already? Shall we call it a day?
155.H1900: 1900. Admiral, the night view here is great too. I really like it.
155.H2000: 2000. Let's have dinner now. I can't wait to find out what we're having!
155.H2100: 2100. Phew, this sure was a tiring day. Guess I'll sleep after maintaining my Seiran.
155.H2200: 2200. The night is getting deep. I've finished maintaining the Seiran, so why don't you take a rest?
155.H2300: 2300. Admiral, shouldn't you sleep now? Sleep is important, you know?
155.NewYears 6547: Admiral, please consider an operation that I would be perfect for. I'm serious. I'm begging you, okay!? Okay?

403.Intro: A good day to you, Admiral. It's the upgraded I-401, of the special submarine class.
403.Library: I'm I-401, the second ship in the I-400 submarine series. I'm a submarine carrier capable of making a round trip around the world, and carries 3 units of the special attack plane "Seiran". Yes, it's a secret tactical weapon... it's a secret, okay?
403.Poke(2): What is it? A dive? How about a dive?
403.Poke(3): I told you that the Seiran is a delicate plane... so stop touching it so much.
403.Ranking: Hmm? Admiral, going good? How is it?
403.Equip(1): Aah, so that's how it works... This'll do!
403.Equip(2): Yeah, yeah! This is great, this is really great!
403.Docking(2): The bath sure is nice... yep, it sure is!
403.Construction: Seems like there's a new girl. Wonder if it's a younger sister?
403.Return: And that's the operation! The fleet has returned!
403.Sortie: SSV I-400 class, commencing crash dive!
403.Battle: Okay! Time to start I-401's gallant battle!
403.Yasen(1): Fufu~n♪ You can't escape from the pursuit of I-400 class!
403.Yasen(2): The Seirans are my friends, after all.
403.MVP: Ah, I did it? Hurray! The I-400's are good, after all
403.Sunk: Uuu...I wonder if I ran wild enough this time round. A ship really sinks when they're sunk, huh. Bye bye.

163.Intro: Nice to meet you... Maruyu, reporting for duty. Huh? You haven't heard about it? ...Oh no...!
163.Library: Maruyu isn't from the Navy shipyards, so I don't have any friends from home. I'm a little different from everyone else... I mean, the first thing Kiso-san said to me was “What are you. Can you actually go underwater?”... I'm starting to wonder if Maruyu can survive out here…
163.Poke(1): Maruyu will be carrying your luggage. Yep, we'll be doing a mole run.
163.Poke(2): I-I shouldn't be afraid...of the Fleet Girls...you say?
163.Poke(3): No! Don't look at me like that, please!
163.Idle: Siiir… I get the feeling people are just looking at me from a distance… Why is that?
163.Married: Oh, are you tired? Why don't you relax with Maruyu?
163.Wedding: S..Sir. To care for Maruyu this much... Maruyu is touched! I'll keep on doing my best!
163.Join: Maruyu will be going along too.
163.Equip(2): I'm not going to let people call me a mole anymore!
163.Equip(3): Don't call me Moley. I'm Maruyu!
163.Supply: Now I can go back underwater!
163.Docking(1): I'll go take a bath... H-huh? My body's floating, why is that!?
163.Docking(2): Whew, I'm so tired… I'll just go take a nice bath and… Huh? N-No! I keep on sinking!
163.Construction: It's a new ship daughter. I wonder if we could be friends?
163.Return: The fleet seems to have returned.
163.Sortie: Maruyu can surely be of service!
163.MVP: Maruyu can be amazing too, you know! ...Wait, did someone just call me a mole?
163.Damaged(1): I see you managed to find me…!
163.Sunk: No... I don't want to go down... I don't want to...
163.H0000: 0000 hours. Sir, it's now time to rest.
163.H0100: 0100 hours. If you're staying up sir, so will I.
163.H0200: 0200 hours. Sir, I'll make sure I'll dive better tomorrow!
163.H0300: 0300 hours. How am I doing with everyone else? I… It's fine! Of course it's fine!
163.H0400: 0400 hours. You worry too much, sir.
163.H0500: 0500 hours. It's almost morning. I'll go wake everyone up.
163.H0600: 0600 hours. All the ships were already awake… Ha ha ha…
163.H0700: 0700 hours. Okay, Maruyu will off to the cafeteria.
163.H0800: 0800 hours. *Sigh* My eyes are red? That's… that's just because I didn't sleep properly last night... I think?
163.H0900: 0900 hours. Okay, sir! Let's switch the mood, and march on forward!
163.H1000: 1000 hours. I told you, I'm not sad!
163.H1100: 1100 hours. It's almost time for a fun lunch!
163.H1200: 1200 hours. Maruyu's going to go underwater for a bit. I'll see you after lunch!
163.H1300: 1300 hours. Hmm, today's swim went pretty well!
163.H1400: 1400 hours. Having a late lunch. Oh these? These are combat rations!
163.H1500: 1500 hours. Huh. I guess you have a lot of friends, sir.
163.H1600: 1600 hours. But Maruyu has you, so that's okay.
163.H1700: 1700. It's sunset. And Maruyu's all alone…
163.H1800: 1800. Huh!? You'd like me to cook, sir!? B-but, I'm not sure if I can do curry...
163.H1900: 1900. Oh, I don't know how to make curry… What I am going to do…
163.H2000: 2000. Oh… I-it's you! You're going to teach me? Oh, thank you so much!
163.H2100: 2100. Here is your curry, sir! Kiso-san taught me how!
163.H2200: 2200. That was good, wasn't it sir!
163.H2300: 2300. Sir, friends are nice, aren't they!
163.Anniversary 6547: Captain, congratulations on our third anniversary! I, Maruyu, will mogu mogu happily. I will do my best from now on.
163.Rainy 6547: Captain, the rain just keeps on pouring, doesn't it? I'll go fetch us an umbrella, ok? Eh? Did you ask what kind of umbrella I like? Hmm... ah! Yamato's umbrella! It's gorgeous. I love it!
163.Fall 6547: So it's fall? ...Captain, what is that? You're gathering dry leaves... Ah! You're going to bake sweet potatoes! Roger that! I'll do some mole runs for sweet potatoes.
163.Saury 6547: The fleet's gotten so hectic for some reason. They're completely lit up on their way to the northern sea. Kiso-san, what was that? *nod* *nod* ...So that's what's going on!
163.Xmas 6547: Captain, this poultry is really good! It would go really well in curry! Ah... I guess curry wouldn't make sense to have on Christmas, huh? Eh? It's okay!? Then I'll go make some of my Maruyu curry!

402.Intro: Sir, please let Maruyu keep working hard.
402.Library: Maruyu isn't from the Navy shipyards, so I don't have any friends from home. I'm a little different from everyone else… I mean, the first thing Kiso-san said to me was “What are you. Can you actually go underwater?”... I'm starting to wonder if Maruyu can survive out here...
402.Poke(1): Sir, don't you call me Mole-chan too!
402.Poke(3): I told you, It's not 'mole'! My name is Maruyu!
402.Ranking: Maruyu, delivering a communication to you sir. Otherwise known as “Mole-mail”… Huh?
402.Equip(1): I wonder if there's anyway to fix my slow speed…
402.Equip(2): So, um… Could I.. um, get a, um… “Seiran” too… oh…. never mind…
402.Supply: Now I can go underwater again!
402.Docking(1): Please give me a little rest.
402.Docking(2): U wa~a it's tattered, although it's the important swimsuit that I got from the captain...
402.Construction: I wonder if there'll be another Army girl coming...
402.Battle: Maruyu will transport it properly to the very end!
402.Attack: I can see you all the way round!
402.MVP: Maruyu can be amazing too, you know! …Wait, did someone just call me a mole?
402.Damaged(1): I see you managed to find me...!
402.Sunk: No... I don't want to go down... I don't want to...!

431.Intro:
Member of the German Navy, submarine U-511 here.
...Please call me Yuu.
I've come quite a long way... Please take care of me...
431.Library:
German Navy U-boat... submarine U-511 here...

...I worked hard to come here.

If I could be friends with everyone... and learn... about the culture here, I think it would... be nice...
431.Poke(2): I understand... this is... the greeting of this fleet, right? ...It's so different.
431.Poke(3): "When in Rome, do as the Romans do," they say, but... well... what should I do...?
431.Idle: Is Yuu... doing things wrong...? Is this okay...? I'm nervous... can I do this... properly...?
431.Married: (A-Admiral-) ...No, I mean... um... Admiral... as always... thank you... desu...
431.Wedding: Admiral... what is it...? This ring is... for Yuu...? ...Da... danke... T-That is... d-danke...!
431.Equip(2): Danke... Thank you... Was that right?
431.Equip(3): I feel like I've seen that ship before... am I imagining it...?
431.Docking(2): Let me rest a lot... Gute nacht...
431.MVP: Yuu is the best...? ...Danke. ...I understand. ...I'll try even harder.
431.Damaged(3): I got hurt... it's really bad... Yuu... wants to... resurface...
431.Sunk: Ugh... I can't resurface... my home... Maizuru... I want to see it... one more... time...
431.Anniversary 6547: Yuu is having fun today, too. Bismarck onee-san looks like she's having fun, too. But... I think I ate too much...
431.Xmas 6547: Yuu is having fun today, too. Bismarck onee-san looks like she's having fun, too. But... I think I ate too much...

334.Idle: (Adm-) ...Admiral? Is Yuu... doing this the... right way...? Oh... d-danke!

436.Intro: U-boat U-511, renamed to submarine RO-500. I was Yuu-chan, but now I'm Ro-chan. Admiral, I'll be in your care~!
436.Library:
I'm German Navy U-boat U-511, remodeled for operation by the Japanese Navy as submarine RO-500.

I was operated from my home port of Maizuru. I may not have seen actual battle, but I did actively train with an anti-sub fleet. Yup!
436.Poke(2): Yes, my Japanese is better now. I tried my best. Yup!
436.Poke(3): Um... Admiral? That's not really a greeting, is it? You can't do that, okay? Okay? Okay!?
436.Idle: Anti-sub fleet practice is okay, but... I want to go out and try live combat, too! Hey, Admiral...? Are you listening...? Uuu... no you're not!!
436.Married: Admiral, guten tag... ... ...Ah, this? Yeah, I tried baking Hacchan some... stollen. ...Want to try some? Okay♪
436.Wedding: Admiral, you called for Ro-chan? Eh...? What's this ring...? Da... danke! I mean... thank you. Admiral, our honeymoon should be in Maizuru, okay?
436.Ranking: Admiral, you want to see the situation report...? Understood!!!
436.Equip(1): Danke... no, I mean... Thank you very much! Hehehe... did I get it right?
436.Equip(2): "I'm so happy" is what to say! Danke! Danke!
436.Supply: These supplies will really help! Danke!
436.Docking(1): I'll rest for just a little bit.
436.Docking(2): It'd be nice if I could go to Maizuru's hot spring again. Admiral, I'd like it if you would take me there.
436.Construction: A new ship girl has arrived!
436.Return: The operation is completed. "Good work, everyone" is what to say!
436.Sortie: Submarine fleet, please follow Ro-chan. Fleet, move ooouuut!
436.Battle: Enemy ship sighted! Well, here I go! Fiiiiire!
436.Attack: Bismarck onee-san and Eugen-san may outclass me, but... Ro-chan will do her best!
436.Yasen(1): "Night" is what you call it! I'll do my best. Garuru~
436.Yasen(2): Fiiire... Fiiiiire! Oxygen torpedoes are... amazing!
436.MVP: Eh? Ro-chan is number one? "Danke" is what to say! I'm going to tell Hacchan!
436.Damaged(3): Gh... they got me... I'm still okay, but... I want to go baaack...!
436.Sunk: No... no way... cold... so cold... it's dark...
436.H0000: "Admiral, thanks for your hard work" is what to say! For today, I, Ro-chan, will serve as your secretary ship! I will be in your care!
436.H0200: Admiral! 0200! Huh...? Did I say it the wrong way...? Um... really? Uuu...
436.H0300: 0300, Admiral! Was that better this... time around? It was? Alright...!
436.H0400: 0400, Admiral! ... ...I'm getting a little sleepy, but... Ro-chan will do her best! Yes!
436.H0500: 0500, Admiral! Guten morgen! "Morning" is what you call it! "Morning!"
436.H0600: 0600. Everyone, wake up. Guten morgen♪ Guten morgen♪
436.H0700: 0700, Admiral. What should we have for breakfast? Are bread and cheese fine? Okay! Then let's... ea~-!
436.H0800: 0800, Admiral. Huh? Breakfast didn't fill you up? Uwaah... I'm so sorry, desu... Admiral... uuu...
436.H0900: 0900, Admiral! All the I-class submarines promised to go dive with me! I can't wait! ...Yup!
436.H1000: 1000. Ah... Hacchan! Yoohoo! Dechi and Iku, too— guten morgen! Huh...? Dechi... why are you mad? ...Eh?
436.H1100: 1100, Admiral. Diving with those I-class submarines is so fun! Yup!
436.H1200: 1200. What should we do for lunch, Admiral? "When in doubt, go find Mamiya"...? Okay!
436.H1300: 1300. ... ... ...Mamiyah's lunsh ihs elishious... ...Even Bismarck onee-san is gobbling it up... see?
436.H1400: 1400, Admiral. What should we do this afternoon? Orel? Or maybe Bashi? What should we do? What?
436.H1500: 1500. Ah... Max~! Where are you going? *nod* *nod* ...Take care!
436.H1600: 1600. Maruyuu! Yes, you♪ Maruyuu! Ah... why are you running away? ...Maruyuuu!?
436.H1700: 1700, Admiral. It's already pretty far into the evening.
436.H1800: 1800. It's dinner time, Admiral! Let's see, let's see... what should we have?
436.H1900: 1900. Lebe-chan, what's that? Kaltes essen!? Rye bread with sausage and ham??? It looks so good...! It's okay!?
436.H2000: 2000. Lebe-chan's dinner was really good! Admiral, Ro-chan is really full, too! Ehehe...
436.H2100: 2100, Admiral. What's that, what's that? It's not beer? Foam...? Uu... I can't see the difference... it just looks like beer...
436.H2200: 2200, Admiral! Anyway, do you want to try some real German beer? I'm pretty sure we have... ...There isn't any...
436.H2300: 2300. Admiral, thank you so much for your hard work today! Let's do our best tomorrow, too! Gute nacht.
436.Setsubun 6547: I heard it from Eugen-san. Setsuboon! It's an important tradition!
436.Anniversary 6547: Admiral, you did it! Today is a festival, right? Ro-chan is happy, too! Yup!
436.EarlySummer 6547: It's gotten hot. Admiral! You should a wear swimsuit, too. I want to see it!
436.Summer 6547: She said summer is here! She said we're going swimming! Splash! Splaaash! Shioi's the one who told me!
436.Xmas 6547: Frohe Weihnachten! Admiral, this turkey is delicious.

59.Intro: I'm Furutaka. I'll be happy to show how all the good points of heavy cruisers.
59.Library: Heavy cruiser, Furutaka. Selected by Vice Admiral Mikawa to be a member of the eighth fleet, I took out a lot of enemies at the first Battle of Solomon! This is what a heavy cruiser can do!
59.Poke(1): This is a really great unit, you know?
59.Poke(2): The next operation area's data, is it okay to show me?
59.Wedding: Admiral! How was the Heavy Cruiser team's performance? Did we make a difference? Awright, that's great! I'm so happy!
59.Ranking: Looks like there's a notice for you, Admiral.
59.Equip(1): With this night battles will be a cinch!
59.Equip(2): With Team Mikawa's comrades, I can boast.
59.Supply: Night battle will be easy with this.
59.Docking(1): My weapons need some repairs, yeah?
59.Docking(2): That last battle, I overdid it a bit, yeah?
59.Construction: A new ship has been constructed.
59.Sortie: Seize the enemy transport ships. Want to defeat them, right?
59.Yasen(1): I'm pretty good at night battles, you know!
59.MVP: We only stood out by chance. That's what being a heavy cruiser is about.
59.Damaged(3): Ah, they got me... I'm not sunk yet!
59.NewYears 6547: Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! I'll do my best to show you all the good points of heavy cruisers again this year!
59.Valentines 6547: Admiral? H-Here, please accept this! Th-Thank you very much!
59.Anniversary 6547: Today is a wonderful day, Admiral! Furutaka is honored to be with you! Thanks as always!
59.EarlySummer 6547: Summer is really coming along this year, isn't it? I wonder where a good place would be to buy a new swimsuit with Kako.
59.Fall 6547: At this time of year, the naval base calms a bit down and the atmosphere is a little laid back, isn't it? Fall kinda gets me into a strange mood.
59.Xmas 6547: Admiral, Merry Christmas! To be able to spend this time of year together with you... I feel so happy!
59.YearsEnd 6547: Another year is already ending. Admiral, I'll clean up the room, so just leave it to me!

262.Idle: The admiral's, busy... uh... what to do...? I wonder what's Kako doing?... Admiral, what should Furutaka do!?
262.Married: Admiral? The good points of a heavy cruiser... have you come to a better understanding of them? Really? Then, then that's great! I'm glad!
262.Supply: Supply is important. This is welcome.

416.Intro: I'm Furutaka! I'm a little small for a heavy cruiser but... Heavy cruiser Furutaka will do her best today too!
416.Poke(2): Aoba? Would you sto... Ah, it was you Admiral, g, good work!
416.Poke(3): A~o~ba~! ...Ah, it's you again Admiral? Sorry, I thought it was Aoba again...
416.Ranking: Admiral, information analysis is important, isn't it.
416.Damaged(1): E, enemy radar guided attack!? N, not yet...!
416.Damaged(2): I-I've been hit... I, can still fire!

60.Intro: Second Furutaka Class Heavy Cruiser, name's Kako! Nice to meetcha!
60.Library: I'm the Second Furutaka Class Heavy Cruiser, Kako. I achieved quite a feat during the Battle of Savo Islands! Ah, the way back? Well, the verse "Going in is easy, but returning is scary" was no joke!
60.Poke(2): Strategy meeting? I'll just ask Furutaka about it later, can I not do that?
60.Poke(3): Yeah, yeah! I hear ya! Now stop pulling my skirt!
60.Wedding: Aaaahhhh, another scolding, yeah? Sorry for my carelessness, yeah? Wha- that's not it? Admiral… why is your face red?
60.Ranking: A letter for the admiral... I'm awake, I'm awake!
60.Equip(1): Woah, I'm wide awake now. I can feel the energy from this!
60.Equip(2): Somehow, I feel cooler now, hehe
60.Supply: Whoa, I feel awake. The power is surging!
60.Docking(1): Stop it...so sluggish...the fitting...ah, forget it...
60.Docking(2): Aah, I'm seriously gonna die...let me pass out in bed!
60.Construction: Got a report that a new ship is do~ne.
60.Return: The sortie's done, here's the report... *snore*
60.Sortie: Kako, ready to sortie! Furutaka, you're coming too.
60.MVP: See, I can really do it if I try! So, when I get back, let me sleep a bunch!
60.Damaged(1): Damn, and we were just about to leave!
60.Damaged(2): The gun battery has blown off!?
60.Damaged(3): Youuu! You perverted son of a bitch!
60.Sunk: Yeah, Furutaka always scolded me for getting carried away too much...
60.NewYears 6547: Best wishes and Happy New Year~! Admiral, let's power through another year!
60.Valentines 6547: Hm? Well, what was it...? That chocolate thing? I kinda did end up making some... Here.
60.Anniversary 6547: To be able to spend such a day with the admiral— I'm happy!
60.EarlySummer 6547: Finally, it's gotten hot out, hasn't it? Summer is coming, isn't it? Ehehehe. That's great. Summer. Awesome!
60.Summer 6547: Great! Summer has arrived! Alright, I'm gonna take lots of naps! Ehh... I can't?
60.YearsEnd 6547: Kuh... it's already the end of the year? That was fast... ...Can we... just do the cleaning next year? ...Hey?

263.Idle: Zzzzzzz... Zzzzzz... Zzzzzzz... Zzzzzz... Zzzz... Nya... mfufufu. Whoa! I'm not sleeping! I was awake, I was.
263.Married: What's up, Admiral. Why the red face? Hm? That's lack of sleep! Alright. I'll take a nap with you. I bet you'll have a wonderful dream!
263.Supply: Torpedoes and ammunitions, Load them up well. Ah, don't forget the fuel too, okay?
263.Damaged(2): What!? A sub? Not good, not good!
263.Sunk: Yeah, Furutaka always scolded me for getting carried away too much...

417.Intro: Second Furutaka Class Heavy Cruiser, name's Kako! Ah, you know, hello again!
417.Ranking: Admiral... when you see stuff like these... don't you get drowsy? I... zzz... zzz...
417.Join: Haha! Alright. I guess it's my turn. Let's go!
417.Damaged(1): Ow! I ain't just gonna take that. Here goes the Kako Special!

61.Intro: Hi, thanks for your time, I'm Aoba! Please can I have some words!
61.Library: I'm Aoba. Advancing into the Truk Islands area, I supported the Pacific Front. With a war correspondent on board, the staff also had reporting as part of their job. At my last moment, I was at Kure. Even without fuel, I did my best!
61.Poke(3): Are you interested? I've got some good news, you know?
61.Wedding: Aoba, all she really wants to do is look at the commander rather than the enemy… J-just kidding!
61.Ranking: Some news? What is it, what is iiiit?
61.Equip(1): Okay! I can work better now!
61.Equip(2): This'll let me do so much more reporting... ah, no, make fighting easer.
61.Supply: Okay! I can work better now!
61.Docking(2): I seem to have gotten too deeply in the matter.
61.Construction: According to the data, there seems to be a new ship launching, yeah?
61.Return: The fleet's back, could I have an interview?
61.Attack: The enemy still hasn't noticed us!
61.Yasen(2): Searching, barrages, torpedoes - leave them all to me!
61.MVP: Happy to be of service, thanks again.
61.Damaged(3): Firepower... Is firepower just not enough, I wonder...
61.Sunk: Sunk, huh... I wanted to sink at Kure....
61.NewYears 6547: Hello and Happy New Year! This is Aoba! Thank you for your cooperation in another year of interview coverage!
61.Valentines 6547: Commander, sorry to intrude! I'd like you to have some of my chocolate! ...Ah, nice face. Don't mind if I do!
61.Valentines 1471: Eh? The picture just now? Ah, I took it for the fleet newspaper... Eh? I can't? Waah!
61.Rainy 6547: Oh, Gassa! That dejected expression of yours looks nice. Yoink! Huh? Hey, give me my camera back! Why are you taking pics of me!? Ones of me are no good!
61.EarlySummer 6547: It's getting hotter and hotter. So summer is coming back for the year. This season reminds me a little of the last summer at Kure.
61.Summer 6547: Oh...! It's the middle of summer! So many ship girls are out wearing fashionable swimsuits...! Great, huh? How flashy! Eh, 'Gasa? Ah, I should, too? No, I'm good...!
61.Fall 6547: Somehow it's fall already, isn't it~ Fall is the season for tasty food. Well, isn't that great~
61.Saury 6547: Saury fishing is now in full swing! I'm here providing coverage of the saury fishing support fleet. Aoba, sortieing- no, providing coverage!
61.Xmas 6547: Uwawawa... you're right! This turkey stuff is really good, Commander! Eh? "Watch the skies"? Wha... what is this? Why are friendly planes...!?

123.Intro: Ye~s, It's Miss Kinugasa's debut! Together with Aoba, take good care of me!
123.Library: First to have a catapult equipped, Miss Kinugasa! Great to meet you. I performed magnificently in the capture of Wake Island and the Battle of the Coral Sea, and even the Solomon's Ironbottom Sound! But... planes, you know? I'm not really a fan...
123.Poke(2): Let get to work today too!
123.Poke(3): If you keep touching me, I'll touch you back~ Hey hey!
123.Idle: Oi! Ooi! Oh, you're not Ooi? Ah, he glared at me.
123.Wedding: Admiral, so that I can protect you, I'm gonna get stronger and stronger! But, if it get dangerous, you have to promise to get away, okay? I don't want to lose someone important to me.
123.Ranking: Hm-hmm~ How's it? May I look?
123.Equip(2): Hey! Don't be watching me modernise!
123.Docking(2): Ow-w-w~ Aoba's going to laugh at me again~!
123.Construction: A new ships built! So fast~
123.Battle: Naval battle! I'm gonna start, yeah?
123.MVP: Hm-hmm, isn't Miss Kinugasa the strongest! When we get back, I'm gonna boast about it to Aoba!
123.Damaged(2): Hawawa! The bridge is looking bad!
123.Damaged(3): Geh! Direct hit!? ... Admiral.. erm... could you not look?
123.H0000: It's midnight. Miss Kinugasa's sound asleep. Zzzz...
123.H0100: ...nya~ It's 1 A.M.? Not going to sleep?
123.H0300: It's 3 A.M. Hey? Just when will you go to bed?
123.H0400: It's 4 A.M.! So it's come to this... Just do it! All-nighter!
123.H0500: 5 A.M! The weather report's starting, you know?
123.H0700: 7 A.M, somehow, the world's in such a rush now.
123.H0800: 8 A.M, how about watching the morning soaps?
123.H0900: 9 A.M. You done the daily quests?
123.H1000: It's 10 A.M. Won't you redecorate the room soon?
123.H1100: 11 A.M. Oh, there's such a nice smell coming from the mess~
123.H1200: Beep-beep-beep-pom~! 12 midday, time for lunch! My lunch is curry! What are yo~u having?
123.H1300: 1 P.M, how about taking a siesta? Zzz...zzz...
123.H1400: It's 2 P.M. Admiral, work hard this afternoon too!
123.H1600: 4 P.M., it's almost evening, isn't it~
123.H1700: 5 in the evening! What are you doing 'After Five'? Eh? People don't use that anymore?
123.H1900: 7 P.M, I'm having dinner~ Still curry!?
123.H2000: 8 P.M. Now then, it's getting heavier, yeah? Ah, I'm not talking about my weight, yeah?
123.H2100: 9 P.M, oh? Someone's coming. Ah! It's Aoba! Good work today!
123.H2200: 10 P.M, Aoba, I heard that she did some reporting. She can be both a reporter and a warship~
123.H2300: 11 P.M. Admiral? It's about time for bed, you know? ...eh? Your best performance starts now? Aren't you energetic~
123.Setsubun 6547: Admiral, how've you been? Is that so? You can just leave this Setsubun up to me! Ei!
123.Valentines 6547: Here! It's my specialty, heart-shaped chocolate! Savor it when you eat it, okay?
123.Valentines 1471: About my special heart-shaped chocolate— have you tried some? Mm... so, how's the flavor? Oh...? That's a relief!
123.Rainy 6547: Hmm, somehow these rainy days make me feel down. Ah? Ugh! Now's not the time to take pics of me, Aoba! How about I take some of you instead!
123.Summer 6547: Aoba, it's getting hot. Summer is on the way, huh... eh? A swimsuit? Hmmm, what should I do? Hmmmm.
123.Fall 6547: Fall, huh? This time of year is just a little... I don't really like it, ya know? I feel like I have to watch the skies. Maybe I'm worrying too much? Ahahaha...
123.Saury 6547: It's saury fishing season! Alright, even I, Miss Kinugasa, shall be lending a hand! Searchlights and lookouts are in place!
123.Cold 6547: *whew* I feel like I've overcome something again this year. *sigh* ...Alright! Mood change! Time to face the end of the year at full sail!
123.Xmas 6547: Merry Christmas! Admiral, are you having fun? ...Are you okay? It's a stomachache, isn't it? Should I bring you some stomach medicine? Hold on!

142.Poke(1): Are you ok? You're not tired?

62.Intro: I am Myoukou, of the Myoukou-class Heavy Cruisers. Let us work on this together.
62.Library: A heavy cruiser built under the auspices of the Washington Naval Treaty. I'm a first-class warship of the Japanese Navy designed by Yuzuru Hiraga. This name has also been passed on to Aegis destroyers of the modern MSDF.
62.Poke(1): Admiral. Did you call for me?
62.Poke(2): Is there... something I can help you with?
62.Poke(3): If its something difficult to say, shall we talk over there?
62.Married: If the admiral falls, I...please at least rest a bit when you are tired. It is Myoukou's wish.
62.Wedding: I greatly respect the admiral's fabulous strategy and tactics, and always shall.
62.Ranking: It looks like there is a message for you from Command.
62.Equip(1): Looks like I'm getting even more stronger.
62.Equip(2): Oh my. I'm getting stronger and stronger. What should I do?
62.Supply: Looks like I'm getting even more stronger.
62.Docking(2): Are you sure that someone like myself would be allowed to rest?
62.Construction: Oh, I'll go greet our new addition.
62.Return: The fleet has returned. With wonderful results!
62.Sortie: We must not stand down from this battle!
62.Yasen(1): Then there's no other choice... Moving to pursue!
62.MVP: It's all thanks to everyone's hard work. Do commend them, would you please?
62.Damaged(3): What else... can I possibly do...?
62.Sunk: See you... in another life... good bye.
62.Setsubun 6547: It's Setsubun. Here, these beans are for you. Demons, begone! ...Ufufu♪ How exciting!
62.Valentines 6547: Admiral, um... If it's okay with you, would you please accept these? ...Ah, these are from... me...
62.Anniversary 6547: Admiral, I would like to show my appreciation for your spending time with I, Myoukou, on this important occasion.
62.Rainy 6547: The wet time of year— the rainy season. Even the sound of raindrops... when you close your eyes and listen.... it calms the mind, don't you think?
62.Summer 6547: It has gotten quite hot. It must be summer. Ah, Takao! You're cheerful as always. Eh? A swimsuit, you say?
62.Fall 6547: Autumn. In some respects, it's a lonely season. Still, it's perfect for reading, isn't it? Admiral, what will you be reading?
62.Xmas 6547: Admiral? Merry Christmas! I gave baking a cake a try. Please have some if you'd like.

265.Idle: The admiral seems very busy... In that case, I should do everything I can at hand, so that the admiral may call on me whenever I'm needed.
265.H0000: 0000 hours at night. It's already this late. The day goes fast, doesn't it Admiral?
265.H0100: 0100 hours. Admiral, pushing yourself too hard might be tough on your health.
265.H0200: 0200 hours. This Myoukou will look over the remainder, okay? Admi-... Oh...
265.H0300: 0300 hours. No, I was just taken by surprise when you put the blanket over me.
265.H0400: 0400 hours. Admiral, what should I do with this? Oh? Admiral, are you sleeping?
265.H0500: 0500 hours. I better take care of everything while the admiral's asleep.
265.H0600: 0600 hours. Hngh... It's morning. The admiral's job certainly is a tough one. Oh, a visitor?
265.H0700: 0700 hours. Coming! Oh, Ashigara, what's wrong? You look surprised?
265.H0800: 0800 ho-... Ah, good morning. Ashigara was here just... Admiral? You don't look so good.
265.H0900: 0900 hours. (Sigh) ...Admiral? You forgot your appointment with Ashigara for a discussion over breakfast, didn't you.
265.H1000: 1000 hours. Goodness. I'll make sure to apologize to her in your stead. By the way, about this document...
265.H1100: 1100 hours. Yes, I suppose we'll have an early lunch while we work.
265.H1200: 1200 hou- Oh... another visitor? Come in! Eh-... Haguro? Why are you so teary!? Ah, don't leave!
265.H1300: 1300 hours. Admiral, I see why you're so troubled... Very well. We'll chat after our work.
265.H1400: 1400 hours. Admiral, I don't mean to scold, but can we talk for a minute?
265.H1500: 1500 hours. Admiral, we'll leave out the fact that you're forgetful. But promises are things that are meant to be kept.
265.H1600: 1600 hours. All the girls look forward to seeing you. And forgetting that is... Are you listening to me!
265.H1700: 1700 hours. Now you have plans for dinner with someone as well, don't you?
265.H1800: 1800 hours. Wha-... You want me to make curry tonight? Okay... Very well.
265.H1900: 1900 hours. Here's Myoukou's Special Curry. The meat has been glazed with brandy, and...
265.H2000: 2000 hours. Well then, I'll go patrol the base perimeters. ...Admiral?
265.H2100: 2100 hours. I suppose all the Kanmusus love the admiral anyway. (Giggle)
265.H2200: 2200 hours. Everything is quiet on the base! Oh. Nachi? Where are you going with that bottle of sake?
