265.H2300: 2300 hours. Hmm? You had plans to drink with the admiral? (Sigh) Goodness... Admiral, you are unbelievable...

319.Intro: Myoukou-class Heavy Cruiser, Myoukou. Let's do our best together until the end.
319.Poke(3): If it's rather difficult to say, let's move over to the room over there... shall we?
319.Equip(1): Thank you very much for the equipment switch.
319.Equip(2): With this, it feels like I can fight to the end!
319.Supply: Thank you very much for the equipment switch.
319.Sortie: This Myoukou, for the sake of my sisters, is prepared to fight to the bitter end!

63.Intro: You are my commander? I'm Nachi. I appreciate your contribution.
63.Library: Born at the Kure Naval Yards. I am the second of the Myoukou Heavy Cruisers, who was the guardian of Shanghai. I was rushed out to the Pacific front as a flagship of the fifth fleet. Carrier-based planes? Ah, I'm a bit bad with those.
63.Poke(2): What? Do you have a plan?
63.Poke(3): Hmm? What's that you're doing? What kind of tactic is that?
63.Married: You, how are you doing? ...I see, it relieves me. We can sortie more together!
63.Wedding: Hey you… Somehow… I don't hate you…. Yeah, as long as I am with you, I can promise more great victories. Definitely.
63.Equip(2): Hmm, where did you get the blueprints for this remodeling?
63.Docking(1): Looks like I won't be appearing on the front lines for now, huh.
63.Docking(2): Apologies, but let me rest. Recess is part of a battle too.
63.Construction: Looks like a new ship has been launched. Looking forward to it.
63.Return: The report for the battle results is in. Want to hear about it?
63.Sortie: Let's go! Those who afraid just stay where you are!
63.Attack: Enemy to starboard! Take aim carefully!
63.Yasen(1): We will avenge our friends! Pursue them!
63.Yasen(2): One more time... This will be the critical hit!
63.MVP: I can't be getting all excited about this victory now.. we can't let our guard down yet. Nonetheless, tonight let's drink the night away!
63.Damaged(3): A wound like this... It's nothing...
63.Sunk: This is my end, huh... That's acceptable... Fare... thee... well...
63.NewYears 6547: Admiral, Happy New Year! I'll be cruising the seas together with you again this year. Alright, first we have to liven things up!
63.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun, huh? Well, just for today, why not try having Ponshu? Ashigara, Admiral, what do you think?
63.Valentines 6547: I'm not... all that great... with this kind of thing, but... this stuff has a bit of alcohol in it. Here.
63.Anniversary 6547: Ah, that's right. Today is a special day. Then I shall drink the night away. Of course, with you.
63.Summer 6547: Summer, huh? It's a bit hot, but it isn't unbearable. Well, why don't we open a bottle to rid ourselves of the heat!
63.Fall 6547: When this season comes around, for some reason, I start to get a little lonely. That's so unlike me, huh?
63.Xmas 6547: Christmas... huh... doesn't sound too bad. Tonight we'll be drinking all the way into the morning! Yes, indeed. Not bad at all!

266.Idle: No, I'm not bored. In fact i'm enjoying myself looking at what you're doing.
266.Supply: Supply? I really appreciate it to you.

192.Intro: You're.. still on combat duty? Alright, this Nachi will again, go on the battlefields with you!
192.Poke(2): Mm.. Well then, how about we drink some sake together tonight?
192.Docking(1): I'll rest for a bit, but is Ashigara alright?
192.Battle: Now, witness my very own war!
192.Yasen(1): Alright, we'll sweep up the remnants of the enemy in one go! Nachi squadron, charge!

64.Intro:
Ashigara here. My specialty is surface combat.
Fufu♪ Nice to meet you.
64.Library:
I, Ashigara, am the one who participated in the British Fleet Review.

I was acknowledged as the "Hungry Wolf". Of course I was, with this fearless body!

...Eh? It was a sarcastic remark that has nothing to do with sensuality? That kind of meaning is... There's no way...!
64.Poke(1): What's the matter? Did something happen?
64.Poke(2): What is it? Is it a sortie?
64.Poke(3): P-Please keep your hands to yourself. I can maintain my own equipment.
64.Married: Are you alright? Don't push yourself too hard, okay? Whether it's a rendezvous or a battle, the beginning is the most crucial part! Always face them in top condition!
64.Wedding: To have drawn out the full extent of my abilities... You are... ...I see. You're the first one to have done it!
64.Ranking: You have a message. What's it say?
64.Join: A sortie! The battleground is... Victory is calling out to me!
64.Equip(1): This moment when I become stronger... it's my favorite part!
64.Equip(2): It's magnificent! I can feel the power! Hey, you'll let me fire a test shot, won't you!?
64.Supply: This moment when I become stronger... it's my favorite part!
64.Docking(1): Are you saying my next battle makes you uneasy?
64.Docking(2): Well, you need proper rest if you want to be able to seize victory. Understood! I'll take a break.
64.Construction: Looks like a new girl has arrived. Let's go meet her.
64.Return: The fleet has returned. Looks like the operation is over.
64.Sortie: Ashigara, now sortieing! Look forward to the report of our victory and the results!
64.Battle: Flank speed! Ready the cannons! Aim! Fire!
64.Attack: Lay down a barrage! Fire! Fiiire!
64.Yasen(1): Now, the second act! All ships, charge!
64.Yasen(2): My ten cannons aren't just for show!
64.MVP: This is because I, Ashigara, am here! It's the natural outcome, you know. A major victory!
64.Damaged(3): Damn it... for me to have taken this much damage...
64.Sunk: Victory was the only... the only thing I took pride in...
64.NewYears 6547: Happy New Year, Admiral. I'll score a crushing victory again this year. Yeah, absolutely! I'll do it!
64.Setsubun 6547: Bean-throwing? That's fine, but try not to throw any at Myoukou-neesan on accident. ...Ah...!
64.Valentines 6547: So then, go ahead and take it. This is my Victory Chocolate! If you eat it, victory is assured! Come on!
64.Anniversary 6547: Oh my, today is an important occasion for us. And it's a good day to deep fry some Katsus. Right?
64.Summer 6547: Summer is on the way, isn't it? I have a good feeling. This is my year!
64.Fall 6547: Fall is a lonely season. Alright! At times like this, we need the victory cutlet curry! Alriight! I'll make some!
64.Xmas 6547: Merry Christmas! Tonight's main dish will naturally be cutlets! Victory on Christmas Eve. That's right!

267.Idle: When is the next operation!? Hey, where's the next operation going to be!? Victory is... battle is... conflict is calling out to me!!!
267.H0000: Midnight. The date has changed. I, and also the naval base, will be starting up for real from here on!
267.H0100: 0100. The senses are sharper late at night. It's the best...
267.H0200: 0200. Alright~! Image training for the sake of victory! Good night~♪
267.H0300: 0300. zzZZzz... ... ...! Watch out, Admiral! Here, I'll... zzZZzz...
267.H0400: 0400... (...) ...I can take you... all on by myself...! ... ...You're all bark and no bi... ...zzZZzz...
267.H0500: 0500... (...) ...Is there no one with a little... more backbone... The unassailable Ashigara w... ...zzZZzz...
267.H0600: 0600... ...Ah! Huh!? The admiral's gone? Admiral, where are you? Maybe in the next room...?
267.H0700: 0700. Whoa, you surprised me...! Admiral, why are you with Myoukou nee-san!?
267.H0800: 0800. I'm surprisingly hungry. Mamiya-san, a Victory Set, please~!
267.H0900: 0900. Admiral, it goes without saying that breakfast has to be from Mamiya-san's! So good~♪
267.H1000: 1000. It's about time to sortie and score a victory! Heavy Cruiser Division, let's go!
267.H1100: 1100. A heavy cruiser is absolutely the best, you know... with a lupine frame like this! Right!?
267.H1200: 1200. Admiral, lunch is a cutlet sandwich. Naturally— "victory". This is my good luck charm!
267.H1300: 1300! Now, let's get nothing but wins here in the afternoon as well! Victory, here we go!
267.H1400: 1400. So my training wasn't enough... Just like Myoukou nee-san, I've got to get stronger and stronger!
267.H1500: 1500. Myoukou nee-san is incredibly strong. She doesn't look like it at first glance, but she's actually really scary...
267.H1600: 1600. Furthermore... one time when she got fired up, her lecture just went on and on! Eh? You already knew?
267.H1700: 1700. It's about time for everyone on the long expedition to return. How successful will it be?
267.H1800: 1800. Well then, I, secretary ship Ashigara, shall make curry for our victory celebration!
267.H1900: 1900. Okay! Keep the oil coming~! I'll fry them one by one~!
267.H2000: 2000. More than one hundred cutlets... What a sight to behold... This is great! It's going to come true!
267.H2100: 2100. Eh...!? My cutlet curry caused repeated cases of heartburn!? H-How could this happen!?
267.H2200: 2200. Admiral, you don't need to console me or anything... It's so strange... What went wrong?
267.H2300: 2300! Alright~! Mood change complete! I'll do my best again for tonight's battle image training!

193.Intro: Heavy cruiser Ashigara here. If there's surface combat, leave it to me! Let's seize victory together!
193.Poke(1): I, Ashigara, shall have my turn. Ufufu♪
193.Poke(3): Like I said, I can take care of my own equipment- ...Eh? I misunderstood? W-What? Then what is it!?
193.Equip(2): This is great... I can feel my power rising...! Hey! It goes without saying that you'll let me fire a test shot, right!?
193.Construction:
A new girl, huh? ...She's a rival. A rival!
Bring it on♪
193.Sortie: Ashigara, now sortieing! You can rest assured that you'll see the report of our victory and the results!
193.Yasen(1): I can't just return like this...! Charge! Charge~!

65.Intro: I'm Haguro. I'm the youngest of the Myoukou-class heavy cruiser sisters. U-um... I'm sorry!
65.Library: I was born in Nagasaki. I participated in many battles, in the Battle of the Java Sea, the Battle of the Coral Sea, the Battle of Midway, the Battle of the Eastern Solomons, and the Battle of the Philippine Sea. Um... I try my best!
65.Poke(3): Um... excuse me... Is this some new way of communication?
65.Married: Commander… I hope this war will be over and the sea will get quiet. I pray for it. Commander… you will surely…
65.Wedding: After this battle is over… T-together with the commander..! Erm.. Ummm.. Errrmm…
65.Join: Picking even me... I'll try my absolute best!
65.Equip(1): I... don't need to receive this kind of strength...
65.Equip(2): Um... could you remodel the others too?
65.Supply: I... don't need to receive this kind of strength...
65.Docking(1): The other girls should go first.
65.Docking(2): Okay. Any more and I would have sunk instantly back there.
65.Construction: It seems a new comrade has been launched.
65.Return: The battle is complete... Um... Just reporting...
65.Attack: Guns and torpedoes engaged, I hope this is enough...
65.MVP: As it is, it would be better if all the fighting could end.
65.Sunk: The other girls, could they manage to hold on... Ah, no more, I can't see any more...
65.NewYears 6547: Best wishes for the coming year! I'll be counting... on you... again this year...!
65.Setsubun 6547: Commander-san, it's Setsubun. Umm... you would like me to be the demon? Eh...? But that's...
65.Valentines 6547: U-Um...! Commander-san! Th-This chocolate... I-If it's okay with you, please accept it!
65.Anniversary 6547: C-Commander, sir... today is anniversary day, right? I am so happy... Happy indeed. Yes.
65.Summer 6547: It's summer, isn't it? ...Huh? "Aren't you going to swim," you asked? Well, I don't have a swimsuit... u-um... eh... ehhhh!?
65.Fall 6547: Fall is... so peaceful, isn't it? I really enjoy this season. Commander, what about you?
65.Xmas 6547: Commander... Merry Christmas! U-Um... It's a present... please take it if it's okay... Um...

268.Idle: E, excuse me, Commander…? Haguro is waiting for you here in case of trouble...

194.Intro: Fourth ship of the Myoukou-class heavy cruisers, Haguro. Together with everyone, I will support the front lines!
194.Poke(2): Commander? ... It's all right, I'm good!
194.Join: Haguro of The Fifth Squadron, heading out!
194.Equip(1): I will cherish the equipment I've received.
194.Equip(2): Please remodel... the other girls first.
194.Supply: I… I'm receiving it, thank you.
194.Attack: Even if there are five times the enemies...I will fight them all!
194.Damaged(2): I'm hit...second turret!?...I can still continue!

66.Intro: Hello. I'm Takao. I'm glad that you seem like an excellent Admiral.
66.Library: When it comes to heavy cruisers, there's no questioning it— my Takao-class is on top. As a member of Vice-Admiral Kondo's Fourth Division, I participated in many naval battles. Those terribly fierce battles concluded with a struggle to defend Singapore.
66.Poke(1): Feel free to ask me anything.
66.Poke(2): If something is on your mind, won't you please tell me?
66.Poke(3): Well, um... what should I do?
66.Idle: Alriiight, the preparations for the sortie are finished... that aside... I wonder if Atago is working properly... Oh? Admiral? Fufu♪ ...It's fine.
66.Married: Admiral, I'm right here with you... so rest easy.
66.Wedding: These words of praise... perhaps you could express them in a clearer way... not a medal, but...
66.Ranking: What's this? A message has arrived.
66.Equip(1): What is this...? For such potential to be released from within me... what a wonderful feeling.
66.Equip(2): This power... is all thanks to you.
66.Supply: Thanks for the food. Now I can go back out there.
66.Docking(1): Let's watch over those girls from here!
66.Docking(2): To be forced to rest... even though I can still fight...
66.Construction: It's a new comrade. Let's give her a warm welcome!
66.Return: Operation complete! The fleet has returned!
66.Attack: Strike at enemy ship on the starboard side!
66.Yasen(2): Nuts. That is all I have to say to you!
66.MVP: Admiral, were you watching my performance?
66.Damaged(3): W-What? Did you think you could win that way!?
66.Sunk: I'm... sinking, huh...? Good bye... Admiral...
66.NewYears 6547: Best wishes for the coming year! The Takao-class heavy cruisers of the Fourth Cruiser Division will be counting on you again this year! Now, shall we make our shrine visit?
66.Setsubun 6547: Atago, you're supposed to eat an amount of beans equal to your age. Eh? You don't want any? I see... Ah, Myoukou-san! Eh? Be the demon!? ...I'd rather not... ...Ehh?
66.Valentines 6547: Alright! With this, it's finished! Fufu... I wonder if they will like it? Ufufu...
66.Valentines 1471: Ah... um...! If you... would like to... please have these! Ah, yes... I made them... myself.
66.Rainy 6547: It's been raining a lot lately, hasn't it? I tell you, this surely is the rainy season! Ah, I-I'm sorry.
66.EarlySummer 6547: Hgnnn... Summer is coming soon. Eh? Ah, well, maybe for a bit, I'll go on a diet. Hgnnn...
66.Summer 6547: Atago, why are you so underdressed? Even in summer, you have to dress properly. Look, even the admiral is wearing his commander uniform properly... properly... Ahh... um... Admiral?
66.Fall 6547: Fall! Fall is the time of year when the Fourth Division can't afford to get careless. Everyone, stay vigilant! In particular, your fall... appetites...
66.Saury 6547: Come, Atago, let's go protect the fishing grounds. Fourth Division, sortieing! We're carrying out the saury fishing support operation!
66.Xmas 6547: Merry Christmas! Admiral, just for today, you can forget about your commander duties and enjoy a party with us! Oh!? Ah... Atago! Don't interrupt me!
66.YearsEnd 6547: Let's start with the cleanup. Please relay that to Choukai and Maya as well. Atago is... huh? She's gone!?

269.Married: Admiral, is something wrong? Are you... perhaps a bit tired? I understand. Then, would you like to rest your head on my lap? It's okay if it's for a little bit, so please have a good rest. This is also one of your important responsibilities, after all.
269.Wedding: Admiral, the commander's responsibilities... are more than a little heavy. If you're feeling a bit tired, you're welcome to rest your head on my chest, alright? We can... stay together... from now on... right?

67.Intro: I'm Atago. Admiral, please remember that, okay?
67.Library: Second of the Takao-class, Atago. Ufufu! I was born at the Kure Naval Arsenal. Don't I have a well-balanced and heavily armed body? At the decisive Battle of Leyte Gulf, I deployed as the flagship of the Central Force... Well, things happened, you know?
67.Poke(3): Oh, you. You're just like a baby on the inside, aren't you?
67.Idle: Admiral? Well, now... it looks like Takao might be running a little low on calcium. I wonder if she should drink more milk. A-ouch! Hey... Takao!
67.Wedding: As a reward... for a little while, you and I can swap hats... and see how we look. *swap* Ufufufu♪
67.Equip(2): My upgrade is all done...! Huh? No, I didn't upgrade these. I've always had them!
67.Docking(1): I'm just going to take a quick break, okay?
67.Docking(2): My tanks are so big. They make my shoulders stiff, you know?
67.Construction: My, my. Looks like our circle of friends has grown!
67.Battle: Lots of enemies found! Commencing the attack, okay?
67.Yasen(1): A night battle... this is my specialty!
67.MVP: Do you understand what I'm capable of now~? Ufu♪
67.Sunk: My, my... what a shame... I wonder if Takao is taking this seriously...
67.NewYears 6547: Best wishes for the coming year~! Admiral, I'm counting on you again this year, okay? Ufufu♪ Now, let's have a drink of New Year's sake!
67.Setsubun 6547: Hmm...? So you're supposed to eat as many beans as your age, huh? Takao, you're surprisingly knowledgeable~ Well, Admiral, how many will you eat? I'll be watching♪
67.Valentines 6547: Homemade chocolate is surprisingly hard, isn't it~ The ingredients were really expensive... but... it's done~!
67.Valentines 1471: Admiral? We'll be having some of my homemade chocolate as teacakes today. Please look forward to it, okay? Ufufu♪
67.Rainy 6547: Such a downpour. This is the perfect time for hot milk. No, really. Want to try some?
67.EarlySummer 6547: Oh, my, Takao. You started dieting for the summer? It must be hard. Me? I don't need to.
67.Summer 6547: This summer is as hot as always~ When it's this hot, I'll be more comfortable doing my job if I dress down some, right? Uu... uwa~h! Much better~♪
67.Fall 6547: Fall is... let's see... I also get a little sad around now, you know... But! It's a time of year with really tasty food, you know.
67.Saury 6547: My, Takao, aren't you excited to the support the saury fishing? The fishermen will be so happy.
67.Xmas 6547: Admiral? Pan-paka-pa~n! I wish you a... Merry Christmas! Here, a present from me. Ah! Now, please open it~ There, it suits you perfectly~! I'm so relieved!
67.YearsEnd 6547: I'm... not really good at things like cleaning~ Takao? I'll leave this to you, okay? Ufufu~

270.Married: Ufufu... Admiral, what's wrong? Huh? Are your shoulders stiff? What a coincidence— mine are stiff, too! Oh... you're going to massage them? Hah... that feels great...! Admiral, you're good at this. It feels really nice! I'll let Takao give it a try next time as well! Ahhh~ right there...
270.Wedding: Eh? This is for me... is it? Really? I'm... very, very serious about these things, you know! That's fine? I see... then... please place it onto this finger! Ufufu! It's beautiful...! Admiral, thank you! I will always, always treasure it.

68.Intro: Yo! Name's Maya, nice to meet you.
68.Library: Third of the Takao-class heavy cruisers, Maya-sama! Kobe-built. I went hard in the Southern Ops and Solomon battles! Haah? Leyte? Nah, I'm not great with subs.
68.Wedding: Thanks for always using my full power, man. This too... I thank...you.
68.Equip(1): Yeaaah! I'm fired up! Here I go!
68.Supply: Yeaaah! I'm fired up! Here I go!
68.Docking(1): Pulling me back, will the fleet be okay?
68.Docking(2): Using me until I'm like this... dammit!
68.Construction: I heard there's a newbie. Let's take care of her!
68.Sortie: If you're afraid, just hide behind me.
68.Attack: Here comes my pain train, eat it!
68.Yasen(1): Looks like you're getting on my nerves, bub.
68.MVP: Isn't it obvious? I'm Maya the Awesome, you know?
68.Damaged(3): Don't joke with me! J...just wait and see!
68.Sunk: Sinking...huh... I had such a simple life...
68.NewYears 6547: Admiral? Happy New Year to ya. The invincible Maya is countin' on ya again this year! You got this!
68.Setsubun 6547: Here we go, Choukai! I'm throwin' the beans! Urya... uryaurya!! ...Why ya runnin' away!!?
68.Valentines 6547: What now? Valentine's? Ugh, c'mon! Well, anyways... I kinda got ya some. Here!
68.Valentines 16: I can't stand sweet things! You can take this and shove it!!
68.Rainy 6547: Lately it's been all damp and wet, huh. Would be cool if the weather would just clear up already. I wish!
68.Summer 6547: Alright! It's summer! Summer! It feels great, huh? Admiral, let's take off our clothes and go for a swim!
68.Fall 6547: Man, the summer I was looking forward to is over with. Now we're stuck with this gloomy season. Ah... achoo!
68.Xmas 6547: Christmas, right? Well, whatever. This "champagne" alcohol is really... well, tell me what you think. ...So, Admiral?

271.Intro: Yo, Admiral! Working hard? Cause today is another day for me to kick some ass!
271.Idle: Hey! Admiral! Are you listening? Hey! ...Damn, he won't listen. The hell!? Sheesh...

428.Poke(2): Admiral~ calm down a bit will ya? Why dontcha just follow MY example! ...Eh? "You're one to talk"!?
428.Join: Oh, here I go! Air defense cruiser Maya! Setting sail!
428.Sortie: I'm the awesome air defense cruiser, Maya! Anti-aircraft warfare? You can count on me! Just hide behind me!
428.Attack: Hehee...feel the might of a brand new me!
428.Damaged(2): The hell...!? Don't mess with me!

69.Intro: My name is Choukai. It's a pleasure.
69.Library:
Fourth of the Takao-class ships, Choukai here.

Malaya, Solomon, Marianas and Leyte Gulf were among the operations I participated in.

My name is presently inherited by a JSDF AEGIS-equipped escort vessel, fourth in its class.
69.Poke(1): Ah... Commander! Thanks for the hard work.
69.Poke(2): Do you have any orders for me as of yet?
69.Poke(3): Ah...! Is this... also some kind of duty I must perform!?
69.Married: I'm... forever grateful to you. It's an honor to be with you.
69.Wedding: If you're ever perplexed by a strategy, you can always come to me. We'll analyze it— just the two of us!
69.Equip(1): So you're modernizing me...? That's wonderful!
69.Equip(2): This is... it has a good feel to it!
69.Supply: So you're modernizing me...? That's wonderful!
69.Docking(2): Indeed... it seems I went a little overboard.
69.Construction: A newcomer. Aren't you also... curious about her?
69.Return: I'm reporting in about the completed operation.
69.Sortie: Right, let's proceed! Let's do this!
69.MVP: This is in accordance with my predictions. Naturally, it was made possible because of your strategy.
69.Damaged(3): My predictions didn't... this shouldn't be happening...!
69.Sunk: There was... a flaw in my predictions... ...I'm so sorry...
69.NewYears 6547: Best wishes for the coming year. Along with Maya, we'll be counting on you in the coming year!
69.Setsubun 6547: H-Hey... Maya... Even though it's Setsubun, you shouldn't throw so many beans... I mean, where did...! C-Come on...! I'm getting angry!
69.Valentines 6547: According to my calculations, this level of sweetness would be best. Ah... um... these chocolates... please accept them.
69.Valentines 16: Ah... this bulge... While I was making the homemade chocolate, did I eat a few too many?
69.Rainy 6547: Mr. Commander. The rainy season is quite calming, isn't it...? Eh? You don't think so? I-I am sorry....
69.Summer 6547: It's summer, isn't it? Eh!? A swimsuit? Umm... no. For me, things like that are... ah... yes... Then, next time...
69.Fall 6547: Autumn is such a calming season. I especially enjoy evenings in autumn. Commander, what about you?
69.Xmas 6547: Merry Christmas! While it is a Western festival, it's quite a wonderful one, isn't it? Here, have some cake!

272.Idle: I'm confident in my night warfare capability, but... about the enemy aircraft... I see... so I should act as Maya would... Uhm... but, but...
272.Supply: Right... For these precious supplies... as always, you have my thanks!

427.Intro: Choukai, reporting in. I'd be honored if could work with you again today.
427.Poke(1): Choukai, reporting in. It's my intention to return the favor of remodeling me through such things as night warfare.
427.Join: Eighth Fleet flagship Choukai, setting sail. Starting the sortie!
427.Battle:
Over there. They're exactly where I had anticipated.
Enemy fleet spotted! All ships, begin the assault!
427.Attack: Target: the enemy fleet ahead of us. Prepare the cannons! Commence firing!
427.Yasen(1): Conventional night warfare... It's now time to display the results of my training! All ships, forward! Please follow my lead!
427.Damaged(1): Ow...! The bridge was hit!? I... I'm fine! I can still fight!

70.Intro: I'm Mogami. It's alright, I won't collide with anyone this time. Really!
70.Library: I'm the heavy cruiser Mogami-class nameship, Mogami. Aren't Three-barreled main guns great? Yeah, yeah, I've got a habit of bumping into the other ships, I wonder why?
70.Poke(3): If you're too persistent, I'll get a bit mad, you know.
70.Idle: Admiral! Oh, you're busy? I'm going out for some workout.
70.Married: I'm always crashing because I've only got eyes for you, Admiral! Just kidding!
70.Wedding: Ah, Admiral? Somehow, my rear cannon feels a bit off. Hey, could you take a quick look? Yeah, that's the spot…hey, that's not it!
70.Docking(2): Dang, my stern cannons got damaged a little bit.
70.Battle: Hey, is it okay to start now?
70.Yasen(1): I'd better not have a collision...
70.MVP: I'm number one? Hmm, yeah... to be frank, I'm happy, thanks!
70.Damaged(3): Argh! This'll make it hard to keep going on...
70.Sunk: I'm sinking too... was it inevitable?...
70.NewYears 6547: Admiral, have a Happy New Year! I and the other aviation cruisers are counting on you again this year!
70.Valentines 6547: Here! Give my chocolate a try, okay? I can't guarantee the flavor, though... Oh? Thank goodness! That makes me happy, too!
70.Rainy 6547: Mikuma, what's wrong? You don't look too great there. Ah I know, shall we invite Suzuya and Kumano and have a tea party or something? 'Kay?
70.Rainy 1471: Admiral, hold still for a bit. See? Wearing your hat this way is cooler!
70.Summer 6547: Mikuma, what's wrong? Why the long face? Ah, I know! How about we get some ramune? My treat.
70.Fall 6547: So it's fall, huh? Ah, Michishio. This season... doesn't it make you a feel a little tightness in your chest? I wonder why that is.
70.Saury 6547: Ehh~ Saury fishing, huh. Sounds good. I'll pitch in, too! What equipment do I need? First of all, I'll need something that casts a light!
70.Xmas 6547: Admiral, Merry Christmas! Well, it sounds nice. I really like it. It's fun!

73.Intro: We meet again, Admiral. It's Mogami. How's my flight deck? Does it suit me?
73.Library: First of the Mogami-class heavy cruisers. By taking off my stern cannons and replacing them with an aviation deck, the Aviation Cruiser was developed! Equal fire and air power, howzat!
73.Poke(1): Admiral, have you got something for me to do?
73.Poke(2): You interested in my flight deck?
73.Poke(3): Yeaaah, well, I am different from the regular carriers. If you use me well, I think it'll be interesting, you know?
73.Wedding: Admiral, wassup? What's with that look? Is there something up with my flight deck?
73.Ranking: Looks like there's a notice for the admiral
73.Equip(1): Ooh, you're gonna make me even stronger?
73.Equip(2): So you use it like this... huh~
73.Docking(1): Going in for repairs. Why do I keep running into friends...? This sucks...
73.Docking(2): Aaah... my long-awaited flight deck came to nothing, damnit...
73.Return: The operation is over, the fleet has come back
73.Yasen(2): Gathering the rains of summer, how swift it is... Basho, right?
73.MVP: This is my true power, dude. 'cause I'm something like the pioneer of the helicopter destroyers, you know?
73.Damaged(3): Damnit! A direct hit... that's no joke...
73.Sunk: Ugh...I wonder if I can apologize to Mikuma in the other world...
73.H0200: 0200. Say, I didn't know I have to do night shifts.
73.H0300: 0300. *yawn* Eh? You're still working in this late time? Thank you for your work!
73.H0400: 0400. *big yawn* Man, Admiral sure works hard.
73.H0500: 0500. Huh? Ah, I was dreaming a bit just now.
73.H0600: 0600. What was my dream about? That's a secret!
73.H0700: 0700. Is it OK if I sleep now?
73.H0800: 0800. Oh, come on. Your office has a futon, right?
73.H0900: 0900. Ehh? You've packed the futon? Well, the kotatsu is fine too.
73.H1000: 1000. Your eyes are wide open when you're bustling.
73.H1200: 1200. Admiral, let's fill up at lunch, okay?
73.H1300: 1300. I'm stuffed! Dessert goes in a different stomach, though.
73.H1400: 1400. Mmm, Mamiya's ice cream is delicious! Admiral, you got cream on your face... Yep, there you go!
73.H1500: 1500. If the meal comes with dessert, I guess I can do the night shift.
73.H1600: 1600. I managed to eat a lot, but I'm sleepy now.
73.H1700: 1700. I'm so tired, I feel like I can sleep while walking...Oh, sorry!
73.H1800: 1800. This... This is the admirals office!? Why!?
73.H1900: 1900. The admiral carried me here!? I'm really sorry!
73.H2000: 2000. Wah! I'm supposed to make curry for dinner tonight!... Hm... this smell....
73.H2100: 2100. Admiral, As a backup, Kumarinko brought some curry she made. Well, let's dig in!
73.H2200: 2200. Eating curry together with the admiral makes it delicious. I could eat it every day!
73.H2300: 2300. So, Admiral, we're finished with everything, right?

120.Intro: Greetings, I'm Mikuma. I wonder where Mogami could be hiding?
120.Library: I get along very well with Mogamin, the first ship in the Mogami class, but we get along too well sometimes and collide often... Yeah... literally... I do watch where I'm going, okay?
120.Poke(2): Admiral, let's do our best today as well.
120.Poke(3): Admiral, you're too close, too clooose.
120.Idle: Really, Admiral... I thought you'd forgotten about me.
120.Wedding: Admiral, for taking such great care of me up until now, my gratitude is boundless. Umm.. If it's okay, afterwards, together with Mikuma…. Kumarinko!
120.Ranking: Well! Intelligence for the admiral? Would I be able to see it too, I wonder?
120.Equip(2): Admiral, how does it look? Does it suit me?
120.Equip(3): Would it be alright if I said 'Kumakuma'?
120.Docking(2): I will just take a short break...
120.Construction: A newcomer? It would be good if they were a good one.
120.Return: The fleet has returned safely. Phew...
120.Sortie: Where is Mogamin? I always have to watch out for her...
120.Yasen(1): Night battles are my specialty, you know!
120.MVP: Because the admiral chose me, I could do my best! I humbly accept your gratitude.
120.Damaged(1): Just how angry will you make me!
120.Damaged(3): Aaa... Kumarinko's western clothes..! That's going too far!
120.Sunk: Please... Don't look... I don't want anyone... To see me while I sink...
120.H0100: 0100. Admiral, are you you going to be staying up late tonight?
120.H0400: It is now 0400. Admiral, why don't you just go to bed?
120.H0500: It's 0500. Admiral, if you work too hard, you damage your body.
120.H0700: 0700. Admiral, what would you like for breakfast?
120.H0800: 0800. Let's do our best together today as well, okay?
120.H1100: 1100. What should would you like for lunch?
120.H1200: 1200. I want to have lunch together~
120.H1300: 1300. You always get tired after eating, don't you?
120.H1500: 1500. Admiral, you're still holding strong here!
120.H1700: 1700. Admiral, it's already evening, isn't it?
120.H1800: 1800. Admiral, do you wish to go for dinner? Or perhaps, off for a drink?
120.H1900: 1900. Well, Admiral, it is tasty? ...thank goodness.
120.H2000: 2000. How about having a bath now?
120.H2100: 2100. Is it okay for me to have a rest now?
120.H2200: 2200. Admiral, it's almost time for that. Tha~t♪
120.H2300: 2300. I did my best today as well.
120.NewYears 6547: Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! Mogamin and I will be counting on you again this year.
120.Valentines 6547: Admiral, I would like to give you some of my special Kumarinko Chocolate. Here, this is it! You don't need to hold back.
120.Valentines 1471: Admiral, what did you think of my Kumarinko Chocolate's flavor? ...Eh? You haven't tried it yet? Please don't hold back and have some soon, okay?
120.Rainy 6547: The rainy days are continuing nonstop. I'm a little bad with this kind of season. For some reason, this time of year brings a melancholy feeling with it. I can't go on like this, can I?
120.Summer 6547: I wonder what Mogamin is going to do for her swimsuit this year. I want to have new matching swimsuits.
120.Summer 1471: In the end, we couldn't buy matching swimsuits. Eh? Admiral, you want to play beach volleyball? Kumarinko is... I'm fine.
120.Fall 6547: Fall! It's a time of year when everything looks so appetizing! No... Mikuma, you can't lose to your appetite here! Mogamin wouldn't like it if you got fat.
120.Saury 6547: Saury? Is that an upper class fish? Hmm... I'm not sure I really want any. ...Ah! Delicious! Saury tastes so good!
120.Xmas 6547: A Merry Christmas to you! I really love Christmas Cake! Admiral, what about you? Okay, say "ahh".

121.Intro: Admiral, I've attained a new form!
121.Poke(1): I will be troubled if you believe that I am the same as before.
121.Poke(2): With this, I'll surely catch up to Mogamin.
121.Poke(3): Admiral, I wonder if you could please return my flight deck?
121.Ranking: Well, well! A new communique? Can I see it?
121.Docking(1): Please take special care with my flight deck.
121.Docking(2): Even though I though I fixed where Mogamin hit me.... I'm back in the dock...
121.Construction: I am informing you that a new ship has been completed.
121.Return: The fleet has returned safely, thank goodness...
121.Sortie: I want Mogamin to see this, my big performance!
121.Battle: Well now, let's begin my three-dimensional air AND surface actions!
121.Attack: Seaplanes, I'll leave this to you.
121.Yasen(1): To be honest, nighttime is a little scary...
121.Yasen(2): Next, the bombardment phase... Mi... Kuma!

124.Intro: I'm Suzuya! What a lively fleet this is. I'll be in your care!
124.Library: I'm Mogami-class heavy cruiser #3. I was born at the Yokosuka Naval Arsenal. Hmhm♪ See, cruiser names come from rivers, so "Suzuya" comes from the Suzuya river in Sakhalin. Did ya know that?
124.Poke(3): I told you not to touch my deck knee socks like that! Geez!
124.Idle: Admiraaal, I am seriously bored here... aren't we gonna sortie? I-want-to-sor-tie!
124.Married: That girl, Kumano... I hope she's doing okay... right, Admiral?
124.Wedding: Admiral! I know I'm getting kinda serious on you, but thanks for trusting a ship like me with so many jobs! Just wanted to say thanks... ehe♪ ...Eh... ah... well anyway, as always, I'll be in your care!
124.Ranking: Heeere. A written report addressed to you.
124.Join: Mogami-class heavy cruiser, Suzuya! Here I go!
124.Equip(2): Ooh~ I won't lose to Kumano with this!
124.Docking(1): Man, you really do get hungry after a workout, huh?
124.Construction: Looks like a cute girl is on the way, y'know?
124.Return: The fleet has returned~ Nice work~
124.Battle: Well, well... let's get this attack moving!
124.MVP: Well, it's only natural. I'm the type who lives off of praise. Praise me a lot, okay?
124.Damaged(3): Crap... this is so embarrassing... don't look at me! Ugh... I'm so done with this mission...
124.Sunk: N-No way... my torpedo tube... exploded...? That... can't be good...
124.H0000: Twelve midnight. It's really gonna be night after this!
124.H0100: 1 o'clock, huh... Admiral, you're a night owl, too?
124.H0200: It's 2 o'clock! I'm getting the munchies...
124.H0300: 3 o'clock already! If it's this late, let's just do an all-nighter.
124.H0500: 5 o'clock, huh? Man, I wanna crash for a bit...
124.H0600: It's 6 o'clock! Now would be a good time for sleep!
124.H0700: 7 o'clock! Ahh... time to do the morning news...
124.H0900: It's 9 o'clock! Let's go get 'em again today!
124.H1000: It's 10 o'clock! Where we going today?
124.H1200: Yeeaaah, it's 12 o'clock! I wanna eat curry again today♪
124.H1300: Already 1 o'clock? It's not Friday, but we're having curry! Curry made just for us ship girls!
124.H1400: 2 o'clock! Admiral, I'm taking a nap! Nap time.
124.H1500: 3 o'clock... Ah... sorry. Nodded off there...
124.H1600: 4 o'clock. Hey, why don't we have some tea?
124.H1800: 6 o'clock! I'm getting the jitters for some reason~
124.H1900: It's 7 o'clock. What're we doing for dinner?
124.H2000: 8 o'clock, huh? Now we're starting the good part of the day~
124.H2100: Well, it's 9 o'clock. Are the expeditions done yet...?
124.H2200: Already 10 o'clock, huh? Another day passed right by...
124.H2300: 11 o'clock! Oh, yeah! My night engine is all fired up!
124.NewYears 6547: Admiral, have a Happy New Year! I'm counting on you again this year, y'know! So! Where's my New Year's gift~?
124.Setsubun 6547: It's Setsubun... Kumano, do you have any plans for Setsubun? Ahh... she's talking with her mouth full... ohh...
124.Valentines 6547: Heeey...! Admiral, here's my chocolate, just~for~you~♥ Fufu♪ Looking forward to the return gift, nihihihi♪
124.Anniversary 6547: Cheese! Isn't today an anniversary, Admiral? Suzuya is happy, too, yup!
124.Rainy 6547: Ugh... it's all wet and humid... I won't be able to do aaanything in the rainy season.
124.EarlySummer 6547: Argh. It's gotten pretty hot. Ugh, it's all hot and humid. Kumano, you don't mind it?
124.Summer 6547: It's summer, isn't it! Summer! Kumano, let's go for a swim in our new swimsuits! Hm? Hmhm... are you coming, too, Admiral?
124.Fall 6547: Fall, huh? This part of the year is kind of a downer... right, Kumano? Um, Kumano? Are you listening?
124.Fall 1471: Ah, that sandwich? Yup, it turned out great, if I do say so myself. Ehehe♪ I put it together along with Kumano. Should I make more?
124.Saury 6547: Saury? Yeah, I do like to eat them, but... Whaa... We're going fishing for them? Seems like it'd be really slimy work. I don't wanna do it...
124.Xmas 6547:
Merry Christmas, Merry Christmas~ Admiral, it's a Merry Christmas!
Okay! So, my present... where's it at? Hm~?

125.Intro: Good day to you. I am the heavy cruiser Kumano.
125.Library: The stylish Kobe-born heavy cruiser, why, it can only be myself, Kumano. At the famous Malaya, Midway, Solomon and Marianas hard-fought battles, I, of course, participated. I did want to return to Japan at the end however...
125.Poke(1): Oh, is it time for work? Aren't you the lazy one...
125.Poke(2): My, Admiral, do you have something for me to do?
125.Poke(3): Touching me so freely, aren't you mistaken about something, Admiral?
125.Idle: N… n ~u~u…… fu ~a~a… Im feeling a bit sleepy
125.Married: Admiral. W-well... You appear to be doing quite well? I just might praise you, you know.
125.Wedding: The admiral's room, it has such a pleasant feel to it, yes? I do not dislike it. At any rate, if you make such a request, it will be fine to stay, no? Yes, if it is your desire…
125.Ranking: There's a scolding letter from the Naval Central Staff for you Admiral.
125.Equip(2): I don't really like low-quality arms.
125.Docking(1): Well, I don't really hate taking a bath...
125.Docking(2): I'll partake of the full-body aesthetic course, please.
125.Construction: Oh my, you hired another new girl? That's fine, I guess...
125.Yasen(1): Night battle? There was a certain idiot who loved them.
125.MVP: MVP, that is but one of the things that today's ladies can accomplish. I will humbly accept your thanks.
125.Damaged(3): For me to get in this state... I can't believe it.
125.Sunk: To sink in such a place... I wanted to to wear cute clothes and eat Kobe beef... in my birthplace of Kobe...
125.H0100: 1 o'clock? My skin will get bad. Do you intend to pose a challenge to my good looks?
125.H0200: Admiral? Just when do you intend to stay awake till? 2 o'clock.
125.H0300: 3 at night!? I just can't believe you!
125.H0400: 4 at night... I won't associate with you anymore.
125.H0500: Really! Even if you say 'late night', it is 5 in the morning!
125.H0600: 6 o'clock, just the right time to open your eyes, please.
125.H0700: It has become 7 o'clock. Thanks to you, Admiral, I missed my beauty sleep, you know?
125.H0800: It is 8 o'clock. Will you assist in sorting out my hair?
125.H0900: It's already 9 o'clock, are you not late?
125.H1000: Oh my? Do you not have anything to do today? It is 10 o'clock already...
125.H1100: 11 o'clock. It's cannot be helped, I will assist you.
125.H1200: 12 o'clock. For my lunch, I desire to have sandwiches.
125.H1300: Admiral? These "Convenience store" sandwiches, this is the first time I have had them. They are unexpectedly good... Ah, 1 o'clock.
125.H1400: It is 2 o'clock. I will be having my post-meal nap. Therefore, good day, Admiral.
125.H1500: 3 o'clock, yes? I am refreshed after my nap, so in study, work or Kancolle, I will be of the utmost efficiency.
125.H1600: Admiral, It is 4 o'clock now. When will I get to see your enthusiasm?
125.H1700: 5 o'clock. I have a beauty appointment. Hence, I must ask to be excused for a while.
125.H1800: 6 o'clock. I am undergoing beauty treatment, no? Admiral. Please show some discretion.
125.H1900: 7 o'clock, yes? Haa, that felt good... oh, Admiral. You are here?
125.H2000: Admiral, It's 8 o'clock. Rose Hip Tea, would you like to partake in some?
125.H2100: It has become 9 o'clock. A late dinner, is it not a good thing?
125.H2200: 10 o'clock. For the sake of my beautiful body, I will be taking my beauty sleep now.
125.H2300: 11 o'clock, Admiral. This late at night, what do you want?
125.NewYears 6547: Admiral? I would like to entrust myself to your care once again this year. When shall we depart for our first shrine visit of the year?
125.Setsubun 6547: *nom nom* Yhou shee, Shuzhuya? Ihf I eatf thish ehohmahkhi *nom nom* ahd ghulp iht ihn wahn baih *nom* ah I wihl e blesh wifh goodh healf foh thef wholg yeahg-nggh... mnngh...! *chokes*
125.Valentines 6547: Wooooo↑ooooah↓!? A-Admiral? You may have my chocolate... if that is... what you wish.
125.Anniversary 6547: Admiral, today is an important day, right? Shall we celebrate with champagne?
125.Rainy 6547: Ah yes, it's the rainy season. At a time like this, I would like to eat a sandwich.
125.EarlySummer 6547: Summer is around the corner! Suzuya, I want to go out and buy the latest swimsuits.
125.Summer 6547: It's! Summer! I want to go to a resort again this year. Oh? Truk Island? Is that a resort?
125.Fall 6547: The season is now autumn, I see. The further into autumn we go... how to put this... the deeper a sense of melancholy grows.
125.Saury 6547: Saury...? And what is that...? Does it work well as a sandwich ingredient? Eh? It can work as one depending on how it is used? Is that so? Then, I must proceed at full power! Suzuya, let's be off!
125.Xmas 6547: *nom nom* *nom nom* ...What is this? This grilled turkey is actually... *nom* mm~mm~~ sho elishioush♪

71.Intro: I am Tone! With my addition to the fleet, there will be no problems searching out the enemy!
71.Library: The last completed heavy cruiser of the Japanese Navy, oldest sister of the Tone-class, Tone. At Pearl Harbor and Midway, as the eye for the fleet, I unceasingly watched the length and breadth of the ocean. I ended out the war protecting the Kure Naval Yards as a floating fortress, fighting until my blades were broken, arrows were depleted.
71.Poke(3): Admiral, you appear to have copious free time? Battle preparations and logistics are important, are they not?
71.Wedding: That's right, my scouts have found the enemy fleet!! ...Eh? Enough of that? ...Then what is it? What is this?
71.Ranking: A communique has arrived. Shall you be confirming it?
71.Equip(2): You have my thanks... Compared to that Chikuma, I became stronger again!
71.Docking(1): Yes. Indeed. Frequent refits bring about triumphs!
71.Docking(2): Grr.... Even I get tired. For now... to sleep!
71.Return: Operation complete. The fleet has returned.
71.Attack: No way, you say the catapult is in bad condition?
71.Yasen(1): Did you think you could escape from my scouts!?
71.Yasen(2): Not yet, not yet..! I won't lose to Chikuma!
71.MVP: As long as I'm here, it's victory as expected! Because I am "the" older sister, compared to that Chikuma!
71.Damaged(3): Direct hit!? ...I shall not sink with merely this!
71.Sunk: I have blundered...! I am sinking, no? The siesta of a million years...
71.NewYears 6547: So the New Year begins! Admiral, Happy New Year! Let's make this year a great one, too!
71.Setsubun 6547: Why do I have to be the demon!? ...Hm. It must be because I'm the older sister! No way around it, then. Ah- Ow! Who did that!!?
71.Valentines 6547: The chocolates were so good...! Eh? I wasn't the one who was supposed to eat those...? ...My bad...
71.Anniversary 6547: Third anniversary, isn't it? How splendid, indeed! Aye! Wah-hahahaha! Na-haha-owch!
71.Rainy 6547: Look, there's a snail on top of the fence! That's quite a scene. Wha!? You say it's eating the fence!? What the...!?
71.Summer 6547: Ugh... it's getting hot. I'm no good with heat. Chikuma. Chikuma~! Ice cream.... ramune....
71.Saury 6547: Fall is harvest time! There's so many delicious things to fill up on! I'm the type who just eats sauries whole! Gh... a bone. Chikuma! Chikuma!
71.Cold 6547: Chikumaa! Chikumaa! What the... she's not here? It's a pain, but I suppose every now and then I have to show off my culinary skill... ...Ah! Chikuma! I'm so hungry♪
71.Xmas 6547: Chikuma, this is a Western festival. Both the cooking and the cake are worthy of praise. I'm having myself a blast!
71.YearsEnd 6547: Chikuma! I'm already done with cleaning. Stretching around is way too much trouble... I want to have some soba soon...

273.Idle: N-no! I'm not... It's not like i'm bored or anything!

188.Poke(3): Admiral... you have quite a free time over there don't you. How about use it to adjust my catapult, carefully okay?
188.Ranking: Let's see, now, what's the status like? Hmmm...
188.Docking(1): That's right, maintenance is really important. I-it's not like I lack of sleep alright?
188.Attack: The catapult has been serviced, just for this moment!
188.Yasen(2): No, not yet..! I will never lose to Chikuma!

72.Intro: Pleased to meet you. Second of the Tone-class, Chikuma.
72.Library: I'm Chikuma. Carrying 4 twin cannons on the foredeck, and with substantial reconnaissance capability, I am the second of the Tone-class heavy cruisers. Together with Tone nee-san, I acted as the important eyes of the Nagumo task force.
72.Poke(1): Tone nee-san? Oh, it's just you Admiral.
72.Poke(3): Really, Tone nee-san, please don't come that close. Oh, wait? Admiral?
72.Wedding: Admiral, calling me out to this place... I... my heart is set on my oneesan... Eh? It's about formations? Oh my... Even me...
72.Join: Chikuma, all preperations complete! Heading out!
72.Equip(1): To take care of just me... Nee-san will get mad, you know?
72.Equip(2): I'm so happy♪ I must report this to Tone nee-san.
72.Supply: To take care of just me... Nee-san will get mad, you know?
72.Docking(1): Keep it a secret. I'm just going to take a quick break.
72.Docking(2): My clothes and catapult are all spoilt... I'll go and repair it a little, yes?
72.Construction: It appears that the new ship's construction has been completed.
72.Return: I have a report that the operation is complete.
72.Sortie: Is reconnaissance okay? Alright, heading out!
72.Attack: Nee-san is also doing her best, huh... Attack!
72.Yasen(2): Recon teams, do your best observing my batteries~
72.MVP: How am I so strong? There's someone I want to protect. *giggle*
72.Damaged(2): Ow! The main cannon!? No, I can still fire!
72.Damaged(3): Ohh... I can't let nee-san see me in such an unsightly shape...
72.Sunk: Is nee-san.... okay? She is..? That's great...
72.NewYears 6547: Best wishes for the coming year. Together with my sister, we'll be counting on you again this year.
72.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun serves the important role of purifying the malice of the year. Even Nee-san is really getting into it.
72.Valentines 6547: Did Tone-neesan eat them herself? ...Okay. Don't worry. I'll give you half of mine.
72.Rainy 6547: Nee-san, you shouldn't bully that snail. Ah, you're admiring it? I-Is that so....
72.Summer 6547: The sunlight has gotten a lot stronger. It'll be trouble for the skin. I should put some sunscreen on Tone nee-san, too. Ah... Tone nee-san?
72.Saury 6547: So it's fall. Admiral, what does fall mean for you? Oh? It's the same for me, ufufu.
72.Cold 6547: Okay, okay. What's the matter? I'm here, now. Eh...? You were hungry? But you just ate... There's no helping it, is there? Please wait just a moment. I'll...
72.Xmas 6547: Admiral, Merry Christmas. Are you enjoying yourself as well? Tonight is a "holy night". Ufufu.
72.YearsEnd 6547: Nee-san, the end of the year cleaning is a big deal. It's important. After this is over, I'll make us some delicious soba. Let's eat it together with the admiral.

274.Idle: Well… It is about time to lay out an operation… Oh you seem busy… Ah…

189.Intro: Second ship of the Tone-class, aviation-cruiser Chikuma. I'll do my best with nee-san.
189.Married: Admiral… Thanks for everything until now. You're just like Tone nee-san. Fufu...
189.Ranking: Are you going to check on the report, Admiral? Here's the report~
189.Supply: Oh… I'm happy. Thank you so much.
189.Docking(1): My legs feel a little breezy with this clothing, Fufu~♪

176.Intro: Guten morgen! I'm the heavy cruiser, Prinz Eugen. I'll be in your care!
176.Library: Woah! You startled me! Ah... I am the German-born heavy cruiser, Prinz Eugen. Admiral Hipper-class, third ship. Along with Bismarck onee-sama, I took part in Operation Rheinübung. A lucky ship... ...me? I'll be fighting in this sea, too!
176.Poke(1): Woah! You surprised me! ...A-Aye! Setting off!
176.Poke(3): Admiral! Will we be doing the Rhine Exercise? ...Ah, huh? So we won't... Anyway, I'll still work hard! Leave it to me!
176.Idle: Bismarck onee-sama... I wonder if she's okay...? I'm a little worried... maybe I should go see how she's doing?
176.Married: Woah...! Admiral, if you're tired, you need to take a little break. Definitely! Got it?
176.Wedding: Admiral, you said you needed something? Wha- t-this is for me? U-Umm, Bismarck onee-sama is... a-ah... u-um... da... danke! I'll treasure it!!
176.Ranking: Fleet intelligence, right? Wait just a moment... Oh... oh, oh.... so that's how it is?
176.Join: Heavy cruiser Prinz Eugen, setting off!
176.Docking(1): *sigh* I got hit. I'll be fixed shortly
176.Construction: It looks like a new ship has been commissioned. I can't wait to meet her!
176.Sortie: Bismarck onee-sama, let's head out together!
176.Yasen(2): Main cannons... ready, aim...! Commence shelling!
176.MVP: Wha...? I'm a lucky girl? I'm nothing of the sort! I'm bad at stuff like the shallows, after all...!
176.Damaged(1): Wha...!? I got hit! But still, I can...!
176.Damaged(2): Uu... I need to snap out of it...
176.Damaged(3): At this rate, Bismarck onee-sama is going to laugh at me...!
176.Sunk: I'll... be the... first to go this time... Sakawa... Nagato... see... you...
176.NewYears 6547: So this is the Japanese new year, (2 priests!?)...! The (Japanese city!?) is so uniquely pretty...!
176.Setsubun 6547: So this part of Japanese culture is "Setsubuuun~!" I should throw this bean at Nagato? ...Ei! Oh?!
176.Anniversary 6547: Today is a wonderful day! Good work as usual, Admiral! Ehehe.
176.Xmas 6547: ...Hah...! It wouldn't be Christmas if we couldn't enjoy stollen and lebkuchen! Isn't it good?

177.Poke(1): Oh...! Roger that! Prinz Eugen, sortieing!
177.Damaged(2): I won't sink from something like this...! Return fire!
177.H0000: Woah!? It's exactly midnight! For today, it'll be my duty to notify you of the time. Alright, I've got it! Leave it to me!
177.H0100: It's now 1 a.m.! Was that okay, you think? Ah, I see! Thank goodness!
177.H0200: It's 2 a.m. In this country, you say... ushi-mitsu-doki-tte-iu-no? Ahh, that sounds a little funny to me.
177.H0300: Woah, you startled me! Ah, my hairstyle... you mean? Ahh! It's now 3 a.m.!
177.H0400: *stretch*... It's 4 a~m. ...nn... As expected, I'm a bit tired... but... I'm fine.
177.H0500: It's now 5 o'clock! Guten morgen! And what a nice morning it is! Let's do our best!
177.H0600: 6 o'clock. Breakfast, huh... eh? M-Me!? G-Got it! Leave it to me! Umm... hmm, what should I make? I wonder if I should make some for Bismarck onee-sama, too? Should I?
177.H0700: Okay! Today's breakfast is bread, sausage, and cheese. There's also salad... and of course, have some hot coffee! It's fairly typical, but delicious, right? Ah, it's exactly 7 o'clock now.
177.H0800: It's now 8 o'clock. So then, Admiral, let's break down today's operations! Shall we start with exercises? Or maybe expeditions?
177.H0900: It's 9 a.m. Hm? Ah, it's Nagato! Heeey, Naagatooo! ...Hm? Do I remember where we met? Well, of course I do! ...Ah... that is... huh? Ehehe... where was it...?
177.H1000: It's 10 o'clock. A battleship? 'Course! Together with Bismarck onee-sama, we'll sink it in no time! Leave it to us!
177.H1100: It's now 11 a.m. It's almost lunchtime, huh? For today, let's have lunch outside, okay?
177.H1200: Ah, it's already noon! It's midday! For lunch, does having cheese and bread outside sound good? Since it's so nice, shall we have a beer, ☆too? Aha, maybe not...
177.H1300: It's now 13 o'clock. Time to start the afternoon operations. Let's do our best!
177.H1400: 14 o'clock. Eh? What, what? Sakawa? Ah! I know her. She's that cute light cruiser.
177.H1500: 15 o'clock. Ah, you mean this? Yup! This is my rigging from Operation Cerberus. What do you think? Does it suit me~?
177.H1600: It's now 16 o'clock. Woah! You startled me, Bismarck onee-sama! You'd like to sortie together with me? Yes, certainly.
177.H1700: 17 o'clock. It's evening now. It's going to start getting dark. *sigh* Such a beautiful sky... Ah, of course, Bismarck onee-sama is even more beautiful!
177.H1800: It's 18 o'clock. I'll start preparing dinner. For today, does kaltes essen sound good? Eh... not in the mood? You'd prefer something warm?
177.H1900: It's 19 o'clock. Well then, I tried to make Eisbein pot-au-feu for dinner. You don't mind if the flavoring soaks into the soup, right? And finally, if you add in rice to make it a porridge, it's delicious!
177.H2000: It's now 20 o'clock. Japanese heavy cruisers are pretty well-rounded, huh? Hmm, hmm... mmm, I see~... hmm, hmm...
177.H2100: 21 o'clock. Huh? A signature move...? Let's see... I spent a lot of time shelling hordes of advancing enemy tanks! I'm pretty good at that! Yup!
177.H2200: It's completely dark out— 22 o'clock. Admiral, as always, good work on today's operations!
177.H2300: It's 23 o'clock. Hm, it's about time I was relieved so I can rest... Gute nacht... Huh? I can't...?

448.Intro: Buon Giorno! I am the first of the Zara-class Heavy Cruiser, Zara! "Tenacity" is my motto. Please to meet you, Admiral!
448.Library: I'm the first of the Zara-class heavy cruisers, Zara! I don't mean to brag, but I won't lose to any other heavy cruiser in a gunnery duel! I'm a little worried about my little sister, Pola, but that's neither here nor there... Admiral, I'm going to do my best! Heavy Cruiser Zara will join your fleet!
448.Poke(1): That's right, it's me, Zara. At the ready!
448.Poke(2): I wonder if Pola is alright... Ah... Yes, I'm ready anytime!
448.Poke(3): Even though I said tenacity is my strong point.... this is going too far ! Admiral, I'm going to get angry !
448.Idle: Eh? Pola? She still carries a bottle of booze? That's sounds typically bad. Admiral, where did you saw her? I need to look for her...
448.Married: Admiral, how are you? Good, I'm relieved! Of course, I'm worried about Pola too, but right now it's just us two, right? Hehe... Oh! I didn't mean it in that way, but...
448.Wedding: Admiral, what's the matter? This is... eh? A ring? Admiral, you want to remember me even more? I see... It seems my tenacity hits you as well, is it? Hehe... Grazie, Admiral.
448.Ranking: Intelligence? Yes! I have it with me.
448.Join: Zara-class heavy cruiser, Zara, set sail! Away to the fleet, sally go!
448.Equip(1): I'm actually a Treaty heavy cruiser... Ah, this is good! Good indeed.
448.Equip(2): Torpedo tubes...? No, I don't need it. It's not needed for me. But I don't mind equipping it.
448.Docking(1): They got me. Sorry. I'm going to the shower. Just a moment, I'll be done in a moment.
448.Docking(2): Sheesh... my clothes and equipment is in shambles! I still lack toughness! But next time I will succeed!
448.Construction: Admiral, A new ship has been constructed.
448.Sortie: Pola, you okay? No booze for you today. Zara's fleet, moving out! Follow my lead!
448.Battle: Enemy ships spotted, ready for shelling! Now, let's begin us Zara's battle!
448.Attack: Main batteries to the enemy ship dead center. Commencing assault! Sink away!
448.Yasen(1): Night battle... Sounds good. Finally we, the Zaras will show what we're made of. All fleets, follow my lead. We're breaking through!
448.Yasen(2): Battery number four, I'm counting on you. My tenaciousness is depending on this shot!
448.MVP: Eh? I'm number one? Grazie! I'll take the prize. Hehe...
448.Damaged(3): Kya! My plate won't fall off from just that!
448.Sunk: It's cold...water is... I see... Pola, don't drink too much... Okay?... I will...be going...ahead...
448.NewYears 6547: Buon Anno! Admiral, Happy New Year. Pola and I are counting on you again this year!
448.Setsubun 6547: Setsuuboon? That can't be it! That intonation is weird! Eh? Roma-san, what is it? Eh? Ehhhh? ...That's also a little...
448.Rainy 6547: "Tsuuyou" is what you call this time of year, right? With such a variety of names based on the season, Japan sure is an interesting place. No, I don't mind it at all.
448.Summer 6547: Swimsuit? No, I didn't bring one, but maybe I can buy one? Hmmmm.
448.Fall 6547: I like autumn. After all, this is the time of year when I was commissioned. I like how it makes me feel a little at ease. Right, Pola? Wha... you're off drinking! I said you can't!
448.Saury 6547: Saury! Yeah, it's great. It works well in pizza and pasta! I'll help! What should I do?
448.Xmas 6547: Buone Feste! Admiral? Here! Your present! A present from you would be... um... I... it'd be nice!

358.Intro: Buon Giorno, Admiral! And welcome back. Zara of the Zara-class first heavy cruiser is ready for order. Please be of service for today as well!
358.Poke(1): Yep, I'm right there. Good to go whenever!
358.Poke(2): Pola, right? Yes, I'm worried. Admiral, will you help look for her with me?
358.Equip(1): I'm actually a Treaty heavy cruiser... Ah, this is good! Radar sure is great.
358.Equip(2): Is this really an oxygen torpedo? Yes! Grazie, Admiral!
358.H0000: Buona sera! Admiral, I'll be in charge of secretary duties today. Is that okay?
358.H0100: Um... Zero one... zero zero hours. Like that? That's how? Ufufu, good. Zero zero!
358.H0200: 02..00 hours. Yes, it's the middle of the night. I hope Pola's not still out drinking... I'm a little worried.
358.H0300: 0300 hours. Alright, I think I'm getting used to it. Admiral, aren't I doing it perfectly? Ehe~
358.H0400: 0400 hours. It'll be morning soon. I'm a little tired, but... I'll keep going, Admiral!
358.H0500: 0500 hours. Alright, it's morning! Admiral, we stayed up all night, didn't we? Now everyone in the fleet is getting up and going through their morning rituals too... yeah!
358.H0600: 0600 hours. Buon giorno. The morning sun feels good, doesn't it Admiral?
358.H0700: 0700 hours. Admiral, I made breakfast for you. It's just a simple espresso and a fresh croissant, but please enjoy.
358.H0800: 0800 hours. Admiral, would you like another espresso? R-really? Okay, I'll bring it right out!
358.H0900: 0900 hours. Okay, time to start making use of the fleet. First up are the expeditions... oh? You want to do something else? Roger!
358.H1000: 1000 hours. Which practice exercise did you want? I kind of want to take a crack at those Takaaao-class! Admiral, is that alright? Ehe... roger.
358.H1100: 1100 hours. Those Takaaao sisters surprised me. I took some hits, but... how do I say it... it wasn't that bad. I'll challenge them again any day!
358.H1200: 1200 hours. What would you like for lunch? I learned to make a new sort of pasta—would you want to try it? Do you prefer rosso or bianco?
358.H1300: 1300 hours. How was it? Since it has a strong flavor, it's best to drink some wine first. Oh! But don't drink too much.
358.H1400: 14—Ah, Ciao, Libe! How are you? That's good to hear. I made a lot of new friends. Eh? I'll introduce you next time!
358.H1500: 1500 hours. Oh, RADAR? Um, I think I might need it. They call it "dentaaan" here, right?
358.H1600: 160—Ah, Roma and Littorio! Ciao! Oh... yes, I'm still getting used to it. I'm sure there's a lot you both could teach me.
358.H1700: 1700 hours. Admiral, what do you want to do for dinner? You want to go to "Mamiiiya"? Mamiiiya! Is that some sort of bar?
358.H1800: 1800 hours. So this is Mamiiiya's Bar... wah, something smells really good. Oh, my order... I'll have what the admiral is having.
358.H1900: 1900 hours. Admiral, is thish what Japanesh food tastesh like? Making the bestsh use of raw ingredients. I should... mmm... mph!
358.H2000: 2000 hours. This is also tasty... wait, who's that! Po... Pola!? She's here.. it can't be! Admiral, excuse me! Wait up!
358.H2100: *pant* 21... *pant* 00... hours. I'm so sorry, Admiral. It turned out to be nothing. Nothing... at all...
358.H2200: 2200 hours. Admiral, you worked hard today. Is it alright if I turn in early? I'm just a little... tired.
358.H2300: 2300 hours. You've had a long day, Admiral, so don't work too late. Buona notte!

496.Join: Tenacemente! Zara-class Heavy Cruiser "Zara", Weigh Anchor! Sally Forth!
496.Sortie: Pola, you good? You know, drinking real~ly isn't good for you! Alright, Heavy Cruiser Zara, Sally forth!
496.Battle: Enemy ships spotted, prepare for combat! Pola, you good? Look, the battle of the Zara-class starts now!

449.Intro: Buon Giornov~. I'm the third ship of the Zara-class heavy cruisers~, Pola~. I'm at an age where I want to challenge myself with everything. I'll do my best~.
449.Library: I'm the third ship of the Zara-class heavy cruisers, Pola. Everyone, be sure to remember me. I'm an excellent heavy cruiser focused on armor and defense. I participated properly in surface combat, but I wasn't able to have outstanding military results. I can only drink it away.
449.Poke(2): What is it?? Wanna have a drinking party??
449.Poke(3): Zaaara nee-sama, it's alright. I wasn't drinking. Oh, it's you, Admiral~
449.Idle: Hmm... Where did I hide that vintage wine...? Oh yeah, it's over there! Huh? Zara-neesama? Um... I'm not on duty right now. Umm... um..
449.Married: Admiral, did something bad happen to you? I see. Poor thing... I know, how about a little drink between the two of us? It's the best thing to do when things are falling apart. Cheers~!
449.Wedding: Admiral, are you saying that... really? It's for me? Hehehe~ Then how about a drink? Cheers~
449.Ranking: Information? Wait a bit. I'll get the files. Whoa... thanks, Admiral.
449.Join: Zara nee-sama. Don't worry so much. I'm gonna be fine~ I'm sortieing just fine~♪
449.Equip(1): Grazie, grazie~ A magnificent remodeling, Admiral. I'm getting good~.
449.Equip(2): A torpedo refit? Umm, that's fine, but can't we fit some more wine bottles?
449.Equip(3): Admiral, do you want to drink, too? It will make your body feel warm.
449.Docking(1): Admiral, I'm going to the bath~.
449.Docking(2): There are two Admirals... ehehehe. I drank a little. My clothes are in the way.
449.Construction: Admiral, I heard a new girl came.
449.Return: Admiral, the opera is over~. I mean, the operation is over~.
449.Sortie: Zara-class number 3, Pola, heading out~. Everybody, let's go together~. Aye~!
449.Battle: Eh? An enemy? Where, where? Oh, you're right... Oh, no... get ready for shelling~.
449.Yasen(2): I'm a Zara-class as well. My surface shelling skill is bar none~ ...supposedly...
449.MVP: Me? I'm number one? Can I drink the wine of victory~?
449.Damaged(1): Ow ow ow ow! O~wh ga~wd~!
449.Damaged(2): No, no. It hurts so much.
449.Damaged(3): Arrgh. It hurts too much. I can't go on without drinking! I'm getting hot.
449.Sunk: It's actually colder when you're bare naked... Zara, looks like this is goodbye for me... my...sister...
449.NewYears 6547: Admiral, Buon Anno~! Best wishes~ for the coming year~ Let's have a drink~!
449.Setsubun 6547: Zara nee-sama, this event is "Setsubunga", right? I'll go ask Roma-san, then. ...Eh? Eho roll fest? Really?
449.Rainy 6547: It's been nothing but rain late~ly... This must be the "Tswo-yoo" Zara told me about. Maybe I should go and make some "Terre-Terre Bouse".
449.Summer 6547: Zara nee-sama, what are you doing for this year's swimsuit? I spent all my money on booze, so I'll pass on this year~.
449.Fall 6547: Ehh~ Mizuho-san, what's this white wine? Japanese sake? It's got a weird taste and smell~ but it's delicious. Do you want to be friends? Ehehehe~
449.Saury 6547: Sauryfest...? I don't really get it, but Zara nee-sama, I'll help you out~
449.Wine 6547: Uwaa~ it's getting so cold... At times like this, even drinking won't warm you up~ Nachi-san, this is...?
449.Xmas 6547: Buone Feste~! Admiral~ Christmas is so fun, isn't it~? I'm not sure how many drinks I've had today, but I'm perfectly fine~ Ehe, huhuhuhu...

361.Intro: Buon Giornov~. I'm the third ship of the Zara-class heavy cruisers~, Pola~. With the admiral, I'll challenge anything~. I'll do my best.
361.Poke(2): What is it~? I'm ready for a sortie or a drinking party~.
361.Join: Zara nee-sama! Stop worrying. I'm okay! I will serve as flagship properly! Weigh anchor~♪
361.Equip(1): Admiral, grazie, grazie! But, um... could you leave my third turret like this...?
361.Equip(2): What a nice modification! I'm feeling wonderful~! Do you think I can store more bottles of alcohol?
361.Docking(1): Admiral, it's fine! I won't bring alcohol into the bath! Don't worry!
361.H0000: Admiral, buona sera! Today I, Pola will do various things by your side. Leave it to me~
361.H0100: Uhmm... Zerooooo-Oneeeeee-zerooo-zerooooo... zerooooooo-zerooooooooooouh.... How's that, Admiral~?
361.H0200: Too long? Hmm... very well. Oh-twooooooo-ohhhhhhh-ohhhhhhhh.... How bout that~
361.H0300: 03...00. How's that~ It's good, eh? Yeah, I get carried away once I start drinking~ Ehehehe~ I'm warmed up~
361.H0400: 0400. Ahh... it's so hot. I need to get rid of these clothes... Eh, Admiral? Why are you stopping me? I'm getting hot in here!
361.H0500: 0500. What's that, Admiral? I should drink some water? I'd prefer booze over... Okay, down the hatch. *gulp*
361.H0600: Ghood Mornin' Admiral~ Somehow I don't remember anything... and right now is 0600. Oh, it's already morning.
361.H0700: 0700... Admiral, for some reason my head hurts so bad. Ah, I smell the fragrance of espresso. Thank you, Zara.
361.H0800: 0800. Zara's espresso and croissant is delicious. *nom* Thifh ishf goohfd bhrfsfhasft
361.H0900: 0900. Yes, Zara. No need to worry. I won't drink any booze to make me feel relaxed. Am I right, Admiral~?
361.H1000: 1000. Admiral, do you have any preference for this fleet composition? Will it be Maauuse transport? Or Fuleet Escort~?
361.H1100: 1100. That's right. I have some interest in Oxygen Thorpidos~. But all I got is shelling exercise...
361.H1200: 1200. Zara's new creation pasta tastes good~ *nom* The shmell of this bhianco whith gohs vehry whell~ Shoo ghood~!
361.H1300: 1300. Fleet battle? Yes, I have some experience. But those tea drinker battleships sure are powerful...
361.H1400: 14- Hmm...? For some reason she looks like that tea drinker battleship I've met. She's a Japanese Battleship? Is that so? Hmm...
361.H1500: 15. Oh, Miss Littorio. A job well done. Eh, you changed your name? Oh, I see... By the way, about that battleship...
361.H1600: 1600. So that powerful Japanese battleship is called "Congo". I'm starting to have an interest in her.
361.H1700: 1700. Admiral, the sunset over the horizon sure is beautiful. It's like the color of Rosso red wine~ Hehehe...
361.H1800: 1800. About dinner... Ah, we're eating out? Ehehe... I'll accompany you. And the store is... Maamiya? Is that a Trattoria?
361.H1900: 1900. Admiral, Trattoria Maamiya is the best. The food and drinks are delicious. Ah, can I have more wine?
361.H2000: 2000. Hey Admiral, wanna drink~? Ahh~ I can't hear you over the sound of my full stomach~ Drink up~ Ahahahahaha~ This is fun, isn't it~?
361.H2100: 21... Ahhh... Too troublesome. One more bottle of red and white wine, please! Ah... It's hot! My clothes are in the way! Eh... Zara! I-uh...
361.H2200: 22...00 I got scolded so, so, soooooo~ bad by Zara. Did I drink too much~? How strange...
361.H2300: 2300. The day has almost ended without anything bad happening. Buona notte, Admiral~

51.Intro: My name is Tenryuu. Heheh. Ya scared?
51.Library: First of the Tenryuu-class, Tenryuu. Along with some destroyers, I led raids in a torpedo squadron. My partner of the same class is Tatsuta. That girl... I wonder if she's alright? Well, whatever.
51.Poke(2): Don't leave me out if there's a night battle, alright?
51.Poke(3): Checkin' out my weapons? They easily surpass any others in the world! ...What? They're old, ya say!? Dumbass.
51.Wedding: Haha! Did ya fall in love with my power? Huh? Not my power, but me!? Ha! This is some kinda messed up dream, right!?
51.Ranking: Letter's here. Hurry up and read it.
51.Equip(1): Ya sure ya wanna power me up this much...?
51.Equip(2): That's it, that's it! I've always wanted something like that! Hurry up and hand it over!
51.Supply: Ya sure ya wanna power me up this much...?
51.Docking(1): Hey! Don't pull me back from the front lines!
51.Docking(2): Hey! Don't withdraw me from the battlefield! Let me fight 'til my dying breath!
51.Return: This fleet finally cleared the mission. Come on... let's get moving!
51.Battle: This is the mighty Tenryuu's attack! Hell yeah!
51.Attack: Too scared to speak, huh? Check this!
51.Yasen(1): Charging into night battle! Ya best be scared!
51.Yasen(2): The smell of gunpowder is the best, ain't it?
51.MVP: It's only natural. I'm the strongest, after all!
51.Damaged(3): To be able to take me down this far... you're good. I'll give ya that.
51.Sunk: Damn it... I can't advance or retreat. Tatsuta... hate to say it... but I'm goin' on ahead...
51.NewYears 6547: Admiral, Happy New Year! Countin' on ya again this year! Well, I'll be showin' ya plenty of my strength this year! Hmhm, that's right.
51.Setsubun 6547: Ow! Owowow! Why the heck is everyone throwin' beans at me!? Hey! Don't just say, "you're the demon, nanodesu"! This isn't even a horn! H-Hey, Tatsuta! Stop handin' 'em beans!
51.Valentines 6547: Yo, Admiral. Been waitin' for ya. My chocolate tops even world-class stuff... My hands are cold? I-I didn't wait that long, ya know...
51.Anniversary 6547: Admiral, 'grats on the third anniversary! Well, ya did good endurin' my strength for the past 3 years. Not bad!
51.Rainy 6547: Admiral, are ya headin' out? You better take an umbrella with ya. Well, so my radar says.
51.Summer 6547: Hell yeah! It's summer! Everyone's meetin' up at the beach in their swimsuits. We're gonna do some special training usin' a ball. Make sure the net ain't too high for the destroyers.
51.Fall 6547: The signs of fall are everywhere... it's completely fall now. Maybe I'll write a poem. Uh... Hey, Tatsuta, you're laughing too much!
51.YearsEnd 6547: The year is finally about over with. Admiral, we're hittin' the New Year's Eve bell together this year. Right?

213.Idle: Hey, hey! Put me in an operation right now! I'll lose my edge.
213.Married: Ahh? Well, that's just the kinda guy you are. It's all good!

52.Intro: Nice to meet you, I'm Tatsuta~. I hope Tenryuu-chan hasn't been causing you trouble?
52.Library: Light cruiser Tatsuta, second of Tenryuu class. I come from Sasebo. I hope Tenryuu-chan hasn't been causing everybody trouble? You really can't take your eyes off that girl, right? Huh? Me? Well, I'm not particularly fond of submarines~
52.Poke(1): Is there something on your mind?
52.Poke(2): Waah, it's dangerous if you suddenly talk from behind me, you know.
52.Poke(3): Touching is forbidden~ That hand, don't blame me if it falls off.

52.Ranking: A message for you~. It'd be nice if every message brought good news~.
52.Join: Time for a sortie. Now where's a ship who wants to die?
52.Equip(1): Oh~ It seems I've become stronger again.
52.Equip(2): Thank you. Don't tell Tenryuu-chan about it. That girl gets sulky easily.
52.Docking(1): I want to relax like this for a while~
52.Docking(2): A~Ah, I'm all tattered~ I'll sleep in the dock for a while, futons are happiness~
52.Construction: Looks like a newcomer has arrived~
52.Return: The fleet has returned? Looks like the operation has ended~
52.Sortie: Where is the enemy? My torpedoes are anxious.
52.Attack: Oh~ have you lost your voice?
52.Yasen(1): Let's give chase~ They absolutely will not escape.
52.Yasen(2): Aren't I more skilled than Tenryuu-chan~?
52.MVP: Eh, me? I've still got more to go~ Hey, Tenryuu-chan's got such an ama~zing glaring face, ufufu~
52.Damaged(2): Noo, my clothes~ ...I won't forgive you...
52.Damaged(3): Don't tell me you thought you'd won with just this~? Attacking all out even at your own expense...Fufu...Ufufufu..
52.Sunk: I was killed in such a flashy way~ Oh? I can see Tenryuu-chan fighting... That's good~
52.NewYears 6547: Admiral, it's New Year's. A year has passed by. Happy New Year. Along with Tenryuu-chan, we'll be counting on you again this year, okay?
52.Setsubun 6547: Girls~? "Demons, begone~ Fortune, welcome~" is what you say when throwing the beans. Just say so if you're out of beans to throw, okay~? Make sure you aim well at the demon, okay~? Ufufu♪
52.Valentines 6547: Why are you gazing at me with such wanting eyes~? Such a needful person. Be sure to savor every bite~
52.Anniversary 6547: Congratulations on the third anniversary. For sure, even though it's a happy occasion, touching is prohibited. Oh, can't you hear me? Do you want to die?
52.Rainy 6547: I wonder when it will stop raining. When it's this humid, wounds will start to ache.... ufufu.
52.Summer 6547: It's becoming the hot part of the year, isn't it? You wish you could have air conditioning in your office? Why are you trying to joke around...? Those clothes of yours... I'll make them cooler for you, okay?
52.Fall 6547: Fall appetite. Fall reading. Tenryuu-chan has fall inspiration~ May I see? Ufufu... ahaha... ahahahahaha!!
52.YearsEnd 6547: It's the end of year, so how will you spend the night? Hitting the bell with a certain someone? Or maybe... with me? Ufufu~

214.Idle: I'm a little bored~. Well, it's okay because I'll do what I want to~

99.Intro: Kumaa. Nice to meet you, kuma.
99.Library: First ship of the Kuma-class light cruisers, Kuma kuma. Born in Sasebo kuma. I got some old parts, but I'll try my best, kumaa.
99.Poke(3): Don't pat me, kuma. I'm not a teddy bear, kuma~
99.Married: Admiral, thanks for you hard work kuma. Taking a break from time-to-time is good, kuma.
99.Wedding: Fufufu~ I've caught the admiral, kuma. I'm not gonna let you go, kuma. Kumakuma~!
99.Docking(2): I almost thought I was going to die there, kuma~!
99.Construction: A new ship has been made, kuma~.
99.Return: Mission complete. Do you want to see the report, kuma?
99.Sortie: Choosing Kuma is a good choice, kuma.

99.Setsubun 6547: It's Setsubun, kuma. Bean throwing, kuma. The target is... Kiso. ...Ah, better not... ...Ooi. ...Also better not. ...Eh, Tama then, kuma! ...Tama... sorry, kuma.
99.Valentines 6547: Admiral, this is for you, kuma. Don't worry, kuma. It's made of chocolate, kuma. You can eat it with peace of mind, kuma.
99.Anniversary 6547: It's the bearry unexpected third anniversary. I can't bearlieve it, But it bears a celebration! Ku-ma~!
99.Rainy 6547: I hate the rainy season, kuma. Kuuuumaaaa... kuuuumaaaa... Aah! I hate the rain, kuma. Kuuuumaaaa...
99.Summer 6547: It's summer! I'm going swimming, kumaaa. Watch Kuma's river-swimming technique, kuma. I'll paw up some salmon too, kuma~. Ah... that was a joke, kuma.
99.YearsEnd 6547: Cleaning time, kuma. I will do my best, too, kuma! ...But I'm already tired of it, kuma. Running away, kuma!

215.Idle: Ku~…ma~… it, it's not like I'm bored, Kuma. I'm enjoying this fully, Kuma!

100.Intro: Light cruiser, Tama. I'm not a cat, nya.

100.MVP: Tama's excellence? Nya~, that's just my high hunter's instincts... nya.
100.NewYears 6547: New Year's, nya. Happy New Year, nya. Counting on you again this year, nya. ...Nyaa~
100.Valentines 6547: Admiral... chocolate for you, nya. It's not matatabi, nya. It's my chocolate, nya. Nyaa...

100.Summer 6547: It's summer, nyaaa. It's a little hot, nya. It's so hot it makes me wanna roll over onto my back and sleep, nya. Nyaa~
100.YearsEnd 6547: End of the year, nya? A time when everyone gets busy, nya. I can't help going to the corner to lie down, nya. Nya...

25.Intro: I'm light cruiser Kitakami. Nice ta meet ya.
25.Library:
Kuma-class light cruiser, third ship, Kitakami here~

Hmm? Yeah. Ooichi's my pal.

I heard I can step up into bein' a torpedo cruiser that rapid-fires oxygen torpedoes, yeah? Wanna try?
25.Poke(2): Ooichi, yeah, what's up...? Ah... it's just you, Admiral.
25.Poke(3): Gee~ez, Ooichi, stop feelin' my body up...! Er... it's the Admiral. Whatcha doin'?

25.Married: Admiral? What happened? Ya feelin' down? That's not like ya. Everything's fine!
25.Wedding: Eh...? You've taken an interest in me? Ya got good taste, y'know. Truly exceptional!
25.Ranking: Admiral, it's a message for ya. Here.
25.Equip(1): Yeah. I like bein' strengthened. Keep 'em comin'!
25.Equip(2): It's nice, yeah. I'm mesmerized, yeah! Thanks, yeah?
25.Docking(1): Sorry... I got wrecked a little.
25.Docking(2): What can I do!? My armor's as good as paper...
25.Construction: I heard that a new ship got launched, yeah.
25.Battle: Enemy sighted! It's a surface battle... get ready~!

25.Yasen(1): Wellll then, we got 'em cornered~! Follow me!
25.Yasen(2): These single gun mounts are elegant in their own special way, y'know?

25.Damaged(1): What the...? This much won't stop me!
25.Damaged(3): That's pretty sad... Ooichi's gonna have a big laugh if she sees this. Damn it...
25.Sunk: Next time I'm reborn... I want to be a heavy cruiser, y'know...
25.NewYears 6547: Well, best wishes, y'know? Countin' on ya again this year, y'know. New Year's just makes ya wanna relax, y'know. Y'know, Ooicchi?

25.Anniversary 6547: Huh? I forgot....that today is a special day.... Whoa! All the destroyers... don't gather around me...!
25.YearsEnd 6547: Whew...! It's already the end of the year. The naval base cleanin' stuff isn't even started... ...whew...

58.Intro: A brand new Kitakami... that's who I am. I feel a little more mature, loaded to the brim with oxygen torpedoes like this♪
58.Library:
I'm fully loaded with Type 93 oxygen torpedoes, with 20 torpedo launchin' tubes on each side for a proud 40 in all. I got all this after remodeling into a torpedo cruiser, so now I'm Super Kitakami-sama!

They say that I had overwhelming power, but... I never really had a chance to achieve anything with it. Tch...
