58.Poke(2): Nh...? What...? Admiral... what's up with ya, huh? It's fine, though, yeah.
58.Poke(3): Th-That? I'd rather not load any.

58.Yasen(2): Well... my main cannons are... yeah... well... yeah, y'know?

58.H0100: 0100. Yeah, that's right. The time announcin' thing, y'know. I'll be doin' it for ya today.
58.H0200: 0200. I'm gettin' bored of this. Have any manga or anything? Y'know, manga.
58.H0300: Tch... 0300. It's really far into the night, y'know. I'm tired, too...
58.H0400: The present time is 0400. Aren't ya feelin' sleepy? Oh, I see. Good for you...
58.H0500: 0500. It's almost morning... so bright... I'm sho sleepy. Can I sleep? Like right now...

58.H1200: 1200. It's lunch time...! Well then, I wonder what we should eat today, y'know? Hmm...
58.H1300: 1300. That's right, it's gotta be curry for lunch, y'know~! Maybe I should go for Mamiya Curry, y'know? Or maybe I should go half-watch ashore?
58.H1400: *sigh* In the end, I always have Mamiya-san's curry. Well, that's fine, y'know. It's delicious. Ah... 1400. Just in case, y'know.
58.H1500: 1500. Well, y'know... lotsa stuff happened, y'know. But yeah, it can't be helped, either, yeah. That's what I'm thinkin'...
58.H1600: 1600. Ah, it's Abukuma. Hey~! Huh? Yeah, so why ya runnin' away? Heeey. ...What a weird person. Y'know?
58.H1700: The present time is 1700. It's almost closin' time for today, y'know? The sun's settin'~
58.H1800: 1800. Well, that's 'bout it for today~ Eh... it's still too early? I see... tch...
58.H1900: 1900. Ah, Ooichi~! Why ya holdin' a pot? Eh? Ooichi's special curry? C-Curry, huh...
58.H2000: 2000. Eh? Admiral, so it's okay to have curry again this evenin'? Hmmm... It's good, yeah? It's mesmerizin', yeah♪ Ooichi, thanks, yeah?
58.H2100: 2100. Well, we ended up havin' nothin' but curry today, but yeah, Ooichi's sure is good, y'know? The flavor was kinda weird, though.
58.H2200: 2200. Well, it's about time for the fleet duties to finish for today~ 'Preciate the hard work~ Bed time, bed time. Admiral? Laters.
58.H2300: 2300. ...Huh? Huuuh? Ehh... I'm on night watch duty tonight? Ehh... can I pull it off...? Isn't this a bit of a stretch?

119.Poke(3): Gee~ez, Ooichi, stop feelin' my body up...! Er... it's the Admiral. Whatcha doin'?
119.Wedding: Well... what to say? Oh, yeah... doesn't this feel nice? Lately... I kinda think like that, but... yeah... Well, that's kinda how it is?
119.Ranking: Oh, that's right. Gotta check the intelligence, y'know.
119.Equip(1): Keep 'em comin'! I'll be an even better ship, yeah♪
119.Equip(2): It's nice, yeah. I'm mesmerized, yeah! Thanks, yeah?
119.Docking(2): Well, a bath is good, too, y'know~? Y'know, Ooichi?
119.Construction: A new ship got launched, yep.
119.Battle: These single gun mounts are elegant in their own special way, y'know?
119.Attack: My 40 oxygen torpedo tubes aren't just for show!
119.Sunk:
I'd like to be... a carrier in my next life, pl... ease...
Hey, maybe a repair ship would work... ...ahaha...

24.Intro: Hello. I'm Light Cruiser Ooi. Pleased to make your acquaintance.
24.Library: I'm Ooi, fourth ship in the Kuma-class light cruisers. I was born in Kobe. I'm an active practice ship at the Navy School, you know? Of course, I'll change into a torpedo cruiser if I need to fight for real. Nice to meet you!
24.Poke(1): Is this some sort of drill?
24.Poke(3): Admiral.. what's with that hand? Is this some sort of drill? May I shoot it?
24.Idle: Will Kitakami-san be alright?..... I'm getting worried as I'm not with her... Hmm... I'm so worried... It's definitely, yes, there's definitely something that's about to happen! I have to go now!
24.Married: Admiral? What happened to the other girls, you say? Eh...? That's not it? Hmm, it's okay then.. It's okay...
24.Wedding: Kitakami-san!... oh, it's the admiral? Ah, no, it's fine.. yes, I love the admiral too!
24.Ranking: There is a new message for you, Admiral.
24.Equip(2): Um, please strengthen the other ships too.
24.Supply: Yep, be sure to pack me with fuel and torpedoes okay? Fufu, this way I can fight again.
24.Docking(1): Yes, I'll be taking a short break.
24.Docking(2): Tsk, what terrible command- no, it's nothing~. Ufufu.
24.Construction: I'm so happy that a new friend has arrived.
24.Return: The fleet has returned. Thanks, everyone.
24.Sortie: Ooi, sortieing! Don't fall behind, everyone!
24.Battle: I get all worked up when I hear about exchanging shells!
24.Yasen(1): Who's the one that hurt Kitakami?
24.Yasen(2): Become scrap at the bottom of the sea!
24.MVP: Oh, me? Ufufu, that isn't such a bad feeling. I'll try my best again!
24.Damaged(3): They got me... I'll need to get repaired.
24.Sunk: I wonder if we've worn down the enemy fleet...? Really? That's fine. I'll sink them...
24.NewYears 6547: Kitakami-san!! Best wishes for the coming year! I'll be c- ...Oh, Admiral? I'll be counting on you again this year. Yes.
24.Valentines 6547: V-Valentine's... This will be year of the decisive battle! Ufufu, fu, fu... uu!? Ah, a nosebleed? Ahahaha...
24.Anniversary 6547: Today's an important day! During a day like this, it's the best to spend the day with Kitakami-san! Kitakami-saaaaan!
24.Summer 6547: It's almost summer, isn't it? Time to go buy a matching set of swimsuits with Kitakami. Ufufufufufu.
24.YearsEnd 6547: Ugh... why does the end of the year have to be so busy...? Ah... cleaning... I'll do my best♪

57.Intro: I'm torpedo cruiser Ooi. By the way, I wonder where Kitakami-san is.
57.Library: It's Ooi, torpedo cruiser edition. My torpedo powers were counted in, but I didn't have much of the limelight. I'll show you what I'm made of this time. Keep your eyes open!
57.Poke(1): Um... do I fire a torpedo?
57.Poke(3): You like them too, Admiral? Yes, I have a lot attached to my legs! ...but you've touched them too much, so how about eating 20 of them?
57.Wedding: Of the two Torpedo cruisers, you chose me, right?... If you betray me, I'll sink you in the ocean, you know...
57.Ranking: It seems there is a message for you, Admiral.
57.Equip(1): These Type-93 Oxygen Torpedoes are so cool... and marvelous.
57.Equip(2): I want to be able use my torpedoes to their maximum abilities.
57.Equip(3): If Kitakami is fine with it, go ahead.
57.Docking(2): That strategy was horrible... No, sorry for my incompetence.
57.Construction: A new friend has joined our fleet.
57.Return: The campaign has ended. Good work.
57.Sortie: Now, let's go and fire these oxygen torpedoes up!
57.MVP: I'm the one? Aww, I'm loss for words♪ Eh, Kitakami-san...? Did Kitakami-san see that!? Did she!?
57.Damaged(3): Oh no! My torpedo tubes are in tatters now!
57.Sunk: I guess it isn't bad... to sink as a Torpedo Cruiser...
57.H0000: Admiral, midnight has just came around again. It's late night.
57.H0100: The time is currently at 0100. Eh...? It sounds too strict? I-I see...
57.H0200: The time is――... Ah, I mean, it's 0200. Do you prefer it like this, Admiral?
57.H0300: 0300. ...Geez, so annoying. Being picky even in the way I make the hourly announcements... N-Nothing! It's 0300, sir!
57.H0400: It's 04...00... Admiral? Admiral...? Did he go to sleep? ...THIS IS MY CHANCE!
57.H0500: 0500. I need to go to Kitakami-san's side!! Yes, she is definitely troubled! Kitakami-saaaaaaaaaan!!
57.H0600: 0600! Kitakami-san, are you okay, are you safe!? I-it looks like you're fine... Eh? This knife? Ah, it's for making breakfast...
57.H0700: 07,00... Yes, I was thinking, of preparing, breakfast... For today's miso soup, are you okay with gluten?
57.H0800: 0800. Alright, for Kitakami-san's sake, I made breakfast with a quality that is above my skill level! Please go ahead and eat up♪ ...It's delicious? I'm relieved♪
57.H0900: 0900. Eh, shouldn't I return to my post? But...
57.H1000: 1000. Admiral, I'm back... Where did I go? ...Isn't it obvious, of course it's to Kitakami-san's place!!
57.H1100: 1100. Um... Admiral? Why are you holding your head like that? Did you get a flu!? Let's see, where is the flu medicine...
57.H1200: It's 1200. It is now noon. Should I make some lunch? It's fine. I'm good at cooking.
57.H1300: 1300. Go on, eat up! Eh? What is this...? It's obviously omelette rice! Should I write something with the ketchup?
57.H1400: It's 1400. What is it, Admiral? What's with that look of doubt on your face. I didn't do anything like poison your lunch, you know? How rude.
57.H1500: 1500. It's about time to seriously go out for some sorties now I guess. ..Yes, I'll do my best!
57.H1600: 1600. Um... For the expedition, what should the fleet do, Admiral?
57.H1700: It's 1700. Oh my, It's nearly dinner time. I'll prepare dinner food for a while.
57.H1800: The time is currently at 1800. What kind of pot is this, you ask? It's certainly, my special curry, fulfilled with my love! I'm leaving!
57.H1900: 1900. Kitakami-san♪ I just accidentally cook too much curry! If you don't mind, let's eat togetheeeeR!
57.H2000: 2000. See, there's a curry for Admiral too. Eh? It's delicious...? Your body is getting hotter? You see?
57.H2100: It is now 2100. Let's see, we're done washing up, the area around the fire is okay too. Good work for today, Admiral. Fuu...
57.H2200: 2200. Tsk, That one light cruiser is making such a noise A―GAIN... Admiral, Can I go to complain her? Ah, O...Okay?
57.H2300: 2300. Admiral, Thank you for your hard work today. Is Kitakami-san already sleeping?

118.Equip(2): Hehehe... Nobody will get in our way anymore... Ah, there's a speck of dust on my shoulder. OK, I'm good.
118.Docking(2): It's all the campaign's fault! No, sorry for my incompetence.
118.Construction: Eh? A new ship? ...Tch, another nuisance. No, it's nothing.
118.Sortie: Now, I will strike with the true power of these wonderfully cold oxygen torpedoes!
118.Battle: I get all worked up when I hear about exchanging shells!
118.Attack: Become scrap at the bottom of the sea!

101.Intro: It's Kiso. I'll bestow upon you absolute victory.
101.Library: 5500 ton Kuma-class light cruiser, Kiso. My regards. Runways and catapults... forget it. Don't need 'em. Battle is all about bringing it up close and personal. Right!?
101.Poke(3): Now you're talkin'. Skinship is important.
101.Idle: Someday, together with you... No, nothing. It's so unlike me too. Heh.
101.Wedding: Don't mind me sayin' it, but your orders in battle send shivers through my spine. You're not half bad!
101.Join: Where's the fool who dares challenge me?
101.Equip(1): Seaplanes? Don't need that sort of thing.
101.Supply: Seaplanes? Don't need that sort of thing.
101.Construction: Looks like a new ship is ready to go.
101.Sortie: I'll teach them the meaning of a real battle.
101.Yasen(1): Did you really think you could get away?
101.Yasen(2): That's one incompetent commander you got there!
101.MVP: An inevitable result. No need to make a fuss about it.
101.Damaged(3): Well then, I guess I've got some ventilation.
101.Sunk: To have been able to sink me... be proud of yourself.
101.NewYears 6547: Happy New Year. So you made it far enough to welcome a new year. That's good. I'll rely on you again this year.
101.Setsubun 6547: What's with that bean? You couldn't possibly have chosen me as the demon and decided to throw it at me... ...right?
101.Valentines 6547: This isn't really my thing... Well, it's from one comrade to another. Take it.
101.Anniversary 6547: So it has been three years... It looks like we've known each other for so long. No, It's not a bad thing.
101.Rainy 6547: The rainy season makes the wounds on my body ache... Telling me, "Faster. Go faster."... Nah, don't mind me.
101.Summer 6547: Summer, huh? Well, this season isn't too bad. You planning to go to the sea? Well?
101.Xmas 6547: So it's Christmas... Well, it's not a bad thing.
101.Xmas 1471: Christmas cake... Hmph. ...Why the hell is it so sweet!? It's too damn sweet!!
101.YearsEnd 6547: A ship girl song showdown...? No, I'm not joining anything like that. I said I'm not going! Hey!

146.Intro: You're still worried? It's fine. Leave it to me.
146.Poke(3): Damn straight! You and I are good together!
146.Idle: Someday, together with you... No, forget it. That's so unlike me. Heheh.
146.Supply: Thanks for the supply. You should eat properly, too.

21.Intro: Light Cruiser Nagara! Please take good care of me!
21.Library: Weighing in as a 5500 ton light cruiser, first ship of the Nagara-class, Nagara! I'm a bit of an old model, but I'm a high-speed torpedo-armed team-leading machine, so I'm just perfect to command destroyers, you know? I even fought hard in the difficult Battle of the Solomons!
21.Poke(1): Commander, thanks for the hard work!
21.Poke(2): Done my miles for the day!
21.Poke(3): The commander is interested too? I've been working on my legs recently...
21.Wedding: Thank you for always leading us to victory! Nagara also loves the commander!
21.Join: It's time! Leave it to me!
21.Equip(2): Mhm! My body is light. Thank You!
21.Return: The operation's over, the fleet's back.
21.Sortie: Torpedo squadron, sortieing! I'm itching for a fight!
21.Battle: Enemy ship spotted! Ready for surface action!
21.Yasen(1): Pursuing! I won't give you a gap to break through!
21.Yasen(2): Can you keep up with Nagara's legs?
21.MVP: V-I-C-T-O-R-Y! Vic~to~ry! The sound of success!
21.Damaged(3): If I had only trained more... Dammit!!
21.Sunk: I wanted to run with everyone some more...
21.NewYears 6547: Commander, best wishes for the coming year! I'll be running at full power again this year! Try to keep up~! Alright~!
21.Setsubun 6547: Who is this year's demon-san...? Ah, a Kongou-class...? Hmm, hmm... Hiei-san and... Ki... Kirishima-san!? Uuuuu... ...Oh, right! I'm not finished with my running yet!
21.Xmas 6547: Mmm~ this chicken is so good♪ Oh, right, it's turkey. ...Ah, Hiei-san, what's up? Eh? Christmas Special Curry...? ...Eh? Ehh!? Ehhhhhhhh!?

218.Idle: Alright...! I ran all day again today! I'll run even more tomorrow! Ah! Commander! Heading out? Going for a long run? I'll come with you! Eh, you're not?

22.Intro: I'm Isuzu. Leave the torpedo squadrons to me. I'll bring victory to the admiral with all my power. Pleased to meet you.
22.Library: Isuzu was built in the Taisho period (1912-1926) as the second of the Nagara Class light cruisers. As you might expect my speed is top-rate; the admirals that commanded me in history include Admiral Yamamoto Isoroku, Admiral Yamaguchi Tamon, and many other pillars of the Navy. Amazing, huh?
22.Poke(3): Huh? I got distracted. What was it you wanted?
22.Married: Idiot, don't worry so much. It's fine to take a break.
22.Wedding: The admirals I've had as my partners have all had great success. Isoroku, Tamon... I wonder what will become of you? I'm looking forward to it.
22.Ranking: There's a report for you. Read it well.
22.Equip(1): That modernization... saved me. Now I can work harder!
22.Equip(2): Heheh, that'll do. Now I'm more ready to fight!
22.Supply: Heheh, that'll do. Now I'm more ready to fight!
22.Docking(1): To be my best again, I'll have to go for a little.
22.Docking(2): It's okay, if I rest a little, one way or another I'll be better.
22.Return: It seems the fleet has returned to base.
22.Sortie: Admiral Yamamoto and Admiral Yamaguchi were my captains, you know!
22.Yasen(1): A pursuit battle is Isuzu's speciality!
22.Yasen(2): Idiot, do you want me to shoot you?
22.MVP: Huh? Isuzu is No.1? Well, that's what you'd normally expect. Ain't it good?
22.Damaged(3): It's only the equipment on the surface that's damaged at most. The engines are still fine!
22.Sunk: I overdid it slightly, huh...? Nagara, Natori, be well...

219.Idle: I-It's not like I'm bored! I'm not! Okay!?

141.Intro: It's Isuzu, remodelled. Leave anti-submarine and anti-air roles to me!
141.Poke(2): Idiot, do you want me to shoot you?
141.Idle: I-It's not like I'm bored! I'm not! Okay!?
141.Supply: Oh, supplies... I can fight on with these!
141.Docking(1): Idiot - don't worry so much. I'll be fine with a quick rest.
141.Sortie: Well then, I will show you the strength of remodelled Isuzu!

23.Intro: Fourth ship of the Nagara-class Light Cruisers, 'Yura'. Pleased to make your acquaintance!
23.Library: I'm Yura, the fourth ship of the Nagara-type Light Cruisers. I was the first out of all of us to be equipped with seaplanes. I've served as the flagship of torpedo and submarine squadrons. I'm not so good with Dauntless and B17 planes.
23.Poke(3): Admiral, do you really like my single barrel guns so much?
23.Wedding: Admiral, how was my recon? As a light cruiser, I wanted to try doing it once…
23.Join: Nagara-class Light Cruiser, Yura, heading out.
23.Equip(1): That's right, my firepower will become stronger, right?
23.Equip(2): Is my catapult... in the way?
23.Supply: Oh yeah, I've strengthen my firepower. Nice work!
23.Construction: They say a new ship has been completed.
23.Return: Seems like the fleet has returned. I wonder if they achieved any results?
23.Sortie: Now, I guess I shall show off a little.
23.MVP: Yura is the best? Really? Hurray!
23.Damaged(2): It will take more than this to sink me...
23.Damaged(3): Not yet... I won't sink from just this!
23.Sunk: I guess this is better... than being scuttled...
23.NewYears 6547: Admiral, Happy New Year. I'll be counting on you again this year. Okay?
23.LateWinter 6547: Admiral-san... it's the winter season, you know? Shall we grill some mochi? ...Or is it too fattening...?
23.Setsubun 6547: Admiral-san, it's Setsubun... ...These beans are meant for throwing, Admiral? You're really that into this?
23.Valentines 6547: Admiral-san, do you really enjoy chocolate... that much? Then, I'll give you my chocolate as well... okay?
23.Rainy 6547: The rainy season. Admiral, would you like to spend some time with me in my room? I'll make you some tea. Well?
23.EarlySummer 6547: Admiral. You can really feel the summer when the rainy season ends, can't you? I would like to get... a new swimsuit, too.
23.Summer 6547: Admiral, it's summer, right? Right! Ah... Yuudachi-chan. Your swimsuit is cute. Mine will be next year, too.
23.OldFall 6547: Fall, huh? ...The further we go into fall, for some reason, I... start to feel a little more lonely, you know...
23.Fall 6547: Admiral, the season is... fall, you know? Hey... would you mind going with me... to the naval base's Fall Festival this year?
23.Fall 1471: Admiral, that handbag... is very nice. It's really lovely. I wish I had one, too...
23.Saury 6547: Admiral, it's the time of year for delicious salt-grilled saury, right? Right? I wish we could grill some tonight.
23.Cold 6547: Admiral. Fall this year is coming to a close. It'll be getting cold. So that you don't catch a cold, make sure to stay warm at night, okay?
23.Xmas 6547: Admiral, Merry Christmas! Isn't it nice having Christmas with me? Now, say "ahh~"
23.Xmas 1471: Admiral, this food looks really good. Here, say "ahh~" This is fun! Right?

220.Idle: Admiral-san... um, I... ah... Admiral-san, you look so busy... I know, while you're busy, I'll take your personal belongings and wash them for you. Well... this is washed... and this is washed... ...This is... ...mh...! This one, too! I've washed them for you, okay? Hey...
220.Supply: I'm thankful... for this... you know?

53.Intro: I'm called Natori... I'll do my best not to trouble you!
53.Library: Third ship of the Nagara-class, Natori. I'm a bit of an older model, but there is much use for a high-speed light cruiser too... Y-yes, a Destroyer squadron, it'd be best if I was assigned to one, please. I-I'll do my best!
53.Poke(3): T-this... this is 'psyching up', isnt it.... Do your best..! Everybody!
53.Married: Yeah! Then... that's all from me...
53.Wedding: The admiral doesn't really like fighting as well, it makes me feel at ease. For the admiral, no, for y-you… I'll keep doing my best.
53.Join: You called for me... Eh!? Sortie!?
53.Equip(2): Modernization... sorry! Even though I'm old...
53.Equip(3): Yeah! Then... that's all from me...
53.Docking(2): It's going to take a while to recover...
53.Construction: A new friend... well... that's all from me...
53.Return: The operation is complete and the fleet has returned. Then... that's all from me...
53.Battle: E-enemy spotted... wait, it's a real battle!?
53.Yasen(1): Night battle.... I'm good at them but... I...
53.Yasen(2): Surface action... it'll be okay... I've practiced for this...
53.MVP: Eh!? I was the one who did the best...!? You're going to praise me...? Thank you...
53.Damaged(2): Hieeeee! I-I'm on fire? Help meeeee!
53.Damaged(3): Everyone... where did you all go...? *cries*
53.Sunk: I've sunk a lot of ships already... I guess... this would have happened sooner or later...
53.NewYears 6547: Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! Oh... If you don't mind, the fleet will be counting on you again this year...!
53.Setsubun 6547: So this is bean throwing. DesRon 5's demon will be... Huh? Uwa...! I-It's me? Ah, no way! Ow, ow! That hurts...! ...Stop it! Uwehhh... save me...!
53.Xmas 6547: This cake is really good...! Ah, Isuzu-nee, did you want to try some? Er... ah... you must really like it... Eh? Fwehh!? Are you okay?

221.Supply: Umm... th... thank you very much.
221.Idle: Admiral, you seem so busy... While you do that, I can organize your things for you. Umm... this is... it goes here... This is... here... And then! This is... huh? Th-This is... umm...

113.Intro: I'm here, I'm here! Kinu has arrived at long last!
113.Library:
I was born in Kobe!

I trained hard in the School of Maizuru. After a whole lot of tough things happened, I worked hard in the southwestern region. ...Well, that was tough, too... Kuma-chan was a big help out there. But still... Panay Island was pure madness!
113.Poke(1): I'm gonna work hard again today!
113.Poke(2): When I look at your face, I start to get all motivated~
113.Poke(3): Hm? What's up? You wanna sweat it out together?
113.Idle: Admiral...! Can't we go train or something soon~?
113.Married: Admiral! You want a shoulder massage? Or maybe you wanna go train?
113.Wedding: Admiral! We're always just training together, so maybe it's a sign that we should spend more time... together... Eh!? No, I didn't mean it that way. I mean the one closest to you should protect you... I just want to... ohhh... ... ...whatever!
113.Ranking: What's that— the intelligence report? Lemme see!
113.Equip(2): It's important to put on some anti-air, you know?
113.Supply: I can keep doing my best with this.
113.Docking(1): After a battle, isn't a bath just great?
113.Docking(2): I've had enough... Gonna take a little break~
113.Construction: It's a new comrade! That's great!
113.Return: Heeey, Admiral~! The fleet has returned!
113.Sortie: Alright! I'll show you the results of my training!
113.Battle: Adapt to the situation while maintaining formation. Let's go!
113.Yasen(1): Now then, let's get this pursuit battle moving!
113.Yasen(2): You enemies to port— take that!
113.MVP: This victory is the result of all that training, you know? Yeah! I'll keep working hard, Admiral!
113.Damaged(3): Even like this, there's no way I'll sink...!
113.Sunk: Admiral... I'm sorry... looks like... this is it for me... Please let the other girls retrea-
113.H0100: 1 o'clock. I'm gonna go to bed soon, 'kay? Night~
113.H0200: It's 2 o'clock. It's the time of Ushimitsu. This is scary~!
113.H0300: It's 3 o'clock... I wanna go to sleep soon, though...
113.H0500: It's 5 o'clock! Gonna get up? Gonna sleep?
113.H0600: It's 6 o'clock. Let's do our best again today!
113.H0700: It's 7 o'clo~ck! What you wanna do for breakfast?
113.H0900: It's 9 o'clock! Where ya goin'? Take me with you!
113.H1000: It's now 10 o'clock... so why am I tired?
113.H1100: 11 o'clock! What should we do for lunch?
113.H1200: It's 12 o'clock now! What're you having?
113.H1300: It's 13 o'clock. Let's take it a bit easier, okay?
113.H1600: It's 16 o'clock. Don't we gotta hustle soon?
113.H1700: The 17 o'clock announcement. Admiral, don't get caught off-guard!
113.H1900: It's 19 o'clock! Well then, it's almost time.
113.H2000: 8 o'clock! All members, er... Nothing! I didn't say anything at all.
113.H2100: 21 o'clock, huh...? Is it okay if I go into the bath first?
113.H2200: It's 22 o'clock. It's Kancolle time, right? Mhm, mhm!
113.H2300: It's 23 o'clock. Honestly, Sendai-san is just so freaking annoying!
113.NewYears 6547: Best wishes for the coming year! Admiral, the start of the New Year is gonna be pure madness!
113.Setsubun 6547: Guwoaaah!! What the hell!? Why is everybody throwing beans at me!? O-Ow! Owowowowowowow!
113.Valentines 6547: I made these truffles! Admiral, have one! Ehehehehe, how is it? Spicy? Sweet? Only one is sweet— it's Russian Chocolate Roulette!
113.Anniversary 6547: III~YAA~HOO-HO-HOO~!! Third Anniversary! You know? You know!? I am so happy! Cheers to our fleet and Admiral! Huzzah!
113.Rainy 6547: It's the rainy season. It seems like almost every day it's raining~. Ah, let's play shiritori to kill time! Let's see, 'Teitoku', Ku....'Kuchikukan'.... Ah, It's over!
113.EarlySummer 6547: So hot... So it's already summer... Summaht. *buzzing cicadas* Huh? That's no good?
113.Summer 6547: Summer is definitely all about festivals, right? We should have a naval base summer festival. Let's get this work done quick and start preparing!
113.Fall 6547: Fall means different things for everyone, doesn't it? Admiral, what about you? As for me, fall is a time when I have lots of chances to make people laugh! Uh... what's with that look?
113.Xmas 6547:
Er... here's a haiku:
Kurisumasu
together with Admiral
just the two of us

487.Intro: Light cruiser Kinu! Admiral, let's get this moving!
487.Library:
I was born in Kobe!

I trained hard in the School of Maizuru. After a whole lot of tough things happened, I worked hard in the southwest region. ...Well, that was tough, too... Kuma-chan was a big help out there. But still... Panay Island was pure madness!

The appeal of my remodel is also pure madness!
487.Poke(1): Hm? What the, what the...? Oh~ it was the Admiral!
487.Poke(3): Yehehehyuhyahuhe♪ ...Not there! That's my weak point!

487.Attack:
Come on, come on!
Come at me with whatever you got!

114.Intro: H-hello, I'm Abukuma, a light cruiser.

114.Poke(2): My name, can you write it in kanji?
114.Poke(3): Ow-owww! Please don't touch me too much! My bangs are fragile you know! Admiral, you're a bit like Kitakami.

114.Married: Admiral, please don't overdo it, okay?
114.Wedding: Admiral~, thanks for waiting! I want to say couple of words of thanks to you… because you looked after me with such care, I got a bit more confident. Admiral, thank you.

114.Join: Huh, no way, me!? I-I can go but...
114.Equip(1): Looking forward to it? I really am!
114.Equip(2): I understand! My strength is necessary, right?
114.Docking(2): Seems a bit long for a bath, don't you think?
114.Return: The fleet has returned to the home port!
114.Sortie: I'm waiting for this! B-but it's not like I'm looking forward to it that much.
114.Attack: When it's time to act, I will do it!
114.Yasen(1): Well then, it's night battle, but I will not lose to some night battle idiot somewhere.
114.MVP: Even someone like me can do it if I try!
114.Damaged(2): Stop it! My bow has barely recovered!
114.Damaged(3): Am I really just no good? But, I don't want to lose like this!

114.H0500: Admiral, it's 5 o'clock. It's not bad by now

114.H0900: It's 9 o'clock. What should we do today?

114.H1100: It's 11 o'clock. A bit more to lunch!
114.H1200: It's 12 o'clock. Hey, I want to eat delicious food.

114.H1600: It is now 4 o'clock. The fatigue is slowly settling in
114.H1700: It's 5 o'clock! I'll go fix my hair~
114.H1900: It's 7 o'clock! Study, work! And then Kancolle!
114.H2000: Evening 8pm call! Admiral, how are you doo-ing-?
114.H2100: It is now 9 at night, soon it will be time for a night battle
114.H2200: It's 10 o'clock! Let's take a short break
114.H2300: It is now 11 o'clock. A very critical time!
114.NewYears 6547: Best wishes for the coming year! I and everyone in the First Torpedo Squadron will be counting on you again this year!
114.Setsubun 6547: In Setsubun, I heard that the amount of beans you eat is based on your age... Eh, let's try not to overthink it! Yeah, that's OK for me!
114.Valentines 6547: Admiral, I tried making homemade chocolate this year. So how is it...? It seems pretty OK to me.
114.Anniversary 6547: Third anniversary! Third anniversary, it's third anniversary! It's ultra OK for me! Admiral, congratulations!
114.Rainy 6547: It's raining a lot lately. It's the rainy season, huh... The Shiratsuyu-class are frolicking around without a care in the world. ...Destroyers... annoying... Oh no! Someone's bad habit is rubbing off on me!?
114.EarlySummer 6547: It sure is taking longer for the sun to set, isn't it? Looks like summer is right around the corner. *sigh* ...And when it's here, those girls from the Third Torpedo Squadron will be a whole lot noisier.
114.Summer 6547: This scorching sun... it's certainly summer. I'm a bit worried that my skin's getting dry. Um... Admiral, are you listening?
114.Fall 6547: Fall... this season... reminds me of that one night battle. Such beautiful fires... yet so scary... at the same time. Ufufu, it's strange, isn't it, Admiral?
114.Xmas 6547: Merry Christmas to you! I got an invitation from Ashigara-san and the others for their evening party... Admiral? What should we do? U-Um... as for me...
114.YearsEnd 6547: Uwaaa, I'm so busy! Hey, Admiral you should also help out with the naval base's cleanup! Here, hold this! Ah! Dust spotted to starboard!

200.Intro: My turn to shine? That's gotta be it! Abukuma, sortieing!

115.Married: ♪ Leave it to me, okay? Commander.

115.Equip(3): The data was right on the mark!

115.Damaged(3): Nuu... Seems I stacked them up a bit too much, huh...

115.Valentines 6547: Here! It's some chocolate from me! It's only proper that they're made with fruit juice. It's true.
115.Anniversary 6547: Congratulations, today is an important day for you and us. Tell us your thoughts after this, Admiral!
115.Rainy 6547: Hmm~ As far as the rainy season goes, machinery rusts more easily, so maybe I dislike it a little. Still, let's do our best!
115.EarlySummer 6547: *sigh* ...It's gotten a bit hot, hasn't it? It looks like summer has already arrived. That was fast, huh?
115.Summer 6547: *sigh* Summer's so hot, isn't it? Admiral, since it's like this, I think I'd like to wear some summery equipment.

54.Intro: Sendai, reporting in! You can leave the night battles to me.

The last of the 5500-ton light cruiser types... would be mine— the Sendai-class.

I'll teach you all about the appeal of a mature light cruiser. Naturally, it'll be with a night battle!
