138.Damaged(2): This is nothing compared to Sibuyan island!
138.Damaged(3): Ku.... Even if you say that, I'm still a light cruiser... B-but, I'm not sunk yet... I can still fire!
138.Sunk: Again, Noshiro has sunk, huh.... Agano-nee, will you take it easy this time...? Okay...?
138.H0000: It's 0 o'clock at night. Timekeeping, is it like this?
138.H0100: It's 1 o'clock at night. Admiral's room has this kind of taste... Ah, I didn't mean it in that way
138.H0200: It's 2 o'clock at night. If you're going to be up anyway, how about redecorating the office?
138.H0300: It's 3 o'clock at night. Are you not tired? This is so different from training with Agano-nee!
138.H0400: It's 4 A.M. No matter when an enemy attacks, Noshiro is always ready to go!
138.H0500: 5 A.M. We, the shipdaughters, no matter what the time... Eh? The other shipdaughers are... asleep?
138.H0600: 6 A.M. Today's dailies are done? Ah, as expected from the admiral!
138.H0700: It's 7 A.M, huh. Isn't it about time for Breakfast? Agano-nee's making it, so let's go eat together!
138.H0800: It's 8 A.M. Admiral, let's do our best today too!
138.H0900: 9 A.M. Admiral! This morning variety show, it's pretty interesting, right?
138.H1000: 10 A.M. As a flagship, Noshiro will provide the ingredients for the admiral's lunch!
138.H1100: 11 A.M. The ingredients have been gathers. Onion, potato, carrot, and...
138.H1200: It's just on lunch! Well, I'll serve up some Noshiro Curry! It's Agano-nee's favourite!
138.H1300: It's 1 P.M. Ah, I was found out, huh. The truth is, Noshiro can't cook anything except curry.
138.H1400: It's 2 P.M. I'll clean up after lunch... Ah, I have to clear up after Agano-nee's too...
138.H1500: It's 3 P.M. Sorry Admiral, I made Agano-nee a promise, so I'll be heading off for a bit.
138.H1600: It's 4 P.M. Even though I waited at the meeting spot for an hour... yeah...
138.H1700: It's 5 P.M. Agano-nee forgot about the promise... Well, she does that often...
138.H1800: It's 6 P.M. Agano-nee, after an earnest apology, invited me to dinner. Well, it can't be helped, you know?
138.H1900: It's 7 P.M. I'm going to head off, but I'll prepare tonight's curry in advance.
138.H2000: It's' 8 P.M, well then, see you later!
138.H2100: 9 P.M. I'm back. A dinner between sisters is nice to do sometimes, yeah?
138.H2200: It's 10 P.M. Admiral, are you night battling tonight as well? Doing all-nighters all the time is bad for your health.
138.H2300: 11 P.M. Noshiro expresses the opinion that you should go to sleep earlier.
138.NewYears 6547: Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! The Agano-class will be counting on you again this year. I'll do my best as well!
138.Setsubun 6547: Here, Agano-nee. Throw these beans. Demons, begone~! ...Just like that. Ah, that way is...! ...Ah, aah... U-Um, Yahagi? ...Well, you see...
138.Valentines 6547: Agano-nee's portion is... there we go. Admiral's portion is... Ufu♪ It may be small, but I did my best. Alright, I'll definitely give this to them! Time to practice!
138.Rainy 6547: The hydrangeas are pretty... Admiral, what do you think? About this season? It fills me with a sense of tranquility. I like it.
138.Fall 6547: Agano-nee, you've enjoyed the fall foods enough. You won't be able to fit in your uniform! Eh? Wearing a yukata is good enough? That's not good at all!!
138.Saury 6547: It's a saury fishing support mission! Noshiro, ready for action! Searchlight, skilled lookouts... and...  For detecting schools of fish... ... ...I wonder if this is enough...
138.Xmas 6547: Christmas... is it? This isn't an event I'm familiar with... I'm kind of looking forward to it. Ah, Admiral, this poultry dish is really good!
138.ChristmasOld 6547: Agano-nee, don't just idle around under the kotatsu! You'll get fat! Hey, stand up, stand up! Why not try going out to do some exercises?
138.YearsEnd 6547: *sigh* I need to clean up the admiral's desk, too... I also want to get the storehouse organized... ...Ah! Agano-nee? What am I doing? I'm cleaning, of course! Cleaning.

139.Intro: Light Cruiser Yahagi, reporting for duty. Let's work at it together to the end, Admiral!
139.Library: Yahagi, the third ship of the Agano-class light cruisers. I've participated in most of the major sea battles during the latter part of the war, including the Mariana Straits, Leyte Gulf, and Bonomisaki. That's right, I fought it out to the very end. I wonder what happened to Yamato, after my memories trailed off. Oh well... This time, I'm going to protect everything!
139.Poke(1): So, what kind of plan are you making today?
139.Poke(2): Hmm, that's thoughtful. I don't mind that.
139.Poke(3): Haha, interesting. If you want to do thi~s, then maybe I'll do the same then, how about that?
139.Idle: Right... If there can be another life for me after this one, I guess becoming something other than a warship wouldn't be such a bad idea.
139.Married: Admiral… The fleet girls are complimenting you for your hard work, you know? ...he isn't listening...  Admiral, what the matter? You looked reddish. Taking care of yourself is important, you know. Hmm... You had slight fever. Right, I'll make you something nutritious. I'm off using Mamiya's kitchen for a while. Wait for me, okay?
139.Wedding: Wha-, Admiral, you.. What's wrong? Your face... you have a rather serious expression. ...Eh, this is for me? Not for someone like Yamato or Yukikaze? For me!? W-what should I do... hu-hum.... What should I do..I-I...
139.Ranking: There's a report for you, Admiral. How is it?
139.Join: Leave the Second Torpedo Squardon to me. This is Yahagi, raising anchor!
139.Equip(2): Okay... With this modification, we might be able to do this!
139.Supply: Resupply please, we're going back out!
139.Docking(1): This wouldn't even count as a wound, you know.
139.Docking(2): I do want to go out there prepared, so thanks.
139.Construction: A new ship is taking the water.
139.Return: All ships of the fleet have returned to base.
139.Attack: Have to draw them in more this time... All right, fire!
139.Yasen(1): Aha! A night battle then? Not so bad!
139.Yasen(2): Don't you dare think of the Agano-class as just some cruiser!
139.MVP: I'm the top of the fleet? Well.. that actually feels pretty nice.
139.Damaged(1): This is where I get serious!
139.Damaged(2): Did you think I was going down with just a few hits?
139.Damaged(3): If you want to sink me, you will need 5-6 torpedoes... otherwise, that won't do!
139.Sunk: That's enough, get away from me... I can see Yamato and Yukikaze again... that's not so bad...
139.H0000: 0000. Midnight. Don't push yourself too hard
139.H0200: 0200. It's a quiet night tonight, isn't it.
139.H0300: 0300. Aren't you going half-watch ashore for the day? Hmm?
139.H0400: 0400. Hey, don't push yourself too much, okay? I can take care of the daily quests for you tomorrow.
139.H0500: 0500. It's the beginning of a brand new day at Kancolle!
139.H0600: 0600. Let's see, make equipment three times at the factory, and then go sortieing, and umm...
139.H0700: 0700. Okay, then construct three new ships, and... Urgh!
139.H0800: 0800. I'm exhausted. Daily quests aren't easy, are they Admiral... Oh, ehem.
139.H0900: 0900. Arms Reduction Treaty? Scrap two ships? ... I can't do that! ...I mean I will, but still...
139.H1000: 1000. Whew, I'm exhausted. Admiral, now I understand how difficult this is. I respect you a bit more now.
139.H1100: 1100. I think I'm better suited for seaborne combat. Let me head out there!
139.H1200: 1200. Doing things I'm not used to sure makes me hungry. So, what should we have for lunch?
139.H1300: 1300. They say this is popular in my hometown nowadays. A big round-meat sandwich... I guess?
139.H1400: 1400. Hm, hm, hm... that's pretty good! They call it a "Hamburger", apparently.
139.H1500: 1500. Now let's go sortieing again! Let's push on.
139.H1600: 1600. Oh, this? It's a sake cup with a Hagi flower and an arrow as a design. Nice, isn't it.
139.H1700: 1700. Almost sundown. I want to enjoy night battles too.
139.H1800: 1800. How did the exercises go today, by the way?
139.H1900: 1900. Admiral, I wonder what we will have for dinner tonight. I'm looking forward to it just a bit!
139.H2000: 2000. Well, it's time for night battles. How about it? Shall we go?
139.H2100: 2100. I'm still good to go, Admiral. I, Yahagi, will do my best!
139.H2200: 2200. Admiral, Yahagi Torpedo Squadron is going at it full strength! I'll crush those flag-BBs!
139.H2300: 2300. Ugh, battleships sure are tough... And enemy carriers... yes, I don't like them.
139.NewYears 6547: Admiral, Happy New Year! Counting on you again this year! Now, let's sortie once again this year!
139.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun, huh. This is pretty nice... er... ow!? Incoming fire!? Wh-Who...!? ...A-Agano-nee!?
139.Valentines 6547: Nee-san and the others seem busy... Making chocolate... huh...? I should give it a try. ...Mm. ..I'll ask Noshiro-nee to teach me how to make some!
139.Rainy 6547: It's really pouring. Oh, Isokaze. Is that your special teru teru bozu? It has an unusual shape. Maybe I should make one.
139.Fall 6547: Fall, huh? The food at this time of year is certainly delicious. However, Agano-nee is enjoying this a little too much!
139.Xmas 6547: Christmas... it isn't too bad, from the sound of it. Admiral? I think I like... ...I may be a little tipsy.
139.ChristmasOld 6547: It's become a little cold, huh... This is perfect for training. Tenth squadron, assemble. We're doing exercises!
139.YearsEnd 6547: Sakawa, what's the matter? Ah... you want me to get that ship down from there? ...Here! I see, so you're cleaning. I'll help out.

140.Intro: Pyan♪ The fourth Agano class Light Cruiser, Sakawa! Commander, nice to meet you!
140.Library: I'm Sakawa, the fourth ship and the youngest of the Agano-class light cruiser sisters. I was born too late, so I couldn't go outside much. I wanted to go together with Yahagi-chan... but I ended up guarding Maizuru.
140.Poke(1): Pya! You called for me? Whats the matter? An order?
140.Poke(3): Commander! I like you! Cross...roads? What's that? I don't know what it is...but don't think I like it!
140.Idle: Sakawa...will always be here waiting for you, Commander, always, always waiting...
140.Married: Commander, aren't you working a bit too hard? If you're tired, wanna have some rest together with Sakawa?
140.Wedding: Commander, I'm always saying things like PyuUu or PyaAaa to you but...what I'm actually trying so hard to say is I'm really thankyouthankyouthankyou!...eh? You can understand? Really!? I love you too! Pyaaaa~!
140.Join: Light Cruiser Sakawa, setting sail! Watch me closely!
140.Docking(2): Rest a little bit~, Eh? I looked like a special transport ship? No, no!
140.Construction: Someone newer than me has arrived!
140.Sortie: Yay~! It's my turn! Flagship of the Torpedo Squadron, Sakawa! Moving out!
140.Yasen(1): Night battle? I've always wanted to try it!
140.MVP: Pyaaa! Sakawa is number one!? Yay~! Count on Sakawa next time as well!
140.Damaged(2): Pyaa!? The fire, I have to extinguish the fire!
140.Damaged(3): Pyaaaaa, the turret, the turret is gone!
140.Sunk: Why...I wanted to...go together with...Yahagi-chan and everyone...
140.H0100: It's 1 A.M! The night begins from now~! PyaAaa...I'm sleepy...
140.H0400: 4:00A.M.? Eeh...4 O'clock. is fine?...OK! It's 4 O'clock.
140.H0500: 5:00A.M...It's already 5 huh...What are you working so hard for Admiral? What's a daily?
140.H0600: 6:00A.M...by the way..! Aaah! Sakawa should be responsible for the hourlies today.
140.H0800: 8:00A.M.! Today Admiral is awesome as well.
140.H0900: 9:00A.M. Today Sakawa will stick with you as well.
140.H1000: 10:00A.M. Sakawa quiz~ the thing Sakawa likes, what might it be~
140.H1100: It's 11 A.M. what about your lunch? Eh? The answer for the quiz? What was it again...?
140.H1200: It's noon~! Wanna grab something to eat? Heey Admiral~...good idea right?
140.H1300: It's 1 P.M.! The answer for the quiz?...Erm...well...it's right in my sight...right?
140.H1400: It's 2 P.M. dummy dummy Admiral~! The answer is not ramen! It's you Admiral!
140.H1600: It's 4 P.M. Admiral~ keep it up~! Keep it up~!!
140.H2000: 8:00P.M. Admiral, wanna take a bath? Dinner? Or...wanna have Sa~ka~wa? Eh..? That's not good? Whyyy~!
140.H2100: 9:00P.M. That's right...you should be tired now. How about a rest?
140.H2200: 10:00P.M. Sakawa will be having her supper. Munch...munch...
140.H2300: 11:00P.M. It's already 11 P.M.! Should we do a night battle then go to sleep soon?
140.NewYears 6547: Pyaaa~! Pyaaa~! Best wishes for the new year~! Commander? I'm counting on you again this year! Yay~! This osechi looks so good♪
140.Setsubun 6547: Pya...! Ah... Yahagi-chan seems mad for some reason... I wonder what happened... Eh? Houshou-san. This is... ehoumaki? So I eat this in one go?
140.Valentines 6547: Ehehe... I'm going to make handmade chocolate for the commander. Maybe they'll go "pya" when they eat one... ehehe♪
140.Rainy 6547: Pyaa. So many days of rain, pyaa. I can't go out much during the rainy season. *sigh*
140.Fall 6547: Pyaa! It's getting a little cooler, so I'm glad♪ Commander, what are you doing? Eh? Security and support preparations for the fishing grounds? What is that?
140.Cold 6547: I'm not even a little cold. I wonder if Maizuru is a little colder. Pya!
140.Xmas 6547: Commander? Merry Christmas, pyuu~! The tree is so pretty. I really love this atmosphere! What is that bubbly looking drink? Ah... I can't have it yet...?
140.YearsEnd 6547: Cleaning! I need to tidy up my room! Py-Pyun...! Kya... ah... I can't reach the top of the dresser~!

314.Married: Admiral, you are working hard as always, so amazing. Should I massage your shoulders? I am good at it.Pyon! Pyan! How is it?

183.Intro: Admiral, light cruiser Ooyodo has entered the line of battle. Please entrust the fleet directives and administration to me.
183.Library:
Designed specifically as a fleet flagship, I am the newly produced light cruiser, Ooyodo.

There were issues with the new recon seaplane I was intended to carry and the war situation changed, so I was unable to serve as the Combined Fleet flagship.

Nevertheless, I was able to participate in Operation Kita and Operation Rei-Go. I, too, will do my best on the front lines.
183.Poke(1): Aye! Please leave it to me.
183.Poke(2): Admiral, is what you're doing some method of communication? I believe speaking normally would be sufficient. Yes...
183.Poke(3): Admiral, that is not a telecommunications device. Careless touching will interfere with the fleet commands.
183.Idle: Admiral, it's time for the next mission. Ad... Admiral...? Admiral? Are you listening? Hey...
183.Married: Admiral, I truly cannot thank you enough... for always keeping me in your heart. I've... been watching over you all this time. Did you notice?
183.Wedding: Admiral, did you call for me? Eh...? Is this for me? Thank you so much, Admiral. I will always cherish this.
183.Ranking: Admiral, I've organized our fleet's intelligence.
183.Equip(1): Are you remodeling me? Thank you so much.
183.Equip(2): That's true. I do want to load torpedoes, but on the other hand...
183.Supply: Supplies and logistics... they're very important.
183.Docking(1): I apologize for this. I'll fall back a little.
183.Docking(2): I can't apologize enough. I hope you can afford me a short leave of absence.
183.Construction: A new ship has been completed.
183.Return: Fleet, the operation has concluded. Thank you for your hard work.
183.Sortie: Combined Fleet flagship, Ooyodo, casting off!
183.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted. Ready the cannons, if you would, please!
183.Yasen(1): Never forget Operation Rei-Go. All ships, attack!
183.Yasen(2): The fleet's movements... Right. Keep it up, everyone.
183.MVP: Eh...? My accomplishments were the greatest? My... how unexpected... ...but I'm a little proud of myself. Ufufu♪
183.Damaged(2): No way... I'm listing to starboard... Begin counterflooding!
183.Damaged(3): Gh... they got me... b-but... I won't sink just yet. I absolutely refuse... to sink...!
183.Sunk: Hurry with the drainage! Eh...? Not working...? It's not working!? Admiral... this is the end of the line... we'll reunite someday, somewhere... surely...
183.NewYears 6547: Admiral! Best wishes for the coming year. I'll be counting on you again this year.
183.Setsubun 6547: For Setsubun this year, the demon target of each fleet is... well... Huh? The demon role personnel file isn't here... Huh? How strange. I was sure I'd put everything in order yesterday...
183.Anniversary 6547: Admiral, our fleet has now reach its third year of service. Congratulations! Please be of service as well for next year.
183.Rainy 6547: It's been raining a lot as of late, but our fleet is ready to deploy at any time. Admiral, how do you plan to utilize the fleet? Eh? You're giving everyone the day off? Really? Admiral, are you sure?
183.Fall 6547: Admiral, it's really starting to feel like autumn.
183.Saury 6547: Light source, check! Sonar, check! My equipment loadout is all set! Preparations complete to set sail to the northern sea as well as the adjacent waters for the saury fishing support fleet.
183.Xmas 6547: Admiral, it's Christmas, isn't it? Merry Christmas!
183.YearsEnd 6547: Admiral, it's almost time for Operation Rei-go. I shall do my best as well!

321.Intro: Admiral, flagship Ooyodo shall be accompanying you. Please leave the front line fleet directives to me.
321.Poke(2): Admiral, is what you're doing some method of communication? Is it code? Is it really?
321.Poke(3): Admiral, that is not part of the headquarters' facilities. Please, do not obstruct the fleet commands!
321.Idle: Admiral, what do you think of my remodel? I asked you what you thought of it...! Geez...
321.Ranking: Admiral, would you like to see the fleet intelligence?
321.Join: Combined Fleet flagship Ooyodo, now sortieing!
321.Equip(1): You're remodeling me further? Thank you so much.
321.Equip(2): I would like to load up on torpedoes, but maybe I should load recon seaplanes...
321.Sortie: Flagship Ooyodo, sortieing at full power! Let's go!
321.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted. Ready the cannons. Everyone, let's go!
321.Yasen(2): That's right... this is the true power of the Ooyodo-class!
321.H0000: Admiral, the date has changed. We'll be counting on you today as well.
321.H0100: Admiral, the present time is 0100. Please leave the responsibility of announcing the time to me.
321.H0200: Admiral, it's 0200. Oh? Admiral, are you tired, perhaps?
321.H0300: 0300. While the admiral takes a break, I'll reexamine the fleet operational plans we've put together.
321.H0400: The present time is 0400. The admiral's sleeping face is so cute. Ufufu♪ This was worth it!
321.H0500: It's 0500. Admiral, it's morning. It's time to do the morning call. All hands, arise!
321.H0600: 0600. Admiral, I've finished preparing breakfast. I tried putting gluten in the miso.
321.H0700: The present time is 0700. Admiral, have you finished your breakfast? I'll clean up, okay?
321.H0800: It's 0800. Okay! Fleet exercises, then! Let's make sure they're strict!
321.H0900: Admiral, it's 0900. After exercises comes sorties. The sortie schedule is over here.
321.H1000: It's 1000. Tone-san has come here again today. Tone-saaaan!
321.H1100: 1100. Tone-san and Chikuma-san are such good friends... I envy them just a little...
321.H1200: 1200. Admiral, let's have curry for lunch. We'll have a military band to go with it.
321.H1300: It's 1300. Admiral, what did you think of my curry? Don't you find it unique?
321.H1400: The present time is 1400. Oh... Ashigara-san. What is it? Hmm.
321.H1500: It's 1500. She's a heavy cruiser, but Ashigara-san and I are strangely on the same wavelength. Ufufu♪
321.H1600: It's 1600. Admiral, it's Ashigara-san. She's requested a large amount of pork sirloin and cooking oil.
321.H1700: The present time is 1700. Admiral, the sunset overlooking the sea is lovely.
321.H1800: Admiral, it's 1800. What would be good to have for dinner? Something like Sashimi...?
321.H1900: It's 1900. Admiral? Something went wrong with dinner. Let's go for cutlets instead. How about it?
321.H2000: It's 2000. Admiral, I'll put your after-dinner tea right here.
321.H2100: The present time is 2100. It's almost time... for night warfare. Ufufu♪ I won't be night battling, though. Look— there's still a lot of paperwork to do.
321.H2200: It's 2200. Admiral, isn't it almost time to close out the overtime work and take it easy?
321.H2300: Admiral, it's 2300. Thank you very much for another hard day's work. Let's do our best tomorrow, too.
321.Fall 1471: Admiral, it's time for the naval base's Fall Festival. I tried a change of outfit, too. How do I look? Admiral, how about wearing a jinbei as well? I'll make the arrangements, if that's okay with you?

471.Intro: I've kept you waiting, Commander. First ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers, Kamikaze, has arrived. Are you ready, everyone? Follow me.
471.Library: I am the first of the Kamikaze-class Destroyers, Kamikaze. I am the nameship of a fleet of destroyers designed during the Eight-Eight Fleet Program era. We may be an older model compared to the Mutsuki-class, but I managed to run through that battle to the very end. I hope you'll remember who we are.
471.Poke(1): Commander, did you call me? I am prepared.
471.Poke(2): I'm an old type? Silly you. A destroyer's capabilities aren't about her specs.
471.Poke(3): Stop it, Harukaze. I'm not fond of such things... eh? It's you, Commander. What's the meaning of this? I desire an explanation.
471.Idle: Destroyer-1? Ah, I was once called that a long time ago. But I am now Kamikaze! That's my nameship! Be sure to remember it!
471.Married: Commander, you look tired. Okay, I'll pour something warm for you to drink. One moment, please. Here you go. So, are you warming up? Really? That's a relief.
471.Wedding: Yes, Commander? Another escort mission? I don't mind that... Eh, no? What is that on your hand? It's... for me? Wow, really? Thank you. I'll treasure it... I will treasure it for sure!
471.Ranking: Looking at intel? It is vital. I'm glad that you're an able Commander.
471.Join: Destroyer Division 1 Flagship, Kamikaze. It's time to weigh anchor!
471.Equip(1): Am I getting stronger? Th-Thank you. I'm glad, but...
471.Equip(2): Mm, this is good. I can survive till the very end with this. Thank you.
471.Supply: Right. Refueling complete! What's next? Fleet escort?
471.Docking(1): Just a little... let me rest a little. No peeking. I'll be done in an instant.
471.Docking(2): Ahh... this is awful in many ways. Commander, I'm taking a break for a while. Hurm...
471.Construction: New ship construction has completed. Good!
471.Return: Commander, the fleet has returned. In any case, I'm glad that they're all okay.
471.Sortie: Flagship Kamikaze, setting sail. Are you ready, everyone? Follow me.
471.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted. Right, ready for battle. On me, everyone.
471.Yasen(1): Pursuing the enemy fleet. Battle speed 5. Charge! Follow me!
471.MVP: Yes! Ah, but please don't praise me. I'm only doing my usual routine. T-that's right.
471.Damaged(3): I'm hit? Where? I-I won't sink!
471.Sunk: No way. It can't be! I'm filling with water... No...
471.NewYears 6547: Happy New Year, Commander. The Kamikaze-class can count on you again this year, right? Hmm? Right!
471.Setsubun 6547: Naturally, I will be the demon for the Kamikaze-class. After all, the name ship- Ow! Ow, ow, ow. Come on!
471.Rainy 6547: Miss Haguro, please be careful at this time of year! Ah, you too, Miss Ashigara! If you're heading somewhere, I'll accompany you.
471.Fall 6547: Commander, it's autumn! This time of year makes me feel so excited! Commander, how does autumn make you feel?
471.Saury 6547: There's been a rumor about a saury fishing support... fleet... Umm, what equipment should I start with, I wonder...? I'll need something bright, perhaps... and then...
471.Xmas 6547:
Commander, here. Say "ahh" ...I asked you to say "ahh".
...And after I made this Christmas cake myself. You don't want any?

476.Intro: Commander, I'll do my best! First ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers, Kamikaze, has arrived. Let's face our battles head-on!
476.Poke(3): Is that Ashigara? I'm a bit busy right now... Eh? Commander!? What's the meaning of this? I would like an explanation of what it is you think you're doing.
476.Equip(1): You're going to make me stronger? Thanks. Don't forget the anti-sub equipment!
476.Equip(2): Huh? It's for a transport mission? I guess. Actually, I'd rather not remove my torpedoes...
476.Sortie: Even if the war outlook is bad, we've got to do something! Flagship Kamikaze, setting sail. Fleet, weigh anchor!
476.H0000: Right! Today I'll be taking care of you as your secretary. Is that ok? It is now 12 midnight. Leave the hourly announcements to me!
476.H0100: 0100. *yawn* I'm a bit sleepy... but I'll be fine. You can rely on me.
476.H0200: 0200. It's the hour of Ushimitsu. What? You're scared, Commander? Guess you do have an adorable side.
476.H0300: 0300. Umm... do you feel like... going to the washroom? I'll accompany you there. How's that...?
476.H0400: 0400. Oh, thank goodness. It's going to be morning. Eh? The night? I don't... find it... scary...
476.H0500: 0500. That's not it! I'm completely fine on the ocean. It's not the same as night time on dry land. Geez...
476.H0600: 0600. Commander, I'll be performing the morning call. Fleet, arise! It's morning. The morning has arrived. Rise and shine, everyone!
476.H0700: 0700. Right! Commander, allow me to cook. Wait a moment, please... Okay! Sorry to keep you waiting. I had to watch the barley rice.
476.H0800: 0800. What do you think of my cooking? Mmm! Right! So, after this, let's begin on with fleet operations.
476.H0900: 0900. What shall we start with this morning? Expeditions? Quests? Mmm, I can't decide with such a wonderful fleet. Commander, what do you think?
476.H1000: 1000. Right! Now then, we should begin with an expedition. Put me in charge of a convoy escort. Hey! I can say with confidence that I won't return with less than one shou's worth.
476.H1100: 1100. Geez, it's almost lunch time... what should I do? I don't mind cooking again, but... how about cooking together? It can be the commander's solemn duty, mmm?
476.H1200: 1200. Okay, I've decided. We'll have salted rice balls for lunch...is that ok? I'll prepare some miso soup to go with it. It matches with the salty flavor.
476.H1300: 1300. How was it? Lunch, I mean. There's a shortage of vegetables. Fresh vegetables have gotten so expensive.
476.H1400: 1400. Didn't my salted rice balls turn out well? What? Did it take long to make....? ...Ah, no, not at all! I am very efficient cook.
476.H1500: 150— Ah, Haguro! Thank you for your hard work. You look great... eh... ah... Well, I'm feeling great too. Look, look! I'm fine!
476.H1600: 1600. A transport operation? Right, then. Though I do feel a little worried without torpedoes... I'll be fine, so don't worry!
476.H1700: 1700. Ah, Commander, the sun is setting. How beautiful... this reminds me of the sunset I saw in Singapore. It's nostalgic. Is Nokaze....all right?
476.H1800: 1800. Commander, it's past sunset, isn't it? The fleet has returned to port? Let me cook dinner, then. Please look forward to it.
476.H1900: 1900... Here, Commander! Kamikaze special pork miso soup with fresh vegetables. It'll go well with the barley rice. Bon appetite!
476.H2000: 20— Oh!? Ashigara? Mmm, mmm... You are preparing pork cutlet curry rice here? Wow, that's wonderful... Commander, can you eat? Ah, you ate it. That's great.
476.H2100: 2100. Mmmmmm... delicious. Ashigara, thank you for the victory pork cutlet curry rice. *sigh* I overate.
476.H2200: 2200. Eh... Commander, what is it? What makes me feel afraid? Mmm...submarines are a nightmare for a convoy escort, you know? Eh, you don't believe me?
476.H2300: 2300. I can't do it! Submarines are terrifying. Of course, any enemy is horrible... Night time? The sea at night is not so frightening.

472.Intro: Morning. It's Asakaze. Second ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers, Asakaze. Commander? Please memorize it soon. Okay?
472.Library:
Kamikaze-class destroyer, second ship, Asakaze. I was born in Nagasaki.

Along with my younger sister Harukaze and the others, I formed the historic Fifth Destroyer Division. I was naturally the flagship. I took part in landing operations in the early stages of the war. Of course, I was also reliable and punctual with convoy escorts.

Mm! If it was there, I did it!
472.Poke(2): Yes...? A fleet escort...? Leave it to me, if you would, please. It'll be fine.
472.Poke(3): D... W-What are- Don't make a fool of me! Eh? You're not... trying to...? Ah... sorry. I misunderstood. Right! That makes us even!
472.Idle: I'm so bored... Harukaze, doesn't talking like that put you to sleep? I mean, look at Matsukaze. Ah... Matsukaze, you're wearing that hat again. It'll get in the way in battle, so take it off. Ah... what? What's that? You're picking a fight with your big sis? Bring it on! I'm not going to hold back!
472.Married: What's this? You're so undisciplined. You're worn out from this? *sigh* Commander, haven't you lacked motivation recently? I have no choice, then. I'll help you get your fighting spirit back. Look this way for a moment. Ready? Close your eyes. ...Ah, they opened! You opened your eyes! I'm not doing this anymore!
472.Wedding: What is it, Commander? To call me out to a place like this... I'm very busy right now. Well, with fleet escorts and such. Convoys and such. Eh? What's this? For me...? W-Well...! I suppose I'll accept it. I-It's beautiful... and the size is just right...
472.Ranking: Hm? The intelligence? I'll go get it for you. Hold on.
472.Join: Fifth Destroyer Division, setting sail! Ready? Everyone, follow me!
472.Equip(2): How is it...? Well, anything would work well on me!
472.Supply: Well, I'll have some. It's essential.
472.Docking(1): Sorry. Is it okay if I fall back for a bit?
472.Docking(2):
Hmm... I'm sure Kamikaze-nee is going to scold me for this...
Well, I suppose I don't have to tell her?
472.Return:
Commander? The fleet has returned. *whew* I'm so tired...
Would you mind massaging my shoulders?
472.Sortie: DesRon 5, heading out! All DesDiv 5 members, are you ready? Sortieing!
472.Battle: So the enemy fleet was spotted? Everyone ready? Let's do this.
472.Yasen(1): DesRon 5, charging in. Fall into formation behind me! We're going in!
472.Yasen(2): Yes! You took the bait. I'll finish you!
472.MVP: Please observe! I, Asakaze, am the greatest. My eloquence and training are on a whole other level! Uh...? Commander? Why are you laughing? What's with you!?
472.Damaged(3): It's not as if I took a torpedo! This isn't... enough to sink me!
472.Sunk:
It can't be... I'm... sinking once again...
Matsukaze... where are...? Please come and... find me...
472.NewYears 6547: Commander, Happy New Year! ...What? What is it? It's not like that. This is important. It really is.
472.Setsubun 6547: I see, so it's Setsubun? Alright! Kamikaze-nee w- Ow! St-Stop it! What are you doing, Matsukaze!? Uu- Hatakaze, I just saw you jump in! Ugh, now you've done it!
472.LateWinter 6547: Hatakaze? Now that you mention it, I haven't seen her. That girl doesn't handle winter well. She'll show up eventually once it gets warmer. Eh? That's wrong?
472.Xmas 6547: *sigh* ...So this is Christmas! Looks good. I love these types of things. So this is Champagne...? *gulp* Wait, this is alcohol! Huh? Matsukaze!?

370.Intro: Morning. It's Asakaze. Second ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers, Asakaze. Commander, have you come to appreciate the morning? You already liked it? Ehe♪ ...Alright!
370.Join: First Surface Escort Division, heading out! Harukaze, are you ready? We're going to protect everyone this time! Don't let the enemy subs come near them! Sortie!
370.Equip(2): Isn't this nice? Commander, have you come to understand me a little?
370.Supply: Of course I'll have some. Let's keep at it!
370.Sortie: DesRon 5, heading out! Is everyone ready? Matsukaze? If you fall behind, I won't let you hear the end of it!
370.MVP: Please observe! I, Asakaze, am the greatest, am I not? Well, haven't I known the Commander for a long time? And my training is on a whole other level! Uh...? Commander? Why are you still laughing? What's with you!?
370.H0000: Midnight. *whew* I'll be the one to accompany you today. ...What? Is there a problem? ...Oh, so I see. Then I guess it's fine.
370.H0100:
2 a.m.! Er... what, you want it the other way? How pretentious... Well, whatever.
Aye! 0100. Is that fine?
370.H0200: 3 a-! ...Oh, right... 0200. Well, I guess it's fine. It's 02. 02. Hey, are you even listening?
370.H0300: 0300. Commander, you're not even listening, right? If you're not listening, I'm-going-to-stop. He~ey!? ...Ah, you reacted. I guess you were listening.
370.H0400: 0400. *stretch* It's finally morning...! Morning, morning. Hmhm♪ I love mornings! Mornings are really nice, you know? Right, Commander?
370.H0500: 0500. It's here! The morning! It's morning! The morning breeze feels so good~♪ Right, Commander? ...Eh? Close the window because it's cold? *sigh* ...Our Commander really doesn't get it at all.
370.H0600: 0600. We're going full throttle this morning. First of all, you have to start the day with a delicious breakfast! I cooked up a huuge batch of barley rice. Now, eat up!
370.H0700: 0700. Commander, what's this? You haven't gotten through much of your meal at all! No, no, this won't do at all! You have to eat properly in the morning. Here— a big helping of barley rice! ...It can't be helped. I'll give you some of my pickled radish.
370.H0800: 0800. We're going to start the morning exercises. Div 5, form up! Hatakaze? Harukaze? Matsukaze? ...Oh well. We'll do the morning exercises with those who showed up. Destroyer Division 5, we're setting sail this morning!
370.H0900: 0900. *whew* I worked up a good morning sweat! Alright! It's still morning, so let's keep going! What's next? An expedition? A sortie?
370.H1000: 1000. Uuu... Morning is ending... However, we're still in the a.m. hours! It's technically morning! Wh-Why are you eying me like that, Matsukaze!? What is it?
370.H1100: 1100. I get it already. I suppose it is almost lunchtime. I ate quite a lot in the morning, but I'm already getting an appetite. And you, Commander...?
370.H1200: 1200. It's noon. Hm? Harukaze, what is that? ...Eh? A sandwich? What's that? Destroyers should eat barley rice! Right, Commander? ...H-Huh? You don't feel that way?
370.H1300: 1300. Hmmm... Sandwiches aren't bad, but they're not something I'd eat too often. Still, thank you, Harukaze. Thanks for the meal!
370.H1400: 140- Ah, Mogami-san, Mikuma-san. Hi there. Um... what's that you have? Eh? A model? Hmmm... so you build them. Eh~ how eccentric. ...Ah! No, I didn't mean it like that! If it comes out okay, would you show it to me?
370.H1500: 1500. Well, I guess everyone has their hobbies. Matsukaze, what do you do on your days off? ...Eh? Ahh... I see. Fu... how eccentric. It's fine, though.
370.H1600: 1600. Ah, Nowaki? What's up? Ah, I see. Nah, I haven't seen her. Right, got it. If I see her, I'll let you know.
370.H1700: 1700. And so it ended up being evening. Eh? What about the sunset...? Ha! What are you talking about? The morning sunrise is many times more lovely. Right?
370.H1800: 1800. Ah, geez, after saying all that, it's already night— night! Night is somehow... How to put it... I have no motivation.
370.H1900: 1900. Commander, well~ ...I know it's wrong, but I don't really feel like working at night... ...Eh? You're ordering takeout for dinner? Ah, then I wanna order something! Umm... I'll have...
370.H2000: 2000. Mmm... even Mamiya's takeout is delicious. I'm so full! Treating ourselves can be nice sometimes. Every day would be... hmm... that would be quite the luxury, huh? Yeah.
370.H2100: 21... 00. ...Night is... I don't like the night. I especially dislike the sea at night. I like mornings. I like being out on the sea. I like the clear blue skies. Eh? DesRon 3? No, I'm a part of DesRon 5.
370.H2200: 22... 00. The First Surface Escort Division? ...Yeah. I fought hard, but... I wanted to protect them, but... it was too intense. That's why I hate the night.
370.H2300: 23... 00. It's well into the night. There's no avoiding it, though. ...It's fine! The morning sun will always rise again. Hey, Commander? Let's do our best tomorrow morning!

473.Intro: My name is Harukaze, third ship of the Kamikaze class of destroyers. Commander-sama, I am pleased to make your acquaintance.
473.Library: I am Harukaze, the third ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers. I was born in Maizuru. I used to be called Destroyer-5, but I later got a real name, "Harukaze". I was in Destroyer Division 5 and also belonged to the first Maritime Escort Flotilla, in which I helped protect everyone. Even if the fighting ends... I will still protect you.
473.Poke(2): Hm? Oh? Commander-sama, thank you for today.
473.Poke(3): Commander-sama, is there something wrong with my rig? Ah, there was a flower petal? Ufufu, I find it elegant.
473.Idle: I wonder what is Asakaze doing now. If it's her, she's probably frolicking around, Commander-sama. Hm? Commander-sama? You look tired. Wait, I'll give you a blanket. Good night.
473.Married: Commander-sama, do you want to hear about my dream? I was injured and then... Commander-sama? Did you fall asleep?
473.Wedding: Commander-sama, you called for the fifth destroyer group? Eh? Only me? Ah, yes. This is for me!? Thank you very much. I will cherish it.
473.Ranking: You want to look at the report, right? I will bring it to you.
473.Join: Harukaze of the Fifth Destroyer Division. Thank you for the privilege of sortieing. Setting sail.
473.Equip(1): This is for me? You have my thanks, Commander-sama.
473.Equip(2): This is... really great equipment! I'm really happy.
473.Supply: Refueling. I confirm that I have received it.
473.Docking(1): Commander-sama, I am going to freshen up. Please wait a bit.
473.Docking(2): Commander-sama, I am so sorry. I'm going to heal my injuries.
473.Construction: I should go and meet the new ship.
473.Return: Commander-sama, I'm here to report in. The fleet has returned to base.
473.Sortie: Flagship Harukaze, setting sail. Everyone, please take care of me, okay?
473.Battle: What do I do... enemy ships have been spotted. Everyone, please get ready.
473.Yasen(1): It has come to a night battle. Everyone, please continue to follow me.
473.Yasen(2): Oh, my. The enemy is still here as well.
473.MVP: I am...? Really? Thank you, I'm glad to be here. I am delighted.
473.Damaged(3): Aaaaah! In this shape I can neither do battle nor escort...
473.Sunk: I'm going... to sink here... Asakaze, Matsukaze, Hatakaze, goodbye... surely... somewhere we will...
473.NewYears 6547: Commander-sama, I owe you so much for what you did for me last year. I hope you'll allow me to rely on you again this year. The Kamikaze-class, the fleet, and I all ask this of you.
473.Setsubun 6547: It is Setsubun, isn't it? It makes you feel as though your will to fight has returned, doesn't it? The one acting as our demon is... Kamikaze onee-sama...? Ah... everyone, you're throwing so hard...! Ah... awawa...!
473.Rainy 6547: Rain... I'm well aware that not many are fond of the rainy season, but I love it. It fits well with my umbrella. I adore it so much. Don't you agree?
473.Fall 6547: Commander-sama? Autumn is a time of delicious food. If I may, I would like to show you my skill and prepare you some delicious food, okay? Ufufufu.
473.Saury 6547: You said that we'll be supporting the saury fishing, didn't you? Orders acknowledged. I'll be heading out to fish as well.
473.Xmas 6547: So this is... what is known as "Christmas". I see a lot of dishes I am unfamiliar with. This large piece of meat is... I see, so it is poultry.

363.Intro: My name is Harukaze, third ship of the Kamikaze class of destroyers. Commander-sama, I am pleased to make your acquaintance. I will support you until the end.
363.Sortie: First Escort Fleet, Harukaze, setting sail. Everyone, please take care of me.
363.Yasen(2): Oh my, there are enemies over here... and over there as well...!? It can't be... a wolf pack!?
363.H0000: Commander-sama, I think for today, I will be serving as your secretary ship. Is that all right with you? I'm glad.
363.H0100: Notifying you that it's 0100. Commander-sama, you still intend to continue working? I am going to make tea.
363.H0200: Notifying you that it's 0200. I finished making the tea. I'm going to put it here. There are tea-cakes as well.
363.H0300: Notifying you that it's 0300. Commander-sama, the late night is completely silent. I would like it... if it was always like this.
363.H0400: Notifying you that it's 0400. Commander-sama, was it not because you did your duties all night that you got tired? Here, let me give you a shoulder massage.
363.H0500: Notifying you that it's 0500. Commander-sama, look at how beautiful the sunrise is. No matter the season, the dawn is wonderful.
363.H0600: 0600. It is now morning. I woke up all of the members of the fleet. Commander-sama, what would you like for breakfast?
363.H0700: Notifying you that it's 0700 and time for breakfast. Here is the breakfast I prepared. It's my specialty, so please enjoy it.
363.H0800: Notifying you that it's 0800. Commander-sama, here is a second helping. I tried my very best to make it.
363.H0900: Notifying you that it's 0900. Commander-sama, what kind of work will you have the fleet do today? Please give us any order.
363.H1000: 1000... Oh my, Asakaze-san. Good day to you. You are as lovely as ever. Second platoon? No, I haven't seen them.
363.H1100: Notifying you that it's 1100. Is this about Asakaze-san? Yeah, it's as you say, she is my most cherished friend.
363.H1200: Notifying you that it's 1200 and time for lunch. Commander-sama? Today for lunch I'll prepare some western sandwiches. I'll also make a fragrant black tea.
363.H1300: Notifying you that it's 1300. Was the sandwich to your liking? It's a native English food made for the sake of eating in a hurry.
363.H1400: Notifying you that it's 1400. Someday I would like to sortie with the fifth destroyer group in the midst of a naval battle. Someday...
363.H1500: Notifying you that it's 1500. Commander-sama, how does afternoon tea sound? I also made cookies.
363.H1600: Notifying you that it's 1600. I made black tea again. Did you eat the cookies I made?
363.H1700: Notifying you that it's 1700. Commander-sama, please look at this. The setting sun... is so red... I have been mesmerized by it. So beautiful...
363.H1800: Notifying you that it's 1800. Commander-sama, if it's fine with you, I will go prepare dinner.
363.H1900: Notifying you that it's 1900 and time for dinner. Today, dinner is pilchard dumplings, boiled barley rice and also miso soup with vegetables. I was taught recently. It's delicious, right? Please eat a lot.
363.H2000: 2000... Ah, I am so glad I learned to cook that lovely dish the other day. Eh? Night battle, is it? Umm, I am a fleet escort.. Umm, thats...
363.H2100: 2100... Ah, Kamikaze-oneesama! Yeah, I'm serving properly as the secretary ship. Yes, leave it to me.
363.H2200: Notifying you that it's 2200. Commander-sama, this fleet has many lovely ships collected in it. I am happy.
363.H2300: 2300. Commander-sama, I am happy. If perhaps this body can't move anymore someday, I would still want to protect everyone. Always and forever...

474.Intro:
I'm Matsukaze, the 4th ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers. So you're my commander, huh?
Sweet. I'll leave everything to you then! All right, let's go!
474.Library:
I'm Matsukaze, the 4th ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers. What do you mean, we're outdated? Are you kidding me?!
Don't you dare to forget howwe provided support at the front, from capture operations at the Southern Solomon Islands to escorting fleets.
Seriously, don't just forget about us Kamikaze-class, not to mention me.
474.Poke(3):
I guess that's a thing now. Huh. I'm okay with this.
Oh, my sister? Don't worry, I bet she likes you too. No problemo.
474.Idle:
You look busy. Oh well. Time to annoy sister dearest.
Hey~! ...Huh? Aaaand she's already scolding me. What gives?
And seriously, why do hers have to be so big? Anyway, don't piss her off!
474.Wedding: This isn't like you, calling me out someplace like that?  It couldn't be, you plan to make a once-in-a-lifetime confession?  Aha!  I wonder if that's it?  It is?  Haa...thank you.  Wait just a moment...you kept me waiting too long!
474.Married: You look a bit pale don't you?  Let me take a closer look and see.  Yup, you have a bit of a fever don't you?  Well I guess it can't be helped.  Let me carry you for awhile.  Alright then, full power!  Heavy...ha...lift!  Ugh!
474.Ranking: Ah yes, the report...... it's pretty important. Wanna have a look at it?
474.Join: DesRon 5, Matsukaze, heading out. Follow me, guys.
474.Equip(2): Hmm, this doesn't fit. ......No wait, it might actually. Huh, nice sense you have there!
474.Docking(1): 'Cuse me, gotta hang back for a bit.
474.Docking(2): Whoops, I failed. Sorry for giving you trouble.
474.Return: All right, fleet's returning to port. I just love my timing.
474.Sortie: Matsukaze, heading out. Ahaha, nailed it. Let's move!
474.Battle: Uh-oh, we've got a visitor. Get ready to engage, fleet! All right, let's go!
474.Yasen(1): I kinda like pursuit battles. Let's go then!
474.Yasen(2): There you are! Sorry, but gotcha!
474.MVP: Wait, me? Nah, it's fine, I don't need that. But thanks, it's the thought that counts.
474.Damaged(3): Now you've done it. I can be surprisingly stubborn, you know. I ain't gonna sink here!
474.Sunk: ....Huh?  This can't be.  I'm sinking again?  I couldn't protect them this time either, could I....?  Hey...big sis...

371.Intro:
I'm Matsukaze, the 4th ship of the Kamikaze-class destroyers. And of course you're my commander.
Naturally, that means you've got my back! All right, let's go!
371.Join: 5th Torpedo Squad, Matsukaze, heading out. Follow me, guys.
371.Sortie: We're a special escort fleet, full capable of defending too!  I'm well used to painful battles!
371.MVP: Ah, me?  Nah, it's fine, I don't need that. But thanks, it's the thought that counts and I'll accept that, okay?
371.H0000: Today it's my turn to help you out. Sounds good?
371.H0300: 0300. Eh?  Talk a bit more?  Well aren't you hard to please, are you...
371.H0400: 0400.  you're a bit sleepy too, aren't you?  How about you lie down for a bit?  I'll join you if you want. Ahaha, nope, just kidding!
371.H0500: 0500.  It's almost morning.  Should we go wake everyone up?  Aah, the morning glow.  It's beautiful, isn't it?  Not bad at all.
371.H0600: 0600.  Everyone, it's morning.  Ah, good morning, sis. Still early and already full of pep, aren't we?
371.H0700: 0700. What would you like for breakfast? Sis and me could make something for you if you want.
371.H0800: 0800.  I see....her meals aren't quite enough for you... Well, how about I try making some this time?  How does that sound?
371.H0900: 0900...!  Huh?  Why I'm breathing so heavily?  Well, it's my dear big sister's morning practice after all.  *sigh*.....If there's one thing I have to put up with, it's that.
371.H1000: 1000. You know, my sister... she'd be such a nice woman if she just shut up for once. So, what do you think?
371.H1100: 1100.  Alright then, what'd you like for lunch?  I heard Mamiya has something new on her menu. Wanna try it?
371.H1200: 1200.  Ah, this is it!  Mamiya's new special Hayashi Rice.  Let's get this!  Could I get a bite of yours too?  Oh, this is also great!
371.H1300: 1300.  Done eating.  Now we gotta exercise.
371.H1400: 1400..oh, Mina, Mika!  Are you doing well?  Where's Sacchin?  I see, that's cool!  Glad to hear that!
371.H1500: 1500.  *yawn*....I always get a little sleepy around this time.  Should I lie down for a bit? Eh, a little bit wouldn't hurt.
371.H1600: 1600.  Oh, U-chan!  Have you seen Yzuki?  She sure is shy.  Oh well, I'll just wait patiently for her!  Kay?
371.H1700: 1700.  Hey you?  The evening sun sure is red.  It looks just like blood.  Aha!  I'm joking, I'm joking!
371.H1800: 1800.  What should we get for dinner?  Would you like me to make something myself? Or is it still too early?  What do you think?  Ah, sorry.  I didn't mean it like that...it's nothing.  Huh...... hey you, I bet you're pretty good at cooking, no?
371.H1900: 1900.  Aha!  This looks really delicious!  Good job!  Can I dig in?  Haha, here I go!  *Chew* Oh wow, it really is delicious!  You're awesome!
371.H2000: 2000.  Ugh...I'm so full.  Thanks for the meal.  Home cooking sure is awesome!
371.H2100: 2100. Ah, I see. It's that time. Well, I used to be part of Desron 3, sooo... yeah, I suppose this is nice.
371.H2200: 2200.  But it's night now.  Let's take it easy.  What's with that look on your face?  This time isn't bad at all, don' you agree?
371.H2300: 2300.  Hey you, good job today.  Keep it up tomorrow too.  I had fun today.  G'night and sweet dreams.

1.Intro: I'm Mutsuki. Let's show some enthusiasm!
1.Library: The first Imperial Navy destroyer to be loaded with the large and powerful 61cm Torpedo Mounts, Mutsuki here! While I'm an older model, I gave it my all on the frontlines!
1.Poke(1): Oyo? Admiral? You called for me?
1.Poke(2): What is it~? What is it~?
1.Poke(3): Are you that interested in me~? Ehehehe♪
1.Wedding: To tell the truth, I wanted you to praise me, so I did my very, very best.
1.Ranking: Looks like... some kind of letter has arrived?
1.Equip(1):
Oh~! This overflowing power~!
I feel so inspired!
1.Equip(2): I don't plan on losing! Teehee♪
1.Supply:
Oh~! This overflowing power~!
I feel so inspired!
1.Docking(1): I want to take a little break.
1.Docking(2): Weh... I couldn't do anything... I was so miserable...
1.Return: Notifying you that the operation is complete!
1.Sortie: Everyone! Are you ready for the sortie, nyaa~n?
1.Yasen(1): I have this battle under control!
1.Yasen(2): I have both a main gun and torpedoes!
1.MVP: Praise me more and more~! I grow more when I get praised~! Ehehehe♪
1.Damaged(2): Weh... my armor is as good as paper...!
1.Damaged(3): Nya!? Th-This much won't stop me...!
1.Sunk: I hope... I helped... a little... gh... nya...
1.LateWinter 6547: It's my season, nyashi! Admiral, Kisaragi-chan, everyone, let's show some enthusiasm! Ohhh~!
1.Setsubun 6547: Oyo? Is it Setsubun? It is Setsubun! I'm going to throw! Eii!
1.Valentines 6547: Here, Admiral. You can have this chocolate from me! Ehehe, please do♪
1.White Day: Umm, I made some cookies for Kisaragi and the admiral.... Would you like to try some nya~?
1.Anniversary 6547: Oyo!? It's the third anniversary! Ehehe, Admiral, Kisaragi-chan, it's the third anniversary! The third anniversary!
1.Rainy 6547: Kisaragi-chan, it's been raining a lot recently. Ah, let's make some teru teru bozus! One for Kisaragi-chan and one for me!
1.EarlySummer 6547: Oyoyo? It's almost summer time, nya? Kisaragi-chan, for this year's summer vacation, what should we do? I will~, I will~!
1.Summer 6547: Oyo? Admiral, you're going for a dip in the water, nya? I'm coming, too! Swimsuit, swimsuit!
1.Fall 6547: Yaaay! I got through summer, nyashii~! Now it'll be relaxing for a little while, nya~! Alright, I'll do my best for fall, nya~! Admiral, expect a lot from me.

1.Wine 6547: Oyo? This is... the special wine available only at this time of year, nyaa. Maybe I'll have just a little, too! Ah...? Kisaragi-chan, that much!? ...Haa, Pola-san, nyaa...
1.Xmas 6547: Kisaragi-chan, it's Christmas! This cake is so sweet and delicious, nya! Here, here~!
1.YearsEnd 6547: So fast, nya~ It's already December, nyashi~ I have to do the cleanup with Kisaragi-chan... *sigh*

254.Idle: Nya... Admiral... I'm a little bored, desu...

2.Intro:
My name is Kisaragi.
Please keep me by your side.
2.Library:
Mutsuki-class destroyer— the second ship known as Kisaragi.

At Wake Island, I fought bravely while I was bombed by annoying F4F Fighter planes.

Nooo~ I mean it... the sea breeze is going to damage my hair...
2.Poke(2): Eh? Hmmm... I'm ready any time.
2.Poke(3): Geez... You must like it, too.
2.Wedding: Nn... it was all for show, to tell the truth. All I really wanted to do was gaze out at the sea with you... you know. Ah... just kidding♥
2.Ranking: It seems to be a letter for you. What's~it~say?
2.Equip(1): Look, look~ at this radiant skin... ufufu♪ ...You should take a closer look.
2.Equip(2): Ufu♪ Both stronger and more beautiful, don't you think?
2.Supply: Look, look~ at this radiant skin... ufufu♪ ...You should take a closer look.
2.Docking(1): I'm feeling a little tired, so I'll have a rest in bed. Would you like to join me?
2.Docking(2): Aww... but I want to be with you for as long as I can. You and I... let's rest together.
2.Construction: Hmmm... I hope the newcomer's cute...

2.Sortie: You'll let me come, too, right?
2.Battle: Oh, no! My hair will get damaged!

2.Yasen(1): If you've fallen for me, shall we do it?
2.Yasen(2): Now, then... I'm going to make you feel all better♥
2.MVP: Ahn♥ I was the best? Well, I suppose that's normal. It's fine, it's fine. There's no need for so much praise.
2.Damaged(3): What are you... going to do to me!?
2.NewYears 6547: Best wishes for the new year! Please take good care of us again this year, okay~?
2.Setsubun 6547: We throw this bean, right? Eii~♥ Oh, my! Did I hit somewhere strange?
2.Valentines 6547: Heeere~♥ They're chocolates filled with my feelings, so make sure you eat every last one, okay?
2.White Day: Huh, Mutsuki, you're giving these cookies to me? Thank you. I'll eat them with appreciation. Fufufufu.
2.Anniversary 6547: Commander, it's the third anniversary today. I was really surprised, too. Let's celebrate today with just the two of us.
2.Rainy 6547: My, Mutsuki-chan's teru teru bozu is cute. There's one for me, too? Thanks!
2.EarlySummer 6547: It'll be summer soon~ Maybe I should go buy a new swimsuit.... Hey, which one do you think is good~?
2.Summer 6547: Hey, let's go to the beach! Ah, let's take off our rigging and clothes. So? What do you think of my swimsuit?
2.Fall 6547: Fall sure is nice. Mutsuki-chan looks a little happy, too. Commander, what does fall mean to you? Is fall for appetites? Or perhaps... ufufufu
2.Saury 6547: Help with the saury fishing...? Will I be able to...? Mutsuki-chan, you're so excited. Ufufufu♪ How cute.
2.Wine 6547: Oh, my~ This is a lovely time of year for wine. Is this fine in a place like this? My, Pola-san, that's a beautiful way to drink. I won't lose, either. Okay, cheers. Commander, would you like to join us~?
2.Xmas 6547: Ufufu♪ Mutsuki-chan, Christmas cake is delicious, isn't it? Try some of this turkey, too.
2.YearsEnd 6547: I see, so it's already December, huh? It's cleaning season. Oh, no... my hair will get ruined.

255.Idle: Nh... could it be that am I of no use to you...?
255.Married: That face of yours... I can't help but find myself staring into it, you know. It's exactly my type... Just kidding♥
255.Supply: If it's from you... Thank you... I love it.

435.Join: 30th Destroyer Division, Kisaragi. Starting the sortie!

435.Yasen(1): If you've fallen for this remodeled me, shall we do it...?
435.Yasen(2):
There's no helping you girls, is there...
Now, then... I'm going to make you all feel better♥

164.Intro: Yayoi, reporting for duty... Pleased to meet you. Please don't be too concerned about me...
164.Library: Third of the Mutsuki-class destroyers, 'Yayoi'. I was born at Uraga, Yokosuka. Mutsuki, Mochizuki and I did our best as a task force. I dislike dive bombers. Please take good care of me.
164.Poke(2): Eh...? Yayoi, isn't angry you know? ...Sorry for having such a stiff expression.
164.Poke(3): Like I said, I'm not angry... Please don't be so concerned about me...
164.Idle: Yes, I'm fine... Please take your time. Yayoi will be here... Yes, I'll be...
164.Married: If the commander is upbeat, that's good. Yayoi's good too, then.
164.Wedding: Commande~r. Com...mander... It's hard. Hawawa!? W-were you listening? I see... thank goodness. No, that's good. Commander... Erm... thanks for everything. Let's keep going together... okay?
164.Ranking: Uhm... A report for the commander...
164.Supply: Is it alright for me to get this?
164.Docking(1): Yayoi shall be going for some repairs.
164.Construction: A new ship has been completed.
164.Sortie: OK, Mutsuki, Mochizuki, let's go... Yayoi, heading out!
164.Yasen(1): Chasing the enemy. Leave it to me...
164.MVP: Ye...yes, Yayoi was important... uh... um... I'm kind of...happy.
164.Damaged(3): That does it... I'm not angry... I'm not.. angry...
164.Sunk: I'm... sinking... Mutsuki, I'm... joining you... as well...
164.NewYears 6547: Admiral... best wishes... the new... year. I'm counting... on you... again this year...
164.Winter 6547: Uzuki, I'm glad you're okay. ...Eh, is that so? I shouldn't worry about you...? Mh... Ah, I'm not... angry... ...Maybe a... little...
164.Valentines 6547: Commander... here, t-these are for you. They're sweet. Don't worry about getting... me... anything...
164.Anniversary 6547: Commander... congrats... on three years. Yayoi... is happy... too. Yes.
164.Rainy 6547: Rainy season.... Ah, this teru teru bozu....is cute.... Ah, please....don't mind me....
164.Fall 6547: I don't... really like... fall. I'm not... angry. I'm not really... angry, but...
164.Saury 6547: Saury is... I like it... saury festival... I... it's good... in my opinion...
164.Wine 6547: This is... the taste of the season... the special wine. Is that so? Grown-ups sure... like having so many... festivals.
164.Xmas 6547: Christmas... Ah... I'm... not mad or anything... Cake... I'll have some.
164.YearsEnd 6547: Mochi... Mochizuki...! We're doing cleaning, so... ah, there, wipe that down with water... Ah, it's not... I'm not angry... at all...

165.Intro: Yay~! I arrived-pyon! My name is Uzuki, you can call me U-chan!
165.Library: Fourth of the Mutsuki-class destroyers, 'Uzuki'-pyon. From convoy escorting to capture operations, I worked re~ally hard! Near the end I was loaded up with lots of machine-guns to down them all! U-chan won't be sunk by bombers!
165.Poke(2): Commander... you're wonderful today... nah just kidding pyo-n!
165.Poke(3): ohohoh? Tickling is U-chan's specialty pyon! Commander~, I won't let you run away pyo~n!
165.Idle: Comman~der, play with me~, I'm bored-pyon... puppukupu~!
165.Married: Commande~r, if you're tired let's take a break together! Pyon pyon!
165.Wedding: "Co~ma~n~der… what's up~? Your face is all red, yeah? I mean, your face is kinda close, yeah? Eh, wha? Ah, is there something on U-chan's face? No way, tell meeee? What? Whaaa!? Fuwaaa…"
165.Ranking: A report for the commander pyon
165.Join: Uzuki, sortiei~ng! I'll do my best pyon!
165.Construction: A new ship daughter is born~... who is it pyon?
165.Attack: The true power of the Mutsuki-class~! Yaaa!
165.Yasen(1): U-chan is ama~zing at night pyon!
165.MVP: nnnYay! Great success pyon! This is the real power of the Mutsuki-class! *smug*!
165.Damaged(3): I got beat-pyon... huu..., I want to take a bath-pyon...
165.Sunk: This is farewell... for U-chan pyon? Commander... don't cry, okay?
165.NewYears 6547: Commander, Happy New Year, pyon! I want my New Year's Gift, pyon!
165.Winter 6547: Pukupuku~! I'm not too good in winter, but I managed to clear it and then some, pyon! Ehehe. Yayoi, you worry too much, pyon!
165.Valentines 6547: Commander~! Here's some chocolate from me, pyon~! Ah, I'm not kidding this time, pyon!
165.Anniversary 6547: Commander~!!! It's third year anniversary pyon! U-chan is happy pyon! Splash!
165.Rainy 6547: I don't like rainy days, pyon. Puppukupu....
165.Fall 6547: Yayoi is looking down, pyon... At times like this, U-chan will do something funny! Here we go... Pupukupuu! ...Huh? Why are you angry, pyon?
165.Saury 6547: Saury~! Leave the saury to me, pyon! It's Ucchan's secret double searchlight challenge, pyon! What's it mean? It doesn't really mean anything, pyon. It's fashion, pyon♪
165.Wine 6547: Ohhh~? Is this the wine I've heard so much about, pyon? U-chan wants to try a little bit too, pyon♪ *gulp* *gulp* ...Phaaah! Puppukupu~! It's too soon for U-chan, pyon.
165.Xmas 6547: U-chan, it's Christmas! *nom* *nom* Mmm~ Tastes good, pyon! *nom* *nom* ... *nom* *nom*
165.YearsEnd 6547: The end of the year cleanup? U-chan isn't good at cleaning, pyon... Yayoi can do it, pyon.

28.Intro: I'm Satsuki. Good to meet ya!
28.Library: I kept getting injured again and again on missions, but I fought bravely to the end as the fifth of the Mutsuki-class destroyers. After the war began, I did my best to escort the fleet and guard areas of the ocean. I really did!
28.Wedding: Commander! I'm sorry for always making you fret… but… it was a little on purpose… just kidding!
28.Equip(1): Looks like you made me stronger. Thanks, Commander!
28.Equip(2): Yeah, I'm different from the everyday me!
28.Supply: Looks like you made me stronger. Thanks, Commander!
28.Docking(2): Woah~ I thought I was really gonna die~
28.Construction: Looks like a new friend has arrived.
28.Battle: You gonna fight with me? Ain't that cute of ya!
28.MVP: Ehehee!! Are you reconsidering me now?
28.Sunk: H-hey? What's this... the ocean... is dark... I can't see anything... why?
28.NewYears 6547: Happy New Year, Commander! Ain't it cute how it passed by so fast? Countin' on ya again this year, you know!
28.Valentines 6547: Commander, some chocolate for ya! Handmade by me! ...Huh? I didn't get help from Irako... None, okay? I-I really didn't!
28.Anniversary 6547: Apparently, today's a special day. But to me, every day's a special day if I'm with you, Commander....
28.Rainy 6547: The season of May.... Eheh, it's my season, isn't it? Ufufufu!
28.EarlySummer 6547: Its getting hot, Commander! I'll bring you something to cool you down!
28.Summer 6547: Commander, splitting watermelon with everyone is fun! Eh... you gonna challenge me? Hehe, ain't that cute of ya♪
28.Fall 6547: Ah... it's fall now. Commander, I'm not worried! This is me we're talking about. I'll make it through! Watch me.
28.Saury 6547: Commander, it's the saury festival! I hear ya. I'll lend you my power, too! This festival is gonna be fun!
28.Xmas 6547: Commander! I heard the neighborhood is lit up for Christmas. It's gorgeous. So what are we doing for it? Ufu... just kidding!

256.Idle: Geez Commander, is it not my turn yet? Are you listening to me? Aah... I see, understood.
256.Married: Seriously, I'm no match for the commander... hehe~

418.Intro: How's the remodeled Satsuki? Want to try me?
418.Equip(1): Thanks for the enhancement! With this I can protect the admi—I mean, I can protect everyone!
418.Attack: Alright, my fight starts now! Everyone, follow me!

481.Intro: Sixth ship of the Mutsuki-class destroyers, Minazuki here. Sorry I'm late. Commander, take care! ...Ehehe.
481.Library: I'm the sixth ship of the Mutsuki class, Minazuki. I was born in Uraga near Yokosuka. Along with my older and younger Mutsuki-class sisters, I participated in battles at the start of the war. I also served as a convoy escort a bunch of times. Oh? Submarines...? They're really annoying enemies. *sigh* Don't I know it.
481.Poke(1): Oh? Did you call me? It's fine.
481.Poke(2): Sacchin...? ...Ah, my bad. Nah, it's nothing. Ehehehe...
481.Poke(3): Commander, what's wrong? Are you getting hungry? No helping it... want me to go make you something? It's fine.
481.Idle: Heeey. Hey, heyheyhey, heee~ey! Huh? Commander, can't you hear me...? He looks so busy. No helping it... I'll go over to Sacchin's, then. Okay~ off I go.
481.Married: What's wrong? You're looking pretty worn out. Commander, you don't look so good. Ehe... Alright! I'll cheer you right up. Ehehe♪ How's this! Eh? It didn't work? Alright! It's time to get serious...!
481.Wedding: Commander, what is it? You called? Oh, okay. ...What's going on? Ehehe... what's that thing you're hiding? Nice, nice, what is it, what is it? Ah, this? Can I open it? Then... I'll open it. Whoa...! Is this seriously...? Fufu... whooaah♪
481.Ranking: Oh, okay. The intelligence, huh? I'll bring it right away! Wait right here. ... ...Here.
481.Join: Mutsuki-class destroyer, Minazuki, going ouuut! Ehehe♪
481.Equip(1): This is great. I'm happy... Ehehehe♪
481.Equip(2): Ohhhh... I get it now. So it's like this.
481.Docking(1): Sorry. I'll take a quick bath. Commander... no peeking, okay? Er... he left.
481.Docking(2): Ahhh... sorry. This is a little bad, huh? I'll go get cleaned up. Please wait. Whew...
481.Construction: Commander, it's a new ship! I'm so happy!
481.Return: Commander, the fleet's back! Everyone is safe. That's the most important thing.
481.Sortie: Fleet flagship, destroyer Minazuki, setting sail! Everyone, follow me!
481.Battle: The enemy... I've spotted them. No helping it... let's go! Alright, everyone?
481.Attack: This isn't a convoy escort... it's a naval battle! I'll be fine... just stay calm...! Alright! Let's goooo~!
481.Yasen(1): Time for pursuit, huh? I understand. Let's do it. Fleet, form up! I will lead the assault!
481.Yasen(2): Even against submarines or surface ships... this time... I won't lose!
481.MVP: Ehehehe! I was the biggest help? Yeah! Go me! Mutsuki-class power! Go ahead and praise me more! Fufu♪
481.Damaged(2): That hurts...! Ugh... I'm getting ticked off!
481.Damaged(3): Owowow... What's up with that? This is the worst! I-I can still move! I won't sink!
481.Sunk: Eh...? I'm sinking...? No way... Sacchin... Fumi-chan... sorry...
481.NewYears 6547: Commander, Happy New Year~! Ehehehe... I hope you'll let me rely on you again this year. So, you can let me have my New Year's money any time now~ Hmm~? Hmm~?
481.Setsubun 6547: Ufu♪ It's Setsubun! Nice, nice! Eh? "Setsuboon"? Your pronunciation is off... Eh? Why do you look so full of confidence? Eh...?
481.Fall 6547: Fall has arrived. Commander, what does fall mean to you? ...For Sacchin, fall is for food. For Fumi-chan, fall is for reading. For Naganaga, fall is for sports, I think. What about you, Commander? Maybe fall is... the season of love?
481.Saury 6547: *sigh* Did you hear the rumor, about the Naval Base Saury Festival? What's up with this fleet... and after they just went out saury fishing. This is too much for me... uhehe...
481.Wine 6547: Eh? A special wine? Is that so? World-famous? Whoa, this is... ah, it reeks of alcohol! Wha, Pola-san!?
481.Xmas 6547: Sacchin, Sacchin!! This is delicious♪ Ah... this, too♪ Uuu~ This Christmas must be a trap♪ I'm gonna grow a bulge, a bulge~♪

366.Intro: Sixth ship of the Mutsuki-class destroyers, Minazuki here. Commander, let's have another lively day. Take care! ...Ehehe♪
366.Equip(2): Ohhhh... I get it now. So it's like this. Got it, got it.
366.H0000: Commander, it just turned midnight. Tonight we're going to stay up late together, huh? Well, sounds good to me. *whew* Fuhehe♪
366.H0100: It's 0100. It's the middle of the night, huh? Want me to pour some tea? You don't? You do? Which one?
366.H0200: 0200. It's the hour of Ushimitsu. Commander, do you believe in ghosts? Ah, I see. Hmmmm... that's so boring... it's not even...
366.H0300: Ah! I think the commander fell asleep. Good, good♪ 030... What the...! He woke up. How boring. Ah, geez! He went back to sleep!
366.H0400: Commander, it's now 0400. It'll be morning soon... *yawn* I'm as tired as you'd expect. I'll brew the tea this time. Or is coffee better? Okaaay♪
366.H0500: 0500. Here, it's your coffee. Commander, is black ok? How mature♪ This aroma is nice. I like it~ Ehehe♪
366.H0600: It's 0600. It's morning. I'll go wake everyone up. Everyooone!! It's morniiing!! Wake up, waaake up!! All hands, ariiise!!
366.H0700: 0700. It's almost breakfast time. I'll go make a simple one, okay? Simple is fine, right? It is? Well then, wait just a bit.
366.H0800: 0800. Here. It's only a simple one, but breakfast is ready. I'll leave it here, okay? Oh, yeah, you wanted some ochazuke. There's a kettle of tea here... okay, just pour it all in. So...?
366.H0900: It's 0900. Okay, now that we're done with breakfast, let's get started on our morning duties. Ufufu♪ Want to clear some missions? Or manage the expeditions? What should we do?
366.H1000: 1000. Oh, Fumi-chan. How are you? Ah, is that so? Good, good! Oh, hey, want to go on an expedition with us girls in the 22nd? A reeaally long one. Ahaha!
366.H1100: It's only 1100, but... somehow I'm feeling hungry? Commander, what do I do? I guess breakfast might have been a bit too light.
366.H1200: 1200! Okay, it's lunchtime! What should we do? I can make another simple meal if you want. Oh, right! Irako-chan has the cafeteria open now. Let's go take a look! Fufufu...
366.H1300: I'm so fullll... Ah, 1300. Commander, I think I ate a little too much. My bulge is... Yeah, I'm still fine. Fuhehehe.
366.H1400: 140... Oh, Sacchin! Yoohoo, how are you? Ohhh? So hey, wanna swap and be the secretary ship? You don't? Ah, Commander... why are you glaring? Ehehehe...
366.H1500: Hey Sacchin, next time, want to go on an expedition together with Fumi-chan and Naganaga? A reaallly long one. We'll bring an extravagant bento! Won't that be fun? Eh... still a no? Tch... Ah, it's 1500!
366.H1600: 1600. *sigh* I'm kind of tired. Today was... Eh? It's not over yet? Is that so... ehehehe...
366.H1700: It's 1700. Commander! Look, look! The sunset is really pretty, huh? Ahaha... Isn't it great? The sunset overlooking the sea. I love it... ehehe.
366.H1800: It's now 1800. That it's for today. The fleet is coming back to port. Now, then! Should I focus all my efforts into making it? Making what? ...Making dinner. Dinner! ...Please wait.
366.H1900: Chop! Chop! Choo~op...! Ehehe... This one, too! Ehehe... Commander, please wait, alright? It'll only take a little while! Ah, the time is now... um... mhm! It's 1900!
366.H2000: 2000. And now... ta-dah! Tonight is... a crab croquette special! Eat as much as you want!
366.H2100: It's 2100. Commander, how were my crab croquettes? What did you think? Were they tasty? Ahaha♪ is that so? That's great. Whee~!
366.H2200: 220... Eh, Sendai-san. Did you need something? ...A night battle? Nahh... if you ask me what I'm good at, I'd say convoy escorting... Eh? I'll manage somehow? No way... I don't know... should I...? Hey, Commander? ...Huh? Commander!?
366.H2300: 2300. *phew* I'm saved... Commander, you're horrible. You should've stopped her properly. *sigh*

29.Intro: I'm Fumizuki. Nice to meet you~
29.Library: I'm Fumizuki, the seventh ship of the Mutsuki-class Destroyers. I've been in many open-sea battles. I was once on a fleet escort mission when I collided with a large ship and... got really hurt. It was such a mess!
29.Poke(1): Eh? What is it, what is it?
29.Poke(3): Commander, what is it? What is it? Ehehe~
29.Wedding: Commander, why are you looking at me so much? Y-You're making me nervous...
29.Join: Time to sortie! I'll show you my best!
29.Equip(1): Ah~ That looks great! Thank you~
29.Equip(2): Awesome, even I can shine with this!
29.Supply: Ah~ That looks great! Thank you~
29.Docking(1): I'll go take a tea break!
29.Docking(2): Ugh~ I feel so sleepy I could die~ Good night~
29.Construction: We've got a new comrade! I wonder what she's like?
29.Return: Operation complete! The fleet is back at base! Good job everyone!
29.Sortie: Even I'm quite strong at night battles!
29.Yasen(1): It's time to show off what the Torpedo Squadron's best is like!
29.Yasen(2): Hey, can I do them in?
29.MVP: I'm going to keep getting stronger, okay?
29.Sunk: Fumizuki... will not go down... like this...
29.NewYears 6547: Commander, best wishes for the new year! I'll be counting on... Uwah, the rice cakes are burning...!
29.Valentines 6547: Commander, for you~ A special sweet chocolate present from me. It's~for~you~♪
29.Anniversary 6547: Commander, for days like this, I have to be next to you. Because it's special, isn't it?
29.EarlySummer 6547: Summer's soon! Those impatient cicadas have already started chirping~.
29.Summer 6547: Huuhh? Splitting watermelon? I'll give it a tryyy♪ I'm really good at thiiis. Ready? Eii~♪ Wha!?
29.Summer 1471: Com~man~der, aren't you thirsty~? I'll bring some barley tea~. You'll drink it, right?
29.Fall 6547: In fall... I think baked sweet potatoes are really delicious♪ but... eating too much is dangerous... Fweeh...
29.Saury 6547: It's saury fishing~♪ I, Fumizuki, will go out and help catch some fish, too~ Commander, leave it to me, leave it to me~♪
29.Xmas 6547: Merry Christmas~ Commander! Isn't this hat cute? I want a present♪

257.Idle: Commander, what are you doing? Let's have a little chat! Oh, sorry... am I bothering you?
257.Married: Commander, this is embarrassing...! Please don't, stare at me so much...

6.Intro: Nagatsuki here. Don't make light of me as destroyers. I'm useful.
6.Library: Eighth ship of the Mutsuki-class. After the occupation of Southeast Asia, I was assigned to escort duties. While unloading at Kolombangara, I had to fend off a surprise attack by the enemy fleet.
6.Wedding: Relying on me so much is troubling... but it's not that simple. You're different, Commander.
6.Join: Have you got the strategy hammered out? Then, off we go!
6.Equip(2): I'll have to work harder from here-on-in.
6.Docking(1): I don't really need a rest...
6.Docking(2): If it's an order... I'll take a break.
6.Construction: A new comrade? I'm looking forward to it.
6.Attack: Prepare for surface action to starboard!
6.Yasen(1): I don't get this serious often! Let's keep going!
6.Yasen(2): Feel the power of the Oxygen Torpedo!
6.MVP: No matter how many more comrades there are, none shall surpass me!
6.Damaged(3): I got attacked... Not a direct hit, though...
6.Sunk: Sorry everyone... looks like this is as far as I'll go.
6.NewYears 6547: Commander, I'm happy that we were able to celebrate the new year once again. I'd like to count on you again this year.
6.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun, huh. Cultural events like this shouldn't be taken lightly. ...Ow! Satsuki! Stop messing around!
6.Valentines 6547: Valentine's, is it? Pointless... Uh... Commander, you're so disappointed... Well, then... sorry.
6.Anniversary 6547: Commander, it looks like today is a special day.
6.EarlySummer 6547: Sorry, Commander, I don't like this season. Why?... Uuu.. I don't really know.
6.Summer 6547: Alright! I'm feeling good enough to get back out there. Yeah... the middle of summer is when I'm at my best, so leave everything to me.
6.Saury 6547: Saury? It's not bad. I'll help. Kabayaki style is good, but then so is salt-grilled. Looking forward to it.
6.Xmas 6547: Christmas, huh? What's so merry about it? Here, you can have this. Well, it's time go train.

258.Idle: Commander, that's... well... Nagatsuki will be waiting here, alright?

30.Summer 6547: Ah, a watermelon. Sounds good. When it comes to splitting watermelon... I, Kikuzuki, will never lose.

30.Xmas 6547: Christmas, huh? You should go celebrate with your loved ones. Wh... What!? Commander... this... is a gift for me?

259.Idle: ...That's right, I'm used to being left behind. Please don't mind me, it'll be lonely otherwise...
259.Married: Such concerns of yours to me, Kikuzuki, is pointless. ...It's pointless... even though it's pointless, but still...

7.Intro: You're the commander, right? I'm Mikazuki. I hope you welcome me warmly into your fleet.
7.Library: I am Mikazuki, the Mutsuki class destroyer that participated in escorting light carriers and other fleets. I even sortied to that fierce battle of Solomon Islands. Although I'm an old model, utilizing my fast speed I even participated in some transport missions.

7.Equip(1): I have to work much harder...don't I?
7.Equip(2): Commander, with this, it looks like I'm good to go.
7.Equip(3): With this, it looks like I'm good to go.
7.Supply: I have to work much harder...don't I?
7.Docking(1): Just a little...I'll leave it in their hands...

7.Yasen(1): Jeez, and I even told them not to come again!
7.MVP: To think that I would be that strong...That's unbelievable!
7.Damaged(3): What have they done!? My clothes have been soiled...!
7.Sunk: Commander...I wanted to continue fighting together with you...
7.NewYears 6547: Best wishes for the coming year! Commander, I'll be counting on you again this year!
7.Setsubun 6547: *whew* I'm in the middle of transporting beans! I'll split these equally for everyone, so please wait a sec! Ahh, Mochi, don't eat that yet!
7.Valentines 6547: Commander, don't look just yet! Please wait a little bit longer. My special chocolate cake will be ready in just a moment!
7.Anniversary 6547: Commander, today is a very special day. This Mikazuki will firmly escort you.
7.EarlySummer 6547: Commander, it's bad! Summer is getting closer... I'll make sure to be careful!
7.Summer 6547: *sigh* I'll to get through summer this year somehow. Commander, thanks. Okay!
7.Saury 6547: So I'm doing saury fishing support? Roger that. Please leave it to me. I'll do my best!
7.Xmas 6547: Christmas. Commander, are you enjoying it, too? Here— It's only a modest little gift, but it's a token of my gratitude for what you do for us.
7.YearsEnd 6547: It's cleaning season. Oh, hey, hey! Mocchi! Don't just loaf around. Nagatsuki, I don't see your hands moving!

260.Idle: Commander, let's have a little rest? Let's not rush things, it's ok like this.
260.Married: Commander, you are always so considerate of everyone, so you can be yourself when you are with me? Hm? You mean that IS being yourself?

31.Library: Mutsuki-class destroyer Mochizuki. I took part in several invasions as a member of the 30th Destroyer Squadron. I engaged in transport missions again and again while going through repeated repairs. Worked hard, didn't I?
31.Poke(2): The strategy isn't complete yet? Well, I don't mind.
31.Poke(3): Upper... Ah... T-there there... That sure was stiff~... Yeah, that was good.

31.Equip(1): Oh~ this is nice... my body, feels, light?
31.Equip(2): Phew, nice... finally there's a little motivation.
31.Supply: Oh~ this is nice... my body, feels, light?
31.Docking(2): Ah~ What a pain... I'm gonna sleep.

31.Return: Strategy completed. The fleet is back.
31.Sortie: Okay okay, the fleet is leaving~

31.Yasen(1): Fine...! It's about time I get serious!!
31.Yasen(2): Line of fire is... it's ok... this will do...
