31.Damaged(3): Seriously, I said it hurts a lot!
31.Sunk: Commander, the truth is... I.. had... fun...
31.NewYears 6547: Commander, Happy New Year! New Year's is always a great time for taking it easy~ No need to work~ Right~?
31.Setsubun 6547: Wow... there's so many beans... that's an awful lot for Mikazuki. I'll lighten her load a little. *nom*♪*nom*♪
31.Valentines 6547: Eh~? Valentine's? What a pain~ I do have some chocolate, though. Want to eat it?
31.Anniversary 6547: Woah, the third anniversary is here? Amazing, unbelieveable. Ah, well, nap time I guess?
31.Rainy 6547: I'm sleepy.... Rainy season, huh... The sound of rain is really lulling.... Commander, let's sleep.... zzZZzzz...
31.EarlySummer 6547: Ahh~... It's getting a bit hot~ I'm feeling sluggish... isn't there any ice cream~? Ice cream...
31.Summer 6547: *sigh* It's seriously hot. It's no good... no good... Ramune's all gone... ice cream all gone... no good at all!
31.OldFall 6547: It's fall~ Time for the fall harvest~ There's gonna be so much yummy stuff~ I just want to eat and sleep~
31.Fall 6547: Well we have a lot of time, so let's go do Operation F. I guess I can fish up dinner in this downtime.
31.Saury 6547: Ah~ saury fishing? That's way too much work... Just let me eat some when they're done.
31.Xmas 6547: Commander, come on and drink, eat and sing with us, alright? This one's a fun Christmas! Uhehehe♪
31.YearsEnd 6547: Just because it's December, everyone suddenly seems so busy... Ah, ow... Mikazuki, don't kick me...

261.Idle: Well, I'm ok, just tired from work. Was spacing out? Oh, don't worry, I'll be fine.
261.Married: Hey, Commander. Come laze around with me. If you're always on edge, you'll get tired.

9.Intro: Nice to meet you! I'm Fubuki! Thanks for having me!
9.Library: The first of the Special Type destroyers designed under the Washington Naval Treaty, shocking the world with our capabilities relative to other ship classifications at the time, Fubuki here! Based on our design, many successive fleet-type destroyers were built. Aye! I'll do my best!
9.Poke(1): Thanks for the hard work, Commander!
9.Poke(2): What would you like me to do next?
9.Wedding: Umm... hey... I... Commander, I mean... I l-l-lo... n-no... I have total faith in you! Sir!
9.Join: I'll be the one to finish them off!
9.Equip(1): Thank you very much! I'll try even harder!
9.Equip(2): For the commander, I'll do my best!
9.Supply: Thank you very much. I'll try even harder!
9.Docking(1): I'll be resting for a bit.
9.Construction: Ah! Didn't a new friend just arrive?
9.Return: Looks like the operation is complete.
9.MVP: I was able to do it! It's all thanks to the commander!
9.NewYears 6547: Best wishes for the new year, Commander! Let's play Hanetsuki! The one who will lose will get X drawn on their face in ink. I'm not going to lose!
9.NewYears 1471: Best wishes for the new year, Commander! I'll work even harder and harder this year!
9.Setsubun 6547: I will do my absolute best for Setsubun as well! Target acquired— now throwing! Uryaa! Impact confirmed— target is silenced! I did it...! ...Eh... ehehe...?
9.Valentines 6547: Commander, today is Valentine's day! I made a big chocolate heart for you~ Here! ...Huh? Wha!? It melted somehow...
9.Anniversary 6547: Commander, the third anniversary is here! The third anniversary! I'm really amazed! Special Type destroyer, Fubuki, is happy!
9.Rainy 6547: It's also raining today... Well, it's the rainy season, so I guess the rain can't be helped. Ah, that's it! Let's do some training! Yes! Huh? The Shiratsuyu-class girls look lively, don't they...
9.Summer 6547: Gather up, Special Type Destroyers! We're starting our summer training! Pair up. Ah... oh, right! You'll pair with me! Okay?
9.Fall 6547: Special Type Destroyer, first ship of the Fubuki-class, Fubuki! I'm going, Commander! Please watch over me!
9.Xmas 6547: Christmas...? So this is Christmas!? Commander, it's so beautiful! The trees are pretty, too♪
9.YearsEnd 6547: Eh? Commander, are you doing the New Year's shrine visit? Ah, excuse me, but I'm going to Mamiya-san's place later to help get the New Year's soba ready. Please drop by and have a bite if you'd like. I'll give you extra!

201.Intro: Fubuki here! Thanks for having me today!
201.Poke(3): Whaat is iiit, Mutsuki-chan? Eh, er... C-Commander!?
201.Idle: Main gun... check. Torpedo tubes... check. Engine... no problems! *whew* Next was... Ah! That's right, let's scan the horizon, too. Let's see...
201.Married: Are you working hard like always, Commander? Umm... here. I made this myself. If it's okay, would you like to eat this? H-Here you are...
201.Ranking: Commander, you're going to confirm the situation?
201.Join: I'll definitely be the one to finish them off! Setting sail!
201.Equip(2): I will do my very, very best!
201.Supply: Thank you very much, Commander. With this, I can do my best!
201.Return: Operation complete. Thanks for the hard work!
201.Yasen(1): Prepare for torpedo attack. Now in pursuit of the enemy.
201.H0000: Commander, the date has changed. For today, I, Fubuki, will be the timekeeper.
201.H0200: It's 0200! Commander, at this time, the base is so quiet, isn't it?
201.H0300: It's 0300. Eh, me? Ah, sir! I'm fine! I'm not getting sleepy!
201.H0400: It's... 0-4... 00... ah...!? No, no! Sir! I am full of energy!
201.H0500: It's 0500! Commander, these early morning hours feel great, don't they? Aye!
201.H0600: It's 0600! All hands, arise, okay? Rise and shine! Fleet— all hands, awaken!
201.H0700: It's 0700! Commander, here is your breakfast. It's a Japanese-style breakfast. This morning, it's miso soup and potatoes!
201.H0800: It's 0800! Alright, with that, the dishes are washed... Aye! Commander, my sortie preparations are complete!
201.H0900: It's 0900! Shirayuki-chan, Hatsuyuki-chan, are you ready? Commander, the 11th Destroyer Division is ready to sortie at any time!
201.H1000: It's 1000! Akagi-san... she always looks so radiant! Someday, I'll be sortieing with her as an escort ship... Ahh...! It's my dream! My dream!
201.H1100: It's 1100! It'll be lunchtime really soon. What should today's lunch be... Commander, how about the usual curry?
201.H1200: It's 1200! Commander, I made some curry! How is it? There are carrots and onions... Ahh, that's it! The secret ingredient. ...Ah! Have some seconds!
201.H1300: It's 1300! Where will we deploy to for this afternoon's operation? The fleet sortie composition... Ah, Commander, are you getting tired?
201.H1400: It's 1400! Ah, Furutaka-san, what's the matter? Huh? Aoba-san? Hmm... I haven't seen her... Ah, okay!
201.H1500: It's 1500! Yes, Furutaka-senpai is really good at everything. She's a kind person. Oh! It's Aoba-san! Aoba-saaaan!
201.H1600: It's 1600! Aoba-san, a little while ago, Furutaka-san was looking for you. Is everything okay? Huh... she went off... um...
201.H1700: It's 1700! Commander, the sunset is pretty, isn't it? It'll be time for dinner soon, and a meal hasn't been prepared yet. Oh, you'll treat me to dinner tonight?
201.H1800: It's 1800. I'm feeling nervous about eating out with the commander... Let's see... a knife and fork... these are used out there, aren't they?
201.H1900: It's 1900! Commander, this consommé soup is hot and delicious! This salad, too... it's very extravagant and Western, isn't it?
201.H2000: It's 2000! I'm full, Commander! Ah, now then, I have to work hard to return the favor. Sir! I will continue to do my best!
201.H2100: It's 2100! Oh, it's Yura-san! Yura-san is wonderful, isn't she? Shirayuki-chan and the rest of us are all grateful to her. Aye!
201.H2200: 2200... Eh, my dream? I want to become stronger; to be able to protect everyone... If peace comes... I want us to always be basking in the sun.
201.H2300: It's 2300. Commander, what are your dreams for the future? Mhm, mhm... is that so? That's great♪ They're the same as mine. Aye!

426.Intro: Thanks for the hard work! Fubuki here! Aye, I'll do my best!
426.Poke(1): Is it time to sortie? I'll do my best!
426.Equip(2): This equipment... with this, I'll do even better!
426.Yasen(1): Transitioning to pursuit attack. Please follow me!

10.Intro: I'm Shirayuki. Thanks for having me.

10.Poke(1): Thank you for the good work. Would you like some tea?

10.Ranking: Commander, a message is here for you.

10.Equip(2): I'm happy...! Thank you very much...!
10.Supply: For future success' I'll try hard!
10.Docking(1): I think it can be repaired immediately.

10.Yasen(1): This is the power of a special-type destroyer, please watch.

10.MVP: I too, am happy that I was able to take part and support.
10.Sunk: N-no... I still haven't done anything...
10.NewYears 6547: Commander, I'll be counting on you again this year. Um, if it's okay with you, will you play Hanetsuki with me? I'll get Fubuki-chan to come along.
10.Valentines 6547: I did my very best making this... chocolate. If it's fine with you, please have it... ...But I don't have much experience with cooking... I'm sorry...
10.Anniversary 6547: Heartfelt congratulations on the third anniversary. Shirayuki will continue to strive to contribute. Yes. Leave it to me!
10.Rainy 6547: 'We have a way to battle even on rainy days!'. It is you who taught me that, Commander. Don't worry, let's do our best on a rainy day!
10.Summer 6547: Ugh... I don't like all the flying insects in summer. Let's burn a swirly-type incense! Let me handle the whole thing!
10.Xmas 6547: I wonder if it's really fine to be so merry just because it's Christmas? But I guess it's fine. It must be. After all... look!
10.YearsEnd 6547: Okay, I'd say the cleaning was finished without a hitch. Commander, would you like to go buy a New Year's fortune with me? I actually buy one every year.

202.Intro: I'm Shirayuki. I'll be in your care today as well.
202.Poke(2): Yes, the 11th Destroyer Division is ready to go.
202.Idle: This is for Fubuki-chan, and this is for Hatsuyuki-chan. Ok this is perfect. Now, I also need to- fufufu, I am now ready for any command!

202.Ranking: Commander, analyzing the report was it? I have gathered them right here.

32.Docking(2): It hurts. Wanna get repaired. Gonna go hide.

32.Yasen(2): When I get serious, I can do anything...!
32.MVP: I'll get serious starting tomorrow...! Watch...!
32.Damaged(3): I can't take it, wanna go home...

32.Valentines 6547: Anyway, it looks like you got some good chocolate from everyone... You won't need this then, huh...? I'll throw it away... Oh, Commander...? ...Uuu.. uuuuu...!?

32.Xmas 6547: Ku-ri-su-ma-su...? What's that...? Is it delicious...? ...Ah! Please give me a piece of cake, too!
32.YearsEnd 6547: The cleanup is harsh again this year... ...But after that, it's the Annual Ship Girl Singing Contest...! I wonder what I should sing this year. I'm pretty good at this kind of thing... Do, re, mi, fa, so, la, ti, do...!

203.Intro: I'm... Hatsuyuki. What? I'll do... starting tomorrow.
203.Idle: Firstly, a comfortable futon. Next would be food and drinks. Then books and games and things like that... Well, it'd be nice...
203.Married: Fine with me, I don't really... Hatsuyuki doesn't really like combat. Being together is fine... right? It's okay, nothing really...
203.Ranking: Ah... you want to see? ...Information? ...Without me looking, or something... Ah, understood... I'll show you it.
203.Sortie: Oh, if I'm really allowed to do this...! Destroyer Hatsuyuki, launching...!

11.Intro: I'm Miyuki. Great to meet you!
11.Library: Fourth of the special-type destroyers, Miyuki-sama! During practice, I hit another destroyer and made a bit of scene. Eh, but I gotta do what I gotta do. Watch and see!
11.Poke(2): I'll be doin' my best next time too!
11.Wedding: Erm, umm… I like the commander!.. What is it? Don't look at me with that face!
11.Ranking: A~h what a bother, a letter-ish thing is here~
11.Equip(1): Let's go go~! I wanna fight soon...!
11.Equip(2): Thank you, Commander♪ Have a nice day~
11.Supply: This'll work, this'll do~ I wanna hurry up and fight!
11.Docking(1): I'm a bit tired, y'know~ Takin' a break!
11.Docking(2): Ow-w-w-w..... What a downer~ My honour's injured.
11.Construction: Woah~ Looks like a new comrade has joined our fleet!
11.Sortie: Miyuki-sama's the first to arrive~ Which one is our enemy~?
11.MVP: Aww yeah! Hey, did you see Miyuki-sama's great performance?
11.Damaged(2): ch! You won't hit me again!
11.Damaged(3): I got hit! Man, I messed up... crap.
11.Sunk: Sorry... I'm going ahead.... see you later...
11.NewYears 6547: Oh! How joyous! It's New Year's! This is gonna be another good year! Yup!
11.Anniversary 6547: Oh, I see! Today's a special day! I forgot! Commander, I look forward to working with you!
11.Rainy 6547: The rainy season's quite annoying, don't you think, Isonami? Hey, are you listening?
11.Xmas 6547: Nice! Christmas! It's kinda nice, and this chicken is tasty, too! So, my present...?

204.Intro: It's the great Miyuki! Nice to meet you again, Commander!
204.Poke(1): Good work, wasn't it, Commander! No problem!
204.Poke(3): Oi, oi, oi! Touching me like that - how should I put it... Well, I guess it's fine!
204.Idle: Ah, yeah, the area around my stomach kinda hurts but... Ah, Inazuma, you don't need to worry about me! I'm fine, I'm fine!! I'm full of energy!!
204.Married: Commander, thanks for everything! Letting loose and fighting feels kinda good! I wonder why that is... Well, who cares! Don't sweat the small stuff, yeah!?
204.Ranking: Right! Information, isn't it! That's important! Let's take a look-see, which is it~?
204.Join: Special-type destroyer, Miyuki, sortieing! Always wanted to try sayin' that!
204.Equip(3): Oh well, it'll work out somehow!
204.Supply: Supplies~! Much appreciated! Thanks for the meal!
204.Return: Ooh! Looks like the fleet managed to crawl home...awesome!
204.Sortie: Well then, which of you is Miyuki-sama's enemy? Fleet, sets sail!!
204.Yasen(1): We chasing after them? Fleet, entering pursuit!! Let's do this!!

33.Intro: So you're the commander, huh? Well, I expect you to work very hard.
33.Library: Fifth ship of the Special Type destroyers, Murakumo here. Huh? Never heard of me? You can't be serious. Don't even know a famous ship like me, who rescued Furutaka's crew, took part in the Southern Operations, and many other operations? Just how inept are you!?
33.Poke(2): You look restless. Are you okay?
33.Poke(3): You... I'll make you eat these oxygen torpedoes!
33.Idle: You... just how are long you planning on making me wait here!? What the hell! What are you thinking? Geez... hurry it up!
33.Wedding: I just want to tell you... well, I don't really dislike you, you know. I guess you can order me to do anything... you want... What are you...!? I-I didn't mean it like that!
33.Ranking: It's an urgent coded transmission. You should read what it says.
33.Equip(1): Heh. Not bad... this'll make me even more captivating.
33.Equip(2): I can fight on with this... ...W-What? I-I'm not thanking you or anything!
33.Docking(1): My clothes got a little dirty...
33.Docking(2): ...! ...I can't believe I have to go into the dock... how humiliating...!!
33.Construction: Looks like the newest member of the fleet has arrived.
33.Return: The operation has ended. The fleet has returned.
33.Sortie: Ha! Finally, to the front lines!
33.Yasen(1): Now this is where I really shine!
33.Yasen(2): All you fools in my path... just sink!!!
33.MVP: Well, it's only natural. ...What? Are you dissatisfied?
33.Sunk: I won't forgive you... I will never forgive you for this!!
33.NewYears 6547: Happy New Year. It really can't be helped, so I'll go along with you this year as well... Honestly...
33.Valentines 6547: This... I found it on the floor over there! Ah-! It's not like I bought it or anything. It's yours, isn't it? ...Hurry up and take it already!
33.Anniversary 6547: Oh, isn't today an important day!? Okay, you come here, too!
33.Rainy 6547: The rainy season, huh.... Well, it isn't so bad. It allows us to take it easy for a while. You dislike it?
33.Xmas 6547: Christ... mas...? That's a Western celebration, isn't it? I'm not interested in such- *nom* Wh-What'sh thish!? It'sh elishious! ...Ehh...!?

205.H0000: It's now midnight. Tonight, I, Murakumo will serve as the secretary ship. What's with that face!? You're still the same petulant child as ever.
205.H0200: 0200. It's so quiet... It'd be nice if it were always this way.
205.H0300: It's now 0300. Are you still... ah... what? Are you asleep?
205.H0400: It's 0400. You woke up? Well, it's fine. I'll be on watch, so please have some rest.
205.H0500: 0500. It's almost morning. Hey, get up! It's morning. The morning sun sure is bright, isn't it?
205.H0600: 0600! Fleet: all hands, arise! Now then, let's begin!
205.H0700: It's 0700! To start with, would you get my breakfast ready? Huh...? What did you just say? Hurry it up!
205.H0800: 0800. Now then, breakfast tasted rather... well, not so bad. You should dilute the miso soup a little more. Yes, starting next time, you can try that.
205.H0900: It's 0900. Are you done cleaning up? Well then, let the fleet operations begin. First comes expeditions. Is the Third Fleet ready? Get to it!
205.H1000: 1000. Ah, Fubuki. You seem so lively. That's good. Things are going well here. It's under control.
205.H1100: It's 1100. Ah, the girls from the 11th? I must admit, they're my comrades. They're important to me.
205.H1200: It's 1200. So, what did you make me for lunch? Eh...? What's with that look! Are you telling me you didn't make anything? What were you thinking!?
205.H1300: 1300. ...Ahh... ugh. Fine! Then I'll make it. This is going to cost you. You'd better remember this! Think of it as a loan.
205.H1400: It's 1400. So? Are you satisfied? Even if it was simple, it wasn't bad, was it? Just as you'd expect from such a great destroyer, right?
205.H1500: 1500. Ah... Furutaka-san. Where were you? I couldn't find you anywhere... Anyway, I'm glad you seem to be doing well. I really mean it.
205.H1600: It's 1600. It's almost evening. Let's bring the fleet back to port. The sunset is... uh...! I wasn't saying anything! It had... nothing to do with you...
205.H1700: 1700. ...What is it? Are you mad? You're acting like such a child, you know? ...You're not mad? Well then, what is it!? Out with it!
205.H1800: 1800. Hmmm...? Is that so? Ufu♪ You're so cute, aren't you? Praising you a little is nice sometimes, isn't it? Just a little, okay?
205.H1900: It's 1900. Come to think of it, I'm getting kind of hungry... What are we having for dinner?
205.H2000: 2000. What's this scent...? Hm? Shirayuki? In that pot... did you make curry? There's so much of it. It can't be helped... I'll have some, too!
205.H2100: (2100?) Shirauki! Yur cookig ish elishious!! Where di you lear to... mm... Eh? The Accounting School!? Ah, I see. Is that so...
205.H2200: 2200. Night has fallen, huh. I don't like the night very much. I love the blue sky. I love seeing fluffy white clouds rising higher and higher against a pretty blue sky.
205.H2300: 2300. And just like that, another day comes to an end. You did well with giving it your all today. Tomorrow... ...Tomorrow, if you want me to keep you company... it'll be fine.

420.Intro: Commander... well, do your best today. I'll do what I can to help.
420.Poke(2): You look so restless. Honestly... Do you really have what it takes to lead us?
420.Married: W-What is it!? ...Why are you giving me that look? Do you not even understand the basics? I guess I have no choice but to start training you from now on!
420.Ranking: Only now do you finally want to check the intelligence? About time! Hurry up and check it.
420.Join: Alright! Murakumo, heading out! Follow me!
420.Equip(1): It's not bad. I'll take it
420.Equip(2): This is great... I've been looking forward to it! I guess anyone can do it if they try.
420.Return: The operation has ended. The fleet has returned. Well, I'm glad everyone is safe.
420.Sortie: It's finally time to demonstrate the power of my remodel in battle! Not bad at all!
420.Battle: Vanish into the depths of the sea!
420.Yasen(1): We're giving chase. They're not getting away!

12.Intro: U-um... my name is Isonami. Pleased to meet you.
12.Library: Ninth ship of the special-type destroyers, Isonami. Though I participated in many different battles, after getting damaged, I ended up in the marine guard and rear patrol. I'll do my best!
12.Poke(1): Ah, yes... um... I'll do my best.
12.Poke(2): Yes, Admiral. Do you need help with anything?
12.Wedding: Umm…. Admiral… do you have a girlfriend?.... Oh, so that's it. Fufu, hmm~ I see~♪
12.Ranking: Admiral, there seems to be a message for you.
12.Equip(1): With this, I can work harder with this right...?
12.Supply: With this, can I work even harder?
12.Docking(2): Is it ok if I take a short paid vacation.... Oh, no, it's nothing.
12.Construction: Ah. A new comrade is here, I wonder if she'll be my friend...?
12.Sortie: It's time to sortie... Yes! I'll do my best...!
12.Yasen(1): This is where, the time I exert my best...!
12.MVP: I can do it if I try! I'm so happy!
12.Valentines 6547: Admiral... Admiral-san! Um, will you please accept this? H... here!
12.Rainy 6547: It's the rainy season. For some reason, it makes me really calm, so I like it as it is. Eh, Miyuki? That's not it? Ehhhhh!?
12.Xmas 6547: How pretty... that Christmas tree... I see, so it's that time of the year again... *sigh*

486.Intro: The youngest of the Special Type I Fubuki-class destroyers, Uranami here. Commander, I'm looking forward to working with you.
486.Library: The tenth ship of the Special Revised I Type Fubuki-class destroyers, Uranami here. I was born in Sasebo. I formed the 19th Destroyer Division together with Isonami nee-san, Ayanami, and Shikinami. I deployed to Midway at the beginning of the war, and even went to the southern seas. Please remember the 19th Destroyer Division's services.
486.Poke(2): Aye! Special Revised Type I, Uranami here.
486.Poke(3): Ah, right there? Yes, my engine intake port is the same as Ayanami's and the others'. So you noticed.
486.Idle: U-Um... Commander, you look so busy. I don't want to get in the way of your work. I know! I'll go see how Ayanami and Shikinami are doing. I'll bring some teacakes for us to have.
486.Married: Commander, are you feeling thirsty? So I see... I know! Isonami nee-san gave me some delicious teacakes. I'll go pour some Hojicha.
486.Wedding: Commander, Uranami, reporting in. Is this about restructuring the 19th DesDiv? Eh? It's not...? This is... for me...? No way... umm... may I open it and look...? Is that okay?
486.Ranking: The intelligence? Please wait a moment. I'll go get it.
486.Supply: Aye! I can join the next operation immediately!
486.Docking(1): Excuse me... I'll go enter into maintenance.
486.Docking(2): Commander, please excuse me. I'll be going in for some repairs.
486.Construction: Commander! A brand new ship is being commissioned!
486.Return: Operation completed. The fleet has returned!
486.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted! Artillery, torpedoes, reeeaaaady! Let's go!
486.Yasen(1): Fleet, please enter into formation. Starting the assault!
486.Yasen(2): Isonami nee-san... I will also do my best!
486.MVP: Eh? My battle results were... Such a thing is... ...No. I feel honored to receive such praise!
486.Damaged(2): Stop it... I said stop it...!
486.Damaged(3): Gaa~aa~ah...!! I was hit? Where? From above? J-Jettison anything flammable!
486.Sunk: It looks... like this is as far as I go. Isonami nee-san, Ayanami, Shikinami... ...everyone, where are you?
486.NewYears 6547: Best wishes for the coming year! It's my sincerest hope that the 19th Destroyer Division will be able to rely on you again this year!
486.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun? Who is the one playing demon for us? Eh? It's not the flagship of DesRon 3? Eh? It's the flagship of DesRon 2? That is... umm...
486.Saury 6547: A fleet for saury fishing support? R-Roger that! The 19th Destroyer Division will prepare to sortie!
486.Fall 6547: *sigh* ...I don't really like this season, but I'll pull through. Oh, I'll be fine. Sorry if I made you worry...
486.Xmas 6547: Oh...! Delicious! This thing you call cake is so sweet and tasty! Commander...!

368.Intro: The youngest of the Special Type I Fubuki-class destroyers, Uranami here. Commander, I'm looking forward to working with you again today.
368.Equip(2): This is also nice equipment. It's fantastic.
368.H0000: It's midnight. Commander, I'm honored to have been appointed as your secretary for the day.
368.H0100: It's 0100. Notification brought to you by Uranami.
368.H0200: It's 0200. Notification brou- Oh, Commander... you're asleep...
368.H0300: It's 0300... What should I do...? Is it better to wake him up...? ...But...
368.H0400: It's 0400. Commander, you look tired. I'll make some hot Hojicha.
368.H0500: It's 0500. It'll be morning really soon. Commander, good morning!
368.H0600: It's 0600. I'll go do the morning call, if you'll permit me to do so.
368.H0700: It's 0700. I've finished making breakfast. I made a large serving of barley rice, so please enjoy it!
368.H0800: It's 0800. Once I finish tidying up, I believe we can commence fleet operations, if that is what you would like to do!
368.H0900: It's 0900. Notification brought to y- Ah... Isonami nee-san, good morning!
368.H1000: It's 1000. Isonami nee-san, today the 19th Destroyer Division will be performing fleet maneuvers! Ah, that's right— Uranami, roger that!
368.H1100: It's 1100. Yes! I have a very strong relationship with Isonami nee-san. We're very close. One time we got so close that we collided... ...Excuse me.
368.H1200: It's 1200. Commander, for lunch, I've made some rice balls! Would you like to have some with me? Then I'll prepare some Hojicha.
368.H1300: It's 1300. Commander, I shall assist you this afternoon as well!
368.H1400: It's 1400. Ah! Commander, Ayanami and the others are over there! Ayanami! Shikinami! Ah, they noticed!
368.H1500: It's 1500. Ayanami and Shikinami really get along with each other... so much so that I'm a little jealous. Ah, but don't get the... wrong idea...
368.H1600: It's 1600. Ah, that's true. My bridge and main battery are a little different from Ayanami's and the others'. See? Here, and right... here!
368.H1700: It's 1700. The sunset overlooking the sea is so beautiful. We do see it every day, but I still never get tired of it...
368.H1800: It's 1800. Commander, I'll get started with the preparations for dinner tonight.
368.H1900: It's 1900. Commander, dinner is now ready to serve! Tonight we're having boiled fish and barley rice! There's enough for seconds, too.
368.H2000: It's 2000. U-Um, there's an incoming message from DesRon 3's command center. ...Ah?
368.H2100: It's 2100. Commander, it seems DesRon 3's flagship is now sortieing... Um... the 19th Destroyer Division can also... that is...
368.H2200: It's 2200. The commander going off to talk to them helped me immensely! Alright! I'll have the remaining paperwork finished off by the end of the night!
368.H2300: It's 2300. Commander, thank you very much for your hard work today! Let's do our best tomorrow, too!

13.Intro: Nice to meet you. I'm Ayanami, a special class destroyer.
13.Library: Special class destroyer, Ayanami. I'm the first ship of the improved Fubuki class. In the Third Battle of the Solomon Sea, I showed an outstanding performance as a destroyer. I'll do my best!
13.Poke(3): If you keep talking so much, you won't be able to do your job properly...
13.Wedding: Am I Ayanami doing my best? Do I help you well? ...R-really! I'm so glad to hear it!
13.Equip(1): Haa~ I'm healed, thanks for that~
13.Equip(2): Ayanami, It feels like I'm reborn!
13.Supply: Haa~ I'm healed, thanks for that~
13.Docking(1): Please let me rest for a bit...
13.Construction: It seems like a new friend is coming!
13.Return: The fleet is back from completing the operation.
13.Battle: Beginning surface action to port side!
13.Yasen(1): I won't give up these waters!
13.MVP: Ayanami being the best makes me happy! It's thanks to the commander.
13.Sunk: I wonder if Fubuki is safe... really, thank goodness.
13.NewYears 6547: Commander! Happy... New Year~! I hope you'll take good care of us again this year!
13.Valentines 6547: Here. It's Valentine's chocolate. I really hope you like it... Please take it!
13.Anniversary 6547: At last, I~did~it! Commander, congrats on the third anniversary. Ehehe. Ayanami feels delightful.
13.Rainy 6547: The rainy season and the sound of the rain. If you think about it, it's actually quite comforting. Don't you think so, Commander?
13.Summer 6547: Summer sure is hot. Commander, shall I cut the watermelon that Shikinami brought?
13.OldFall 6547: I always really love this season. Fall was the season I was launched in. Ufufu♪
13.Saury 6547: Special Type destroyer, Ayanami, finished with saury fishing support sortie preparations! Comm~ander, please give the order any time!
13.Xmas 6547: Merry Christmas, Commander! Here! It's a present from Shikinami and I! Have some cake, too!

207.Idle: Commander, thanks for always working so hard. Ayanami will support you all the way.
207.Married: Commander, Ayanami is also working hard by myself. But, if I'm with you... I'll work even harder!

195.Equip(2): Haa~ I'm healed, thanks for that~
195.H0000: 000 hours. Sorry to disturb you so late at night.
195.H0100: 0100 hours. Please turn it down if it's disturbing you.
195.H0200: And it's 0200 hoooours! We should probably whisper a little more seeing as it's so late.
195.H0400: It's 0400 hours...Ayanami can...manage this...it'll be morning...soon...
195.H0500: It's 0500 hours. Almost time for reveille. The Fleet Girls will be getting up soon.
195.H0600: It's 0600 hours. Morning's here. Good morning, Commander. Let's give it our all today.
195.H0700: It's 0700 hours. Commander, I've left a towel out for you.
195.H0800: It's 0800 hours. Commander, I have your breakfast ready. Would you like Miso soup too?
195.H0900: It's 0900 hours. Should we make a start on the daily missions? Understood sir.
195.H1000: It's 1000 hours. Do you need require anything of Ayanami?
195.H1100: It's 1100 hours. It's about time to start making lunch preparations. Understood. Please leave it me.
195.H1200: Midday. I have your lunch ready. Today is Ayanami's Special Nikujaga Meal Set! How does it taste?
195.H1300: It's 1300 hours. Well Ayanami thinks that worked out well if she does think so. Did you enjoy it, Commander?
195.H1400: It's 1400 hours. Right! It's time for Ayanami to show you what she can really do. She's going to give it her all.
195.H1500: It's 1500 hours. Ayanami is going to do her best to help increase our fleet's ranking.
195.H1600: 1600 hours. Despite everything, Ayanami didn't let the enemy escape. I'll begin work on the mission reports.
195.H1700: It's 1700 hours. Should Ayanami keep at it a little longer?
195.H1800: It's 1800 hours. Almost night time. Ayanami is feeling a little tired.
195.H1900: It's 1900 hours. Ayanami can use the office bath!? Is i-Is it really ok!?
195.H2000: It's 2000 hours. Ayanami really appreciates the offer, but the bath at the dock are empty and those are more than enough.
195.H2100: It's 2100 hours. Naval Base is really peaceful at night isn't it?
195.H2200: It is now 2200 hours. Let's give the night shift our best too.
195.H2300: It's 2300 hours. Commander, you know what? Ayanami now feels more confident about night battles. She'll be fine this time for sure!

14.Intro: I'm Shikinami. I'll be in your care.
14.Library: Special Destroyer number II, Shikinami. Nice to meet you. After participating in Midway and the Battle of Solomon, I serve as a convoy escort. Being a convoy escort is really rough you know... Because it's important...
14.Poke(2): What is it, I'm busy here...
14.Poke(3): Don't call me if you don't have business with me... It's not like I hate it.
14.Married: Commander… It's not good to work so hard. … Hey, take your time!
14.Wedding: Commander, yeah, I've got something I wanna tell you, nah, it's not a complaint or anything, you know? Erm.. Umm… man, I can't say it!
14.Ranking: It's the letter. Be sure to look at?
14.Join: Well, let go~! It's time for sortie!
14.Equip(1): Eh? Is it all right to strengthen someone like me. It's nothing?
14.Equip(2): What is it, to invest toward someone like me... I-it's alright.
14.Supply: Huh? Are you fine with it, strengthening someone like me, that is. Nothing's gonna come out of this, you know?
14.Docking(1): Yayy, well then I'll get myself repaired.
14.Docking(2): Haa, it's was dangerous. I'll go to the dock.
14.Construction: A new ship just joined. I bet she's a cute kid... hurm.
14.Return: Operation completed. The fleet has returned.
14.Sortie: Shikinami! Sailing! Don't worry about me.
14.Yasen(1): Night battle huh... Well, it's fine because I'm good at it.
14.Yasen(2): In the end, it's my turn huh.
14.MVP: Commander! I'm awesome right? Right? Ah, no, I don't care about that at all...
14.Damaged(3): Hurm, I don't that I'll lose because I'm worn out!
14.NewYears 6547: Commander, best wishes for... the new year. There's no New Year's Gift or anything? Ah... I see. Well, shall we go visit the shrine then? Yeah.
14.Setsubun 6547: It's Setsubun! I kinda like it since it's fun. I'll throw at Ayanami- Oh? She's not here. Where are you!?
14.Valentines 6547: I-I just happened... to have made these, but... it wasn't necessary... I guess... ...Eh? It was? Ah... I see...
14.Anniversary 6547: Commander, it's the third anniversary! It's a little hard to believe, you know. But still, I'm also a bit happy. I will continue to be in your care, k?
14.Rainy 6547: The rainy season makes me not want to go out, so I am not too fond of it. Well, whatever. Yeah.
14.Summer 6547: It's summer, Commander. Wanna have some watermelon? Ah, I should bring some to Ayanami too! This is kinda nice.
14.OldFall 6547: *groan* Ugh, another summer is over with. Fall is somehow a little lonely. I'll be fine, though. Really...
14.Saury 6547: Commander, we're still stocking up on saury? Huh... you must have really been craving it. Eh? You weren't? It's just a support mission? So I see. What the...? And after I went through all the trouble to grill saury for you...
14.Xmas 6547: Christmas, huh... We... Ayanami and I... sort of bought you a present. Have you gotten it yet...? Ah... I see...

208.Idle: Hurn, person like Shikinami will be forgotten anyway... Well, that's fine... that's not fine...
208.Supply: Full tank please, counting on ya.

93.Intro: I'm the Ayanami-class destroyer Oboro. I won't lose to anyone. Probably.
93.Library: Seventh ship of the Ayanami-class, Oboro. Laid down in the Sasebo Naval Arsenal. I participated in the Southern operations. Hot places are better, aren't they? Kiss...? No, not that, the cold Kiska Island... I don't want to get close to that... I hope.
93.Wedding: Admiral, am I of use to you? Well then, that's great...
93.Equip(1): You're making Oboro stronger? I see.
93.Equip(2): Oboro could do it, even without the modernisation...
93.Supply: You're making Oboro stronger? I see~
93.Docking(2): Repairs... they're necessary, so that I can fight again.
93.Construction: A new comrade? I don't really care...
93.Return: The fleet is back, I wonder what the result is?
93.Battle: I'm not full of hot air!
93.Yasen(1): I told you, I'm not full of hot air!
93.MVP: Oboro did good? Ah.. ye-yeah! I'll do my best next time too!
93.Damaged(3): No... not yet! I will not sink!
93.Sunk: Well... I am a destroyer... aren't I?
93.NewYears 6547: Admiral, best wishes for the coming year! I hope you'll look after me again this year!
93.Setsubun 6547: It's Setsubun. ...Probably. I'll try my best with the bean throwing! Ei!
93.Valentines 6547: Admiral... um... I tried making this for you... um... i-if you'd like to have it...!
93.Anniversary 6547: Admiral. Seems like it's our third anniversary today. I think...yeah, as for me, Oboro feels great today. Yup!
93.Rainy 6547: It's the rainy season, isn't it? Rain... it's nice to have once in a while. It calms me. I believe...
93.Summer 6547: Admiral. The summer season is finally here! The Seventh Destroyer Division is fully prepared for the summer practice!
93.Summer 1471: Hm? This crab? Yes, she's doing well.
93.Summer 13: It's finally time for some summertime battles! The Seventh Destroyer Division will give it our all.
93.Summer 12: Ah....I finally get to wear my swimsuit, and then this.... It's alright, it'll be fixed if I take a bath.... P-probably.
93.Fall 6547: Fall, huh... It's a pretty tranquil season. Admiral, what kind of books do you read?
93.Xmas 6547: I like Christmas... I think it's nice!
93.YearsEnd 6547: Admiral, time flew by and it's already December! ...Probably. The Seventh Destroyer Division is doing its part with the cleaning!

230.Poke(3): I don't really hate you Admiral, maybe...
230.Idle: Admiral, I'm waiting here... I'm waiting here, hey!... Yes.

230.Yasen(2): Oboro will uphold til the end.
230.Damaged(3): No... not yet! I will not sink! Oboro is still ok!

15.Intro: Special Type destroyer, Akebono here. Hey! Don't look at me, you shitty admiral!
15.Library: 18th Special Type destroyer, eighth of the Ayanami-class, Akebono. I'm not a sumo wrestler. Remember that. I participated in the first carrier naval battle, the Battle of the Coral Sea. However, I'm a bit uneasy around submarines...

15.Poke(3): If you don't like me, why not dismiss me?

15.Ranking: Here, a telegram. Gonna read it?
15.Equip(1): That's it? It's not a big deal or anything.
15.Equip(2): Y-You call it a remodel, but you really just want to see my naked body, don't you? You shitty admiral!
15.Supply: That's it? It's not a big deal or anything.
15.Docking(2): For me to need repairs... Damn it. I can't believe this!

15.LateWinter 6547: Ahhh, come on, you shitty Admiral! Don't laze around just because you think it's cold inside. Get your ass in gear! I swear.
15.Setsubun 6547: Shitty Admiral, it's Setsubun! What, so all I have to do is eat beans and throw them? Piece of cake!
15.Valentines 6547: Huh? Chocolate? You shitty admiral, are you daydreaming? ...I did make some, though. Here.
15.Anniversary 6547: Shitty Admiral. It's our third anniversary! I guess I am happy...for now. Shitty Admiral!
15.Rainy 6547: Huh? A teru teru bozu to ward off the rain? I'll pass on making one. Sazanami, you're pretty good at this, huh. I might give it a try.
15.Summer 6547: It's gotten hot. It's true that this outfit is a bit comfy, but.... D-Don't look this way, you shitty admiral!
15.Summer 1471: Like I said— don't stare, you shitty admiral!
15.Summer 4: I'll seriously get angry if you touch me, so don't even think about it!
15.Summer 12: D-Don't peek! You shitty admiral! G-Geez!
15.Fall 6547: Eh? What am I doing? I'm reading. You know, reading. It's fall, you shitty admiral, so why don't you go read something with text for once?
15.Xmas 6547: Christmas...? That doesn't really have anything to do with me, though. ...Well, I'll still have some cake, though... alright?
15.YearsEnd 6547: Ahhh! So busy! End of year cleaning! Ah, Shitty Admiral, move your ass! You're in the way! Move!

231.unused2: Why are you touching me? That's annoying.

41.Poke(3): A-Admiral? Oh, you fixed the angle of my torpedo tube? Thank you as always.

41.Ranking: It seems like there's a message for you, Admiral.
41.Docking(1): I'll take a break, just for a bit.
41.Docking(2): With this, I'll be able to protect everyone again.
41.Construction: Looks like a new comrade has been born.
41.Return: It seems the fleet's returned to base. Good work!
41.Sortie: Leave the battleship escorting to me!

41.Setsubun 6547: Demons, begone! Fortune, welcome! Ei! Ah, Admiral!? Sorry about that. I'll clean this up.
41.Anniversary 6547: Today is an important day, isn't it? We'll celebrate in something like a diamond formation. Eh? We won't?

241.Idle: Hamakaze...Yahagi too, I wonder if they're okay...ah! Admiral! I'm just fine. I would save you too!

419.Intro: Fourth ship of the Hatsuharu-class, Hatsushimo. Let's go and give it our all!

42.Library: Developed after the Hatsuharu-class destroyer, Shiratsuyu-class, number one, I'm Shiratsuyu! Yeah, number one, the first ship! With lots of upgrades, I'm a true fleet destroyer, you know! Eh? 'Don't be in such a rush that you'll hit a tanker'? Don't worry about it!
42.Poke(3): A~dmiral, do you want to talk to me that much? Alri~ght, I'll stay with you 'till the end!

42.Wedding: *laugh* Admiral, what a nice feeling. My number one favourite thing? It's a se~cret!
42.Return: The operation's over, the fleet's come back, yeah?
42.Sortie: First ship of the Shiratsuyu class destroyers, Shiratsuyu, going out!
42.Yasen(1): I'll be the first to continue the attack, bring it on!
42.MVP: Of course I'm gonna be picked as number one! You know?
42.Damaged(3): ...It hurts, it's cold, it's embarrassing... Just you wait and see!

42.Setsubun 6547: Fortune, welcome~! Demons, begone~! Fufu♪ Setsubun might just be pretty fun! Murasame, what do you think?

42.Anniversary 6547: Cha-CHA~! Yay! It's the third anniversary, The.Third.Anniversary! Admiral, Admiral~ we did it!
42.Rainy 6547: Time to make the most effective teru teru bozu! Hm... Hmm? Hnnggh... this is really hard.
42.Summer 6547: When the rainy season's done, it's summer. I want to be the first one swimming when the beach opens. Yeah!

42.Summer 4: Ah, this? Nah, it's needed for some special summer training on the beach... Nagato-san said so. It's a little early for this, though...
42.Summer 13: Eh!? I got sunburnt? Seriously? Oh no, I forgot to apply the cream.... Crap!
42.Summer 12: Dah~ ...And that was my favorite swimsuit... unforgivable... straight to the baths I go!

42.Cold 6547: Uuu... is it just me or is it getting kind of cold? Wearing short sleeves is going to tough... *achoo*
42.Xmas 6547: Merry Christmas~! This is actually kinda fun! Christmas— my number one favorite time of the year!
42.Xmas 1471: Okay, Admiral, give me the number one best present! The very best one! The best!
42.YearsEnd 6547: Nooo! This year is already coming to a close! There's still so much to do! What should I do!?

242.Idle: Admiral ! work a little harder ! aim to be number one !

43.Intro: I'm Shigure, of the Shiratsuyu-class destroyers. Nice to meet you.
43.Library: I'm the second ship of the Shiratsuyu-class destroyers, Shigure. I participated in the Battle of Leyte Gulf under the Nishimura Fleet, in the fateful rush through Surigao Strait. Fusou and Yamashiro were amazing... Even if everyone forgets, I'll always remember them...
43.Poke(3): You're interested in me? ...Sure. You can ask me whatever you want.

43.Docking(1): Thank you. I'll be going in, then.

43.Setsubun 6547: Bean throwing, huh...? I'll pass. It hurts when you get hit.
43.Valentines 6547:
Admiral. I'd kind of... like you to have this...
Am I... in the way?

43.Rainy 6547: Admiral... there's no such thing as an endless rain... so... please don't worry... I will always be there for you. You don't mind if I... stay by your side, right?
43.Summer 6547: Summer's closing in this year, huh? A swimsuit? Oh, I have last year's, so I'm fine.
43.NotFall 6547: Fall is... a bit lonely, huh? Ah... nah, I'm fine.
43.Fall 6547: Admiral, summer has come to an end... I'm fine. Fall is also... a nice season.

43.Cold 6547: Admiral, hasn't it gotten a bit cold? I'll be just fine. Admiral, I don't want you to catch a cold, so how about wearing a scarf? Ah, sorry. Was that unnecessary?
43.Xmas 6547: Admiral... Merry Christmas. Today I've got a present for you. Here.
43.Xmas 1471: Admiral, it's Christmas season, isn't it? Merry Christmas. Ah... was I a little too early?

44.Cold 6547: Yes, yes! Admiral, aren't you a little cold? Should I knit a nice little scarf for you to wear? Ufufufu♪
44.Xmas 6547: Yes, yes~ Merry Christmas to you, Admiral. The cake and turkey are right there— they're perfect!
44.Xmas 1471: Admiral, you want to take a little peek at what's inside your Christmas present? Ufufu♪ Not yet. It's-a-se-cret♥
44.YearsEnd 6547: Yes, yes~ It's the end of year cleanup. You, too. Here! This broom and dustpan are for you. Get to cleaning!

45.Summer 6547: It's gotten hotter poi by poi. Summer is coming this year, poi!

405.Intro: Fifth Shiratsuyu-class destroyer, Harusame, yes. Leave the transport missions to me... desu.
405.Library: Fifth Shiratsuyu-class destroyer, Harusame. Delicious... wait! that's a different kind of Harusame! With Murasame and big sis Yuudachi we cruised the sea as Destroyer Division 2! I'm a bit good at transport and guarding mission, yes!

323.H0900: 0900. I wonder if Murasame-nee-san is doing well... Hmm...

cake-W-Woaaahhhh... wooaahhhh... uwaaahhhh...!

I participated in the Battle of Guadalcanal, as part of the Second Torpedo Squadron. I will be in your care, Admiral.

458.Setsubun 6547: So it's Setsubun...? Hwah! Kawakaze, throwing beans at Sendai-san like that is...! Ah...! Awawah! Sendai-san, I'm sorry! Ah... um...! I'm so sorry...!
458.Valentines 6547: I wonder if the shape is really okay... or maybe it was a little too exaggerated...? Ah... Admiral! If you don't mind, come here! Please have some of this...!
458.Rainy 6547: It rains pretty often at this time of year, doesn't it? But it's quiet... it's nice. I... like the rainy days, too.
458.EarlySummer 6547: It's getting hotter. Admiral, it's going to be summer soon. What should I do for this year's swimsuit? Should I buy a new one?
458.Summer 6547: Admiral, it's summer. The sunlight is really strong, isn't it? Oh, I'll be fine. I'll put on sunscreen just in case. Ehehe♪
458.Fall 6547: Potatoes taste delicious in fall, don't they? Admiral, shall I make steamed sweet potatoes? I'll prepare some tea as well. One moment, please.
458.Xmas 6547: Admiral, there's a festival today. The fir tree's decorations are so pretty. I'm... so happy...
458.YearsEnd 6547: Admiral, it went by so fast! It's already December. I'm going to have to rush the naval base's cleanup. Ah... it'll be fine! Please leave it to me.

350.H0000: Admiral, Umikaze will be by your side to alert you of the time today. Ah, I'll brew some more tea.
350.H0100: Admiral, it is 0100. Fleet in the night is... quiet as well.
350.H0200: Admiral, it is 0200. Do you feel a little sleepy? Then I will make a strong tea.
350.H0300: Admiral, it is 0300. Should I make black tea sometimes? Ah, no. I guess green tea is the best. Here it is.
350.H0400: Admiral, it is 0400. It's almost morning... Admiral, do you want to take a short nap? It's alright because Umikaze will be awake.
350.H0500: Admiral, it is 0500. It is... morning. Mmmpph, it is a nice morning. Let's strive today as well.
350.H0600: Admiral, it is 0600. I'll make the wake-up call to the fleet. All fleet, wake up! Good morning!
350.H0700: Admiral, it is 0700. I've prepared your breakfast as well. Today's fish is split mackerel. I'll get the tea now.
350.H0800: Admiral, it is 0800. After I'm done with the laundry, I'll get to checking the fleet composition and expedition. I'm sorry, please wait.
350.H0900: Admiral, it is 0900. I have finished checking today's fleet composition and expeditions. What will you do about the morning's sortie?
350.H1000: Admiral, it is 1000. Will you send the fleet to the South? Oh, should we prioritize the supply transport mission?
350.H1100: Admiral, it is 1100. My sisters? Yes, they are my pride. I wonder if Kawakaze is doing well? Ehehe.
350.H1200: Admiral, it is 1200. Leave the lunch to Umikaze as well. How about curry? Ah, curry udon sounds good too.
350.H1300: Admiral, it is 1300. Ah, didn't some curry get flung out? Are you okay? Curry stains are hard to get off, right?..... Ah , it's okay. Good.
350.H1400: Admiral, it is 1400. Ah, Jintsuu-san, you must be busy. Ah, right. 24th Destroyer Division is doing well. It's okay.
350.H1500: Admiral, it is 1500. Being part of the Second Torpedo Squadron is a great pride, but it makes me nervous. Yes...
350.H1600: Admiral, it is 160... Suzukaze! It must be tiring. You are full of energy. Ehehe, keep it up!
350.H1700: Admiral, it is 1700. Ah... What is it Michishio? Eh? Asashio ? I haven't seen her... are you searching for her?
350.H1800: Admiral, it is 1800. Umikaze will start preparing the dinner. I wonder what would be good tonight?
350.H1900: Admiral, it is 1900. Your evening meal is ready. Tonight's menu is chicken rice. How is it? Is it good?
350.H2000: Admiral, it's 2000. Hm, Kawakaze? You're sortieing with Sendai for a night battle? Ah... be careful! Do your best!
350.H2100: Admiral, it's 2100. Ah... I'm a bit worried about Kawakaze. If anything really happened...
350.H2200: Admiral, it's 2200. Kawakaze made it back to the port safely, thank goodness. Thank you for your hard work too, Sendai-san!
350.H2300: Admiral, it is 2300. It has been a hard day of work today. Let's keep our diligence tomorrow too.

457.Intro:
I'm... Shiratsuyu-class destroyer... the eighth ship... Yamakaze...
...It's not a big deal...
457.Library:
Shiratsuyu-class destroyer, eighth ship... revised Shiratsuyu-class, Yamakaze.

I was born in Uraga... just like Shigure-nee and Suzukaze were... Along with Kawakaze and the others, we formed the 24th Destroyer Division.

In order to protect Kaga, we started a big fight as a diversionary move... and I tried really hard. ...After that... I had to go from Oominato to Hashirajima... so I tried to go... and after that... I don't know. I can't remember.
457.Poke(3):
Don't tease me. ...Didn't I say to leave me alone?
...Stop doing... things like that...
457.Idle:
Leave me alone! Leave... ...well... um... um... I...
Ah...! It was... It's nothing... Nothing...
457.Married:
What's wrong? Are you tired? ...I see. ...Would you like some tea? ...I'll make some.
...Well, I'd like some, too. Not really. Don't worry about it. ...Wait a little!
457.Wedding: If you don't need anything, leave me alone. I just want to be... ...Ah... n-no! Don't grab my arm! ...What's this? I don't really... ...Pretty. ...It's warm. ...It's... okay? ...I'm not really... happy or anything...
457.Ranking: Want to look? ...I guess it's fine.
457.Supply:
I'm fine, really...
...It's a waste on me...
457.Docking(1): For now... I'll get repaired... okay?
457.Docking(2): I won't sink, but... it kind of... hurts...
457.Sortie: DesDiv24... flagship... ...Yamaka... *sigh* It's fine. Kawakaze, you can do it if you want.
457.Battle: Enemy planes spotted... They're going to attack... Get ready...
457.Attack: I'll fire! I really will, you know!
457.Yasen(1): You can't see submarines at night. It's scary. ...But... there's no avoiding it, huh... ...I'm advancing!
457.MVP: I was...? ...You really shouldn't...! That kind of thing is... That kind of thing...! ...I... You don't need to...
457.Damaged(1): This is why... I didn't want to...
457.Damaged(3): No way! I... don't want to sink! I hate this!
457.Sunk:
Again... I'm sinking... No! Not into this dark sea... no...!
Kawakaze... Umikaze... help me...!
...Please... no...
457.NewYears 6547: Happy New Year... ...Hold my hand again this year. ...No...! ...It was nothing...
457.Setsubun 6547: Kawakaze... you're noisy. ...Ow... Stop throwing... ... ...Ow... That hurts...! ...I said it hurts!
457.LateWinter 6547: ...Cold... it's kind of cold...! ...What are those white things? ...Snow? ...Admiral... I'm... a little... cold...

369.Intro:
I'm... Shiratsuyu-class destroyer... the eighth ship... Yamakaze...
...Don't let go of my hand. ...I'll come back home.
369.Poke(3):
Leave me alone! ...I'm telling you not to tease me, and yet...
...I guess it's okay...
369.Join: Attached to the Fifth Cruiser Division, DesDiv 24, setting sail. Let's go.
369.Equip(1): I understand. I'll use this... with care.
369.H0000: Midnight... ...I'm doing it today? ...It's okay, but... you're kind of weird, too...
369.H0700: 0700. You'll have breakfast, won't you...? Here. It's barley rice and miso soup... also... pickled... radish...
369.H1000: 1000. ...Kawakaze... what...? You're... a little loud... your voice is too loud...
369.H1100: 1100. ...What are you doing for lunch? ...Oh? Then... I'll get something. ...It's okay.
369.H1200: 1200. ...Noon. Here. Rice balls. ...Is two enough? Three? ...Here's tea.
369.H1300: 1300. ...Still hungry...? ...Oh. ...Well, should we... start the afternoon work?
369.H1400: 140... ...Ah...! Nachi-san, Haguro-san... ...Yes, I... please... don't worry about me...
369.H1500: 15... ...Ah... Umikaze-nee? What... is this...? ...Dropping it off for me? Thank... you... I'll eat it.
369.H1600: 1600. ...Yeah, Umikaze-nee is... gentle... I kind of... like her. ...Kawakaze, too... she's so loud, but... I don't mind... her...
369.H1700: 1700. ...It's almost nighttime. I hate the night...
369.H1800: 1800. ...What are you doing for dinner? ...? ...I'll... make it...? ...Eh?
369.H1900: 1900. Mamiya's... I've always wanted to come here, even if only once... Um... th... tha... thank you...
369.H2000: 2000. ...Mamiya... the omurice... was delicious... If I can... I'd like... to come again.
369.H2100: 2100. ...Night... I don't like it... around now...
369.H2200:
2200. ...Admiral... what...? I'm... not really... scared or anything...
...but... it's so warm... your hand...
369.H2300: 2300. Today wore me out... Again... tomorrow... okay? Tomorrow...

459.Intro: The ninth Shiratsuyu-class Destroyer, Kawakaze of the revised Shiratsuyu-class. Nice to meet you! Ah, about the reading of my name, do not get it wrong!
459.Library: Ninth ship of the Shiratsuyu-class, the revised Shiratsuyu-class destroyer, Kawakaze. Well now, I was built under the Maru 2 program, the same as Umikaze and our big sisters. Maaan, that was some hard, hard work! We sailed the Solomon's seas many times over. My last moments were during night battle. The enemy's radar... really, what foul play!
459.Poke(1): Hm, Admiral. Did you call me?
459.Poke(2): Revised Shiratsuyu-class. Top balance is good, don't you think?
459.Poke(3): The hell? Don't touch my equipment... Hm~? Admiral what's wrong? You're interested over me? Hm?
459.Idle: Ahhhh~ So bored. Hey Admiral, let's do something.　Or else my body will become quite weak.　Admiral, you listening!?
459.Married: Whats up Admiral, tired? That's embarrassing. I guess I have no choice, you can lean on me. Nn? Here, hows that?
459.Wedding: Hmm? Whats up, Admiral? Whats with the box? Are you giving it to me? Eh, what kind of wind blew around? I'll still take it though!
459.Ranking: Hm? ...Admiral, what's up? You looking at the report? Alright, alright.
459.Join: Revised Shiratsuyu Destroyer, Kawakaze, launching. Follow me!
459.Equip(1): Oh? Thank you. Yep~ that's nice.
459.Equip(2): Yeah! Nice, nice! New stuff is definitely a step forward for me!
459.Docking(1): Hmm... I'll just take a short bath...
459.Docking(2): Oh well. Gonna take a long bath. You wanna join me, Admiral? Ha, kidding.
459.Construction: So, a new one has arrived.
459.Return: Ahh~ Operation is over. Good work, good work!
459.Sortie: Yeah, let's go and get hype! 24th Destroyer Division, sortie!
459.Battle: Hm. I saw enemy fleet, let's do this. Guns ready!
459.Attack: Hm, nice nice. Destroyers really belong to the battlefield. Let's go!
459.Yasen(1): Heheheh, Night battle ho! Let's plunge in, sissies! Follow me!
459.Yasen(2): Alright, let's take 'em all at once!
459.MVP: Hm? I'm number one? Heh, Nothing personal, Shiratsuyu sis. Cause I'm numero uno! Hehehe.
459.Damaged(1): Puah... I still can go on! I ain't dying just yet!
459.Damaged(2): Tch... What? Where did they hit me!?
459.Damaged(3): Dammit... They got me... but I ain't sinking yet... owowowowow....
459.Sunk: The hell... I'm in deep sea again... Big sis... everyone... let's meet... again..
459.NewYears 6547: Admiral! Happy New Year! Me and my sisters are countin' on ya again this year! Now, New Year's Gift please! Gimme, gimme!
459.Setsubun 6547: It's Setsubun! Gonna throw beans! Target spotted to starboard! Fire! It's a hit! ...Eh? Er... Sendai...san...? I uh... uhm... eh!
459.Valentines 6547: Admiral, here, some chocolate for you! ...Hm? It's fine. I bought it from the mess hall. I'm looking forward to a great return gift!
459.Anniversary 6547: Hm? It's the third anniversary, isn't it? Way to go! That's quite a shocker! Yay~!
459.Rainy 6547: Hmm... It's been raining for days. It's the rainy season, after all. Oh well, time to relax.
459.EarlySummer 6547: Hnnnaaa... It's so damn hot. I can't stand it. I should put on something cooler like a swimsuit. Ahh, can I get away with it? Can I wear a swimsuit around the base?
459.Summer 6547: It's summertime!? Ku~ it's so damn hot!! What a shame! It'd a waste not to wear a swimsuit now, am I right? Admiral, you can strip down, too.
459.Fall 6547: Alright! We made it through summer. Fall is pretty nice. Kinda makes me feel carefree, and even the food tastes great.
459.Xmas 6547: Admiral! It's Christmas, you know! Christmas! Where's the cake? Cake! Yay~!
459.YearsEnd 6547: It's the year end already! Time flies... The fleet's having a cleanup, huh... Oh well, I'm up for it. You too, Admiral. Here, take this broom!

351.H0000: Alright, Admiral, today's timekeeping role will be me, Kawakaze! Oh you can count on me! Gehehe!
351.H0100: It's 0100. Admiral, hehe, this is how it's done, right?
351.H0200: It's 0200, Admiral. Gehehe, easy peasy! Even timekeeping won't hold me back!
351.H0300: 03..0...0...  !! I'm not sleeping! Not sleepy at all! Because this is easy!
351.H0400: 0...4...zer-... !! Ah, big sis made me some morning tea! It's helpful! Now this will be a walk in a park!
351.H0500: 0...-ive...0...0...Admiral...while i'm doing this it's morning all sudden...Ahh, it's getting brighter...so this is morning huh, uhehe...sleepy...
351.H0600: Admiral,its 0600! It wakie time for everyone! Wake up-!! Sissies-!! It's Morning-!!
351.H0700: It's 0700! Admiral, let's eat breakfast! Breakfast! Uh, I can't do this, I'm not my sister. Now, let's go!
351.H0800: (munch) Admiral its 0800. The breakfast at Mamiya's is delicious!
351.H0900: It's 0900! Admiral, let's begin managing fleets. Where should I start... from expedition ? hmm...
351.H1000: 100-eh, Solomon seas? Yeah, I've been there, quite a lot actually. Drum cans on my back transporting stuff and also patrol duty. Quite a chore.
351.H1100: It's 1100 now, Admiral. We talked too much that it's already noon. Say, you're hungry? Eh, we're having field rations for lunch?
351.H1200: It's 1200, Admiral! Lunchtime is Onigiri time. Whoop-pe-doodie-do. I'm good at making onigiri. Eat'em!
351.H1300: Admiral, It's 1300 now. How do you like my onigiri? Taste good, eh? Nothing beats like making em above water. That's what I think.
351.H1400: It's 1400, Admiral. Alrighty, It's time to get serious. Tokyo Express, eh. Now where's my drum?
351.H1500: Admiral! It's 1500! Where's the snack? Huh!? Nothing!? Why nothing!? My stomach's rumbling here!
351.H1600: Admiral, it's 1600 already. It's already dusk... Say, does that mean there's night battle tonight? Sendai's gonna be there, right?
351.H1700: It's 1700 now, Admiral. So how's dinner...? Huh, what? You're gonna cook? Yeah, Not a bad idea♪
351.H1800: Admiral! It's 1800! Whoa! Dinner's served! Down the hatch~! *nom* *nom* 'tis good, Admiral. Awesome!
351.H1900: Ahh— I've ate well... No wait, it's 1900, Admiral. So— I'm off with Sendai to a night battle~
351.H2000: 2000. Gonna watch out for the enemy's radar detection. Sendai, let's proceed with caution!
351.H2100: 2100. Eh? Shigure, what's the matter? Ah? Numerous torpedoes!? Evaaadeee!
351.H2200: 2200. Admiral—! We've made it back safely from the night battle! Sendai and everyone else is alright. Phew!
351.H2300: Admiral, it's 2300, today was a tiring day huh, good work! Tomorrow we'll work at it too! Yeah!

469.Intro: The 9th of Shiratsuyu-class destroyers, the revised ones, Kawakaze. Now remodeled! I have returned from Solomon Seas, so leave it to me!
469.Poke(3): The hell? Don't touch my equipment... Hm? That's not my equipment...? ARE YOU AN IDIOT!?
469.Battle: Hm? Enemy fleet spotted! Let's do it! Ready the guns!
469.Yasen(1): Kihihi! Yosh, begin the night battle! Ready the torpedoes!
469.Damaged(1): Tch! But I can still go on. I ain't gonna die yet!

47.Intro: 'ello! I'm Suzukaze. If I join the fleet it will be equivalent to 100 ships!
47.Library: I'm Suzukaze. As a Special-class destroyer, I participated in lots of capture mission. After that, I escorted battleships and carriers! You can rely on me! I'll fight until the last!
47.Wedding: Emmm. I… the A...admira… li... Ugh. ...Nothing....You're wrong! I said nothing!
47.Join: I understand! I'll show the serious Suzukaze!
47.Equip(1): Ok, I can go on with this!
47.Equip(2): Thank you, it'll be perfect with this.
47.Supply: Yes! I can go on with this!
47.Docking(2): Ugh... even though I can still...still go on...
47.Return: Operation completed, fu... want to take a break?
47.Sortie: Yeah, I've been waiting for this!
47.Yasen(1): Ei! Take this with you, thief!
47.MVP: I did it! Admiral, did you see my performance?
47.Anniversary 6547: Wait! Isn't today a very important day? Admiral, congrats! Yup!
47.Rainy 6547: Hmm, it's the rainy season. Rain, huh. I don't hate it, but.... Well, whatever! Right, Samidare? Right!?
47.Summer 6547: It's here! It's here! This is the best time of year! I absolutely love summer. It's wonderful!
47.Xmas 6547: Huh...? What's that? Merry Christmas? Kuh...! What's this winter festival...!? I'm gettin' in on it!

247.Idle: Heey, Admiraal! What's wrongg!? You're ignoring me too muuch!?Heey, did you hear thaat? Aadmirraal!?
247.Married: What's wrong, Admiral? ...Are you not feeling very well? Rest assured, it'll work out somehow. Since Suzukaze, too, will give it her all! So get better! 'Kay?

95.Intro: Destroyer Asashio here. I'm always prepared in case of a battle.
95.Library: Asashio-class destroyer nameship, Asashio. We were designed as a balanced mass production type of destroyer for supporting the front lines. My remodeled form served as the basis for the Kagerou-class, you know.
95.Poke(2): Sir! I'm always available for a sortie.
95.Poke(3): Commander, is that a new type of code?
95.Married: U-um... this may be presumptuous coming from me, however... I've always had the utmost respect for you!
95.Wedding: Admiral, what is it? To call me out to such a place... just the two of us... Ah, this is... a strategy meeting, isn't it!
95.Equip(2): For destroyer gear, this is well-made.
95.Docking(1): Even minor damage can prove fatal in the wrong situation.
95.Docking(2): It'll be fine. I'll be ready in time for the next battle.
95.Construction: A new ship has been built.
95.Battle: Enemy ship spotted on port side!
95.Yasen(1): Closing in on the enemy. One shot, one kill!
95.MVP: I'm happy we completed the operation. This is the power of an Asashio-class Destroyer.
95.Sunk: To attack me when I'm on a rescue operation... coward...!
95.NewYears 6547: Commander! Best wishes for the new year! We'll be counting on you again this year! I bring this greeting on behalf of the entire Asashio-class!
95.Setsubun 6547: Commander, it's Setsubun! Please leave it to me! I, Asashio, will do the bean throwing at full power! ...Ei! Ei! There!
95.Valentines 6547: Commander! Here's a chocolate. Please accept it! ...It's fine! I sampled it and checked for poison! Rest assured that it's safe!
95.Rainy 6547: Commander! The rainy days continue! Would you like the Eighth Destroyer Division to start on a teru teru bozu production mission!?
95.Summer 6547: Commander, it's summer! Would you like a chilled ramune from the mess hall? Just give me the order!!
95.Fall 6547: Commander... summer has passed... fall is coming. Don't worry! Us Asashio-class destroyers will go all-out in fall as well! You don't have to worry one bit!
95.Xmas 6547: Christmas...? Commander, this is Christmas, isn't it! I've learned so very much!
95.YearsEnd 6547: Commander, are we doing the end of year cleaning? ...Roger that! Arashio and I will start scrubbing things down! Ready, Arashio? We'll start with the Admiral's desk.

248.Idle: Commander, if you put me on standby, I am prepared to wait here forever!

463.Intro: Destroyer Asashio here. I've received my remodel! I'm prepared to strive even further, so that I can be of more use to the fleet. I'll be in your care!
463.Poke(3): Commander... Sir! The promise... I'm prepared to uphold my important promise to you until the very end!
463.Join: Eighth Destroyer Division flagship Asashio, setting sail!
463.Damaged(1): Ugh! Ow, ow, ow... Arashio...? Are you alright?
463.Damaged(2): It hurts... but, even so... I can still assist in combat! I... won't sink so easily!
463.Damaged(3): Not yet... I can't sink yet... not until I've upheld my promise. Not until then...

468.Intro: Destroyer Asashio here. Since my remodel, my survivability and versatility have greatly improved. I'm prepared to be of more use than ever before. I'll be in your care!
468.Damaged(1): Oh no, we're under fire!? I won't allow this! Anti-aircraft and anti-submarine personnel, be on the lookout!

96.Intro: Destroyer Ooshio reporting in! A small body with large torpedoes! Leave it to me!
96.Library: Second of the Asashio-class destroyers, Ooshio! After being sent to the front lines, I mobilized to Guadalcanal for evacuation missions three times. I'll support you!
96.Poke(2): Hey, hey, we're only just getting started!
96.Poke(3): Yeah, yeah, that feeling! Let's get fired up!
96.Married: Commander, how've you been? Have you become rich?
96.Wedding: Do you know the meaning of "Ooshio"? It's when the gravitational pull of the moon draws the waves up. In short, it's when there's a moon overhead.
96.Equip(1): Hauuu~ being reinforced is so heartwarming.
96.Equip(2): Uoooo! I've been versioned up in a lot of ways!
96.Supply: Hauuu~ being reinforced is so heartwarming.
96.Docking(2): Uuahh... I lost. I really lost~...
96.Construction: New friends just keep appearing, don't they?
96.Sortie: Leave the torpedo warfare to me!
96.MVP: Commander! Please tell me if you have any problem. I'll always be there for you!
96.Damaged(2): I'll find a way to survive!
96.Sunk: Oh no... I guess... this is my limit...
96.NewYears 6547: Commander...! Happy New Year! Let's get fired up for another year! Boom~!
96.Setsubun 6547: Commander, it's Setsubun! Naturally, Setsubun has me fired up! Look— Asashio nee-san is firing the beans at full power! I'll join in as well! Ei! Ei!
96.Valentines 6547: Commander! Have some chocolate that'll make you feel fired up! When you're feeling down, eat this! You'll get fired up in a flash!
96.Rainy 6547: You're asking if it's hard to get fired up during the rainy season? No way, not even a little! I'm always fired up!
96.Summer 6547: Commander, the burning summer is here! The Eighth Destroyer Division is also eating shaved ice to get fired up! *brain freeze*
96.Fall 6547: Commander! Fall has arrived! The Eighth Destroyer Division will now gather dry leaves and commence our operation, "bake sweet potatoes"! Naturally, I'm also fired up for fall!
96.Saury 6547: I really love saury! I'm totally fired up to go do this saury fishing support mission!
96.Xmas 6547: Commander! Let's go all out together for Christmas! Merry Christmas! Get fired up!
96.YearsEnd 6547: Commander, it's the end of the year! We'll start the cleanup with a bang! I'll be in charge of sweeping. I'm so fired up for the cleanup!

199.Saury 6547: It's time for saury! I'm so fired up to get out there! With the power I got from my remodel, I'll go fire up the saury I fish for as well! You bet!

249.Idle: Commander! I'll always be there for you! Always, always, alwaaays!!

97.Intro: Michishio here. Why did I get assigned to such a fleet?
97.Library: I'm a destroyer, Michishio. I and my sisters Asashio, Ooshio, and Arashio were somehow assigned to the eighth destroyer squadron. But, we were separated in the end. Finally I broke into Leyte, as a member of Nishimura fleet.
97.Poke(3): What is it? I don't get what you mean.
97.Married: Reeaaally! This squadron is really lukewarm huh? We're not playing friendly, you know! ...I'm also a friend you say...? I-It's not like I'm happy about it...
97.Wedding: I've gotten better at fighting since the beginning, haven't I?... I don't hate it.
97.Equip(1): Aa, that's right, you meant to say that my power alone is not enough!
97.Equip(2): W-what is it, did you mean to patronize me?
97.Supply: Aa, that's right, you meant to say that my power alone is not enough!
97.Docking(1): Like this, it's too early to be docked.
97.Docking(2): Getting the fleet wiped out while I'm being repaired or the likes, don't do that.
97.Construction: A new ship is ready. Take a look?
97.Sortie: It's ridiculous if I don't sortie.
97.Yasen(1): How foolish, what lies ahead is hell.
97.MVP: Don't go planning boring operation, tch!
97.Damaged(3): You did something interesting, huh. I'll return it twice over!
97.NewYears 6547: A new year, huh? Commander, I'm only saying this once, but... I'm counting on you this year. Th-That's all!
97.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun? What's the point in this event? Ow, ow! Ah, why are you guys throwing those so hard!? Wh-What's up with that!? What are you trying to do!? C-Come on...!?
97.Valentines 6547: Commander... um... it's obligatory— obligatory. This is completely obligatory. Here! I guess... I'm done!
97.Rainy 6547: It's raining quite a bit. Well, watching these rainy days go by isn't bad for once. Oh, please don't use my umbrella without permission. I have it marked with a seal.
97.EarlySummer 6547: It's slowly getting hotter... it's almost summer... Eh? A swimsuit? Huh!? Of course I don't need one! What are you saying!?
97.Summer 6547: It's midsummer. Every day is so hot. Eh? I should wear a swimsuit... you said? Huh!? What are you talking about? Are you trying to get me killed!? Idiot!
97.Fall 6547: Fall... huh. This season is a little depressing. Huh? Say what, Commander? It's not like I wanted to be consoled or anything... I'm fine!
97.Saury 6547: Saury? Huh? What the hell are you talking about? Eh...? Me, too? You must be joking! Stop it, stop it! Quit pulling!
97.Xmas 6547: So you brought me some Christmas cake. Sweet foods like that are... Ah, I'll eat it, actually... Mm...
97.YearsEnd 6547: Alright! It feels like we've finally gotten somewhere. Time to switch gears and get to the cleanup! Div 4! Div 8! Gather up, everyone. We'll be doing the end of year cleaning at full power!

250.Idle: If we're going, then go. If we're not, then don't. Please do it properly! Geez...

98.Intro:
My, I haven't introduced myself yet, have I?
I'm Arashio!
98.Library:
I'm a destroyer girl from Kobe. Right, my name is Arashio.

I did lots of hard work along with my sisters.

But... I kind of wish I could stop having bombs dropped on my smokestack.
98.Poke(2): I'm looking forward to the next operation~
98.Poke(3):
Rather than that... There.
Isn't that an enemy plane?
98.Married: As for you, everyone admires you, you know? Even that Michishio-chan... doesn't she really? Ufufufufu...
98.Wedding:
Ufufufu... I'm rather persistent, but...
I wonder if you can endure it...
98.Equip(2): My, my... what a wonderful thing to do.
98.Docking(1): I'll stand down for just a little.
98.Docking(2): My, my, how troubling. I got pretty messed up.
98.Sortie: I'll go on a rampage now~
98.Yasen(1): I said you can't escape, didn't I?
98.MVP:
Your goddess of victory is right here~
Hurry up and catch me~!
98.Sunk: My, my... you sank me... Make sure you remember this...
98.NewYears 6547: It's a new year~ Ufufufu~ ...Happy New Year! During this new year as well... please take good care of me, okay? Ufufufu!
98.Setsubun 6547: My~ it's Setsubun~ Ufufufu. Sisters, why are you so serious about throwing beans~? If it hits... it'll be a little dangerous, you know...?
98.Valentines 6547: Ufufufufu♪ ...Ahahaha~! Look at this~ It's cho-co-late. Want it? Really? ...Then~ ...Here-you-go♪
98.Rainy 6547: The rainy days keep coming. Plip plip... plip plip... ufufu. Rainy days are fun because they're rainy, aren't they?
98.Summer 6547: Ufufufu! Little by little, it's been getting so hot lately~... Summer is coming around again~ Summer~! Ufufufu! How exciting~!
98.Fall 6547: Ehehe. So it's fall, huh...? Fall makes me feel just a liiittle bit sad... but... I'm not worried! ...You're so sure kind... ehehehe!
98.Saury 6547: Saury fishing...? I don't... want a mission that makes me stink like fish... but there's no helping it. I will help-you-out.
98.YearsEnd 6547: Ahahaha♪ E~veryone looks so busy~ It's December, so things are getting tough~ Ah...? I also have to do my part for cleanup~? ...Ufufufu... you're right~

251.Idle:
My~ Could I have been...
forgotten about, I wonder...?
How troubling~

490.Intro:
Arashio here~
I was remodeled, so I'm a little strong, you know~?
Nice to see you~ Ufufu♪
490.Join: 8th Destroyer Division, Arashio, sortieing gorgeously~! Here I go~!
490.Battle: Oh~ Could it be~? Ene~mies? Ufufu... O~ver~there? I found you~
490.Yasen(1): Night, huh...? That's nice~ ...However~ ...didn't I say you can't get away from me~?
490.Damaged(3): Geez... my looks are ruined. But... that's fine. It's just a little cooler... Ufufufufu...

413.Intro: Asashio-class destroyer, Asagumo, reporting in! So you're the commander... huh. Hmm. Well, it's fine. I'll do it!
413.Library: Asashio-class destroyer number 5, Asagumo. Together with my sworn friend Yamagumo, we made it through many battlefields. That's right, the 9th DesDiv. Famous, right? Eh, you haven't heard of us? You know, I don't really like jokes. Remember that!
413.Poke(2): Whaat? I'm pretty busy, you know.
413.Poke(3): What is it, geez. Eh, you're interested in Asagumo? Then it can't be helped, huh.
413.Idle: Wh-What? There's nothing for me to do? Well, it's fine, but kinda annoying. I know, shall I massage your shoulders? Ah, I'm kidding. Just kidding, of course!
413.Married: Commander...Its good that you're working hard, but if you overdo things, it makes me worried, seriously! Yes, make sure you rest appropriately...got it?
413.Wedding: What, Commander? I'm pretty busy here... Heh, what? Another joke. ...Eh, you're serious? Ah, what do I do... Y-Yamagumo is... Ehh, umm...
413.Ranking: That's right, you always need to check your information. Isn't that common sense?
413.Join: DesDiv 9 moving out. You heard that, Yamagumo? Follow me!
413.Equip(2): My, is it alright? Yeah, yeah.
413.Equip(3): I'll take it off your hands!
413.Supply: That's right, supplies are important. Ah, I see, you knew that already, Commander.
413.Docking(1): I'll take a bath. D-Don't peek, ok?
413.Docking(2): I'm getting in the bath. Geez, even though I said to properly service my turbine!
413.Construction: Commander, it seems a new child has been completed. I wonder what they'll be like?
413.Return: Mission complete. The fleet has returned to base. It's good to see everyone's safe.
413.Sortie: Destroyer Asagumo, setting sail. Leave it to me.
413.Battle: Enemy ships spotted! We can do this, begin firing!
413.Attack: We can do it, keep moving forward!
413.Yasen(1): Night battle, huh. Yep, let's do this!
413.MVP: See, isn't it me? I won't lose to the likes of the Kagerou-class. Obviously!
413.Damaged(2): Tch... That hurts, you know! Quit it!
413.Damaged(3): I...I've been beaten...but, I can still navigate..! As if I'll sink!
413.Sunk: ...Fufu, Yamagumo... We're together again. It's not like I'm... like I'm lonely, you know...
413.NewYears 6547: Happy New Year! Commander, best wishes for the year... I'll be following your lead again this year. Don't worry!
413.Valentines 6547: Ah! I didn't get any chocolate for you, you know! What do you mean? These aren't what you think, okay!?
413.Anniversary 6547: So, today is a special day? Commander, good for you. I'm a little bit happy, too.
413.Xmas 6547: Christmas... huh...? I see, this is... not bad at all. So this is the cake... *nom*

327.Intro: Asashio-class destroyer, Asagumo, armed and ready! Yes, Commander? Then let's get to work!
327.Join: DesDiv 9, sortieing! Yamagumo, as always... together!
327.Equip(2): Oh my, yes. That was... quite helpful. Nice equipment... I think.
327.Docking(1): I'm going to take a bath. Seriously, no peeking!
327.Battle: I found enemy ships!, begin firing! DesDiv 9, charge!
327.H0000: Commander! It's gotten pretty late... I'll keep you company for today. It just became midnight, after all!
327.H0100: It's 0100! The night's a bit cold...
327.H0200: It's 0200...? What's with that face...? I'm not particularly sleepy or anything. you know?
327.H0300: It's 0300...? Commander... are you feeling drowsy? You have terrible bags under your eyes... Are you not getting enough sleep? Its fine if you have a nap, I'll be on night watch from here on.
327.H0400: Its 0400, huh... These early morning hours are cold... I don't hate it, though... What do you think, Commander... oh you fell asleep...?
327.H0500: It's 0500! Commander! Get up! We have to go wake everyone up soon! Hey, are you listening?
327.H0600: It's become 0600! Everyone, raise up! Okay? ...Commander? Are you even awake?
327.H0700: It's 0700! Breakfast time... bread is fine, isn't it? Toast? Aren't you demanding...here you go.
327.H0800: 0800... I'll take care of the plates, pass them here. Ah, the jam on the toast was good, wasn't it? Yamagumo gave it to me!
327.H0900: Its 0900. Its about time for the fleet to seriously start running...please use us destroyers well, too! Commander? Are you listening?
327.H1000: Its 1000 huh... Are the expeditions okay? Our tasks are progressing at a good rate...all thats left is...uh, Commander? What are you doing? Hey?
327.H1100: Its 1100. Can I have lunch with Yamagumo? I promised her. Ah, she's not a bad girl, really! I guarantee it!
327.H1200: Its 1200 right? Commander, this is my best friend Yamagumo. She's a little weird, but please look after her! Uhh... Yamagumo, where are you going? Hey!
327.H1300: 1300. Commander, sorry...it seems like she had something on her mind...I'll ask her about it later! Sorry...how strange though...
327.H1400: Its 1400 now. As an apology for not eating lunch with you, I bought this at the canteen. We can eat this together...or rather, I'll give it to you, okay?
327.H1500: Its 1500 huh...Ah! It's Kirishima-san! Welcome back! Yes, Asagumo has been doing well! Yes!
327.H1600: Its 1600 now. Eh, my attitude towards Kirishima-san is different? Of course, that person is amazing! After all, I saw it! Mmm, I saw it!
327.H1700: 1700. It's about time to prepare dinner. Ah don't worry, I'll prepare it! I said I'll do it, don't worry about it!
327.H1800: Its 1800 now. Okay, dinner is served! Eh, you're complaining about the barley rice? What are you talking about, this is the basis of the dish! It's also very nutritious!
327.H1900: 1900. Hm? But the yellowtail teriyaki was delicious? I know right? It goes will with barley and rice, doesn't it?
327.H2000: It's become 2000. The night...the night is not my strong point. Ah, don't worry, I'm fine....now...
327.H2100: Its 2100 now. Oh, Yamagumo? What is it? No no, thats wrong! That's absolutely wrong! Jeez!
327.H2200: 2200. Yamagumo has some kind of misunderstanding...sometimes she goes into la-la land with her thoughts. She's usually pretty normal though...
327.H2300: Its 2300, huh...its completely nighttime now. The naval base is...not very quiet though. Yeah, I'll have to go give a warning.

414.Intro: Good morning~~. Asashio Destroyer number six, Yamagumo. Please treat me well!
414.Library: I'm the sixth Asashio-class destroyer, Yamagumo~ I was born in Osaka and raised in Yokosuka~ Uh-huh, I'll have to watch out for sea mines~ I was active in escort and patrol missions, then deployed to the Marianas and also Leyte Gulf as part of the Nishimura fleet~
414.Poke(2): You can't do that~. That's delicate~. The depth charges, they're sensitive~.
