414.Poke(3): U~m~, sorry. If you're too pushy, I'll seriously get angry, you know?
414.Idle: U~m~ Yamagumo kind of likes having free time~ But Asagumo-nee~ she's an impatient person~ you know~?
414.Married: Commander, you're working so hard~ How admirable~ Yamagumo thinks that you're really quite amazing~ Yes, really!
414.Wedding: Commander, what is it? Are you giving this box to Yamagumo? I wonder what it is? Ooh, pretty~ Thank you~
414.Ranking: Information, I see. That's really important, isn't it?
414.Equip(2): How is it~? Does it suit Yamagumo~? Really~?
414.Docking(1): I guess a bath is nice too~
414.Docking(2): Uh, I'm sorry~ I'll take it easy with a bath~
414.Return: The fleet has returned~. Oh, that's good~, isn't it?
414.Sortie: Oh, Asagumo-nee? Do you want to go together?
414.Attack: Uh-huh~ I want to hit as much as possible~
414.Yasen(1): Night battles~ Yamagumo might just be a li~ttle bit bad at them~
414.MVP: Huh~ Yamagumo was the best~? Oh, I guess that could happen~ That's interesting~
414.Damaged(2): No~ Yamagumo is weak against attacks~!
414.Damaged(3): I guess I need to get a bi~t more serious.
414.Sunk: I'm sinking, huh... Asagumo-nee... don't come... okay?... See you... later...
414.NewYears 6547: Commander~, best wishes~ for the new year~! ...I'll be~ counting on you again this year~!
414.Anniversary 6547: Commander~, today is special, right~? Yamagumo is happy to be able to be with you~. Ufufu...
414.Xmas 6547: It's Christmas, isn't it~? Commander, what would you like as a Christmas present~?

328.H0000: Commander~ Yamagumo is today's secretary huh...sure, I'll do it!
328.H0100: 01...00! Am I doing it right? Is that so?
328.H0200: 02...00! Midnight's over~ For some reason, I feel pretty nervous around this time...
328.H0300: 03...00! Around this time, I start to feel strange...fuu~
328.H0500: 05...00! Commander, morning is near! How reassuring....right?
328.H0600: 06..00! It's daytime! We'll need to wake everyone up! I like the morning.
328.H0700: 07...00! Commander, I will leave your breakfast here. Today's breakfast includes a fresh egg...be sure to put it on top of your rice!
328.H0800: 08...00! Isn't egg mixed with rice tasty? It's also tasty with brown rice...Yamagumo likes it too!
328.H0900: 09...00! Oh right, during today's lunch, I'm going with Asagumo on a date! A date...isn't that nice? I'm looking forward to it!
328.H1000: 10...00! Asagumo is a soft person...that's why I like her!
328.H1100: 11...00! Commander, how do I look? I look fine? Alright, I'm heading out!
328.H1200: 12...00! Is that...Fusou and Yamashiro? Uuh, for some reason, my stomach is starting to hurt...uuh, guess I'll go home...
328.H1300: 13...00! Commander, I am fine now! I made a U-turn and came back~ I'll return to work now~
328.H1400: 14...00! All members of the expedition team are accounted for! Mission progress is okay! Commander, the fleet is doing well~
328.H1500: 15...00! Ah, these? They are vegetables I grew from my own garden! I was taught how to do that in Rabaul~
328.H1600: 16...00! If you boil these vegetables, add a lot of sugar and make it into a jam, its surprisingly tasty! See?
328.H1700: 1700! Before you know it, its already evening....the day sure goes quickly~
328.H1800: 18...00! Yamagumo will be making dinner tonight! I'll be making a curry using my home grown vegetables! It's delicious!
328.H1900: 1900! Yamagumo's home grown vegetable curry was good right? Hm? Who did I grow these vegetables with? I did it with Asagumo!
328.H2000: 20..00! After this, I'm going on a date with Asagumo again, I can't wait! My tie isn't crooked right? I feel nervous~
328.H2100: 21...00! I'm heading off! Asagumo...! Huh...who is....that? They look....close....Huh...? Tears are...falling out of my....huh?
328.H2200: 22...00....Commander...Asagumo is with an unknown guy...um...eh? That's not right? Is that what it is? Oh, is that all~
328.H2300: 2300! What a relief...Asagumo is working huh~ Commander, Yamagumo is relieved...I felt so tense...

48.Intro: Arare... I won't say 'ncha-'... Look after me...
48.Library: Arare, last destroyer constructed under the Maru-2 programme... Asashio-class series'... final ship but... there's more... After that.... Kagero-class...
48.Poke(1): Commander..... is there something, to do?
48.Poke(3): Please don't touch my torpedoes that much...
48.Wedding: Ah… Commander, what is it? I want to get back to work.. Yeah…
48.Attack: It's not just guns, but torpedoes...?
48.MVP: Eh...? What's this standing ovation...? Did Arare do something...?
48.Sunk: Ah... water is getting in... it's cold...
48.NewYears 6547: Commander... Happy New Year. ...I hope I can... do my best again... this year.
48.Setsubun 6547: "Settsubuun"? What's that? ...Ah, Setsubun, huh...! ...It's okay. ...Jintsuu-san is the demon again this year... Ah, throwing beans is dangerous... so I won't throw them.
48.Valentines 6547: Commander... ... ...I also... made sure... to make you some chocolate... ...Here... ...Have it.
48.Rainy 6547: Rainy season... rain... rain sounds... I don't hate... them.
48.Summer 6547: Ahh... it's a bit... hot... It's almost summer... Admiral... ah... it's... it's nothing.
48.Fall 6547: So fall has arrived. Yeah... the fall insects are... making noises... aren't they....
48.Saury 6547: Saury... I also... like it... Especially... salt-grilled is... good... in my opinion...
48.YearsEnd 6547: The 18th Destroyer Division's... end of year cleaning... you mean? ...I understand. ...Kagerou and... also Shiranui... I'll go get them.

252.Idle: Commander... Things to do... No, it's all good...
252.Married: Commander, Arare and friends… are always thankful… to you.

49.Intro: It's Kasumi. I'm charging in. Follow me.
49.Library:
I'm a veteran destroyer who fought hard on the front lines.

It all ended when I fought alongside battleship Yamato in Operation Ten-go against an onslaught of American carrier-based aircraft.

I won't lose!
49.Poke(1): Look me in the eyes if you need me for something.
49.Poke(2): Like I said— what is it?
49.Poke(3): Huh? You're taking it out on me? You're disgusting!
49.Married: W-What!? I'm actually a little grateful to you. It'd get lonely without you. ...D-Don't get the wrong idea!
49.Wedding: Oh, finding a trashy commander like you in a place like this must mean you have a lot of time on your hands, huh~? ... ...Eh... a present? For me? Eh... ah... ... ...idiot...!
49.Ranking: It's a letter. How many times do I have to say it, you trash?
49.Join: Kasumi, departing! I can't just stand by and watch.
49.Equip(1): Something like this wouldn't even fall into the category of an upgrade.
49.Equip(2): Well, I'm not thanking you for it.
49.Supply: Something like this wouldn't even fall into the category of an upgrade.
49.Docking(2): Damn it... what kind of order was that...? This is so annoying!
49.Construction: A new ship has been completed. Go welcome her.
49.Return: The operation has been completed. Listen to the report.
49.Yasen(1): Ah, come on! No one here but idiots!
49.MVP: It's not like I'm glad or anything, but I'll accept it just this once.
49.Damaged(3): It seems we have some halfway decent opponents... I'll give them that much.
49.Sunk: To think that I could sink... I won't... I won't accept this!
49.NewYears 6547: *whew* ...We were able to safely welcome the new year. I'm glad. Trashy Commander, I- ...Ah, sorry... Commander, I'll be counting on you again this year... ...Wh-What is it!?
49.Setsubun 6547: I told you! Stop throwing the beans so hard! It won't be long before demon Jintsuu will... See. See...? I-I don't know anything!
49.Valentines 6547: Well, it took longer than expected, but I did make you some. ...What's that? It's chocolate! Isn't something like that obvious? ...H-Hurry up and take it already!
49.Anniversary 6547: Why don't you ever tell me something this important beforehand! It's the third anniversary! Third anniversary! ... It's really amazing! Tell me quicker! ... Congrats
49.Rainy 6547: It's the rainy season, huh. Even the outside looks foggy with all the rain. We'll be fine as long as the haze remains. Arare, don't worry.
49.Summer 6547: What? Kiyoshimo, you're buying a swimsuit? Hmmm. I guess that one is fine. Why don't you try it on...? Eh? Me...? I don't need one... Ehh!? I don't want one!
49.Fall 6547: It's fall... and after fall, it's winter... Operation Rei-Go... where I tried so hard as flagship. Why...? I'm remembering it so clearly... Just why...
49.Saury 6547: You're going saury fishing!? If you're going, then go! Be more decisive! ...I'll go as well! Searchlights are... check. Now it'll be just fine!
49.Xmas 6547: Christmas...!? What's with this merry crap— how moronic! Eh...? Cake!? I'll pass on that kind of... Mm... ah... delicious! Ah... umm...

253.Idle: Hey! Why is the fleet on standby at such a critical time? What is the meaning of this!? Listen, damn it!
253.Supply: What!? A resupply!? ...Well, I guess it's necessary.

464.Intro: Remodeled Asashio-class destroyer, Kasumi! Naturally, I'm charging in! Just follow me.
464.Ranking: Ah, you need the intel? Wait a moment. I'll organize it for you now.
464.Sortie: Second Torpedo Squadron, interim flagship Kasumi setting sail! Follow me!
464.Yasen(2): Ah, come on! No one here but idiots! You only need to act! Do it!
464.MVP: It's not like I'm happy or any- ...No, actually... for the spirit and glory of the destroyer crews... ...This is a good thing. I'll accept it.
464.Damaged(2): A hit!? On me!? You damn trash! ...You're dead.
464.Saury 6547: Saury fishing? No helping it... I'll be coming along. I can't bear to just watch! Don't worry. With me going, it'll be a big catch!

470.Poke(2): I can't stand backstabbers! I will only advance forward.
470.Join: My mind is made up. From now on... I'll just advance! I'm going!
470.Damaged(3): I won't sink from something like this! I'm not kidding around!

17.Intro: We've finally met! I'm Kagerou. Treat me well!
17.Library: Constucted for the Circle-4 programe, Kagerou-class nameship, Kagerou. As the main power of the newly-made ships, staring off with the Hawaii attack force, I was in lots of varied battles! Treat me well!
17.Poke(3): I'll get angry if you touch me too much, you know?
17.Wedding: Ah, Commander! Great work!... Erm, right.. Um, here's a Hawaiian souvenir chocolate for you!
17.Ranking: A telegram for the commander has arrived.
17.Equip(1): Thanks! Expect great things from me!
17.Equip(2): Oh? This is pretty good! Thanks.
17.Supply: Thanks! Expect great things from me!
17.Docking(2): I'll be away for a bit. *sigh*.
17.Sortie: Both turbines to full speed, Kagerou sortieing!
17.Yasen(2): How bad for you, take this!
17.MVP: How was it, my fighting? A text-book case? Ah, thanking me is enough.
17.Damaged(2): Hmmph, it'll take more than that!
17.Damaged(3): I'm not worth of the position of the Kagerou nameship... *sigh*
17.NewYears 6547: Commander? Happy New Year! DesDiv18 and the Kagerou-class will be counting on you again this year!
17.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun, huh... Well, that works. Then, I'm gonna throw! Whoa, Shiranui!? What are you doing!?
17.Valentines 6547: Well, just because, okay? I made some just because... Commander, here, take this. Well, it's only just because, after all! Just because!!
17.Anniversary 6547: Isn't today an important day? Commander, everyone, congrats!
17.EarlySummer 6547: Shiranui~! You, should buy a new swimsuit this year, too. Eh? Ahh, sheesh! I'll choose one for you!
17.Summer 6547: Hey! We're going to sea with the 18th Division's members. Are you all wearing your swimsuits under your clothes? Shiranui, this goes for you, too!
17.Xmas 6547: It's Christmas! We need to have fun! Is everyone eating? Oh, Shiranui seems to be having a surprisingly good time, doesn't she?
17.YearsEnd 6547: It's already New Year's Eve. The year went by so quickly... I should get the cleanup done as soon as possible. Eh? Osechi? Well...

225.Idle: Commander, are you listening? Commander? Oh, come on, Commander! What's the big idea, ignoring me!?
225.Married: Commander... You've really been doing your best, haven't you? Yeah. I have do my best too, alongside you.
225.Battle: Enemy Fleet discovered! I'm going in! Stick with Kagerou!

18.Intro: I'm Shiranui. I look forward to your guidance and encouragement.
18.Library: Second Kagerou-class destroyer, Shiranui. Along with the other Kageros I served as the escort for the Hawaii Operational Forces. In the fated Battle of Leyte Gulf, I was attached to Shima's fleet and rushed to the Surigao Strait.
18.Poke(1): Did you call for me, Commander?
18.Poke(2): Do you have something for me to do?
18.Poke(3): What is it... did I make a mistake?
18.Wedding: Commander, what do you think of my battles...? Oh, I see... Well, that's fine too.
18.Equip(1): Oh. Good upgrade. I appreciate it.
18.Supply: Oh. Good supplies. I appreciate it.
18.Docking(1): Though I can still sail... but if it's an order...
18.Docking(2): I wont just sit here and accept this.
18.Construction: It appears a new ship is complete.
18.Sortie: I will live up to your expectations.
18.Yasen(1): I will chase them down completely.
18.MVP: I'm bored. Is there no more spirited foe?
18.Damaged(1): This level of damage won't sink me.
18.Sunk: If this is death, everyone is coming with me... That includes you.
18.NewYears 6547: Commander. Happy New Year. What is it? Is there... something on my face?
18.Setsubun 6547: These beans... I'm supposed to throw them at Kinu-san, right? ...Not here... Well then... Hayashimo, then! Ei~!
18.Valentines 6547: Chocolate? You would like some as well? ...Is that so. ...Then I have no choice.
18.Anniversary 6547: Commander, isn't today a really important day? Really...? Well then, it's delightful.
18.EarlySummer 6547: No. I will not buy such a.... Fine. No way around it. Ah, this might work.
18.Summer 6547: No. The sea is somewhere we go all the time. Just because it's summer is no reason to go in our swimsuits...
18.Xmas 6547: *nom* ...Decent... It's decent. ...Christmas is. It's really not too bad.
18.YearsEnd 6547:
Cleaning, huh. December.
...? Commander, what is it? Is there a problem with how I cleaned?

226.Idle: Shiranui is absolutely not bored. No, please don't mind me. Do as you like...
226.Married: Is there something on Shiranui's face? ...I see, then... it's fine. No, it's nothing... Something wrong?

19.Library: Built in the Osaka Civilian Naval Yards, third of the Kagerou-class Destroyers, Kuroshio. Even though I look like this, I participated in such hard-fought battles as Surabaya, the South Pacific and the third Battle of Solomon, ya' know.
19.Poke(3): Hey, there's nothing wrong with my body, y'know?
19.Wedding: I... I'm... always lookin' at the chief, y'know? Really! C'mon, believe me...
19.Join: Well then, Kuroshio, off I go!
19.Docking(1): I'm just gonna rest for a bit~
19.Docking(2): Oww... I can't really bear this level of pain...
19.Battle: Well now, let's get this party started!
19.MVP: It just kind of happened that way, don't worry about me.
19.Sunk: I… I can't live any longer… Goodbye…
19.NewYears 6547: Chief, it's new years and all. Countin' on ya again this year.
19.Setsubun 6547: Ehoumaki, huh~ Um, which direction is it this year? This way, huh? *nom*♪
19.Valentines 6547: Chief, this here chocolate's from me. Make sure ya eat a lot~
19.Anniversary 6547: Commander, today is an anniversary, right? Kuroshio is happy, too!
19.Rainy 6547: The rain, huh. The season of rain - it's fine, in its own way.
19.Summer 6547: Chief? Why don't we go together to the sea? Nah, not to an expedition— to the sandy beach!
19.Xmas 6547: Mmm~! Christmas cake is delicous! Chief, say "ahhhh~"
19.YearsEnd 6547: The year's already over with, huh? Gotta do the cleanup. Cleanin' time!

227.Idle: Chief? Chieeef? Can yoouu heeeear me? ...Oh well. Guess I'll just take it easy then.
227.Married: It's no good to overwork yourself, chief. It worries us when we see it.
227.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted! C'mon, follow Kuroshio~!

456.Intro: I'm the fourth ship of the Kagerou-class destroyers, Oyashio. Commander, DesDiv15 looks forward to your guidance. Please take care of us!
456.Library: I'm the fourth ship of the Kagerou-class destroyers, Oyashio. I was born in Maizuru. With my consort ships Kuroshio and others, we formed Destroyer Division 15. I participated in conquering operations, escorted aircraft carriers and experienced many Tokyo Express runs. On my last sortie... I was with Kuroshio.
456.Poke(2): Kuroshio, are you prepared? DesDiv 15, ready any time!
456.Poke(3): What? Is it a cat...? This feeling... it's not! Heeey...! ...Di... did I...? Wha, Commander!? I'm so sorry! I thought......
456.Idle: Alright, depth charges... no problem, torpedoes are OK, anti-air weapons are...OK, this should do.....! Phew... Now, even if I'm called... Huh? Commander? Commander......? Huh.....? He's not here.....?
456.Married: Kuroshio! Do you have some time? Um, recently the commander seems to be tired and I would like to make a meal to help out. Could you help me? Ah, thank you.
456.Wedding: Commander? If it's DesDiv 15's report, I just said... Wha? It's not...? This is... wha! M-may I...? May I open it, Commander!?... I'm opening it! Wha! Um...! ...! I... I will.. I will treasure this!
456.Ranking: Commander! Did you want to make a situation analysis? I understand— I will bring you the files.
456.Join: DesDiv 15, Oyashio, ready to sortie! Straight ahead!
456.Equip(1): This is.... with this equipment, I can...! I can be useful to the fleet!
456.Equip(2): Thank you very much, Commander! Anti-sub equipment is important, too.
456.Supply: Commander, thank you very much. DesDiv 15 is ready for sortie!
456.Docking(1): I'm terribly sorry... I will retreat for a bit. I'll be back soon.
456.Docking(2): Commander... I'm terribly sorry. I've ruined the uniform you gave me. Next time I absolutely will not fail. I absolutely won't.
456.Construction: Commander, the new ship's construction has been completed.
456.Return: Operation complete! The fleet has returned to the anchorage.
456.Sortie: I, Oyashio, will take charge as flagship. Flagship, front side, fleet forward!
456.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted. Get ready for battle. Commence... fire!
456.Attack: Port side, ready the guns. Fire! Fire! ......Yes, I can do this!
456.Yasen(1): Fleet, regroup! Alright? We will finish them off with a night battle. Follow me! Let's go!
456.Yasen(2): Did it hit? Did I do it? .... O-ok... Fire!
456.MVP: No way... me!? Commander, you really mean it!? ......Y-yes! Kuroshio, did you see? I did it!
456.Damaged(1): Iyaaa! I'm hit!? What was it!? Torpedo!? A mine!? Wha... what!?
456.Damaged(3): Direct hit to the stern!? No way!? Can I still fight? Can I go on?
456.Sunk: I'm... going to sink again... Kuroshio... Kagerou nee-san... I'm... so...r...ry...
456.NewYears 6547: Commander, best wishes for the coming year! The 16th Destroyer Division as well as the Kagerou-class destroyers will be relying on your guidance and encouragement again this year!
456.Setsubun 6547: So it's Setsubun. Kuroshio-san, who will be the demon for Div 15 and 18 this year? Oh, you don't know. I see... who is it going to be...?
456.Rainy 6547: This season makes my heart sink a little. Commander? Oh, I'm sorry. I'm feeling alright. I don't want to cause any needless worry for the commander. I'll do my best! I'm fine!
456.Summer 6547: Kuroshio-san, what are you wearing? Eh? A swimsuit? What purpose does it serve? The sea? We go to the sea everyday, but...? The commander? To show him? Why? Eh? Ehh?
456.Fall 6547: Fall has arrived. Taiyou was commissioned at this time of year. I'd like to see her once again. Definitely.
456.Saury 6547: S-Saury fishing!? Roger! Destroyer Division 15 will sortie to provide saury fishing support! Kuroshio-san, get the lights. Let's move out!
456.Xmas 6547: Commander! I've cut you a piece of cake. I'll bring you some of that food, too! ...Turkey... this looks to be excellent poultry. It looks delicious. ...Okay! Commander, here you go!

362.Intro: I'm the fourth ship of the Kagerou-class destroyers, Oyashio. Commander, DesDiv15 looks forward to more of your guidance. Please take care of us!
362.H0000: It's now midnight. At this time of night, the fleet is so quiet. Commander, if you'll allow someone like me, I would be happy if I could be your secretary-ship. Please leave everything to me.
362.H0100: 0100. Commander, I have a report. There are no abnormalities in the fleet anchorage. It's a quiet night.
362.H0200: 0200. Commander, I have a report. Outside the admiral's room, in the hall... oh, you're right! Commander, I understand. I won't report such trivial matters.
362.H0300: 0300. Phew... Commander, are you asleep? Fufufufu! The commander's sleeping face is so cute. I could gaze forever. Ah! Yes, I should put this blanket on him.
362.H0400: Ah, Commander, are you awake? Ah, yes, you were asleep for a bit. Right now it's 0400. Please rest a bit more.
362.H0500: 0500. Commander, I have a report. I shall begin preparing breakfast. Today's menu is barley rice, spinach miso soup and stir-fried grated radish.
362.H0600: 0600. Commander, I have a report. I just did the fleet wake-up call. Good morning! Let's give it our best today.
362.H0700: 0700. Commander, your breakfast is ready over there on the table. I'll put on some tea as well. Whenever you're ready, please eat.
362.H0800: 0800. Commander, thank you for having seconds. I...! I'm happy... no... honored! Please leave preparing lunch to me as well!
362.H0900: 0900. Commander, I have a report. Kuroshio, Oyashio and DesDiv 15's first platoon have gathered. We will now begin our joint training with DesDiv 18
362.H1000: 1000. Kagerou nee-san! Yes, I'm doing great! Please don't worry. Ah, Shiranui nee-san. Ah, yes! Thank you so much for your guidance and encouragement!
362.H1100: 1100. Kuroshio, would you like to join us for lunch? Really!? Commander, is that okay? Wha..! Yes! Thank you!
362.H1200: 1200. Commander, Kuroshio, for lunch I've prepared inarizushi. Inside is five-ingredient rice! Please eat up!
362.H1300: 1300. Commander, I have a report. The afternoon's fleet operations have started. I have to consult with you about the expedition fleet management, so if it's okay, shall we convene in the meeting room?
362.H1400: 1400. Commander, thank you for your hard work. About the expedition fleet's securing of military logistics, Commander... um... Commander? Oh, thank goodness. You seem to be a little tired. Would you like to rest?
362.H1500: 150... Ah! Teruzuki! Thank you for your hard work! What happened? Huh? Some sweets as a gift? They look delicious! Thank you very much! Would you like some tea?
362.H1600: 1600. Teruzuki? Yes, we were together as a part of the Second Torpedo Squadron at one point. Yes. I've been to that island and that part of sea a few times.
362.H1700: 1700. Commander, I have a report. The sunset is beautiful! So beautiful... I would like to take a picture of it. I'm so sorry! I'm on duty...
362.H1800: 1800. Commander, for your dinner, I... no, Oyashio will prepare it. Would you like Japanese or western? Which would you prefer?
362.H1900: 1900. Commander, your dinner is ready. Please come to the table. Tonight's menu is... ah, it's great to see you so enthusiastic. All of my efforts were worth it!
362.H2000: 2000. Commander, would you like to have your after meal coffee? Or would you prefer tea?... Ah, yes, I understand! I'll bring it right away. Please wait.
362.H2100: 2100. Commander, I have a report. The Third Torpedo Squadron is sorti... ah, I didn't need to report it. I am very sorry, I understand.
362.H2200: 2200. Submarines? Yes, I think they are powerful ships. They can be formidable enemies, but I think capable submarines on our side are great to have.
362.H2300: 2300. Commander, thank you for working so hard the all day today. I, Oyashio, hope to be of use tomorrow as well. You may be busy, but I would be happy if you could rest, even for a bit.

190.Intro: I'm Hatsukaze, nice to meet you. Admiral, how many of me did you have before me, I wonder?
190.Library: Kagerou-class destroyer, Hatsukaze. Myoukou-neesan and I crashed into each other off Bougainville, and my bow got torn off... Crippled and unable to move, I was the target of concentrated fire and then... I'm scared....I'm so scared, Myoukou-neesan...
190.Poke(1): Ah... Admiral, thanks for the hard work.
190.Poke(2): Staaaare~ I'm just looking. Is that a problem?
190.Poke(3): Hey! Just what are you touching! I'm going to hit you and fight you! Do you want me to tell Myoukou-neesan!?
190.Idle: Ah, geez, I'm so bored~! Admiral, do something~
190.Married: Admiral, just where are you looking? Hatsukaze's right here.
190.Wedding: Why're you calling me over here? I'm busy with maintenance and replenishment… eh? What? Such a large bouquet… for me? No way... I'm so happy… I'm...wha..what are you making me say, you stupid Admiral!? I-I'll just keep it!
190.Ranking: This, is a letter for the commander? hmm?
190.Docking(2): I'm going to the bath. No peeking!
190.Return: The fleet returned home from battle.
190.Sortie: Off I go! I'll leave behind these annoyances!
190.Battle: I'll say it straight...Myoukou-oneesan is scarier to me.
190.Yasen(2): Why are you coming over here!
190.MVP: This battle that was led by Hatsukaze to victory, don't forget it now.
190.Damaged(3): No, D-direct hit on the bow? I've already been hit there by Myoukou-oneesan once...it's been weakened...Aah...I'm scared...
190.Sunk: I wanted Admiral to be so much more stronger so... I kept saying harsh things to him... sorry...
190.H0000: Midnight, huh. How about some sleep?
190.H0100: It's 1 A.M. It's really night-time, eh?
190.H0200: 2 A.M... huh. Not going to sleep soon?
190.H0400: 4 o'clock. If you don't go to bed soon then...
190.H0600: It's 6 o'clock. Admiral... all nighter? Perhaps?
190.H0700: It's 7 A.M. Admiral, let's have breakfast.
190.H0800: 8 o'clock. Looks like today's weather will be good as well.
190.H0900: It's 9 o'clock. Shall we go all out soon?♪
190.H1000: 10 o'clock! Somehow... I'm not really feeling it~
190.H1100: It's 11 o'clock. It'll soon be midday, yeah?
190.H1200: Midday. What are you doing for lunch? I want to eat something tasty~
190.H1300: 1 P.M. Why don't you take a nap?
190.H1400: It's 2 P.M~. I'm a bit sleepy at this time.
190.H1500: 3 P.M. I want to eat something sweet~
190.H1800: It's now 6 P.M. What's for dinner~?
190.H1900: 7 P.M. Admiral, let's eat dinner. I'm starving~
190.H2100: It's 9 P.M. Almost time for night battles, yeah?
190.H2200: 10 P.M. Sendai-neesan isn't here, it's nice and quiet.
190.H2300: The time is now, 11 P.M. Going to take a break soon?
190.NewYears 6547: Happy New Year! Admiral, at least speak clearly for New Year's. See. You can do it, after all.
190.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun, huh... Ah, Myoukou nee-san. ...Eh? You're the demon? No, actually, let it be me instead!
190.Valentines 6547: Admiral, do you like sweets? ...I see. In that case, I'll give you this. Don't want it? You do? ...Okay, here!
190.Anniversary 6547: Today is special, right? I'm happy to spend this time with you.
190.Rainy 6547: The rainy season... it's a pretty relaxing time of year. I don't mind it.
190.EarlySummer 6547: *sigh*... Ah, it'll be summer soon... Eh? A swimsuit? I didn't buy one. What's that? You want to give me a present?
190.Summer 6547: It's finally summertime. What? Go for a swim? That's fine. Ah, we're inviting Shiranui, too? Ah... ...I see.
190.Fall 6547: Fall, huh? Nights at this time of year are kind of unpleasant. Ah... I'm not implying anything by that, though...
190.Xmas 6547: Merry... Christmas... What's with that face? It's Christmas! Heh... it's pretty fun, you know.

20.Intro: Kagerou-class destroyer, eighth ship, Yukikaze here! Please take good care of me!
20.Library:
Kagerou-class destroyer, eighth ship, Yukikaze here!

I was one of the frontline fleet destroyers, taking part in not less than ten major naval battles, and surviving to the end of the war almost without a scratch.

The Miracle Destroyer? Nah... it wasn't a miracle!
20.Poke(3): Um... do you have an order for me...?
20.Wedding: I'm the Miracle Destroyer...? That's... it's not like that. I just... I always want to be at your side... Ah...! Th-That's not it, either!
20.Equip(1): I can feel the kiss of the Goddess of Fortune!
20.Supply: I can feel the kiss of the Goddess of Fortune!
20.Docking(2): Undergoing repairs so I can participate in operations again!
20.Construction: A new comrade has been launched!
20.MVP: I've survived once again! I owe it all to you!
20.Damaged(1): They don't call me unsinkable for nothing!!
20.Sunk: The Unsinkable Ship... there's no such thing...
20.NewYears 6547: Commander, have a Happy New Year! The torpedo squadron and I are counting on you again this year!
20.Valentines 6547: Commander! Chocolate! It's for you! I bought this chocolate myself! I think it's really good!
20.Anniversary 6547: Admiral, it's a memorial day. Congratulations, Yukikaze is happy, too.
20.Rainy 6547: Commander! There are a lot of rainy days recently. It's quite annoying since our uniforms and laundry won't dry as well, right?
20.Xmas 6547: Commander! It's Christmas! The cake and dishes are so good! Commander! Have some, have some!
20.YearsEnd 6547: Commander! This year is already over with. I'll also do cleanup on this room! Aye!

181.Intro:
Is a good breeze on the way?
The next-generation destroyer prototype—
I, Amatsukaze, shall have my turn.
181.Library: Kagerou-class destroyer, ninth ship, Amatsukaze here. I participated as the testbed of a new type of high-temperature, high-pressure boiler intended for the next generation of destroyers. When the data proved reliable, it was passed over to Shimakaze. I was in many tight spots, but I held on and overcame them. It was really tough!
181.Poke(2): Just what are you planning to do?
181.Poke(3): Stop that. Don't touch my hair. You'll knock my streamers out of place.
181.Idle: Eh? I'm... not bored or anything. Even after getting the data for the new boiler, I still have a lot more work to do. I-I really do!
181.Married: Dear... from time to time, go take a break. Breaks are important, too... Ugh! Are you even listening? Geez...
181.Wedding: You... what... is this? ...Eh!? For me...? Umm... I'm willing if you are, but... you're... really fine with it being me? ...Thank you. I'm truly grateful.
181.Ranking: So how are you doing? ...Hmmmm... not too bad.
181.Equip(2): My Rensouhou-kun is the cutest one, don't you think?
181.Docking(1): *whew* I'm worn out. May I head back?
181.Docking(2): Bathtime, bathtime, I say! I don't want to smell all sweaty.
181.Construction: A new girl has arrived, it seems. ...That's good.
181.Return: The fleet has returned. Good work.
181.Sortie: I'm not a member of DesRon 2 for nothing. Yukikaze, come along, now.
181.Battle: This wind feels right... Commence firing!
181.Yasen(1): Didn't I say I wouldn't let you escape?
181.Yasen(2): It'll be fine... the wind is in our favor!
181.MVP: Me...? I'm the ship who accomplished the most? My, that's amazing! Tokitsukaze, how about that?
181.Damaged(3): Ahh... the bow and the first gun turret...! But... I'm not ready to sink just yet!
181.Sunk: So I'm the one sinking into the sea this time... It's cold... and dark...
181.NewYears 6547: New Year's huh. Happy New Year. It feels like a pleasant breeze will be blowing this year. Hey, don't you feel that way as well?
181.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun, huh? ...Who is the demon for our torpedo squadron? Eh? Jintsuu-san? That's a little... Ah, Tokitsukaze! Please stop! Hey!
181.EarlySummer 6547: Hmmm... it's hot and windless. It's almost summer... eh!? A swimsuit!? I won't wear one!
181.Summer 6547: Geez, it's midsummer. It's so hot... Shimakaze, how does the heat never seem to get to you? Well, good for you.
181.Fall 6547: The summer heat is still around, but it's getting a little more tolerable. Eh? Baked sweet potatoes? Um, I'm not really all that interested. I really don't care... at all...
181.Saury 6547: Saury fishing? There's no avoiding it. I'll provide support, then. Searchlights and sonar, right? Hm! I'm all set.
181.Wine 6547: My, this is pretty good wine. May I have just a little bit, if you don't mind? Just a little... only a little!
181.Xmas 6547: So, it's Christmas. It's not like I... Ah... what? Ha... Hatsukaze, I don't want any cake. I told you! I'm on a diet right now!

316.H0100: 0100. *yawn* I'm... a little sleepy. You're still not ready to turn in?
316.H0200: 0200. Did Hatsukaze go to sleep yet? Yukikaze should be asleep... mm.
316.H0300: 0300. You... don't tell me you're going to pull an all nighter? I'm not staying up with you.
316.H0400: 0400. Didn't I say I'm not staying up with you? How stubborn. It'll be morning soon.
316.H0500: 0500. Just look! It's already morning. ...Geez! Ahh... this sucks!
316.H0600: 0600. But still... the morning breeze feels nice... Hey, don't you agree?
316.H0700: 0700. ...What a pleasant breeze. Hey, want to try going a bit off the coast?
316.H0800: 0800. Okay... your breakfast is ready. You're fine with a Japanese breakfast, right?
316.H0900: 0900. It's almost time for the full-scale fleet mobilization. What's your plan?
316.H1000: 1000. Shimakaze!? ...Yeah, that's right. W-We're friends, but... Eh? What? What's with that face...?
316.H1100: 1100. What? Rensouhou-kun? Isn't he cute? Just perching on the bow like that♥
316.H1200: 1200. Is curry fine for lunch? You really enjoy my curry? You mean it?
316.H1300: 1300. So how was my curry? ...Hmm? Glad to hear it!
316.H1400: 1400. Who's faster between Shimakaze and I...? I wouldn't know. I've never tried racing against her before.
316.H1500: 1500. I'm a prototype, after all. I've been through many kinds of tests. Speed is not an issue.
316.H1600: 1600. That's strange... why is Rensouhou-kun in a bad mood? What happened?
316.H1700: 1700. The evening breeze also feels nice. Want to... watch the sunset from here with me?
316.H1800: 1800. It's almost time for dinner. Are you fine with grilled fish?
316.H1900: 1900. ...Okay, here's your dinner. So...? Do you like it? I see! ...I'm glad.
316.H2000: 2000. Oh... Shimakaze, how are you? ...Eh? What? A race!? It's not happening! It's night...
316.H2100: 2100. ...I already said I don't want to race! Shimakaze, you're so persistent!
316.H2200: 2200. Fi... finally, she left... Geez... what is up with her!
316.H2300: 2300. Another day is coming to a close. You did a good job today. ...See you tomorrow.

50.Intro: I'm destroyer Shimakaze. When it comes to speed, I'm the best there is— swift like the island breeze!
50.Library: Fast and armed with heavy torpedoes, developed as the pinnacle of destroyers— the Shimakaze class. I can go even faster than 40 knots. But... I wasn't suitable for mass production, so I was the only one built.
50.Poke(3): Want to race? I won't lose.
50.Married: Eh? Admiral, you're tired from running? How slo~w...! But still, do your best!
50.Wedding: Admiral, did you watch me run? Well? I was fast, right? Right? Hmhmhm!
50.Ranking: Seems like there are messages addressed to you.
50.Equip(1): Can I keep getting faster and faster?
50.Equip(2): Don't blame me if I get even faster!
50.Supply: Can I keep getting faster and faster?
50.Docking(1): I want my turbines serviced, too!
50.Docking(2): Rensouhou-chan needs to be fixed, too.
50.Construction: It looks like another ship slower than me was built.
50.Return: The fleet finally came back. Slow, huh?
50.Battle: There's no one who can keep up with me, you know!
50.Yasen(1): I'm telling you! There's no escape from me!
50.MVP: I'm the best? Really? I knew it. After all, I'm fast!
50.Damaged(3): Haa... for me to get hit...
50.Sunk: I guess being fast... was useless...
50.NewYears 6547: Happy New Year...! I'm faster than anyone else again this year! Watch me! ...Uu!
50.Valentines 6547: Admiral...! You can have my chocolate~ Make sure to eat mine faster than anyone else's. Come on, hurry, hurry!
50.Anniversary 6547: It's still only the third anniversary? How slow! Congrats anyway. Admiral, let's race as a celebration. I won't lose!
50.Rainy 6547: It rains a lot at this time of year. I feel bad for Rensouhou-chan. Summer, come quickly! Hurry, hurry~!
50.Summer 6547: Summer...! Let's go swimming with Rensouhou-chan. I won't lose even if we race at swimming! After all, I'm fast!
50.YearsEnd 6547: Cleaning is so much work... I want to eat osechi right now~! Faster, faster! O-Oh!

229.Idle: Hmm... ah. I'm just chatting with Rensouhou-chan now... *sigh*... 'cause I'm bored!
229.Attack: Quintuple oxygen torpedoes! Here they come...!
229.Damaged(2): I went so fast that I overheated...!

186.Intro: Kagerou-class Destroyer tenth ship. Tokitsukaze... has arrived!
186.Library: Tenth Kagerou-class Destroyer, Tokitsukaze. I worked hard in the 16th Destroyer Division with my friends Yukikaze, Hatsukaze, and Amatsukaze. I was also in the Second Torpedo Squadron you know, really, really. But...an uncontrolled sea seems...kinda unpleasant.
186.Poke(2): Nn? What, what? What is it?
186.Poke(3): What is it, Yukikaze, stop it. Eh? ...Huh... Commander, what are you doing? I'll hit you.
186.Idle: Commander, Commander! Commaaandeer! Hey! Hey, can't you hear me? Hey!
186.Married: Commander, have you seen Yukikaze? Hmm, is that so. Then, you're fine as well! Hey~ Hey~
186.Wedding: Commander, what's the matter? Are you looking for Hatsukaze? Wrong? Amatsukaze? That's wrong too? Then who? Huh? Ah, me? W-why? Err, err... Thanks♪
186.Ranking: Commander, looking at scores? Tokitsukaze also wanna look, wanna look!
186.Docking(1): Haa. I want to clean up a bit.
186.Docking(2): Going to soak in the bath. Sorry-.
186.Construction: Commander, they said a new ship is done.
186.Return: Haaa, tired, tired~. The fleet has returned.
186.Sortie: It's finally the 16th Destroyer Division's turn!
186.MVP: Hou hou, so Tokitsukaze is first, huh. That's good, pretty good!
186.Damaged(3): I ha-te unreasonable operations, I really ha-te them.
186.Sunk: I'm... first again, huh... that's okay... Yukikaze, Hatsukaze, Amatsukaze... See, you... again...
186.NewYears 6547: Commander, Happy New Year~! Counting on you this year, too! Huh? We're gonna draw fortunes?
186.Valentines 6547: Commander, chocolate for you~ ...Eh? Don't want it? That's dumb... you'll eat it! Eii~!
186.Rainy 6547: I hate the rainy season~ I just hate it~. ....At times like this, I'll just climb on top of the commander's head! Grrrr~♪
186.EarlySummer 6547: Commanderrrr! It's almost summer! Let's go swimming with Yukikaze this summer. Okay? Okayyyy????
186.Summer 6547: Commanderrr! It's summer! Let's go to the sea! I don't mean on a sortie! Come on, hurry, hurry, hurry...!
186.Xmas 6547: Commaander, it's Christmas! ↗This cake is so gooood!! ↘Commander, want some, too? Here, say "ahhhh"...
186.YearsEnd 6547: It's already the end of the year~ A whole year went by so fast. Really. Eh? End of year cleaning? I also have to? What for?

322.H0000: Commander, it's 00:00! Um... Commander? What are you doing?
322.H0100: 01:00. Commander, what are you doing in midnight? Let me see it too!
322.H0200: 02:00. Commander, keeping secrets from me is not good. Not goooood!
322.H0300: 03:00. Fighting with Commander is really tiring... To think he's hiding it until the end...
322.H0400: 04:00. Whatever. I'll look for it with Yukikaze and the others later, when Commander is asleep.
322.H0500: 05:00. Commander, it's morning! Totally, totally morning!
322.H0600: 06:00. Commander, make breakfast please! ...eeh, you can't? Liar, you can't be.
322.H0700: 07:00. Well, it can't be helped. Let's go together to Mamiya's place, Commander!
322.H0800: 08:00. Mamiya's breakfast delicious. Me? Impossible, totally.
322.H0900: 09:00. Now then, I should probably call Yukikaze and others for sortie! Sortie, sortie♪
322.H1000: 10:00. Amatsukaze's windsock, doesn't it make you curious~? ...eh, it doesn't? ...I see.
322.H1100: 11:00. Commander, what are you gonna eat for lunch? Where are you going? Curry is good too.
322.H1200: 12:00. Fufu♪ Afternoon curry with Commander♪ Rice nice, satisfied satisfied♪
322.H1300: 13:00. When your stomach is full, don't you just want to laze around? You do become like that huh~.
322.H1400: 14:00. Commander, did you see Yukikaze? She disappeared really fast.
322.H1500: 15:00. Commander, it's time for a snack. Snack♪ What do you want to eat? I want...
322.H1600: 16:00. Hatsukaze and Amatsukaze have changed. Right? I'm still normal, right?
322.H1700: 17:00. Commander, sunset sunset! Isn't it nice, this time of day. I'm pretty fond of it.
322.H1800: 18:00. Commander, time for dinner! Commander, what do you want to go eat? Hey♪
322.H1900: 19:00. Eh? Commander is making dinner? I wonder if it's alright... Do you need help?
322.H2000: 20:00. The commander's handmade dinner, delicious! Cook again tomorrow!
322.H2100: 21:00. I'm going to Yukikaze's place for a while. Nah, I don't really have anything I need to do there.
322.H2200: Commander, it's 22:00. It's totally night. Time to sleep...
322.H2300: 23:00... I'm fine! Since I'm on time announcement duty! I'm not gonna sleep! Maybe!

168.Intro: It's me, Urakaze, nice to meet 'ya!
168.Library: Osaka-born, attached to Kure. I saw action from Pearl Harbor to Guadalcanal. My last moments were escorting Kongou nee-san at the Taiwan Strait. Anyway, there's nothing that can be done anymore...
168.Poke(1): Admiral-san, you're lookin' energetic today as well.
168.Wedding: Whenever I see Admiral doing his best all day long, somehow I just can't leave you alone... yeah! Don't be too reckless, alright!
168.Ranking: Admiral-san? It's be good to read it soon.
168.Equip(1): As long as I'm strong, I would be able to protect everyone!
168.Equip(2): Hey, did I get a bit cooler?
168.Construction: There's a new ship brought in.
168.Return: There's a fleet that just completed it's mission.
168.MVP: There's no need to worry. Because I'm here this fleet is safe!
168.Damaged(3): My turrets are broke, and I'm all battered...
168.Sunk: Don't worry 'bout me, it's better... to do a speedy withdrawal... from here...
168.NewYears 6547: Admiral, a Happy New Year to ya. I'm countin' on ya again this year!
168.Setsubun 6547: Admiral...? Why are ya throwin' beans at me...? I won't get angry, so tell me. Hmm? Hmm...?
168.Valentines 6547: I made some chocolate for ya☆ Admiral? If ya want, have a bite, won't ya?
168.Rainy 6547: Rain... oh, the rainy season. Aren't the Hydrangea pretty? I love 'em.
168.Fall 6547: Admiral, it's fall. Mind if we go to the naval base's Fall Festival together...? Ah, if ya have other plans, ah'll just go with Hamakaze. Ah, is that right? Ehehe.
168.Fall 1471: Admiral, Ah'm pretty good at these shootin' galleries. Which one did ya want? Ah'm gonna get it for ya. Just leave it ta me.
168.Xmas 6547: It's Christmas, y'know♪ I tried makin' a lot o' different food. How's it taste?
168.YearsEnd 6547: So we're all the way into December. After the big cleaup, I have ta do the Osechi... ...Ah! Mm! Ya'll can just leave it ta me♪ Ah, Isokaze? ...! Mm! Give me a hand!

317.Idle: Mmmmm, I'd like to go out soon.

167.Intro: 12th Kagerou-class destroyer, Isokaze. Don't worry, I will protect you.
167.Library: 12th Kagerou-class destroyer, Isokaze. If it's about combat experience, I won't fall behind that Yukikaze. I've fought again and again, participated in decisive battles, and fought to the bitter end. Yamato, Musashi, Kongou, Taihou... their last moments have been etched into my eyes. This time... I will protect them.
167.Poke(2): Commander... you should stop while I'm still laughing.
167.Poke(3): So be it... I will be your opponent. I will show no mercy, even should the commander stand before me.
167.Idle: Commander...The 17th Destroyer Division, can sortie at any time... Hamakaze and I are ready... right Hamakaze?
167.Married: Admiral, have you been eating well? If you don't eat and an emergency occurs, you may not survive it. Even surviving is a splendid battle in itself. So, let's go to Mamiya to eat.
167.Wedding: Commander, what? This important discussion. Is it about the 17th Destroyer Division's formation? What, it's not? Then is it something about that Hamakaze? It has nothing to do with Hamakaze... I see. Nn... That ring... to me... w-what... eh! U-um...
167.Equip(1): You're right... upgrades are necessary, thanks.
167.Equip(2): I appreciate it... with this, I can keep fighting.
167.Supply: Resupplies are important. Battles cannot be fought without them.
167.Docking(1): I'm going to go get rid of some of this dust.
167.Docking(2): I'll stay behind in order to fight another day. It's fine, I'll be back right away.
167.Construction: A new ship has been completed. That's great.
167.Sortie: I'm moving out. Do not concern yourself with my safety.
167.Battle: Enemy fleet sighted. All ships, prepare to attack.
167.Attack: Fire, fire, fill them up with holes.
167.Yasen(1): We'll finish off the rest of the enemies. Follow my lead.
167.Yasen(2): My combat experience isn't just for show! Don't forget it!
167.MVP: Nn... Isokaze's contribution has been recognized yet again. No.. such paltry deeds are not worth celebrating over.
167.Damaged(1): Tch... There's so much more left in me, don't underestimate me.
167.Damaged(2): Pretty good... such a big difference in firepower. But, I won't lose.
167.Damaged(3): Darn it. I cannot be stranded in this place. Move, move it!
167.Sunk: I can no longer move... but I will not cause trouble for everyone else. I'm sorry Yukikaze... Would you do me one last favor?
167.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun, huh? No, I do not mind these sorts of events. Who is the demon that our 17th Destroyer Division will be throwing at? Oho... I see. Right! Div 17, going with full force!
167.Rainy 6547: Rain, huh. After all, it's the rainy season. The rain isn't so bad. I wonder... if I can settle down a bit. It really isn't a bad time of year.
167.NotFall 6547: Commander, I'm sorry. Forget this happened.
167.Fall 6547: It's autumn. Once again, that season has come. Alright, bring it on. I, Isokaze, will show how much better I've become. Whether it's saury or anything else, I'll flay it all!
167.Saury 6547: *cough* ...No, saury are supposed to be grilled thoroughly like this... Strange. Very strange. This isn't what Urakaze said would happen. Not at all...
167.LateFall 6547: I'll be certain to... grill the saury properly next year. I'll keep practicing. ...I have no intention of losing to anyone in battle, but cooking skill is also... important.
167.Xmas 6547: Hmm, so this is what people call Chistmas. It's certainly lively. Not bad. That Tanikaze girl is so enthusiastic... So then, I'll try the cake. I-It's good!

320.Intro: 12th Kagerou-class destroyer, Isokaze. Commander, let's proceed together. You do not need to worry.
320.Poke(2): Commander.. I don't dislike your persistence but, what exactly are you doing?
320.Supply: Re-supplies are important. Battles cannot be fought without them.
320.Docking(1): I'm going to go get rid of some of this battlefield dust.
320.Docking(2): I'll stay behind in order to fight another day. It's fine, I'll be back right away. Don't worry.
320.Construction: A new ship has been completed. We've bolstered our forces.
320.Yasen(2): You shouldn't underestimate how strong I am now.
320.Damaged(2): kugh... but I can still sail.
320.H0000: The date has changed. I, Isokaze, will be reporting the time for today. What? Are you dissatisfied with it?
320.H0200: 0200. It's night. What? Is there any dissatisfaction?
320.H0300: 0300. Gah... Commander, you're making such a difficult expression. Do you have something you want to say?
320.H0400: 0400. It is almost morning. I think I understand what is it that the commander's so dissatisfied about, but...
320.H0500: 0500. But, even if I, Isokaze, is entrusted with matters outside combat. I will give it my best shot.
320.H0600: 0600. It is morning. Well then, it's time to make breakfast. What's with that look?
320.H0700: 0700. It's all right, Hamakaze told me how to do it. Here, it's done. How is it?
320.H0800: 0800. Commander, what's wrong? You have a stomachache? That's no good, it'll hinder your commanding abilities.
320.H0900: 0900. Commander, did your stomachache go away? Aren't you lacking daily training?
320.H1000: 1000. Good, it is time for practice. The 17th Destroyer Division is ready to set sail anytime.
320.H1100: 1100. Leave the lunch to me as well. Tanikaze taught... Ah, why are you running away. Commander!
320.H1200: 1200. It's noon. Here are combat rations from Tanikaze. To have rice balls on the sea is something exceptional.
320.H1300: 1300. The rice balls were delicious, right? Even though Tanikaze might not like look like it, she's really adept at taking care of others.
320.H1400: 1400. Good, it is time for a real sortie. Let's dispatch our main fleet.
320.H1500: 1500. Afternoon snacks? No, no, I don't want it. I'll grow an excess bulge if I do.
320.H1600: 1600. Commander, let's strike the tough enemy fleet. Of course, we'll pick the line ahead formation. What, diamond formation you say? You don't understand. You don't understand!
320.H1700: 1700. Commander, the day is going to end soon. How time flies. Even in a single day.
320.H1800: 1800. Commander, the dinn— Why are you running away? It's all right, Urakaze will be helping me.
320.H1900: 1900. I-it took quite sometime but dinner is ready. Commander, how is it?
320.H2000: 2000. That savory egg custard, too, is from Urakaze. Ah, that grilled fish is from me, Isokaze. Is it good?
320.H2100: 2100. Thank goodness for Urakaze... Cooking is hard.
320.H2200: 2200. So it's time. Good, it's time for night battle practice. 17th Destroyer Squadron, everyone gather all around!
320.H2300: 2300. Commander, thank you for your work today. I look forward to another fine day tomorrow.

170.Intro: I'm destroyer Hamakaze. Henceforth I shall be assigned to your fleet.
170.Library: I am Hamakaze. I participated in many fierce battles. At Leyte, I was a part of Kongou's ring formation. Futhermore, I burned into my memory the final moments of Musashi, Kongou and Shinano. At the fateful Bounomisaki, I, Yukikaze and many others struggled to protect Yamato.
170.Poke(1): The breeze is pleasant again today, isn't it?
170.Poke(2): Shinano... this time I'll keep you safe.
170.Poke(3): Nn...! What is it, Admiral!? What... just what are you doing with my armaments?
170.Wedding: Admiral. If it's about matchmaking, don't you think there are plenty of other girls you can ask who are more into that? ...Eh? Me? N-No! I... this sort of thing... b-but, I'll face it head-on, study it, and put all of my effort into it... okay...?
170.Docking(2): Let's proceed with repairs before it's too late.
170.Construction: The construction seems to be completed.
170.Return: The mission has ended. The fleet has returned.
170.Sortie: Yukikaze, I'm heading out... Hamakaze, setting sail!
170.Battle: I've found us... a worthy opponent!
170.Yasen(1): Having only anti-air battles is boring, you know?
170.MVP: I'm not an amateur who would get worked up over a victory. We can't let our guard down yet. Next up is maintenance, yes?
170.Damaged(1): Kuh! I can still protect them!
170.Damaged(3): This pain is nothing... Kongou and Shinano went through much worse! I will make it to Bounomisaki... I won't lose...!
170.Sunk: Once again... at Yamato's side... I'm going... to...
170.NewYears 6547: Admiral, best wishes for the coming year. I will be counting on you again this... year.
170.Setsubun 6547: It's Setsubun. I'd like to throw some beans with Isokaze. ...Ah, I'll go look for her.
170.Valentines 6547: Um... Admiral. Um... if you... if you'd be willing to accept this... I'd be... happy...
170.Rainy 6547: Hydrangea flowers? I like them, too. I think blue flowers are lovely. They calm me down.
170.Fall 6547: Admiral, you said you wanted to go to the base's Fall Festival with me? Ah, okay. In a yukata? All right, please give me a moment.
170.Fall 1471: Admiral, this Fall Festival is... *nom nom* *nom nom* ...so delicious, isn't it? I'm really enjoying it.
170.Xmas 6547: C-Christmas... It's Christmas, Admiral. Ah... this... is a present from everyone in DesDiv17... yeah.
170.YearsEnd 6547: It's December, and the naval base is having its end of year cleanup. 17th Destroyer Division, on cleaning duty. Orders accepted.

312.Intro: I'm destroyer Hamakaze. Henceforth commencing fleet duties.
312.Poke(2): The 17th Destroyer Division? Ah... yes. They're important comrades of mine. They're very... dear to me.
312.Idle: Umm... excuse me! Is it time... for the next battle yet?
312.Married: Is anything wrong? Are you feeling tired? Mm, shall I prepare something nutritious for you? Will you eat it?
312.Join: Hamakaze of the 17th Destroyer Division, sortieing!
312.Docking(2): I've sustained severe damage... I'll be in the docks for a while... nn... with your permission, please.
312.Attack: Well then, I'll begin. Destroyer Hamakaze, opening fire!
312.Yasen(2): I'll hold out to the very end!!
312.Damaged(2): Nooooo! Nn... I'm fine... I can... still move...

169.Intro: Admiral, I'm Tanikaze! I'll be in your care from now on.
169.Library: Madam Tanikaze here! I was helpin' out Hiryuu during the Battle of Midway, damn enemy planes were dropping bombs on us like rain... Back then, C'mmander Katsumi was amazin' like seriously.
169.Poke(3): What's going on? Do you want "There there, a good boy"?
169.Married: Admiral, what's up? Are you tired?
169.Wedding: What a strange admiral you are to be interested in me, Tanikaze! Then, tell me how you get to love me from the beginning. Hehe, it's fine, the night is long, you know.
169.Ranking: A report is coming to you, Admiral!
169.Join: Just leave it to Tanikaze! Sortie!
169.Supply: Eeeek! Thanks to it, I CON win!
169.Docking(2): I love taking a bath... a bath...
169.Construction: A new ship seems to be ready!
169.Return: The fleet has returned! Goood job!
169.Battle: Shelling and torpedo attack, now let's start!
169.MVP: Even though you may not imagine it, I Tanikaze is very alert, right? Bombs can't hit me, I suppose!
169.Damaged(3): No kidding! Nobody wants to see a figure like this...
169.Sunk: Even I, Tanikaze can't avoid it... It can't be help. I dare... to be sunk, eek...
169.NewYears 6547: Have a Happy New Year, Admiral! We're only going to get better this year! Mm! We'll be fine!
169.Setsubun 6547: Wow! So it's Setsubun! It's really trending, huh~? Who should I throw at? ...Hamakaze? Ah!?
169.Valentines 6547: Yo, Admiral~! Have some of this. This is chocolate I made myself! It's great!
169.Rainy 6547: It rains often during this season. When you carefully listen to the sound of the rain, it's not all that bad.
169.Fall 6547: So summer is finally over, huh. Kinda sad, you know? Yeah, well, it's okay. There's gonna be another summer next year anyway, right?
169.Xmas 6547: Ohh, it's Christmas? Nice, Christmas~! E-Eh... this "turkey" thing.... I wanna try eating it!
169.YearsEnd 6547: Kah...! It's already December! That was so fast! Oh...! I gotta finish with the end of year cleaning...! I can't wait for the New Year's Eve Soba~ ...Right♪

313.Idle: Eeeeeek! I'm bored anyway. Why not go somewhere to have a night battle?

415.Intro: Kagerou-class Destroyer, Nowaki, reporting in. Well, Commander. Let us proceed.
415.Library: Kagerou-class destroyer number 15, Nowaki. Born in Maizuru. I was with Maikaze in the 4th DesDiv. At the start of the war, I participated in the Southern Operation in the Fourth Torpedo Squadron under Naka-san, as well as Midway, Mariana, and Leyte. I will do my best with whatever I can.
415.Poke(2): Hm? Commander, do you have a request?
415.Poke(3): Maikaze, stop it... Commander? ...What is the meaning of this?
415.Idle: Maikaze, what are you up to...? Are you well...? Ah, Commander! I'm alright! Nowaki, on standby!
415.Married: Commander, are you perhaps tired?... don't overwork yourself, please, take a rest.
415.Wedding: Commander, what is it? Maikaze is waiting so I have to go back... eh?... this is... uhm... I have to report to Naka-san... eh?... it is not needed?
415.Equip(2): This is good... With this, I feel like I can keep going.
415.Supply: Thank goodness... Now I can fight.
415.Docking(1): Just let me... rest a bit.
415.Docking(2): I'm sorry... As soon as I've recovered, I'll return to the front.
415.Return: The fleet has returned. Good work.
415.Battle: Fourth Torpedo Squadron, attack! Follow me!
415.Yasen(1): We'll do it! All ships, attack!
415.Yasen(2): I'm not finished! You haven't seen anything yet!
415.MVP: Haa... Thank goodness. That's right, Maikaze. This is the strength of the 4th DesDiv!
415.Damaged(3): They got me... I-I can still move. I won't... sink yet!
415.Sunk: No good... I'm sinking... Chikuma-san... I'm sorry... I... hh...
415.NewYears 6547: Happy New Year, Commander! I'm so thankful for what you've done in the last year. I'll be counting on you again this year.
415.Setsubun 6547: In Setsubun, is it better to throw the beans... or is it better to eat them? Eh? You do both?
415.Anniversary 6547: I see... today is a special day. Commander, that's great, really...
415.Xmas 6547: Christ... mas...? This is... this is cake? *nom nom* Mm... it's sweet... and delicious...

329.Poke(2): Commander, is it possible that... you could stop calling me Nowacchi?
329.Yasen(2): Compared to Mariana or Leyte, this is nothing!
329.MVP: That's... that's right! Maikaze, you saw it! This is the ability of the 4th DesDiv!
329.H0000: Commander, Nowaki will be serving as your secretary ship for today. I will be in your care.
329.H0100: 0100. Commander, it is the late night.
329.H0200: 0200. Commander, it is now the hour of ushimitsu.
329.H0300: 0300. Commander, you're not tired? How impressive!
329.H0400: 0400. Commander, are you even understanding the meaning of my words? Wow, very impressive!
329.H0500: 0500. It's morning. We should prepare to wake everyone else soon.
329.H0600: 0600. Morning. Nowaki shall begin preparations for breakfast.
329.H0700: 07...00. Ah, excuse me, I got engrossed in preparing breakfast... Today is a Japanese breakfast. Please, help yourself.
329.H0800: 0800. How did you like my breakfast? Ah, is that so, excellent.
329.H0900: 0900. Soon, our Fourth Destroyer Squadron will sortie in full force as well. Commander, your orders!
329.H1000: 1000. Maikaze, dancing around all the time like that is dangerous... Ah, Commander, I'm sorry!
329.H1100: 1100. Commander, it will be noon soon. What will you have? Nowaki will follow your orders.
329.H1200: 1200... Ah, Akagi-san. And to what do we owe the plea- Eh? Lunch? Y, yes! Help yourself!
329.H1300: 1300. That surprised me back then. Excuse me... No, I'm fine.
329.H1400: 1400. Well, let's do our best with the afternoon's missions too. Commander, what's next?
329.H1500: 1500. Maikaze, I'm sorry, I'm working right now... Haah, it can't be helped... Jeez.
329.H1600: 1600. Commander, excuse me. I'll be fine. It won't have any effect on the fleet's duties.
329.H1700: 1700. Soon the sun will fall, huh. Commander, the setting sun... is a bit sad, huh.
329.H1800: 1800. I will handle the preparations for dinner. How would steak be, every once in a while?
329.H1900: 1900. I tried a little harder at dinner. Commander, how is the taste?
329.H2000: 2000. Commander, it's best to exercise a little after dinner, exercise.
329.H2100: 21... Ah, Tone-san, Chikuma-san! Chikuma-san, I'm perfectly fine.
329.H2200: 2200. Commander, it's a quiet night. It would be nice if all nights could be like this, huh.
329.H2300: 2300. Commander, thank you very much for today's hard work. Nowaki will try her best tomorrow as well!

454.Intro: Yo, I'm the 16th Kagerou-class Destroyer, Arashi!
454.Library: I'm the 16th ship in the Kagerou-class Destroyer line. I was part of the Fourth Destroyer Squadron, and was an asset to the Fourth Torpedo Squadron. At Midway, I was assigned as an escort to the Nagumo Carrier Task Force. After that, I also did occasional stints at the frontline as needed......Remember me... and my comrades of the Fourth Destroyer Squadron. Please.
454.Poke(1): What do you want? All right, leave things to me!
454.Poke(2): Hm? Commander, what's up? You lonely? Ya can't be, haha.
454.Poke(3): Hagi, cut that out! I'm ticklish! Oho! ... Oh, oh...? If it isn't the commander!
454.Idle: Man, how boring is this... my body'll get weak... Commander, just what are ya doin'... Oh? Seems like you're pretty busy, huh. Well, guess I'll just have to wait for a while.
454.Married: What's up, Commander? Are you tired or something? Hmm... doesn't seem like it... Well then, shall we rest a while? I'll lend you my lap to use as a pillow. Come on over. It's all right, to take a rest once in a while... you know.
454.Wedding: What's up, Commander? You called for me? You sure you didn't mistake me for Hagi? Ah... are you really ok choosing me? R... really? What's with the formality...it's embarrassing. Eh... to put this on my finger? Ah... Ahaha... It seems a bit a bit inappropriate... but thank you for treating me so warmly!
454.Ranking: Oh, you wanted to see the intel? Important stuff! Here ya go.
454.Join: The flagship of the Fourth Destroyer Squadron, Arashi, is sortieing forth! Follow me, everyone!
454.Equip(1): Nice, I'm fired up! Thank you!
454.Equip(2): Ah. I have to wreck those submarines I underestimated earlier. Some depth charges, please.
454.Docking(1): I'll go take a bath. All right?
454.Docking(2): These wounds hurt. A bath is what I really wanted. Commander, wanna join me?
454.Return: The operation is concluded. The fleet has returned.
454.Sortie: It's time for the Kagerou-class Destroyer, Arashi, to make my appearance! Ahh...the storm is rising, just watch!
454.Battle: Enemy ships spotted, get ready for the battle. Begin... fire!
454.Attack: Well the, it's time for me to do it! I'll raise a storm!
454.Yasen(1): Now, it's time for night battle. Cautiously yet boldly...storming in!
454.Yasen(2): The mighty Fourth Destroyer Division, coming through! Eat this!
454.MVP: Hehe~. Was the risen storm branded into your vision? Yeah, it's thanks to the commander and everyone.
454.Damaged(1): Gahh! Where did that come from!
454.Damaged(2): Wh, what is it, what is it!? Where's the enemy!?
454.Damaged(3): Tch! What's with you doing as you please... however... I haven't sunk yet!
454.Sunk: I'm... I'm sinking...? Hagi... until next time... Shigure... after this... I'll leave it to you...
454.NewYears 6547: Commander, Happy New Year! I and everyone in Div 4 are gonna be countin' on ya again this year. Now, let's raise some hell! Hagi, Nowacchi, Mai, let's move!
454.Setsubun 6547: Demons, bego~ne...! Fortune, wel~come...! So who's the demon this year~? Eh? Uhh... it's Sendai-san!? Ah... that's not an easy target... Well, whatever. Take this!
454.Valentines 6547: H-Hey, Commander. This is for you. ...W-Well, it's not really a big deal. Don't read too much into it.
454.Valentines 1471: Commander, that package from before... have you opened it? Ah... not yet? I-I see... No, I don't really mind! Not really...
454.Rainy 6547: Gosh... it's still raining. If it keeps on raining, I feel like my body will rust. How are you holding up, Commander?
454.EarlySummer 6547: Woah. Mai, you seem so energetic. Eh? You're going to buy swimsuits with Nowacchi? Hmmmm...
454.Summer 6547: Hagi, what's up? Eh... wear a swimsuit... to the beach? Sure, count me in. Commander, you coming, too?
454.Fall 6547: Alriiiight! I made it through the nights in summer! Now I should be fine! Shigure, Sendai-san... I've won!!!!
454.Saury 6547: What is...? Everyone is polishing searchlights and Type 3s. What's this for? What are you starting?
454.Cold 6547: *achoo* Ugh, it got cold out of nowhere. Commander, did you catch a cold? *achoo*
454.Xmas 6547: Merry Christmas, Commander. Everyone in the fourth has a present for ya! Ready, girls? One, two... RAWR! Ah... we made him mad...
454.YearsEnd 6547: Shigure... what's everyone doing? Cleaning? I see, I see... Eh? I also have to help? Seriously...?

354.Intro: Commander, take care of me, 'kay! It's great 'ta meet 'ya!
354.Join: The flagship of the Fourth Destroyer Squadron, Arashi, is sortieing forth! Let's go bravely, everyone!
354.Docking(1): Hagi...? Hagi? Did you call for me? Was that... my imagination?
354.H0000: Aah, Commander, what's up, seems like Arashi'll be your secretary ship for today. Yeah, leave timekeeping to me. It just turned midnight now, yep.
354.H0100: It's 0100, Commander. Night... the night can put you a bit on edge, huh. Just a little bit... right?
354.H0200: It just turned 0200, Commander. What's up, you were going through the docs? Reading through 'em must be drag, your eyes'll go bad. Here, use this searchlight...
354.H0300: It's 0300, Commander. Ah... now's a pretty good time to just chill out.
354.H0400: It's 0400. There's somethin' about the dead of night that makes me feel feel weird... ah, ya don't think so? That so... Commander, you're pretty cool. You're one of Sendai's buddies, huh.
354.H0500: 0500! Mornin's a'comin', mornin'! YEAH! It's MORNING! Commander, IT'S MORNING!
354.H0600: It's 0600! Fleet, reveille! Commander, it's time for some food! Hurry up and get some breakfast ready! ...eh? Me? ME!?
354.H0700: It's 0700... I was listenin' to how Hagi would do it, but what do we got to eat right now...? Ah, for the time being, we've got some Miso soup and rice, and for later, we've got dried fish!
354.H0800: 0800. My cooking... how was it? Surprisingly good? Is... is that so, yeah, of course! Don't underestimate Fourth Destroyer Division, heh, heheheheheh, heheh!
354.H0900: It's 0900, Commander. Alright, Fourth Destroyer Division, round up! So we won't lose in night battle (?), we'll commence special training! First off...
354.H1000: It's 1000, Commander. The Fourth... (?) Yeah, we're always ready for the frontlines. Just leave it to us!
354.H1100: It's 1100. ...Oh, seems like the torpedo squadron'll be on sortie. OK, who's the flagship!? Naka-san? No way, Jintsuu-san? Eh... ehh!? SENDAI-SAN!?
354.H1200: Oh-tweeellve-huundreedd! Hey Commander, it's lunch, so let's get a big helpin' of curry! Ashigara-san'll be at Mamiya's today. Let's go!
354.H1300: 1300... Yeeah, that was good... the katsu curry was real good! Now that was some good stuff. "So with that, victory!" ...is what I'm thinkin'. Hahaah... I'm stuffed, stuffed!
354.H1400: Fourteen hundre-... ooh, Nowachi! How ya doin'? Ooh, I'm feelin' great. Commander 'n me make a great pair... ain't that right, Commander? Wait - That's ain't it!
354.H1500: It's 1500, Commander. Ahh, talk about about the First Carrier Division's final moments? ...It was a horrible thing. Fighting a battle lost. No matter the time... it was just horrible.
354.H1600: Sixteen-hundre... ah, Shoukaku-san! Welcome back! Yes, I'm doing fine! It'd be great to go out on sortie with you! Yes! I'll be looking forward to it!
354.H1700: It's 1700, Commander. The sunset sure is beautiful, isn't it... What's this - it's as if I'm being taken aback by it, like I'm gonna be moved to tears. Ah-wh, what...?
354.H1800: 1800. Commander, how about some dinner? I'll be the one to put it together again? I've been looking at this recipe. Let's see... Fuu, ka, de, pi... hm, fu? Fu... well, now...
354.H1900: Nineteen-hundre... oh, Kagerou-nee! Eh, you've got some food for us? (sniff sniff) Ah! This smells amazing! Is this really okay? You've saved us! Commander, dinner has arrived!
354.H2000: 2000. Kagerou-nee brought this soup, "cla-m chowder-" ...is it? (sip) Hm... mm... the rice works surprisingly well here! Delicious! Let's chow down!
354.H2100: 2100... What's up with this time of day... I've got a bad premonition about it. Hah-, Sendai-san! Eh, ye-, yes! About the night sortie, I'll be sure to attend it...
354.H2200: 2200. Stay on full alert... eh, Shigure, did you just say something!? Th-the enemy!? Evade! Evade! Regroup for a counterattack! Damn it!!
354.H2300: 2300. We've returned, I still have my own legs, just in case. Wh, what is it!? I wasn't crying, I'm fine, Commander! What's with you, jeez...

455.Intro: Hagikaze, 17th Ship of the Kagerou-class Destroyer, reporting! Commander, please give me your orders!
455.Library: I am Hagikaze, the 17th ship of the Kagerou-class Destroyer. I was born in Uraga. I worked diligently as part of the Fourth Destroyer Division with Arashi. Being the escort of the Nagumo Taskforce, I took part in the unforgiving battle in the Solomon Islands. I was with Arashi on my last night to. Please remember us, the Fourth Destroyer Division.
455.Poke(2): Commander, if there is anything I can do, please let me know. I will do my best.
455.Poke(3): Listen, listen! You know what!? Oh, my! Commander! I'm such an idiot. I'm s-sorry!
455.Idle: Commander, did you see Arashi? Huh, you haven't? Come on, what in the world is she up to? I will give her a good talk about this next time.
455.Married: Commander? Huh? “Are you fine with the night now?” Yes. I still can't get myself to like the night, but I am okay now. Commander can you put your hand here please. It calms me.
455.Wedding: Commander? What's up? Do you have something for the Fourth Destroyer Division? Should I go get Arashi? Huh, that's not it? Me? This is…!? Th-Thank you! I… will cherish it greatly!
455.Ranking: Commander. Ah, you want to check the situation? Roger that. I will bring you the report.
455.Join: Fourth Destroyer Division, Hagikaze! Setting sail!
455.Equip(1): This equipment, I'm happy for it.
455.Equip(2): I am not that fond of the night.
455.Supply: Thank you. I am ready to go again.
455.Docking(1): Sorry for causing such trouble, Commander. I will take a short leave from the ranks.
455.Docking(2): The night… The night is still haunting. When I enter the bath, it just comes back to me.
455.Construction: Construction of a new ship has been completed. Wonderful!
455.Return: The fleet is returning. Welcome back, everyone!
455.Sortie: Ready, everyone? Fleet, Flagship Hagikaze, leaving port!
455.Battle: Enemies… Where are the enemies? F-Found them! Enemy vessel sighted! Fleet, ready torpedoes and guns portside!
455.Yasen(1): The night… The night sea is scary! But for now, I must go! All ships, forward!
455.Yasen(2): Open fire! Hagikaze, engaging the enemy!
455.MVP: Huh? Me? Hagikaze is… the MVP? That's all thanks to everyone from the Fourth. Thanks, everyone.
455.Damaged(2): What!? N-no! Can I keep going?
455.Damaged(3): Hyaaa! D-did the rudder get hit!? Can it be fixed? Please!
455.Sunk: With this wound… there is no hope of returning… Arashi!? I... will be leaving you here. Good… bye.
455.NewYears 6547: Commander, best wishes for the coming year! The Fourth Destroyer Division will be counting on your leadership again this year. Ah, and so will I.
455.Setsubun 6547: Sendai-san, are you really the demon for this year's Setsubun? Will it be okay? Ah, well, here's the mask... Ah...! Arashi! Ahhh, you idiot!
455.Valentines 6547: Alright! The low-sugar, healthy chocolate is done! Now to wrap it up nicely... Ufufu♪ ...Alright!
455.Valentines 1471: Commander! ...A-Arashi? Eh? Was Arashi giving the commander chocolate as well..? Even so, I won't give up here. Commander, um—!
455.Rainy 6547: I... really love it... the color of the Hydrangea flowers. Even though they're so pretty, I've heard that Hydrangeas have poison in them. How intriguing, isn't it, Commander? Commander?
455.EarlySummer 6547: Maikaze, you're going to buy a swimsuit? With Nowaki? I should go with Arashi... On second thought, she probably has no interest...
455.Summer 6547: Arashi, you're not coming to the beach along with the Commander? It's summer, so why not wear a swimsuit? Ehhhh... not interested!?
455.Fall 6547: Summer passed in the blink of an eye and it's already fall! Commander, I'm currently studying up on healthy autumn cuisine.
455.Xmas 6547: Commander, Merry Christmas! I tried making a healthier cake. I used less sugar and butter in it. Ah, is that okay with you? By all means! Say "ahhhh"...
455.YearsEnd 6547: Umm... after I finish cleaning, I need to get the New Year's Eve soba ready. Is tempura using winter vegetables fine with you?

355.Intro: Hagikaze, Fourth Destroyer Division, in position. Commander, please give me your orders!
355.Join: Fourth Destroyer Division, First Platoon, Hagikaze! Leaving port!
355.Equip(2): The night, I… No, it's fine!
355.Docking(2): Fwah. When I get into the bath like this… Huh? I wonder if the commander remembered to get some food.
355.Yasen(1): The night… The night sea is dangerous. But I will continue on! All ships, follow me! It's night battle!
355.H0000: Commander, the date has just changed. Today I, Hagikaze, will be the secretary ship. I'm counting on your guidance.
355.H0100: It's 01:00. Commander, night is after all a bit... scary isn't it? Ah, no! It's alright!
355.H0200: Commander, it's 02:00. Is the commander completely fine with nights? As expected of the commander!
355.H0300: It's 03:...00. *Scream* Co-Commander, please don't surprise me like that. I get really scared after all...jeez~.
355.H0400: 04:...00. Soon... Won't it become morning soon? Morning Sun... hurry!
355.H0500: 05:00! Commander, it's morning! It's dawn you know! I'll go prepare breakfast, alright? Huh? It's still too early?
355.H0600: It's 06:00. The fleet, all hands, get up! It's mo~rning! Commander, this time for sure I'll go prepare breakfast. Please wait!
355.H0700: 07:00. Here~, Hagikaze's healthy morning meal! Wheat rice with a precious vegetables side dish, burdock and tofu miso sauce and pickles! Enjoy your meal♪
355.H0800: It's 08:00. Commander, Please wait a bit while I clean up the dishes. Mornings are nice aren't they~, Mornings, I like them!
355.H0900: It's 09:00. Commander, sorry to have kept you waiting. Which mission will you start with first today? Or will you observe a ship's remodelling?
355.H1000: 10:0-...Ah! Nowaki, Maikaze, thank you for your hard work. Ah, Arashi? No, I haven't seen her. Next time, let's have a girl's meet with all of DesDiv 4. Commander, will you participate?
355.H1100: It's 11:00. Commander, what will you have for lunch? How about Hagikaze's special root vegetable curry? Is it really ok? Yes, Please wait!
355.H1200: 12:00. Commander, please enjoy the special root vegetable curry♪ It's main point is the combination of the carrots, burdock, wild yam and lotus root. It's also good for your health.
355.H1300: It's 13:00. Commander, the special root vegetable curry was surprisingly delicious wasn't it? It's also good for the bowels. I'll make it again next time.
355.H1400: It's 14:00. Commander...? Ah, the escort and relief of the special aircraft carrier? ...yeah... but, I believe that somewhere in this ocean, we'll meet again.
355.H1500: 15:0-...Ah, Kaga! On that occasion...Oh, no, I'm sorry. U-Um... Ah, yes! Thank you very much! I'll work hard!
355.H1600: 16:00. It's right, I couldn't protect... yes, Nisshin too... But... But! I believe... that we'll meet again. Yes!
355.H1700: Ah... Sorry Commander, I was stuck admiring the sunset. The current time is 17:00.
355.H1800: It's 18:00. Commander, what will you have for dinner? Is it alright if I do it again...Eh? Sendai will...with Me and Arashi? *groan*
355.H1900: 19:00. Excuse me Admiral. DesDiv4 along with the light cruiser Sendai will sortie in a transport mission. Um, I'm sorry it is little, but I left some rice balls for you. If you want them.
355.H2000: 20:00. Sendai, Shigure, Kawakaze, DesDiv4's Arashi and Hagikaze are attached to the navigation order. At the local, it'll become a nighttime breakthrough...
355.H2100: 21:00. This night... I have a bad, bad feeling... Everyone, be careful! Eh? Shigure, what is it? Eh!? Enemies!? An ambush!?
355.H2200: It's... 22:...00. Somehow... somehow we survived this night. Shigure, Kawakaze, thank you. Nights are...scary after all
355.H2300: It's 23:00. Admiral. Hagikaze, DesDiv4, have safely returned. ...Ah, you ate the rice balls didn't you? Again... I'll make them again, ok?

122.Intro: Hello~! Kagerou-class destroyer, Maikaze! I'm not good in gloomy atmospheres!
122.Library: Kagerou-class destroyer Maikaze! From Midway to the Southern Operations, I continued to dance across the battlefield. I'm good friends with Nowaki, a fellow Kagerou-class. When Truk Island was attacked, I almost made it.
122.Poke(1): Go~od morning! Wait, what time is it? Ah, I't doesn't m~atter!
122.Poke(3): O~h, the admiral's in high spirits? Why don't we have a dance~?
122.Married: Admiral~ come and dance with me~!
122.Wedding: This is something I can only say to you, Admiral... truthfully, I can't help being scared... so I distract myself by dancing... But, with the admiral by my side, everything is alright... can I stay close to you some more...?
122.Equip(1): You know, I'm getting too strong!
122.Equip(2): Remodeled ships are hu~ge!... just kidding.
122.Supply: I can dance some more now!
122.Docking(2): I danced too much~... Thanks for the full-body massage~
122.Return: My elite fleet has come back to port~!
122.Battle: Okay! Let's have a magnificent dance!
122.Yasen(1): Right there, a big jump and turn!
122.MVP: Admiral!... will you dance with me the next time too?
122.Damaged(2): No... I can't dance well now...
122.Damaged(3): This... If I dance, you'll see it!
122.Sunk: Where's... Nowaki? Help me~. I hate it... I hate sinking!
122.H0200: 2 A.M, huh~. About time to sleep, yeah?
122.H0300: It's 3 A.M. Your skin's going to get bad, probably~
122.H0400: 4 A.M, Admiral~ It's almost really morning, you know~
122.H0600: It's Morning! It's 6 A.M.! Admiral, let's prepare breakfast, okay?
122.H0800: It's now 8 A.M! Let's do our best today too!
122.H0900: 9 o'clock. Maikaze wants to dance soo~n.
122.H1000: It's 10 A.M. It's a nice wind, yes?
122.H1100: It's 11 A.M! I've been getting hungry~ maybe~....
122.H1300: It's 1 P.M. You have to move after eating, come on, a-one-two!
122.H1600: It's 4 P.M. Just about evening, right?
122.H1800: It's 6 P.M! What should be do for dinner? I think that something like cutlet would be great~!
122.H1900: It's 7 P.M! Admiral, it's Dinner time! Work, Kancolle, take a break!
122.H2100: Maikaze's 9 P.M. announcement. It's almost night battle time!
122.H2200: 10 P.M! Night-dancing time. Going to a night battle?
122.H2300: It's now 11 P.M.~. Admiral, it's okay to take a break soon, yeah?
122.NewYears 6547: Best wishes for the coming year, Admiral. Let's dance together again this year! Okay?
122.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun, huh... Alright~ I'll be the demon then! One-two, one-two~♪ Fufu, you can't hit me~♪
122.Valentines 6547: Here, Admiral! You'll have some of my chocolate, won't you? Here, it's for you. Have some, have some!
122.Anniversary 6547: Admiral, today is a nice, important day. Dance with Maikaze~ Now, one, two~
122.Rainy 6547: It's the rainy season. *sigh*... Nowacchi, want to dance on a day like this? Eh? No because it's too cramped? How petty!
122.EarlySummer 6547: Summer is almost here, huh, Admiral? What dance steps should I use for summer? Hmm... what style do I use... Admiral, what do you think?
122.Summer 6547: Summer has arrived~. Alright, one, two...! Ah, Katori! Shall we dance together again?
122.Fall 6547: Nowacchi, Nowacchi! It's fall. Fall means delicious potatoes. Ah, but you gotta watch your weight!
122.Xmas 6547: Admiral, it's Christmas! Christmas! Let's dance, shall we? One-two, one-two♪ Ahaha!

132.Intro: Akigumo, reporting for duty~ Look after me Admiral~
132.Library: Yokosuka born and raised, I'm Akigumo! I'm in the the Kagerou-class, but my (overwhelming) cruising range caught the eye of Adm. Nagumo and so I joined the 1st CarDiv.
