I mean, I always thought I was a Yuugumo-class... (even our uniforms are the same)... *grumble, mutter*... ah, whatever. After that, I was assigned to guard the 5th CarDiv. I didn't get to finish drawing Shoukaku and Zuikaku, though...
132.Poke(2): What what? Sexual harrasment? Is that okay?
132.Poke(3): Hmmh~mm. If you want to play with me that much, then why don't I sketch you? If you look at it this way, you can see the artistic sensibilities! Hmmh~mm♪
132.Idle: Waaaa! That's it! It's almost the submission deadline, isn't it! I can't just sit around!
132.Married: Admiral, are you beat? Well then, Akigumo will draw a picture of you♪
132.Wedding: At last the admiral has been caught by my charm~? Ju~st kidding! But I wonder what kind of picture the future of me and the admiral would be… Should I seriously try drawing a thin book? Wouldn't it be great?
132.Ranking: A report has arrived for the admiral. Hmm, gonna read it?
132.Equip(2): Mmm, yeah, equipment is important, you know.
132.Docking(1): Even Akigumo needs some repairs, yeah? I'll draw an illustration in the bath~
132.Docking(2): Going for a long bath~. Geez, those guys~ After I'm fixed, I'll return it twice over!
132.Construction: A new shipdaughter~ Admiral likes them too, yeah?
132.Return: The fleet has come back. Good work!
132.Sortie: You wanna order one of my illustrations?
132.Battle: All of you who are waiting, welcome!
132.Attack: Battleship class... I wanna beat them up~
132.Yasen(1): The night's so dark that I can't draw very well, you know~ Let's fire up the searchlights!
132.Yasen(2): Makigumo, look, look! Attacking is like th~is, yeah?
132.MVP: Lo~ok, I can do things that even battleships and heavy cruisers can't, you know. Oh, do you have a sketchbook?
132.Damaged(1): Woah! A hit like this won't penetrate me!
132.Damaged(3): I won't able to draw like this~!
132.Sunk: Hey, my resting place... will anybody sketch it out...
132.H0000: It's 0 o'clock. Are you okay? You ain't spacing out?
132.H0100: 1 at night, looks like you're still going, yeah?
132.H0200: It's 2 o'clock, I'm a night owl too, so it's fine~ I'll stay with you while I write out a manuscript!
132.H0300: It's 3 o'clock, but... are you alright? Will you be okay at your job tomorrow?
132.H0400: It's 4 A.M. At resting times you rest! At drawing times you draw! That's what the great circles do, yeah?
132.H0500: 5 A.M... And that's why I sleep from morning to mid~day...Zzz
132.H0600: It's finally 6 in the Morning, huh.... Admiral~ I'm gonna borrow a futon~ G'night~
132.H0700: 7o'clock... As I feared, it's bright so I can't sleep... What ever will I do...
132.H0800: 8 o'clock. I'll be able to do a manuscript 'cause I ate breakfast... Admiral, bread or rice in the morning, what kinda guy are you?
132.H0900: 9 o'clock, huh... a~nyway, flipping around the front cover and submit first and then off for training!
132.H1000: It's now 10 o'clock~ Are you making progress on your work, Admiral?
132.H1100: 11. With that said, Admiral, what kind of girl do you like the most?
132.H1200: Lunch~! When this time comes around, it's UkiUkiWatching time!... Ah, d-don't mind me...
132.H1300: 1 P.M... 'Lunch time' somehow sounds fun, yeah?... What'cha eating?
132.H1400: 2 P.M... Well, let's do the afternoon sortie!
132.H1500: 3 P.M! Admiral Ranks, check 'em! It'd be great if it's gone up, yes?
132.H1600: 4 P.M. Almost time for the sun to go down... If it gets dark, you can't really draw, you know?
132.H1700: 5 P.M. Hah-... Even though I'm, always fighting, I somehow really want to draw a carrier sinking... Why?
132.H1800: 6 P.M... I'm hungry~ I wanna eat canned beef, yeah, canned beef... Admiral, open up a can, will ya?
132.H1900: 7 P.M. Yeah, canned beef with silver chalis is great!
132.H2000: 8 P.M... For this evening's performance, of course the searchlight will be lit!
132.H2100: 9 P.M. Makigumo's 'Sleep, Sleep!' is so annoying~. Why does she do it?
132.H2200: 10 P.M. I'm tired, so I just be borrowing a futon~ Getting in with me is for.bid.den!
132.H2300: 11 P.M. Just a moment's sleep! Zzzz~... This is just practice, one more time.... Admiral, you too.. go sleep!
132.NewYears 6547: Admiral! Happy New Year! Akigumo-san is relying on you again this year! Alright... it's time for the first illustration of the year! Admiral, don't move, don't move!
132.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun, huh~? A ship girl who is eating ehoumaki is such a picturesque thing. Alright! Let's try drawing them. Kumano-san, then~ Hm, hm... Uh? E-Ehhhh!?
132.Hina 6547: Ohhh! A Hina stand, huh? Nice! We're making progress! If everyone in the Kagerou-class were Hina Dolls... No, let's not. That's way too painful. Well, whatever! It's all good, right?
132.Rainy 6547: The rainy season is so boring... eh? What? So everyone is making teru teru bozu? Then I'll make some from scratch. Now, for the paint...
132.EarlySummer 6547: Hoho, it's almost summer. What's everyone up to? Getting their swimsuits ready? I have to prepare! Time to stock up on drawing materials at the base exchange, hehe!
132.Summer 6547: Ah, that pose is good. That angle... don't move... Oh, right there works♪ Just a minute, I'll take a reference picture... uhhyoyo~♪ It's here— summer!
132.Fall 6547: Fall has come around, huuuh? Oh well. The time between summer and winter is short, so you'd better be ready! But I guess fall is an easy time to let your guard doooown♪ I'll have a potato.
132.Saury 6547: Saury fishing support fleet, huuuh. How moving of us... except not at all... Ah, that's Yuubari-san. That's awesome— the way she yells as she loads her gun... ...Rough cut.
132.Xmas 6547: *nom* Admiral, this turkey is good! It tastes so good! It's insane how good this is turkey is! Eh? Zuikaku-san, what's up? From above!? W-Woah! Evasive action!
132.YearsEnd 6547: Eh, what? Why do I have to help with the Yuugumo-class' cleaning? Eh, what's with this cloth? I'm telling you! I need to sleep early to wake up in time to get to Ariake!

133.Intro: First ship of the Yuugumo-class, Yuugumo, has arrived. Admiral, it's okay to spoil me a bit.
133.Library: First ship of the final mass-production destroyers. Laid down in Maizuru. My first battle was the ignominious defeat at Midway. It's okay, I don't mind. In the Tokyo Express to that island, Operation Ke, the Battle of the Santa Cruz Islands and the evacuation of Kiska, I fought bravely, no? *sigh*
133.Poke(2): Admiral, let's do our best together.
133.Poke(3): Yes yes what is it~? Admiral, Makigumo, you're so fond of skinship, no?
133.Idle: Aren't you tired Admiral? Yuugumo is quite worried you know...
133.Married: Admiral~ is it not a good time to take a quick break?
133.Wedding: Ah, Admiral~, your hat is askance again. You're the commander of such a big fleet, please do look the part. Just how much do I have to look after you… eh? It's fine to keep on doing it? Well, that's・just・lovely♡
133.Ranking: A report from headquarters. Please examine it.
133.Join: Destroyer Yuugumo, going with full force!
133.Equip(1): Many thanks, I will use it well.
133.Equip(2): Yuugumo is being remodeled. No peeping.
133.Docking(2): Sorry, I might have to be in the bath for a while. I've been a bit exhausted lately.
133.Construction: A new ship has been launched, no?
133.Return: The fleet has returned from the operation.
133.Yasen(1): Mi~ss Makigumo, If you are talking about a night battle, this is how you do it!
133.Yasen(2): I say this gonna be quite interesting.
133.MVP: Admiral, choosing me was a good idea, yes?
133.Damaged(1): Ah... Armour, I don't really have any, yes?
133.Damaged(2): Kya! This level... I can still go on!
133.Damaged(3): Kyaaaa! Now you've really done it.... I-I'll return this twice over!
133.Sunk: Oh... I'm sinking too, no? Admiral... thanks for everything... up to now... See you... later...
133.H0100: It's 1 A.M... Zzz... Oh, please excuse me.
133.H0200: It is now 2 A.M. You have to go to sleep, yes?
133.H0300: It's 3 A.M. I just can't leave the admiral by himself...
133.H0400: 4 A.M. A visitor at this time?
133.H0500: 5 A.M. I wondered who it was, Mi~ss Makigumo. I wasn't there so you came to look for me, yes?
133.H0600: 6 A.M. Miss Makigumo.... t-this... I was with the admiral all night... planning battle strategy...
133.H0700: 7 A.M. Well then Admiral, I'll be heading back with Miss Makigumo to our room.
133.H0800: 8 A.M.... Once again, it's Yuugumo. Explaining to Miss Makigumo and getting her to understand was difficult.
133.H0900: 9 A.M. Admiral, shall we check the rankings? Let us put in a fun comment!
133.H1000: 10 A.M. The first fleet's name, shall we change it?
133.H1100: 11 A.M. I thought it was an interesting name, but I wonder why the admins checked it? What a bother.
133.H1200: 12 midday. Treating Yuugumo is okay, no?
133.H1300: 1 P.M. hmm~ After eating, I get tired, no? Wait, Yuugumo didn't sleep yesterday!
133.H1400: It's 2 P.M. Are you really not tired? I have heard that a midday nap is good for mental activity, no?
133.H1500: 3 P.M. Admiral, the new rankings have been released, no? Let us have a look.
133.H1600: 4 P.M, the sun has set a bit, no?
133.H1700: 5 P.M. I wonder who today's best shipdaughter is? Naturally, it's Yuugumo, yes?
133.H1800: 6 P.M. Dinner with just the two of us, I'm looking forward to it.
133.H1900: 7 P.M. Tonight's dinner will be made by Yuugumo!
133.H2000: 8 P.M. Admiral, was it tasty? Was it?
133.H2100: It's 9 P.M. Ah, Miss Makigumo is watching from the gap. Sorry Admiral, I'll be heading back now.
133.H2200: 10 P.M. Would it not be amicable to have a bath soon?
133.H2300: 11 P.M. hmm? Admiral, let us retire early today.
133.NewYears 6547: Have a Happy New Year, Admiral. On behalf of all the Yuugumo-class destroyers, I'm here to wish you well for the new year. Okay, let's have some New Year's sake.
133.Setsubun 6547: It's the Setsubun of all Setsubuns. The Yuugumo-class' demon for this year is... Oh? Me? Ufufu♪ That's fine. Okay everyone, start throwing.
133.Hina 6547: Ufufu. Admiral, these Hina dolls are rather cute. Maybe Makigumo, Kazagumo and I could be the three mainstay of mainstay court ladies... Admiral, wouldn't that suit us? Oh...?
133.Rainy 6547: Oh, my. Hehehe... Makigumo-san, what kind of teru teru bozu is that? It looks a bit too unique. Let me borrow that. There. Now it looks cute, doesn't it?
133.Summer 6547: Hey now, Akigumo-san. Please stop. Geez... don't scrutinize me so intently. I'm begging you, ok?
133.Fall 6547: It's fall. At this time of year, I'd rather not go to the south. Kazagumo-san and Isokaze-san, you two are always so lively.
133.Saury 6547: Ufufu♪ As for the support of the fishermen, leave it to me. That sort of thing is my specialty. Come, Akigumo-san. Don't just draw pictures— do your job, too.
133.Xmas 6547: Admiral, please have a drink. Today is Christmas. On a day like this, it's fine to loosen up a bit. I won't get angry, you know? Fufu♪ It can't be helped...
133.YearsEnd 6547: Now, everyone in the Yuugumo-class, it's cleaning season. It's now time to show what the mainstay of mainstays can do. Alright, now get your dust cloth from Makigumo-san.

134.Intro: Yuugumo-class destroyer, I am Makigumo. Following Yuugumo-neesan's example, I'll do my best!
134.Library: I'm Makigumo, second ship of the Yuugumo-class Destroyers. While cleaning up after the Hornet, 'situation permitting, tow and capture it'... they said, but that was pretty much impossible... and now Akigumo's pointing and laughing at me. Seriously, what the heck?
134.Poke(1): Commander-sama~. Makigumo always has perfect posture. Hey~? My clothes are too big~
134.Poke(3): Hawawawawa, nobody but Yuugumo-neesan is allowed to touch me~!
134.Idle: ...I'm always looking at Commander-sama from the screen.
134.Married: Commander-sama, do your be~st! Makigumo will too!
134.Wedding: Commander-sama, thank you very much for letting me take my time today. Makigumo too, has to graduate from Yuugumo-neesan some time. Is that okay?
134.Join: It's Makigumo's turn, I'll do my best!
134.Equip(1): Hmmhmmm! My new armament, how is it?
134.Docking(2): Makigumo, you can really see her damage... I'll have to work harder!
134.Construction: A new friend has been born!
134.Attack: Heyaaa~ Right in the middle, I'll hit it!
134.Yasen(2): More than scuttling, I want to shoot at the enemy!
134.Damaged(1): Fuyaaa, a hit on the stern!
134.Damaged(2): Fuwaaaaan, even though I thought I could do it today~!
134.Damaged(3): Hawawawawa, turning on the searchlight at a time like this! Akigumo, you idiot!
134.Sunk: Yuugumo-neesan, I can't move anymore, please leave me. My final selfish request... the one to scuttle me, should be you...
134.H0100: Hawawawa, how is it 1 in the morning~!
134.H0200: 2 in the morning.... This is Makigumo's limit...
134.H0300: 3 A.M. Commander-sama, KanColle isn't going anywhere, so let's just sleep~...
134.H0600: S... s... Si... wa! Sorry, I wasn't sleeping~
134.H0900: It's 9 o'clock. Look after me today, too! *salute*
134.H1000: It's now 10 o'clock~. I wonder what kind of person will be your practice buddy today?
134.H1100: It's 11 o'clock. What will Commander-sama's lunch be today?
134.H1200: 12 o'clock. On such a fine day, having lunch on deck is nice too~
134.H1300: 1 P.M. To just daydream with Commander-sama like this, it's somehow relaxing~...
134.H1400: 2 P.M. Commander-sama~ Let's do special training; special training!
134.H1500: 3 P.M. Ah, I forgot! I was invited to Kongou's tea party~!
134.H1600: 4 P.M. Ah, being with Commander-sama is nice... even if I don't go to the tea party...
134.H1700: It's 5 in the eve~ning. The sun has dissapeared~
134.H1900: 7 at night. Commander-sama, I desire dinner!
134.H2000: It's 8 at night. Hey~ Hey~ Commander-sama, is it okay to take a bath?
134.H2100: It's 9 o'clock~. I'll head into the bath first. Oh~? Glasses, glasses~
134.H2200: It's 10 at night. Commander-sama, how are you doing?
134.H2300: 11 o'clock~. Commander-sama~, Makigumo, is all sleepy~...
134.NewYears 6547: Commander-sama, have a Happy New Year~! I'll do my best again this year! Along with Yuugumo nee-san, we're counting on you again this year~!
134.Setsubun 6547: It's Setsubun, isn't it? This year's demon is...? Huh? Yuugumo nee-san!? U-Umm, hey... Kazagumo, why don't you take her place? Ah...! She already has her mask on? Ehh? Uuuu...
134.Hina 6547: Wow~! Cute Hina Dolls! Me, and... Yuugumo-neesama, and... Kazagumo, and... Akigumo, too... we can be the three court ladies! Huh? That's one too many? Oh, never mind! The four court ladies!
134.Rainy 6547: It's doing nothing but raining. Let's change the mood by making teru teru bozu. This one is going to be like Yuugumo nee-san! So I do this, and... this! Eh, or is it like this? Huh??
134.Summer 6547: Akigumo? Why did you bring something like that to the beach? Geez~ don't make sketches in a place like this! Geez~ ...ah, hey, don't draw Yuugumo Nee-san!
134.Fall 6547: It's fall, huh~? The time for baked sweet potatoes! Akigumo, what's with all that scrap paper? You're gonna burn it? Okay, let's bake some potatoes! I'll go and gather some dried leaves!
134.Saury 6547: Yuugumo nee-san, we're protecting and supporting fisherman-san? Just leave it to me! This kind of thing is my specialty! I'll do my best! Hey, hey, hoooo!
134.Xmas 6547: Commander-sama, Merry Christmas to you~! I've cut a piece of cake for you here. ...Ah, Kazagumo, this is so good! Give it a try, okay?
134.YearsEnd 6547: Ahh! So busy! It's cleaning season! Everyone, I have some dust cloths ready for you. Take one cloth per person, please~! Ah, ah, ah, it's one per person!

453.Intro: Third ship of the Yuugumo class destroyers, Kazagumo. So you're the admiral. Roger. Well then, your orders!
453.Library: Fleet type destroyer, Yuugumo class, Kazagumo. Regards. From Midway to Solomon, I advanced around the main battlefields. On that fateful night, I looked upon the burning aircraft carrier. I'll never forget the dragon's last moments.
453.Poke(2): I'm Kazagumo. Not "Fuu'un". Understand? Then, it's fine.
453.Poke(3): What is it, Admiral? I don't need extra outfitting. Eh, that's not it? Eh?
453.Idle: Hey? What is my next mission...? Huh, even though you're that busy... Admiral, I... Ahh... It is okay? Take it easy once in a while? Okay...
453.Married: What is it? Get it together. If you're not well, I won't be able to do my best either.
453.Wedding: What? Calling me to a place like this, Admiral, do you have a new task or something? Eh...! The new task is... meaning, this... put it on... eh...! Me?
453.Join: Yuugumo-class destroyer, Kazagumo, setting out. Ok? Fleet, sortie!
453.Equip(2): What? Torpedoes? It would be nice if they didn't blow up.
453.Supply: Thanks for the supplies, Admiral. I'll head out again.
453.Docking(2): Ahh, geez. I can't fight like this! I'm going to hop in the bath for a bit, so don't peek!
453.Construction: Admiral, a new ship has come. Yeah!
453.Return: Admiral, the fleet has returned. Good work, everyone.
453.Sortie: 10th DesDiv, sortie! This Kazagumo will take the role of the flagship. Advance!
453.Battle: I found you! Fleet, prepare for battle, let's do this. Okay?
453.Attack: Aim towards the enemy on the starboard side. Begin firing!
453.Yasen(1): Night... huh. Hiryuu-san... All ships, sortie! We'll annihilate the enemy in the night battle!
453.Yasen(2): Not bad, I'm returning it! There!
453.MVP: Eh, I... this Kazagumo's battle results... Well, it doesn't... feel bad... I guess!
453.Damaged(2): Mo~u. It hurts! But this won't...!
453.Damaged(3): Ehh. They got me. No~, don't explode!
453.Sunk: N... Not yet, I'm going to go ahead. I'm... still, going. Still... still...
453.NewYears 6547: Admiral, Happy New Year! The 10th Squadron and I will be counting on you again this year. Alright, let's go!
453.LateWinter 6547: Uuu... it's so cold lately... I'm not so good with winter. I wonder where my coat is... Admiral, aren't you listening?
453.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun, huh...? Akigumo, are you drawing a demon's face? It's pretty good... Wait... is that... me!? What for!?
453.Valentines 6547: Admiral! Um... that is... here, it's for you! Ah, it's fine to open it later. It's fine!
453.Anniversary 6547: Admiral, it's the third anniversary? Why didn't you tell me earlier? I haven't prepared anything to celebrate it! Geez~!
453.Rainy 6547: I'm not fond of this season. For some reason, it makes me feel gloomy deep inside. I wonder why?
453.Summer 6547: It's getting so hot. I wonder what the rest of DesDiv 10 will do with their swimsuits this year. What should I do?
453.Summer 1471: I bought one. It's a bit embarrassing, but since it's summer, it's okay, right? Ah, Akigumo, what are you drawing!? Let me see! Hey!
453.Fall 6547: It's gotten a bit chilly, hasn't it? Fall, huh? Potato. I wanna have a baked sweet potato. Right, Akigumo?
453.Xmas 6547: Merry Christmas, Admiral! This is fun! Can I drink a little bit of sake today? Ah... I can't?
453.YearsEnd 6547: The Tenth Division's on cleaning duty? Roger! I'll be leading the sweeping division! Akigumo? Ah... she ran away...

349.H0000: I, Kazagumo will be in charge for today's hourly notification duty! ...What's with that face? Are you saying that you have a problem with it!?
349.H0100: Ah, really? Then it's okay... Admiral! It's now precisely 0100!
349.H0200: It's 0200. Hmm... And that's that♪ It's not a problem right?
349.H0300: It's 0300, admiral. What? Something about my sister? Yuugumo...? What, You like her!?
349.H0400: Admiral, it's 0400. Not her? Okay then... Eh, is it about my other sister, Makigumo?
349.H0500: It is 0500. Oh really? It's not her either. Okay then... Then who are you referring to?
349.H0600: Your story makes no sense that I forgot it's already morning, admiral. It's 0600.
349.H0700: It's 0700, admiral. I'll be making breakfast right away. It's OK, leave it to me. I'm surprisingly... Ow! I-I'm okay!
349.H0800: Admiral, It's 0800. Sorry for taking it so long, but breakfast is ready. Have some! There's even seconds!
349.H0900: It's 0900, admiral. What, my finger? Oh don't worry, it's not so bad! First aid box, you say? Oh for pete's sake, you're over-exaggerating it, Admiral!
349.H1000: Admiral, it's 1000. It's this late already? Uhh... The sallying fleet and... Ah, the expedition... W-wait...
349.H1100: It's 1100, Admiral. It's almost noon. What's our plan for lunch? Is it at Mamiya's?
349.H1200: *Nom nom nom* Admiral, it's 1200. *nom nom* Nothing like a curry at Mamiya's for lunch, eh? It's delicious! *nom nom*
349.H1300: Admiral It's 1300-hmm? Akigumo? What's up? Model for your rough sketch? No! Go find someone else!
349.H1400: It's 1400, Admiral. Phew... Akigumo finally leaves. She's quite the pestering one...
349.H1500: Admiral. It's 1500. Akigumo? Ah, She's not really that bad. Rather she is... No, I mean... a bit of a bother.
349.H1600: Admiral, It's 16... Ah, Shoukaku, Good work for today! Zuikaku? No, I don't think she went here...
349.H1700: It's 1700, Admiral. The sunset sure is pretty... Let's go back inside.
349.H1800: Admiral, 1800. Today's I'll be making dinner... Eh? I'm not doing this out of desperation, I really want to do it. Honest!
349.H1900: 1900. The admiral ended up making dinner in the end... Down the hatch. Oh, it's delicious! Eh, this one too! But why?
349.H2000: 2000. So you can cook, Admiral. Very good in fact. Where did you learn it? Eh, during your academy years? I see...
349.H2100: Admiral, it's 2100. Sendai? No, the new squadron 10 was under Yahagi as flagship. I greeted her the other day. Hehehe.
349.H2200: It's 2200, Admiral. Today was quite a day. Thanks for that. Me? I'm fine. I actually worked hard as part of the Squadron 10, you know.
349.H2300: Admiral, it's 2300. Here, have some tea. Eh? I can do something as easy as serving a tea! What do you expect? Geez... Good night!

135.Intro: I'm Naganami, the fourth ship of the Yuugumo-class destroyers. And off we go. Yeah!
135.Library: I'm Naganami, the fourth ship of the Yuugumo-class destroyers, built and launched during wartime under the maru-4 project. I rampaged all over as a member of the proud Second Torpedo Squadron. At Guadalcanal, we gave an enemy ambush a beat down under the famous command of Rear Admiral Raizo Tanaka.
135.Poke(1): What? Admiral Tanaka? He's the real deal, isn't he? Great at battle and bad at politics—so cool!
135.Poke(2): What, you touchin' me again? ...What? You wanna load fuel drums? ...Hmph. But leave the torpedoes, would you.
135.Poke(3): I've seen a lot of excellent admirals in my time... There isn't a single one that touches so much...
135.Idle: Hmm, if you're not going to sortie, how about a nap? The night's long.
135.Married: Aa~, of course I get you, Admiral. How lovely~
135.Wedding: What is it? With that glum face and all.If you keep acting that way, it'll spread to the entire fleet, you know. Well, I'll lend this Naganami's chest to you here. Now, spit out your problems. Now, in a big voice! Eh? I-it's that!? Well, that's fine too, I guess...
135.Ranking: Here a report to ya, Admiral. So, how 'bout it?
135.Join: Now, let's go do a replay of Savo!
135.Equip(1): No, no! I'm okay, I can switch equipment by myself!
135.Equip(2): This Naganami is just gonna get stronger, ya know.
135.Supply: Resupply is the basics of all.
135.Docking(2): I really wanna fight more, but I gotta go wash up. Sorry!
135.Construction: A fresh n' lively fleet girl, up and ready!
135.Return: A fleet's returned! Let's go greet 'em!
135.Sortie: Not bad, gotta love the rag-tag fleets!
135.Battle: All ships, follow me! We're charging in!
135.Attack: Ugh, don't let your guard down in a shoot-out!
135.Yasen(1): All right, drop the gas drums, battle stations!
135.Yasen(2): Let them cut our clothes, and we break their bones!
135.MVP: On par with Admiral Tanaka's very own command. That was awesome, Admiral. We can do this!
135.Damaged(3): Ahh! Ah, what an embarrassment... Don't you forget this! We're comin' back for you!
135.Sunk: I guess this is it... My proud days with the Second Torpedo Squadron... I'll never... forget...
135.H0000: It's 0 o'clock. Hey, someone's here... Oh, Nenohi... What, you wanna say that it's ne-no-shoukoku?
135.H0100: 1 AM. Hey, is it okay if I watch some late night shows?
135.H0200: 2 AM, huh... You're working hard, Admiral... That's good!
135.H0300: 3 AM. Hey, you were dozing off just now.
135.H0400: It's 4 AM. Give up and go to bed already!
135.H0500: 5 AM. The city's getting ready right about now.
135.H0600: It's 6 AM... Yup, it's totally morning.
135.H0700: 7 AM. Let's grab some grub, and make operational plans the day ahead, huh?
135.H0800: 8 AM. The docks are gonna get busy this time around.
135.H0900: 9 AM, huh... Shall we head out with a full-on roster?
135.H1000: 10 AM. Having something to eat now? ...Huh. So it's called a "brunch"? That's kinda cool.
135.H1100: 11 AM. And here comes Nenohi again... What is it this time?
135.H1200: Noon. Nenohi told me that this gozen (AM) and gogo (PM) thing is coming from the term, "hour of the horse".
135.H1300: 1 PM. Nenohi went back with a smile... I guess she wanted to do the hourly report thing.
135.H1400: 2 PM. Yuugumo came by just now. Brought us something to snack on. She's always the caring one.
135.H1500: 3 PM. The Kongou's are having a party over there! Not sure why, but they're crazy, aren't they!
135.H1600: 4 PM. How was the ranking, huh?
135.H1700: 5 PM. Once you've seen the rankings, why don't you change the comments too? I mean, they do say to treasure every meeting since it's once in a lifetime... Or uh... that might be different.
135.H1800: 6 PM. I kinda feel like having fried rice.
135.H1900: 7 PM. Whoa! Admiral, you're amazin' at making fried rice! Thanks!
135.H2000: 8 PM. Someone's getting restless... Oh, it's Sendai. Looks like she's just doing her thing.
135.H2100: 9 PM. All right, now let's get serious!
135.H2200: It's 10 PM. Girl's talk? ...Well, other than the other Yuugumo-classes, I guess I get along with Shimakaze and Yukikaze.
135.H2300: It's 11 PM. I wish we could get the Second Torpedo Squadron together again.
135.NewYears 6547: I'm thankful. We're celebrating another new year. Right, Shimakaze? Oh, she's gone. Well, whatever. Admiral, I'm counting on you for another year. Let's do our best!
135.Setsubun 6547: Ohh, it's Setsubun. 'Kay, I'll do my best! So? Who is this year's representing the Yuugumo-class' demon-san? ...Eh? Yuugumo-nee? Oh, maaan. Who's even gonna try throwing at her?
135.Hina 6547: Hm, hm, how cute! Mm. Who put this Hina stand together? Ehhhh... so I see. It's nicely arranged! And this part... Woah, the neck bent! Oh, no... gotta get it fixed.
135.Rainy 6547: Hey, what's that? Teru teru bozu? Let me borrow that, Makigumo-nee. Check this out. Ain't it cute? Eh? Why are you angry?
135.Fall 6547: It's finally arrived... fall has. I don't like the fall... right, Shimakaze? Oh, you sure are energetic. It must be nice to be young. Well I'm young, too, but...
135.Fall 1471: Ugh... so it's finally this time of year. I tend to watch the skies a lot... like all the time... E-Enemy aircraft!? Ah, what? It's only a Zuiun... The number of them has increased lately... those Zuiun.
135.Saury 6547: Saury fishing, seriously!? Eh!? The fleet is heading out in support? Seriously!? Well, it can't be helped. It can't be helped! It's our shift, so I guess I gotta? Takanami! Bring all the searchlights you can carry!
135.Xmas 6547: O-Ohhhhh... so this is that Merry Christmas thing? It's nice, and even the food is good!

424.Intro: I'm the sixth of the Yuugumo-class destroyers, Takanami. E-ehm, I will do my best! Really, probably!
424.Library: I'm Takanami, the sixth Yuugumo-class Destroyer. Born in Uraga.  I was assigned to the 31st Destroyer Division, and I had done my part well.  On a fateful night battle at Lunga Point, as the Leadship of the Lookouts squad, our crew first spotted the enemy fleet... and that may have brought victory to the battle... Yup!
424.Poke(2): Commander, did you call for Takanami?
424.Poke(3): Hya! U-Um, I was incredibly startled so... please approach me in a different way if possible!
424.Idle: Drum cans, Drum cans... Oh, we have them. Me? I might not be equipping those, because I'm the leading look out ship! What? What you mean by that? Um... I don't know
424.Married: Commander, are you a little tired? Just wait a moment, Takanami will put in some Tea! Yes, it's Japanese Tea! Commander, just take a little rest!
424.Wedding: Commander, is it true that you need to talk to me? What? This box for Takanami? Am I allowed to open.. it? Wow, it's beautiful, is this for real, for reals?
424.Ranking: Commander, report time right? Yup, right away.
424.Join: Destroyer Takanami of the Yuugumo-class, going... maybe.
424.Equip(2): With this... with this I can maybe fight!
424.Supply: Maybe I'm happy... with these precious supplies.
424.Docking(1): I'm sorry, I might need the bath.
424.Docking(2): I'm sorry. Looks like my bath will take longer this time...
424.Construction: Commander, a new ally is ready to be interviewed.
424.Battle: It seems the enemy fleet has been spotted! Please follow me!
424.Attack: Maybe I have to do this...Aiming...Fire!
424.Yasen(1): Night battle...My memory is coming back...No, it won't. I can do this! I will do this! Everyone, attack!
424.MVP: Takanami was helpful? Really? Yay, maybe I'm happy... for real.
424.Damaged(2): H-Hya~... Are you ok? Can you fight?
424.Damaged(3): N-No... concentrated fire? Maybe I can still go on. Maybe I'll sink? No, don't sink!
424.Sunk: Looks like I'm getting concentrated fire again... Maybe lighting the enemy ships... was also helpful... Commander...
424.Setsubun 6547: Naganami nee-sama, these beans are... Eh? You think I should throw them? E-Eii! Like this...?
424.Valentines 6547: For Commander and Naganami nee-sama... I maybe made some chocolates... I wonder if they'll accept them...
424.Rainy 6547: The rainy days will continue... maybe. Still, rainy days are quiet and nice, aren't they? I... might like them.
424.EarlySummer 6547: It's gotten hot, hasn't it? It will probably be summer soon. Are you maybe feeling a little hot?
424.Summer 6547: It's summer, Commander. I may want to eat some red beans on ice. Mamiya-san... Ah, I'll serve it!
424.Xmas 6547: Merry Christmas, maybe... to you, Commander! Here, I think I have a present for you... this!
424.YearsEnd 6547: It's that time already. It's time for naval base cleaning, so I will do my very best... I think... that is. Yes!

345.Intro: Destroyer Takanami of the Yuugumo-class will give her best this time! Really, probably!
345.Poke(2): Commander? Maybe... did you call for Takanami?
345.Poke(3): Hya wa! U-Um, I was incredibly startled so... please aprroach me in a different way... Um... maybe it's... better.
345.Construction: Commander, a new ally has arrived.
345.Sortie: Destroyer Takanami, member of Torpedo Squadron no.2, going!
345.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted! Maybe we need to press our advantage now... Please follow me!
345.Attack: Takanami might show you the increased fire power! Aiming... Fire!
345.Yasen(1): It's probably a night battle... But I am no longer lost. Takanami, attacking! Please follow me!
345.H0000: Admiral! I, Takanami might announce the time today. Ah! We just passed 0:00 AM!
345.H0100: Maybe it's... 1... AM! Eh? That first part is confusing? Y-yes...but...
345.H0200: Maybe it's 2... AM! Ah? It's okay? I'm sorry it's a bad habit. Yup.
345.H0300: Maybe it's 3... AM. I'm sleepy. Ah, but I'll be fine, really!
345.H0400: Maybe it's 4... AM. It's early morning already. It's the darkest around this time... probably.
345.H0500: 5:00. Morning have come. Commander, good morning!
345.H0600: Maybe it's... 6:00 AM. Everybody, good morning! It's morning!
345.H0700: 7:00. I might have brought breakfast. Today we have miso soup with green leaves...
345.H0800: Maybe it's 8:00 AM. Ah, Naganami-neesama! G-Good morning!
345.H0900: Maybe it's 9:00 AM. Naganami-neesama? Yup! She's my prideful sister!
345.H1000: 10:00. It's probably time for... practice? Yes, roger that!
345.H1100: Maybe it's 11:00 AM. Commander, it's time for lunch. What do you want?
345.H1200: 12:00. 'As for lunch, you can ask Mamiya-san for a treat'? Yay, I'm happy!
345.H1300: 13:00. *nom nom*. Mamiya's omurice is delicious! *nom nom*
345.H1400: 14:00 Next expedition might be... Tokyo Express? Eh... ah... it's... nothing...
345.H1500: 15:0... Ah! Naganami-neesama! Eh? Refreshment? Thanks you!
345.H1600: 16:00. I received cookies from Naganami-neesama! For now, I'll brew some tea
345.H1700: 17:00. Such a wonderful sunset...! The sun might set at any moment. It might looks pretty.
345.H1800: Maybe it's 18:00 PM. Commander, Takanami need to prepare dinner? Yup!
345.H1900: 19:00. Dinner's preparation is probably done. We have Fricandeau Beef today...
345.H2000: Maybe it's 20:00. Commander, do you want another dish of... Takanami's Fricandeau Beef...?
345.H2100: 21:00. Maybe it's night. Commander, I'll brew some tea again, yup!
345.H2200: 22:00. That Light Cruiser sister... Eh? Maybe I should just... leave her be...?
345.H2300: 23:00. Commander, good work today... probably. Yup!

485.Intro: Thanks a bunch!  I'm the 11th ship of the Yuugumo class, Fujinami!  Commander, look out for me, okay?
485.Library: The definitive edition of the fleet's destroyer's, the Yuugumo-class's 11th ship, I'm Fujinami.  I was a part of the 32nd and later the 11th Destroyer Divisions.  The situation was pretty bad by the time I came in but I tried my best.  In the end I was part of the 2nd Torpedo Squadron and took part in the final battle: Operation Sho-Go-1 (Leyte Gulf). It was painful....yeah.  But still, I did the best that I could.  Please remember me.
485.Poke(1): Whaaat? Did you call for Fujinami?
485.Poke(3): Aaa...jeez, seriously.  Because.....I'm busy right now....eh?  A new mission?  Then I'll take care of it for Commander's sake.  Jeez!
485.Idle: Commander...right now...ah, is he busy.  In that case....ah!  Oki! Oki-chan get over here!  Ah, Yahoo!  How are you doing?  Oh really, I see.  Kihihihihi, well, I'm fine I suppose.  Kay, Oki-chan is doing her best too.  That's alright then.
485.Wedding: Ah, jeez, I really am busy, ya know.  We have to get ready for decisive battle don't we?  I'm already providing an escort for the transport fleet.  And I have an expedition after that.  That's why I said...huh?  This...is for Fujinami?  Wow, it's beautiful.  Is this...really okay?  Okay then.
485.Married: Commander, you don't look so good...hmm, oh, should I get you something warm?   I'll go fetch something.  Here, it's hot so please be careful!  Ah...jeez, that's why I told you to be careful!  Ergh....
485.Ranking: You want your info?  Well, I guess that's important.  Here.
485.Join: 2nd Torpedo Squadron, Fujinami, ready to sortie.  Let's go!
485.Supply: Thx, I'll take it.  Thank you.
485.Docking(1): Not Goood....I'll take a little bath then?
485.Docking(2): Fuunfufuun....Don't look in on me now!  You got that, Commander?
485.Return: The fleet is back.  We're all here safe and sound and that's what matters right?
485.Sortie: 32nd Destroyer Division Fujinami, weigh anchor!  You okay Ha-ma-na-mi?  Please get here soon.
485.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted.  Alright Everyone.  Let's push in!
485.Yasen(1): I like night because there's no annoying enemy aircraft.  There's nothing that can bring me down now!  Let's continue
485.MVP: Eh?  That's for, Fujinami? I...see.  Well ain't that fine.  Kihihihihi  It's okay right?  Right!
485.Damaged(3): It's just a little damage!  Something...something like that...there's no way it'll make Fujinami sink!
485.Sunk: I'm sinking...hey...are you looking...until the moment Fujinami disappears...keep watching...me...okay....

373.Intro: Thanks a bunch! I'm the 11th Ship of the Yuugumo class, Fujinami.  Commander, let's do our best from today on, okay?
373.Poke(2): Ah, jeez.  I'm busy....how bout later.
373.Poke(3): Aaa...jeez, seriously.  I said Fujinami's busy right now!  Jeez, seriously....Commander does it really have to be now, don't you get its' not a good time?
373.Equip(1): Thx, I guess?  This is pretty good.

452.Intro: As the fourteenth ship of the Yuugumo-class Destroyers, I'm Okinami. Umm... Yes, I'll do my best. Pleased to meet you!
452.Library: As the fourteenth ship of the Yuugumo-class Destroyers, I'm Okinami. I was developed as part of the Rapid Naval Armaments Supplement Programme. Yes, my birthplace was in Maizuru. Though by that time, the front line was already heading towards disintegration... But I still did my best escorting the main fleet and convoys.
452.Poke(1): U-Umm...Commander? Did you call for Okinami?
452.Poke(2): My glasses...glasses... Oh...I...had them on. Well... That's great.
452.Poke(3): Commander? Umm...I'm sorry. I can't see very well... Wah... too close... That's too close, Commander!
452.Idle: Um, Commander? Co... -mmander? Umm... I guess you're busy at the moment. Okinami will then focus on training herself. Right, umm... ummm...
452.Married: Commander, um... I'm... very sorry for always causing you trouble. Oh, no, not at all...Because you're a very kind Commander. Because you're very kind and I... Huh?... No... Why am I... crying? I don't...Why?
452.Wedding: Commander, Did you call for Okinami? Did I do something wrong...I...Huh? That's for me!? Wha... I don't... but... I can't... believe it... Ehhhh!?
452.Ranking: Th-The information, Commander? Okinami will...bring it over. Aahh!
452.Equip(1): An-, an improvement. Thank you very much.
452.Equip(2): This equipment is... With this equipment, I won't lose against even a swarm of fighters as thick as clouds. Probably?
452.Supply: Commander. From the bottom of my heart, I thank you very much for your kindness.
452.Docking(1): Um... I'm very sorry. I have to dock for a little while. I'm sorry...
452.Docking(2): Commander, this is very embarrassing but have to take a bath... a long bath... and um...
452.Construction: Commander. there's a new kanmusu that... Yes, that's correct.
452.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted! All ship... prepare for gun battle...Please take care of me.
452.Yasen(1): I can't see very well at night... But, we have no choice! All ships, charging in!
452.Yasen(2): M-My glasses... Ah, I'm okay. That's wrong. Firing guns, over there! Fire!
452.MVP: Wha... Ehhhh!? Me? Okinami is number one...? Umm...umm...I, I'm so sorry!
452.Damaged(3): It, it's okay... My glasses are... safe...
452.Sunk: This... is what feels like... to sink into the ocean...? Oh... You... can't see anything... anymore...
452.NewYears 6547: Commander, best wishes for the coming year. I really owe you a lot for this last year. I hope you'll allow me to rely on you again this year.
452.LateWinter 6547: Commander, aren't you cold? The kotatsu feels nice, so please feel free to come over... It's so warm, isn't it? I like this kotatsu as well. Ufufu♪
452.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun... Eh? Kiso-san is the demon? N-No way... I-I can't throw this! I-I can't! E-Ei...! Eh? Ah... ehh!?
452.Rainy 6547: It's been raining a lot. However, I find the rainy season to be quite fun. I love it.
452.Summer 6547: It's getting hotter, Commander. Eh? A swimsuit? Ah... I don't think... eh? Really... are you sure?
452.Summer 1471: Since you strongly recommended it, I... um, bought a swimsuit. How is it? U-Um, p-please don't stare so intently.
452.Fall 6547: So it's autumn? It's the season for reading. I really love this time of year! Admiral, what are you reading right now? Is that a photograph collection?

359.Intro: As the fourteenth ship of the Yuugumo-class Destroyers, I'm Okinami. Commander, I...have also upgraded my anti-air equipment. I think...I'll be okay. I'll try my best.
359.Join: DesDiv31, Okinami. I'll protect it... definitely! Moving out!
359.Equip(2): Alright. With this gear, with this gear, I think I can protect everyone from the enemy planes. Surely!
359.Attack: It's okay, just aim carefully. That's right... now! Fire!
359.H0000: Commander, I'll be the one who declares the time right? I'll be in your care.
359.H0300: Commander, it's 0300. Eh!? I am too bland you say? uhn...bland? uh... uhnn..
359.H0400: Commander, it's 0400. Uhm... ah.. yes, it'll be...morning...soon...
359.H0500: Commander, uhm... it's 0500. It's morning already right? I'll prepare to wake everyone up.
359.H0600: It's 0600. All fleets, all hands on...wake up! It's morning, it's morning already!
359.H0700: It's 0700, Commander. Umm...Breakfast is has been prepared...over here. It's your favorite, grounded natto and miso soup.
359.H0800: It's 0800. Commander, what missions are we doing this morning? Expeditions? Eh... the arsenal? ... Really? Ah... yes...
359.H0900: It's 0900 Commander. Ummmm, the expedition fleet is fine. Next is... ah Kumano-san! Umm... Good morning.
359.H1000: It's 1000, Kumano-san's Commander. Kumano-san, are you looking for Suzauya-san? No, I haven't seen her today.
359.H1100: It's 1100, Commander. Kumano-san was holding a lot of sandwiches. That was Suzuya-san's half right? A bit was split for us.
359.H1200: Commander, it's 1200. The sandwiches Kumano-san brought were tasty. I ate it in one helping.
359.H1300: It's 1300, Comm... Ah, Naganami nee-san, good work today. Were you looking for someone? Oh... I'm fine, don't worry.
359.H1400: It's 1400, Commander. These glasses? Yes, they're a favorite of mine. Glasses and radars are important, of course. No, really!
359.H1500: It's 1500, Commander. I'd... like to eat some sweets but, patience... patience... right?
359.H1600: 1600... Oh, Suzuya-san, Kumano-san was looking for you just now. Ah, so you met her? I'm glad... huh? She's missing again!?
359.H1700: It's 1700 Commander. Suzuya-san, Kumano-san's sandwiches were delicious. Eh, you don't like them if it's every day...? That's... true...
359.H1800: It's 1800 Commander. What shall we do for dinner? I'll make it! What do you want? Steak? Beefsteak?
359.H1900: It's 1900, Commander. I couldn't find enough ingredients for beef steak, so I prepared a whale steak instead. How is it?
359.H2000: It's 2000, Commander. It's already night. Night battle!? No...Okinami is...
359.H2100: 210... ah Noshiro-san! Thank you for your hard work. Yes, I'm currently doing my best. Please don't worry. Excuse me...
359.H2200: It's 2200 Commander. About Noshiro-san? She's a very gentle senpai, and kind... Eh, Jintsu-san? ... I've only heard she's amazing...
359.H2300: It's 2300 Commander. Thank you for all your hard work today. Tomorrow... I'll do my best too.

425.Intro: Yo! I'm Asashimo, 16th Destroyer of the Yuugumo Class. Please remember. Don't forget about me... ok?
425.Library: I'm the 16th Destroyer of the Yuugumo Class, Asashimo. Remember it well. I made my debut when the war situation got worse. I ran about freely at the front lines of the end stage. I did...all I could!
425.Poke(2): Ah, you can leave it to me. I'm fine with escorts or even nighttime raids!
425.Poke(3): Cut it out, Kiyoshimo! I told you to stop!... Wait, that's the commander! You better prepare yourself! Put your hands against the wall! Here I go!
425.Idle: ...Hey, if you're leaving me alone like this, you must have something else important to do, right? I don't like it... but, I forgive you!
425.Married: What's the matter, Admiral? You look down. Alright! I'll perk you up. Hmm? Want me to sing a song? Hmm?
425.Wedding: Hey, Admiral. Do you have business with me? What is it, can it be resolved by asking someone else? What, a ring? Wow it looks good! I'll take it! It's alright isn't it ♪
425.Ranking: Report huh? Must be important... Here
425.Join: Asashimo of the 31st Destroyer squadron! Move out!
425.Equip(1): Oh, you're very thoughtful! Good good!
425.Equip(2): I don't want to be not prepared, upgrade are welcome!
425.Supply: Oh, thanks a bunch! Fuel and ammo are important, after all!
425.Docking(1): Well... it's really just a scratch! Yeah.
425.Construction: Looks like a new ally's arrived—
425.Return: The fleet's back safely! Stop looking so relieved!
425.Sortie: It's my turn huh... well there's no going back! Destroyer Asashimo! Move out!
425.Battle: So it has started. Assault commence!
425.Attack: Tsk, you are quite a loud bunch... how 'bout this!
425.Yasen(1): A night battle, huh, nice, it brings me back! We're charging in—! Follow after me!
425.Yasen(2): Asashimo will take you on! More! Even more! Bring it!!
425.MVP: All right! I'm the best! Well, despite appearances I am the ace after all, so leave it to me.
425.Damaged(2): Tskkk...! Nah nah I can still fight!
425.Damaged(3): Damn, I got hit! Engine is... fine! Then I can still fight! I can continue!
425.Sunk: Heh, You've come to be dependent on me... Well, fine by me... Kiyoshimo, everyone... we'll meet... again
425.NewYears 6547: Commander! Countin' on ya again this year! So for New Year's, well... you can always rely on me!
425.Setsubun 6547: Setsubun doesn't seem bad to me... Alright... it's throwin' time... Ow, ow! Kiyoshimo! Don't throw at me!
425.Valentines 6547: Valen... tine's? Geez, this fleet has all sorts of weird holidays... ...I-I just happen to have this. Take it!
425.Anniversary 6547: Yeah! Today is special day! Alright! Commander, let's celebrate together, ok?
425.Anniversary 1471: Yo! I heard it's the third anniversary. Dang, that's the bee's knees! Commander, treat me something as a celebration. Come on!
425.Rainy 6547: Ahhh, seriously...? It's still raining. Somehow I feel restless just staying indoors. Aarrrgh! What's up with that?
425.Saury 6547: I've got no problems with saury. You write this as "seriously", but read it as "for real". Gonna get 'em "for real"! I got this!
425.Xmas 6547: Kuri... sumasu? Again with the weird festivals this fleet has... At least the food is pretty good.
425.ChristmasOld 1471: Ooyodo-san, are you heading out? Then I'm taking Kasumi and Kiyoshimo along with us. Isn't it obvious?

344.Idle: Oh yeah~ Going out with the likes of Yukikaze, Hamakaze and Isokaze once more would be nice. When that happened, you come along too, Commander. It'll be fun, yes.
344.Sortie: I wonder if Ise and Hyuga are fine... Well, I must go too! Asashimo! Move out!

409.Intro: I've... come again, to these seas. Yuugumo-class destroyer, Hayashimo... reporting for duty.
409.Library: I'm the 17th of the Yuugumo-class Destroyer, Hayashimo. I was born in the Maizuru Naval Base Factory, to times of impending troubles. I launched for the Battle of Leyte Gulf from the Lingga Naval Anchorage... And I've seen many things.
409.Poke(2): Heh... Yeah. This scenery hasn't changed.
409.Poke(3): Commander? To care about me, you're really kind.
409.Idle: Just like this... I'm always watching. Watching... always... forever.
409.Married: Commander. I think you're working a bit too much too. Umm... Sometimes, together, we should... Uu... I-it's nothing... Uu
409.Wedding: Commander, meeting you, I... I'm glad. So, just this is enough... eh? This is... truly? I... can I change, I wonder?
409.Ranking: Commander, you'll look at the data? I see...
409.Equip(1): Stronger... will anything change if I get stronger?
409.Supply: Thank you very much. You have my gratitude.
409.Construction: More battle strength is needed... again... they increased.
409.Return: The fleet returned. Fu...Fufufu. They returned.
409.Sortie: Victory strategy number one? Oh, it's not huh.
409.Battle: You want to go at it with me? Fine, I'll be your opponent.
409.Yasen(1): Night, huh... Fufu, let's jump right in.
409.MVP: You're giving someone like me your blessing? Commander, you're a good person. Fufu... Ufufu.
409.Damaged(2): Ouch... what... this time it's my chimney?
409.Damaged(3): Like this, it can't be helped. Isn't there a good sandbar around?
409.Sunk: Right in front of me... everyone is... what should I do. Wait... wait... I'm going too.
409.Rainy 6547: Commander. Umm... once in a while, can we... N-Nothing. Ugh...

324.H0200: 0200. We have an enjoyable time at night, too. I've watered it down (the sake), let's keep having fun!
324.H0300: 0300. Pulling an all-nighter will harm your body, Commander. Rest for awhile.
324.H0400: 0400. The blue of the morning sky. I don't hate it, but it's a little cold right now.
324.H0500: 0500. I'm sorry, was my hand cold to the touch?
324.H0600: 0600. Let's wake everyone up and get ready for the day.
324.H0700: 0700. The morning checks have been done... Let's look for Mamiya-san... And have our breakfast.
324.H0800: 0800. Commander, here's the mission file for the day. Let's start by looking at it closely.
324.H0900: 0900. All fleets that can be deployed have been sent out on expeditions. What should we do with the remaining ships?
324.H1000: 1000. Ah... What is it, Shiranui-san? Did you need us for anything?
324.H1100: 1100. Commander, I'll be making... Maizuru-styled meat stew for lunch, alright? Fufu...
324.H1200: 1200. How was... the meat stew? There's enough... For seconds.
324.H1300: 1300. Saying it was delicious... That's... Troubling for me...
324.H1400: 1400. Commander, am I... Mistaken about anything? Oh, I see. It's fine then.
324.H1500: 1500. It's time for... Some snacks. Caramel... I don't hate it.
324.H1600: 1600. The caramel was delicious. Makigumo-nee-san... You ate too much.
324.H1700: 1700. Commander, fighting a losing battle is detestable isn't it? No more...
324.H1800: 1800. I'll make dinner. It's not something to be made light of... It's curry.
324.H1900: 1900. I added some coconuts from the southern islands into my curry. Fufu...
324.H2000: 2000. There's enough curry for every girl, so please help yourself to it.
324.H2100: 2100. Commander, how was Hayashimo's curry? Fufu...Fufufufu...
324.H2200: 2200. Ah, Nachi-san brought the whiskey bottle. Will you drink some?
324.H2300: 2300. When I'm together with the commander... I'll... Forget about all these unpleasant happening.

410.Intro: Hello! Last of the Yuugumo-class, it's Kiyoshimo! I'm a bit late, but I'll be in your care!
410.Library: I'm Kiyoshimo, the 19th and last of the Yuugumo class destroyers. I was born in Uraga dontcha know. And goodness, what a horrible situation it was that I was born into too. I wasn't around for long but I took part in several fleet actions. Leyte was, of course, apalling to see but I even took part in Operation Rei-gou! How's that?
410.Poke(1): Hey, aren't you glad it's Kiyoshimo?
410.Poke(2): Hmhmmmm! Uraga born and bred. Great, isn't it?
410.Poke(3): Geez, Commander! ...Keep it a secret from my older sisters? Ok?
410.Idle: Hey, Commander? What's that, what are you doing? Hey, watcha dooin? Tell me tell me tell meeeeeee?
410.Married: Commander? You know, if you're tired, you can take a break with me? Right, right?
410.Wedding: Commander? What's wrong, you have such a serious look on your face? Eh, what's... this? This is for me? Really? Nn... thank you. I wonder... why... I'm starting to tear up.
410.Ranking: Commander? Want to see the message? Hm?
410.Equip(1): I wonder how many more remodels will it take for me to become a battleship...? Eh? O-of course I can!
410.Equip(2): How am I looking? Am I cool? Strong?
410.Docking(1): I wish I sortie with battleshi~ps!
410.Docking(2): I'll be in the bath for sliiiightly longer. Yup.
410.Sortie: Operation Rei-Gou? No? It's all good! Sortieing anyway!
410.Battle: I won't lose to Yuugumo-neesan or my other sisters!
410.Attack: I wonder how Musashi-san is doing? I've got to give it my best too!
410.Yasen(1): A night deployment, huh... I ended up remembering that night.
410.Yasen(2): I said I'd protect you this time, didn't I?
410.MVP: Hmhmm, how's that? Now you've seen what I can really do. You want to go ahead and remodel me into a battleship now?
410.Damaged(1): Hyaa!? It'll be the end if that hit on target!
410.Damaged(3): Huh? The left side? Huh? Navigation is impossible? No way... That's... Really bad isn't it...?
410.Sunk: Am I... going to sink... again? It's fine... Everyone, go on ahead... Once you hit the enemy... come back, ok?

325.H0000: 00000! Eh? Was there an extra 0? 0000-... H-huh? Huh? Huuuh?
325.H0200: 0222! Wah, I messed up again. I'll get it this time! It's 0200!
325.H0300: 03! ...00... I'm sleepy... This mission, is tough...
325.H0400: 0400. I'm seriously sleepy right now! Won't someone take over already!?
325.H0500: 0500! Eh? If I do this right, I'll become a battleship? Guh... I guess I'll do my best.
325.H0700: 0700. Hey, Kiyoshimo's gonna try her best and make breakfast, ok!?
325.H0800: 0800. How is breakfast? Let's eat our fill and turn into battleships together!
325.H0900: 0900. Commander, we should go for morning training together. Let's go!
325.H1000: 1000. Ugh... I ate too much for breakfast... And it feels bad after I've exercised... Uuu...
325.H1100: I don't feel so good... 11..0..0... S-Somehow I managed to report the time. Guh...
325.H1200: 1200. Commander, I'm sorry... Please go ahead with lunch by yourself... I can't do it.
325.H1300: 1300. What did you have for lunch? Omurice with Yamato-nee-sama? H-how nice...
325.H1400: 1400. Eh, Kasumi-chan? What's wrong, you're here because you're worried about me again?
325.H1500: 1500. I got a riceball from Kasumi-chan because I didn't have lunch! Let's have it now. Mmm, this flavor of salt from the salted plum is great.
325.H1600: 1600. Commander, this Kiyoshimo has mended her ways. Let's do it!
325.H1700: 1700. Right, I should get to cleaning the office and prepare for outfitting!
325.H1800: 1800. Commander? There's night battle training for the day? Of course! I'll join too!
325.H1900: 1900. Right! For this part, I should use the star flare, star flares... Huh? I don't have one?
325.H2000: 2000. Really, the members Second Torpedo Squadron were strong. How nice...
325.H2100: 2100. Huh, Kasumi-chan? Another riceball? Is it ok to have it?
325.H2200: 2200. Oh right, I was so engrossed in the night battle that I forgot about dinner. Commander, are you hungry? Shall we have dinner together?
325.H2300: 2300. Ehh!? You had beef steak with Musashi-san? How nice... You should've invited me along too! That's not fair!

421.Intro:
Akizuki-class anti-air destroyer, first ship, Akizuki.
I'm reporting in here. Please leave it to me!
421.Library:
Built with the purpose of handling fleet air defense— the first Type-B Destroyer; first Akizuki-class destroyer, Akizuki here.

As an air defense ship equipped with four Long 8-Barrel 10cm Guns and an Anti-Aircraft Fire Director, I formed the 61st Destroyer Division along with Hatsuzuki.

I'll do my best!
421.Poke(2): This Long-Barrel 10cm Gun and this Anti-Aircraft Fire Director... With this power, I should be able to protect the fleet!
421.Poke(3): Choujuusenchihou-chan, don't struggle so much! Oh? Oho? Ad... miral? Ah...! Please excuse me!
421.Idle: Long-Barrel 10cm, check! Anti-Aircraft Fire Director, check! Oxygen Torpedoes, check! ...Alright! Perfect! It's all okay! Umm, next is...
421.Married: Commander, thanks as always. I will protect both you and the fleet. I-It'll be fine!
421.Wedding: Commander, did you call for me? Um, was my anti-air inadequate? Ah, that's not it? Then is it something to do with Shoukaku-san? Not that, either...? ...! Could this be...? This... ...! Thank you so much!
421.Ranking: That's true. Understanding the fleet's current situation is important!
421.Join: Anti-air destroyer, Akizuki. Starting the sortie!
421.Equip(1): Thank you very much! It's good equipment...
421.Equip(2): I won't lose to the enemy task force with this!
421.Supply: Thank you very much for the resupply!
421.Docking(1): J-Just for a bit... I'll take a break...
421.Docking(2): I have to make sure my Anti-Air Fire Director is firmly attached...
421.Construction: It looks like a new ship was born.
421.Return: The fleet has safely returned. Everyone, good work!
421.Sortie: 61st Destroyer Division, setting sail immediately! Sortieing!
421.Attack: As long as I still have the strength, I won't allow it!
421.Yasen(1): My night battle ability... shall I show it to you?
421.Yasen(2): The curtain fire is too thin... I can feel it. Laying a barrage!
421.MVP: I was able to protect the fleet. We're safe, and next time will surely be okay, too!
421.Damaged(1): Tch...! I can still go on!
421.Damaged(3): Not yet... I won't sink yet! The fleet's air defense... I will...!
421.Sunk: Shoukaku-san... Taihou-san... are you well? ...Still safe... the fleet is... still... safe...
421.NewYears 6547: Best wishes for the new year. Commander, please treat me well this year, too!
421.Anniversary 6547: Arcade? Commander, what's an Arcade? Hm-hmm... I shall learn more about it!
421.Xmas 6547: Merry Christmas to you, Commander! I went ahead and roasted a turkey! ...Ah! I shouldn't have? Why!?

330.Poke(2): This additional Anti-Aircraft Fire Director and Long-Barrel 10cm Gun... My true power. With these, I can protect the fleet!
330.Supply: Thank you very much for these important supply goods!
330.Damaged(3): I was hit!? Abandon all torpedoes! Suppress detonations! ...Not yet... I'm still fine!
330.H0000: Commander, I, Akizuki, will be reporting the time! The current time is 0000!
330.H0100: Reporting in that it's 0100. Is this way fine with you, Commander?
330.H0200: It's 0200. The moon tonight is... The moon is so beautiful, Commander. Um... Commander?
330.H0300: It's 0300, Commander. It's awfully quiet at this hour... ... ...It really is quiet...
330.H0400: It's 0400. Commander, aren't you tired? Let's have some strong tea.
330.H0500: It's now 0500, Commander. Aye! I'm to prepare to do the morning call. Roger that!
330.H0600: It's 0600. Good morning, Commander. Yes! It's such a pleasant morning!
330.H0700: It's 0700. Commander, I'm preparing breakfast over here. Sorry if it's too basic...
330.H0800: 0800. 61st Destroyer Division, sortie preparations complete! We can set sail at any time!
330.H0900: It's 0900. Is the capital ship I'm escorting a battleship? Is it a carrier? ...Please leave it to me!
330.H1000: Reporting in that it's 1000. Commander, I'd like to go and breeze through the exercises!
330.H1100: It's 1100. Commander, what should we do for lunch? Shall I make something for us?
330.H1200: It's 1200. Commander, lunch is rice balls and pickled radish. Ah... it's so basic... I-I'm sorry...!
330.H1300: It is now 1300. Commander, I apologize. I'll try my best to make an extravagant dinner!
330.H1400: It's 1400. Hatsuzuki... are you okay...? Ah... Commander. Let's do our best again this afternoon!
330.H1500: It's 1500. Ah, yes. I really owe a lot to Akashi-san for her help.
330.H1600: It's 1600. Yes! Another Anti-Air Fire Director was added to the stern. It's absolutely perfect!
330.H1700: Reporting in that it's 1700. The sun is setting, so the anti-aircraft watch is ending.
330.H1800: It is now 1800. Yes! I'll try my best to make an extravagant dinner!
330.H1900: It's 1900! Steaming hot barley rice, pickled radish, and then we have canned beef, and even miso soup! How is it...?
330.H2000: 2000. Yes. I put in a little extra effort today. How did I do?
330.H2100: It's 2100. Eh? You mean Suzutsuki? Yes, I'm proud of my little sister. Yeah!
330.H2200: 2200. Ah, Shoukaku-san, Zuikaku-san. Good work out there. Yes, everything's fine!
330.H2300: 2300. I was a little nervous... *phew* Ah, Commander, I really appreciated your hard work today.

422.Intro:
Akizuki-class anti-air destroyer, second ship, Teruzuki!
As with Akizuki nee-san, it's an honor to be working under you!
422.Library:
Akizuki-class anti-air destroyer, second ship, Teruzuki.

Akizuki-nee and I formed the 61st Destroyer Division. In the Battle of Solomon, we fought alongside Hiei-san and Kirishima-san!

Eh? Tokyo Express with supply drums? Ah... that is.... that was...
422.Poke(2): Admiral, are you interested in Anti-Aircraft Fire Directors? Would you like to touch mine?
422.Poke(3): Ah... that's not where the Anti-Aircraft Fire Director is. Woah...! Choujuusenchihou-chan, don't get mad...!
422.Idle: Supply drums, huh... So it's like that, is it? I've always wanted to be an escort for something like a task force... A-Ah, Admiral? It was nothing!
422.Married: Admiral, have you seen Akizuki-nee? Oh... and I was even thinking about splitting this canned food with her... Ah! Admiral, do you want to eat it with me? This one is...!
422.Wedding: Admiral, did you call for me...? Eh? This ring is... for me? Are you sure? ...! Thank you! I will cherish it forever!
422.Ranking: Admiral, you want to confirm the intelligence? Roger. I'll go get it for you!
422.Equip(1): I think I'll be happy with this! Admiral, thank you!
422.Equip(2): Hmm, hmm... Got it! Didn't I?
422.Supply: I've received my supplies! Much appreciated!
422.Docking(1): I took some damage... I'll be fixed soon, okay? Yeah!
422.Docking(2): I was damaged quite a bit... Choujuusenchihou-chan, I'm sorry...!
422.Construction: Looks like a new warship was commissioned. I'm so excited!
422.Return: The fleet has safely returned to port! What a relief...!
422.Sortie: Flagship, on point! Teruzuki, now sortieing! Follow me!
422.Battle: Well, let's get this started. Main guns, prepare for anti-air combat!
422.Yasen(1): A night battle under the light of the moon! Fleet, begin the assault!
422.Yasen(2): Keep the heat up! Chojuusenchihou-chan, keep it up!
422.MVP: No way...!? I was the best? Really? ...! I'll have go to tell Akizuki-nee! Ehehe♪
422.Damaged(1): Ahh...! Th-They got me? Can I still fight? ...I-I see...
422.Damaged(2): Ahhh...! C-Come on...! What? A torpedo? Can I still sail...?
422.Damaged(3): Uwah...! (...) ...Oww... Are the torpedo tubes okay? If they look risky, dump them!
422.Sunk: I'm... sinking once again? ...It's so soon... The moon is... so beauti... ful...
422.NewYears 6547: Admiral, Akizuki-nee, best wishes for the new year! I'll be counting on you again this year, okay?
422.Setsubun 6547: It's Setsubun~? So it's okay to be throwing beans, then? And the demon is...? Eh? Kirishima-san and Hiei-san? E-Ehhh...!? Eh... I don't know...
422.Valentines 6547: Commander, here! You can have this chocolate! Be sure to enjoy my chocolate, okay?
422.Rainy 6547: The rainy season is all damp and humid. It's unpleasant, isn't it? We have to take out the laundry while the weather's still clear. Now, Admiral. I'll be washing that, so take it off.
422.EarlySummer 6547: Akizuki-nee, it's almost summer! Let's go buy new swimsuits! Eh? That!? You're going to wear that again? Umm, I think...
422.Summer 6547: It's summer! Yay! I want to split watermelons! Watermelon splitting! I'll cover my eyes... and strike! This... sensation... Huh!? Admiral!!
422.Fall 6547: Fall, huh. Fall is Akizuki-nee's season, isn't it? And winter is Fuyutsuki's season. Huh? So which season would be mine, then?
422.Xmas 6547: So this is Christmas! Admiral, isn't it great? Christmas! Akizuki-nee, you should eat up, too! Here, here, and these!
422.YearsEnd 6547: It's the end of the year! It's time for cleaning. Uuu... a whole year of dust has built up... *cough cough* It's bad, Admiral! Open the window!

346.Intro:
Akizuki-class anti-air destroyer, second ship, Teruzuki!
I can handle anything from battleships escorts to Tokyo Express missions!
346.Poke(2): Ah... the rear Anti-Aircraft Fire Director? That's just a placeholder, so... Admiral, could you avoid touching it?
346.Equip(1): This is nice equipment! It'll do the job...! Admiral, thank you!
346.Equip(2): Alright...! This is... I think I've got it!
346.Sortie: Flagship, on point! Second Torpedo Squadron, Teruzuki. Setting sail!
346.Attack: I'm a lot more experienced now! It'll be fine! Commence firing!
346.Damaged(1): Ahh...! I can't drop the pace! I have to move!
346.H0000: Admiral, the date has changed. For today, I, Teruzuki, will be the one announcing the time, okay? Hehe♪
346.H0100: It's 0100, Admiral! ...Admiral? Ah... did I wake you up?
346.H0200: It's 0200, Admiral. You mean me? ...I'm not sleepy at all!
346.H0300: 030- ...Ah, that's right. At night time, somehow, instead of feeling nervous, I'm fully alert... even though I'm an anti-air ship...
346.H0400: It's 0400, Admiral. Would you like to rest a little? Since I'll be awake, it'll be fine!
346.H0500: It's 0500, Admiral! The sunrise is beautiful~! Ufufu♪ The morning feels so nice♪
346.H0600: It's 0600, Admiral! Isn't it time to do the morning call? I should go make breakfast, too!
346.H0700: 0700! It's breakfast time, Admiral! It'll be barley rice with miso soup and pickled radish this morning! Hehe♪ I've made sure to bring you plenty of barley rice!
346.H0800: It's 0800, Admiral. So, shall we start the morning exercises? Umm... the composition will be...
346.H0900: It's 0900, Admiral. Want to have Akizuki-nee and I and form the 61st Destroyer Division? We won't let those enemy aircraft come close! Yeah!
346.H1000: 100- ...Ah, Akizuki-nee! Eh? Zuikaku-san? I haven't seen her... Are you looking for her? Ah, I understand. I'll let her know if I see her!
346.H1100: It's 1100, Admiral. What should we do for lunch? Since we're busy, are combat rations fine with you?
346.H1200: 1200! Here! It's lunch! Today's lunch is rice balls made with Kayaku-gohan! So...?
346.H1300: It's 1300, Admiral! What should we start with for the afternoon? The usual anti-air exercises?
346.H1400: 140- ...Ah! Naganami-san...! Eh? How's it going? Oh, it's going great! Yeah!
346.H1500: It's 1500, Admiral! Um... the next expedition is... Tokyo Express!? Umm... I don't know...
346.H1600: It's 1600, Admiral! Sunset... it'll be night soon. I don't really like the night...
346.H1700: It's 1700, Admiral! The sun is setting. Night... huh...?
346.H1800: It's 1800, Admiral! I should go make dinner! Ah... so eating out will be fine?
346.H1900: Itsh (1900?), Amirahl. *nom nom* Mamiya-san's food is so good♪
346.H2000: It's 2000, Admiral! Mmm~! I really filled myself up♪ I'm so happy!
346.H2100: It's 2100! Eh? Shortland Anchorage? Y-Yeah... I've been there a lot, but...
346.H2200: 2200. Have a late-night snack, Admiral! I made some red bean soup, so tonight is a little extravagant. Do you have a sweet tooth?
346.H2300: It's... 2300... At this time of night, I get really nervous for some reason... I have to keep watch in every direction... Ah... it'll be okay... it'll be okay...

423.Intro: I'm the fourth ship of the Akizuki-class destroyers, Hatsuzuki. Are you the admiral? Very well, I'll march on.
423.Library: Fourth ship of the Akizuki-class anti-air destroyers, Hatsuzuki. I was born in Maizuru. My sisters and I formed the 61st Destroyer Division that fought in the Marianas and Leyte. In anti-air battles, I covered the rescue of aircraft carriers. Acting as a part of the fleet's rear guard, I faced the enemy.
423.Poke(1): Did you call me? What is it?
423.Poke(3): You again? What is it? Could it be that you're lonely? You're an adult, aren't you? Well, whatever, I'll protect you... until the end.
423.Idle: I should get the transport craft properly maintained, just in case. And better if I remove any flammables off from myself as well…
423.Married: No it's... not that I have something to do, it's just… You are one tough Admiral, you know that? Could... Could I lean on your shoulder, just for a moment…? Phew… This feels nice… Thank you...
423.Wedding: What is it, Admiral? If you're looking for my sister, she's over there... What? This is for me!? This… it's for my finger… but… I… Are you sure? I don't have anything I could give back to you… Really? Okay!
423.Ranking: Looking for information? Very well. Let me go get it for you.
423.Equip(1): All right. Seems good. I appreciate it!
423.Equip(2): This… can I make use of this?
423.Equip(3): Leave this to me! Don't worry!
423.Docking(2): The transport craft... No. It just hurts a little. I'm sorry...
423.Construction: A new vessel! A great thing, isn't it.
423.Sortie: All right, I'm moving out. Hatsuzuki, sortieing! Sis, leave this one to me!
423.Battle: Enemy fleet spotted! They're a crowd... Ready guns! Moving in!
423.Attack: We're fine as long as we don't get hit. Ahead full!
423.Yasen(1): Night battle, huh? Just my luck. All ships, I'm taking point! Moving!
423.MVP: My accomplishments!? I see… But no, that's the accomplishment of the fleet. I don't need my name on it.
423.Damaged(1): Agh… Not yet… I can still run!
423.Damaged(2): Tsk… They've got some aim… But I'm not going down. Not just yet!
423.Damaged(3): Ahhh…! Damn, the transport craft…No… I'm not gonna go down! Not yet!
423.Sunk: Have... Have I… accomplished… everyithing I could…? I… Zuikaku... I…
423.NewYears 6547: A new year. Happy New Year. Best wishes. I'm counting on you again this year. ...Ah, Mochizuki? Alright, I'll give you a hand as well.
423.Setsubun 6547: Ooyodo, these beans are...? Oh, I see. Setsubun. Who is going to play the demon? Eh!? Nee-san?
423.Hina 6547: It's so lively! I see, so it's Hinamatsuri! The submarines seem to be having a good time. This is... hishimochi...? So I see.
423.Anniversary 6547: So this fleet is now three years old. That's impressive. I'll give my greetings as well. Congratulations, Admiral.
423.Rainy 6547: It's still raining. It seems my body is getting a little stiff. Guess I'll arrange my canned food on a day like this. Ah, this one is inflated. It's... no good.
423.EarlySummer 6547: It's almost summer... Do you know the meaning of my name? Yeah, that's right! Not that it has any significance.
423.Summer 6547: This time of year... I can't say I dislike it. Certain sections of the other ships seem like they have an issue with armor deficiency, though. I'm concerned.
423.Saury 6547: Northern sea fisheries? Rather, you mean saury fishing support. I see. So it's specific to this time of year. Got it! I shall do my part as well. A searchlight... right?
423.Cold 6547: Well, I don't remember much about the closing moments of that battle. Still, I feel that I did everything I could. That's how I feel... about it. It's a feeling from deep inside.
423.Xmas 6547: Christmas...? So that's what it is. The food looks so extravagant.

357.Sortie: All right, I'm moving out. Hatsuzuki, sortieing! Zuikaku, Sis, leave this one to me!
357.Damaged(3): Damn, the transport craft… But no… I am not going down!
357.H0000: Admiral, today I'll be taking care of this for you. Ah! No! I was talking about the reports! How would you even mix that up...stupid...
357.H0100: Its 01:00. What's wrong? Tired? Want me to make some tea?
357.H0200: Its 02:00. I'm not really good at this, but here's your tea. I'll leave it here, so drink it when you get the chance.
357.H0300: its 03:00. Sleepy? Late nights don't bother me. Its thanks to my training. Don't look down on me.
357.H0400: Its 04:00. That night? Well, I don't really remember much, other than Isuzu and the others leaving. Sorry.
357.H0500: Its 05:00. Its morning. Morning's are nice. There's no such thing as a night that never ends. Ah, the morning sunlight feels good too.
357.H0600: Its 06:00! Its morning! All hands on deck! Admiral! Leave breakfast to me. I think I can handle it.
357.H0700: Its 07:00; Admiral, breakfast has been prepared. Its boiled barley and rice, pickled daikon radish, and potato miso soup! Eat as much as you like! Being able to eat as much as you like is a wonderful thing...its truly happiness.
357.H0800: Its 08:00. Admiral, once your done washing up, do you want to start morning fleet operations? I guess we should start with expeditions first thing right? or maybe practice?
357.H0900: Its 09:00. Ah, Nee-san! Secretarial duties? Yeah, I think I should be able to do them with no problems. At least, I think so.
357.H1000: its 10:00. That's right! I'm really proud of Akizuki-neesan. She's our nameship after all!
357.H1100: Its 11:00. Admiral, what do you want to do about lunch? I can make it again if you'd like.
357.H1200: Its 12:00. Mamiya? I've always wanted to try her food. Is it okay if I have curry? Thank you so much!
357.H1300: Its 13:00. That curry lunch was delicious! Curry is so good; Mamiya's is so good!
357.H1400: Its 14:00. Now that we're done with lunch, we should get right to work. Its important that we all learn to work together for both practice and actual combat. That's important not just for combat, but life as well.
357.H1500: Its 15:0...Ah, Isuzu, what's up? Yeah, I've had no problems. What's this? Sugar Candy? Thanks, I'll take it.
357.H1600: Its 16:00. Hmm, Isuzu? Yeah, I know her well. She's been helping me get used to the base and teaching me alot. She's been a big help.
357.H1700: Its 17:00. Sunset. It's almost night. When night comes, my long 10cm cannon starts to act up...my heart as well..
357.H1800: Its 18:00. Admiral, its nighttime...now. Yeah, don't worry, I'm fine.
357.H1900: It's 19:00. By the way, What should we do about dinner? Should I cook more boiled barley and rice? I have some a few canned goods as well, so let's...eat together..
357.H2000: Its 20:00. Admiral, It's...not fair that you're so good at cooking! This food tastes so good...what kind of meat is this? Huh?..Cutlet?!! I didn't even know such a food existed!
357.H2100: It's 21:00. Okay, meal time's done. Admiral, thanks; I really appreciate it. I'll take care of washing the plates. I want...to at least do that for you.
357.H2200: It's 22:00. Ah, Zuikaku. Its fine, no problems so far. Admiral's...well, he agrees. I'm fine. Don't worry about me.
357.H2300: Its 23:00. I'm a bit tired tonight. Admiral. rest well. Let's work hard tomorrow as well. Good night.

174.Intro: Good morning. I'm Leberecht Maass. Lebe is fine, yep.
174.Library: The German-born destroyer, the first genuine large-type. This shifted high temperature, high pressure engine, it could only have been designed in the country of technical skills! I'm not so great at open-sea warfare though... I'll do my best!
174.Poke(2): Nn, what is it? My boiler needs servicing...
174.Poke(3): Admiral, what is it? Is this one of this country's greetings? It's going to be difficult until I'm used to it.
174.Idle: Ah, It's not that I'm bored, I'm just fine, yep.
174.Married: Admiral, you're always working so hard, aren't you. But, you shouldn't push yourself so much. I'll work with you.
174.Wedding: Admiral, why the serious face? Eh? What's this box... O-oh. Thank you.
174.Ranking: Looking at the report? Analysis is important.
174.Docking(1): Ah, they got me. I've gotta get fixed.
174.Construction: Admiral, looks like a new comrade is here.
174.Sortie: Not commerce raiding, but a fleet battle?... I- I can do it!
174.Battle: Fleet battle, huh... Okay, here I go!
174.Yasen(1): Night battle huh, I'll give it a shot
174.MVP: I did the best? Oh... that's great, yep.
174.Damaged(3): The engine room is alright, I can still sail forth.
174.Sunk: I'm sinking, once again, huh. But, this time... it was in a real battle...

310.H0000: Midnight. It's a new day, yeah?
310.H0200: 2 o'clock. I wonder if Max is still going?
310.H0300: 3 o'clock. Ngh... Admiral, aren't you tired? Wow, that's impressive.
310.H0500: 5 o'clock. It's morning, some new missions have come.
310.H0600: Good morning. 6 o'clock. Admiral, good day to you.
310.H0700: 7 o'clock. Breakfast time, yeah? I'll go and get it started.
310.H0800: 8 o'clock. Admiral, how's the Nürnberger Rostbratwurst? Was it tasty?
310.H0900: 9 o'clock. Almost time for serious action, yeah?
310.H1000: 10 o'clock. About time to sortie. But, I've gotta be careful of mines.
310.H1100: 11 o'clock. I won't confuse fishing boats and enemy vessels, yep. Naturally.
310.H1200: 12 o'clock. Lunch time. What would be good for lunch, Admiral?
310.H1300: It's 13 o'clock. I wonder if Max is okay, I'm a bit worried.
310.H1400: It's 14 o'clock. Practice is important, even in the North Sea, yep.
310.H1500: 15 o'clock. Talking about seaworthiness...nah, I'm just wondering...
310.H1600: 16 o'clock. It's okay, I can do it.
310.H1700: 17 o'clock. It's getting a little dark, yep.
310.H1800: 18 o'clock. What shall we do for dinner?
310.H1900: The Sauerkraut and Eisbein, how is it? Admiral, is it tasty? Ah, 19 o'clock.
310.H2100: 21 o'clock. About time for night battles, yeah? I'm not so great at those.
310.H2200: 22 o'clock. It's amazing, everybody here just loves night battles, I'm surprised.
310.H2300: 23 o'clock. Admiral, thanks for everything today. Let's do our best tomorrow too!

175.Intro: Guten tag. I am the destroyer Max Schultz, but "Max" is good enough. My regards.
175.Library: German 1934 Plan-class destroyer, third ship in the series. I was designed to have high survivability, but... my new model of turbine had a small maintenance defect. This time... I shall be alright.
175.Poke(2): What? Don't touch me so much.
175.Poke(3): You... does your... conduct have anything to do with an operation? Really? Hmm...? I see.
175.Idle: Umm... is there nothing for me to do? I see... Specifically, are there no operations? Hmm...
175.Married: Darling... haven't you already done more than enough? Let's slow down a bit. It'll be fine.
175.Wedding: So what is this important business? Eh...? This is for me? Y... you... hmm... I-I see... So that's how it is... hmm... danke schön...
175.Docking(2): Entering for a few large-scale repairs. Bis bald.
175.Construction: A new ship has been completed.
175.Sortie: We'll show them our true power. Casting off!
175.Battle: A fleet battle, huh...? ...Off I go!
175.Attack: We have the enemy. Commencing the attack.
175.MVP: Oh? I'm number one? Hmm... I see. So I am. Hmm...
175.Damaged(3): Did I get... w-what? A mine? It wasn't...?
175.Sunk: I'm sinking in an unfamiliar sea... ...Once again I can sleep... peacefully... ...

311.H0000: It's midnight. Hmm... it's quite late.
311.H0100: It's 1 o'clock. You're still awake? How zealous.
311.H0200: It's 2 o'clock. I wonder if Lebe is still up as well.
311.H0300: It is 3 o'clock. Hey, you dozed off just now. Why not go to bed soon?
311.H0400: It's 4 o'clock. Hmm... you're a bit peckish? It's better to not eat anything right now, you know.
311.H0600: It is 6 o'clock. For the morning, let's get everything into its proper order.
311.H0700: It's 7 o'clock. It's breakfast time. I shall go prepare it.
311.H0800: It's 8 o'clock. For breakfast, would roggenbrot and cheese be okay? Do you like rye bread?
311.H0900: It is 9 o'clock. Now then, let us carry out reorganization of the fleet. Which ship will we dismiss?
311.H1000: It's 10 o'clock. That's right, mines are a pet peeve of mine... nh... ...as are those sorts of puns.
311.H1100: It is 11 o'clock. You're already hungry? Was breakfast not enough?
311.H1200: It's 12 o'clock. Lunch time. It can't be helped, it seems. We'll have a more filling lunch.
311.H1300: It's 13 o'clock. For dessert, how about some baumkuchen? It's not too heavy?
311.H1400: It is 14 o'clock. Oh, yes, I would like to be in a fleet with the renowned Bismarck.
311.H1500: It is 15 o'clock. Hmm... what is it? You seem restless. Don't worry.
311.H1600: It's 16 o'clock. If you're getting tired, let's take a break.
311.H1700: It's 17 o'clock. Are you feeling well? Hmm... I see. Don't push yourself too hard.
311.H1800: It is 18 o'clock. I'll prepare for dinner.
311.H1900: It is 19 o'clock. Ja. Admiral, all of the preparations are completed.
311.H2000: It's 20 o'clock. Admiral, would you like some coffee?
311.H2100: 21 o'clock. I'm not particularly fond of night battles. I'd prefer to retire before long.
311.H2200: It is 22 o'clock. So as to be ready tomorrow, I would like to ask to be excused soon.

443.Intro: Buongiorno! I'm Libeccio, a Maestrale-class destroyer! Just Libe is fine. Nice to meet you Admiral!
443.Library: Italian Navy Destroyer, third Maestrale-class, Libeccio. Admiral, Nice to meet you!  What, Battle of Taranto? That's easy! Although I wanted to do my best in escort fleet, I want to quit in the middle of the rescue.
443.Poke(2): Libe's name? That means a southwest wind. You know?
443.Poke(3): Come on, this way! This way, Mr. Oni! Ufufu♪ Admiral, you're fun♪
