443.Idle: Roma? As expected, battleships are really big, aren't they? I wonder if Libe, by eating regularly, will become that big. Huh? Who are you? Kiyoshimo...? Wanna be my friend? Eh... all right...
443.Married: Admiral-san, ciao~ What's wrong? Tired? Guess it's no use - Libe will give you a shoulder rub. Usho♪ Usho♪ Well? Was it good?
443.Wedding: Ciao~! Admiral, what's up? You have something for me? Eh, you're giving me this box? Not the box, but what's inside? Waa~, so beautiful! Grazie~!
443.Ranking: You want to see the news, Admiral-san? Hold on a second. Um, err...
443.Join: Alright! The most charming Italian destroyer will reveal herself, okay? Libeccio, sortieing!
443.Supply: Thanks for this meal! Thank you.
443.Docking(1): My clothes are a little dirty. Hurry up and fix it.
443.Docking(2): Ouch. Since my bum hurts I guess I'll take a shower. A hot tub? What is that?
443.Construction: It seems like there's a new friend? Hello!
443.Sortie: Ciao~! Everyone, are your preparations ready? Libe's fleet is setting sail!
443.Battle: Enemy ships spotted! Fleet Libe, switching to attack formation. Get ready, get ready♪
443.Attack: The southwest wind...Hooray! It's a good omen! We'll win!
443.Yasen(1): Evening, huh. That's fine, it'll be a night battle, won't it? I'll try it!
443.MVP: Hooray!! Libe's number one? Admiral-san, praise me! Yes, please! Praise me!!
443.Damaged(2): W...what? Torpedoes...Stop attacking me while I need help~
443.Damaged(3): Like I said, my bum hurts! Stop it, already!
443.Sunk: Libe...wanted to help properly...To protect everyone...Good...night....
443.NewYears 6547: Admiral-san! It's New Year's! Watch me do all the tough jobs one by one this year! I'll be fine! Right?
443.LateWinter 6547: Isn't it a little cold? Japanese winters are so cold... Brr~rrr... Eh? Kiyoshi? What? Ko-ta-tsu? Ah! It's warm! This isn't bad at all!
443.Setsubun 6547: Setsuboon... Eh? Really? That's really the name of this Japanese ritual? So I throw this? At Bismarck? Then... Eii! Eiii!
443.Valentines 6547: Admiral-saan! Fufufu~ should I give you this? Want it? Don't want it? Which one...? Do you want my chocolate? ...Theeeen... it's yours! Here!
443.Anniversary 6547: I'm going to celebrate our third anniversary. Congratulations, Admiral! Hehehe~
443.Rainy 6547: Rain! Rain, rain, rain! Isn't this "Tsuuyou" season nothing but rain? So it's that kind of a season.
443.Summer 6547: So this is summer in Japan. It's so hot, of course. However, I love this ramune♪ I love this shaved ice♪ Ah, Libe will have strawberry ice! Strawberry!
443.Fall 6547: That sound I hear... what's making it? An autumn bug? Ah! So it's called a bell cricket. It sounds nice, huh? Eh? Bell crickets eat watermelon? Really?
443.Halloween 6547: Here's my costume. So...? Does it suit me...? It does? Yay! Ehehe♪
443.Xmas 6547: Buon Natale! Admiral-san, let's eat some panettone!
443.YearsEnd 6547: Why is everyone rushing around everywhere? Shi-wa-su? What event is that? Eh? What's this cloth? A dust cloth? But I don't like cleaning events~!

347.H0000: Ciao~ Admiral. Libeccio will be your time keeper. No problem, just leave it to me!
347.H0100: Admiral! 0100! How's that? Libeccio's perfect yes? Ehen!
347.H0200: Admiraaal! 0200! Hehe, Libeccio has gotten really good at this you know~!
347.H0300: Admiral! 03...00! Oo~ Isn't Libeccio's already perfect at announcing the time? You can praise me you know? C'mon c'mon!
347.H0400: Admiral! 04...00! It's morning soon huh~ Libeccio... is a little tired now... but I can do it!
347.H0500: Admiraaal! 05...00! It's morning! Morning! Should I wake everyone? Not yet? Wake them? No? Not yet huh...
347.H0600: Aaadmiraaal! 06...00! I'll wake the fleet yes? All personnel wake up~! Waakkeee Uuuupp!
347.H0700: Admiral! 0700! Libeccio... is a little hungry. Ah, Admiral is going to make breakfast for me? Grazie~!
347.H0800: Nom nom nom... Admiraaaal! 08~00! Your hand made breakfast is delicioush! Make more tomorrow!
347.H0900: Admiral! 0900! Now, let's bring out the fleet. Sortie? Expedition? Or training? If it's training, we have to win!
347.H1000: Admiral! 1000! Ah, It's Littorio! Eh, now you're called Italia? Italia? Why? Why?
347.H1100: Admiral, 1100! Air raid? Umm... I'm scared but, I'm not! If you ask me... I don't like submarines. I just don't like it!
347.H1200: Admiraaaal! 1200! What's for lunch? Oh, Mammiya? Yeah, I wanna go! Yaaay!
347.H1300: *munch* Admiral! 1300! Ehehe... Mammiya's food is delicious! Nom nom nom... Eating at Mammiya's all day sounds great! Yeah!
347.H1400: Admiral! 1400! Phew... I ate a bit too much... Let's work out! Exercise! Gonna sortie out! Let's go, let's go!
347.H1500: Admiral! 1500... Ah, Kiyoshii! Yeah, I'm good! Battleships? Yeah, Battleships are strong... Yep, strong indeed.
347.H1600: Admiral! 16...00! Eh? The strongest Battleship? Should it be Littorio or Roma? The others? Hmm... I wonder who...?
347.H1700: Admiraaal! 17...00! Strongest Battleships... Strongest Battleships... Ah, I know! Warspite! That ship was powerful. I kinda remember it.
347.H1800: Admiral! 18...00! It's nighttime. It's so dark! What are we doing for tonight? No, I mean dinner!
347.H1900: Nom nom... Admiral! 19...00! Tonight is also at Mammiya's...Nom nom... I'm so happy! Nom Nom... Let's eat at Mammiya's tomorrow or even after!
347.H2000: Admiraaal! 2000! It's already nighttime. So daaark! Night battle? I wonder... You Japanese really love night battles.
347.H2100: Admiraaaal! 2100~ I felt a bit sleepy~ You don't feel sleepy, Admiral? Really? How matured...
347.H2200: 2200~ Admiral! Big trouble! The Japanese light cruisers are making a ruckus. It's kinda loud! Why is that? Oh, let them be? Really?
347.H2300: Admiraaal! 2300~! Today was a good day~ Let's do our best for tomorrow, too!
